text_cleaned: Just another night. Another night of feeling lonely and just wondering what I did wrong in life to deserve this unhappiness. I have never felt a pain stronger than being rejected by the love of your life. The person who give you a purpose. The person who is supposed to make everything better. You would give your life for this person and they just do not love you anywhere near the same.

Is it possible to fake depression? I have been feeling bad for about month now. There are period where I cry on a daily basis, I never feel like talking, I struggle concentrating and collecting thoughts, I feel such an extreme sadness inside of me also in happy situations, I am exhausted all the time even if I sleep hour straight, I often have headaches, I am completely alone and I find it difficult to do anything. There are night where it is unbearable. I think about my situation I am completely alone, I am failing at anything because I am so weak I cannot handle my feelings, I feel guilt for everything that happens around me, I cannot carry on anymore, I am always here in this dark place and I feel that I have no right to be like this. I used to self harm and I still have many scar on my skin, but I think to be disrespectful to those who truly struggle then I promised to cut never again. I should not have the right to do so. My life is void, I am void, and I cannot get the energy to do anything ever. I do not get pleasure from what I used to love, nothing seems to make me feel something good. I can enjoy no series, no book, no videogame like I used to. I think I do not even deserve to eat. I am just trying to pity myself giving myself depression, but I do not have it. Is it possible to fake depression? Could it actually be an excuse for me to not take responsibility of the failure that I am?

Imagine being attractive Imagine what it would be like to be desired, to have someone look at you not in disgust or ambivalence. It is all just a roll of the dice, It is too bad if you roll poorly you will be treated objectively worse. I wish I wa born attractive.. fuck

Best moment to have anxiety It is am, I am tired, want to get up early, and guess what ? My brain decided this Instead of sleeping, why do not you become half crazy, thinking about your future should I say the lack of future ? . Here, have some craving for cigarettes, my pleasure, and of course i know you do not have cigarettes, do you think I am stupid ? The middle of the night is the best moment for thinking of smoking when you cannot smoke. Think of your loneliness. Think of you inexistant social life. You are and you have no job. You are living with your boring mother, with whom you literally quarel with every day. She probably think you are a piece of shit. You never had any girlfriend, and you probably will not. Almost , do not count on me to congratulate you.. Your only sunbeam will be at New year is Eve, when you will travel to see your best friends. But guess what, since you have no money at all, you probably will have to work to sell fu ng pastries, and because of that you will not be able to see your friends. Then you will continue to argue with your mother. Living on the couch. Selling pastries. In entire loneliness. God only know how long. The funny thing say my brain is this you are a loser, you lived and worked on your own not so long ago. But you are a child, you have the power to do what you want, where you want. You are , for God is sake, so why do not you move your as ? Leave me alone brain, I already know all that. I would be a king if I could. But I will not. Funny how despair can suck the marrow of your life, how even when you are ready to fall in the deepest pit, you have absolutely no will to catch the rope. TL DR FML. Have a good day night everyone !

I wa just curious what your feeling are on long-term outcome for depression. A little background for me I have been on and off medicine for several years. I wa always depressed a a child, but did not really seek professional help until maybe year ago. I originally went on medicines. for severe pm prescribed to me by my ob-gyn. I just kind of continued on with it because it made me feel leveled out . Then I had issue with sleep apnea, joint pain etc. My neurologist put me on Effexor. Every time I tried to go off that drug I wa dizzy and had bad side effects. Finally, I reduced the dose myself and weaned myself off the Effexor. I had gained a tremendous amount of weight. I wa off all medicine for month and then I really feel into a dark depression. It wa then that I sought a therapist, etc. I have been on medicine ever since..since June of . I had lost pound by going off the medicines, but then became depressed again. following several death and major life events. I wa put on Lexapro and gained weight. Not wanting to gain weight again, I hated being on the medicines. He kept saying it will stabilize. I told him that the weight gain wa making me more depressed. Finally, he changed my medicine to Wellbutrin. We talked about trying to go off medicine when life event settled down..my main reason to go off wa the weight gain. Immediately the weight came back off. That wa a year ago. Now a year later, I am still losing about a pound or two a month. The last time I went in, he did not say anything about going off the medicines. How long do people take medicines? Is it just better to stay on them and not fall back into the hole? Are there any long-term use side effect to be concerned with? Is this something I will probably be on forever? It just seems like I will always be like this. It just seems like depression is always just standing back in the shadows. I go for a very long time and feel fine and then I have a week where I get very down and know that if I wa not on medicines. it would be very bad. I have not gone to talk to my therapist in a long while. When I am having these bout of depression, should I call and say I need to go in for a check-up . I do not really have any specific issue to discuss. The big thing right now is I just feel down because I have lost my closest friend and do not feel like I have any friend to do anything with. I feel so isolated. Would it be good to just call and go in? I just feel stupid saying I feel sad because I do not have any friends. Are there any good book that you can recommend on self-help--esp. negative thinking, understanding why I think the way I do, etc. I found Dr. Phil is book on Life Strategies to be very helpful in discovering that there are reason why I do thing and think.

My hearing, attentiveness and social awareness ha been completely off since dropping into a very low depressive period a of late. Normal? Walking through a busy shopping center today and I feel heavy and zoned out. I ordered food at a bakery and could barely hear my voice a I spoke. I did not hear the employee very well and unknown to me like high school kid entered a I wa browsing and I did not even notice until I visually saw them. The sunlight drain me quick. And when crossing a street I often triple take even when absolutely nothing is coming. Fuck this.

Hello out there.. Ugh. I battle with depression, anxiety, bulimia, OCPD, BPD, and some physical health issues. Not so sure about battle right now. Maybe more like grudgingly coexist with? I am . I have never held a job with the same company for longer than years, and that wa just once. A few time I think I have made it to the year mark with a company. year is a bit easier. I had to quit my last job because it wa too easy to use the job to fuel the eating disorder. I lost of my starting weight in about months, before I switched phase and ended up with a pulmonary embolism from refeeding syndrome. Right now I am in the initial hurry up and deny me so I can get an attorney phase of applying for disability. Thankfully I have a sister who is letting me live in her house, so at least I am not homeless. TBH, most of the time she is out of the country, and when she is here, she is just a selectively social a I am. Because of waiting to get on disability, I am off my medicine. I cannot even afford the cheapest ACA insurance, and even if I had that, I could not afford the copays for my medicine. I am not eligible for Medicaid in my state until I get approved for SSI SSDI. I am not too worried about not having my antidepressant right now tho. This is probably the most pleasant major depressive episode I have ever had. It is not so much feeling horrible psychic pain a it is just been a gentle bleeding out of the vibrancy of life. I sleep a late a I can every day, usually until around or so , hang out in bed playing games, reading, or watching videos, and only really waking up and being willing to be awake around in the evening. I do not feel like I am living anymore. I am just in a holding pattern. I think back to what my life wa like, even month ago, and I mourn for it. At least I am not suicidal. I think I just need a place where I can come every so often and unload my mind. Thanks for sticking around to the end of the post.

Hi. I am new to the forums. I wa going to lurk for a bit before I posted, but there is so many of us, I mean, I knew. but I did not know.. you know? it seems like the thing to do. I am a year old male and I have had problem with depression for a long a I can remember, though it is become worse over the last year or so. I wa pretty heavily involved in music and martial art for years, but I am no longer motivated to do either. I am still going to school, though Hi. I am new to the forums. I wa going to lurk for a bit before I posted, but there is so many of us, I mean, I knew. but I did not know.. you know? it seems like the thing to do. I am a year old male and I have had problem with depression for a long a I can remember, though it is become worse over the last year or so. I wa pretty heavily involved in music and martial art for years, but I am no longer motivated to do either. I am still going to school, though I have no real direction and I am afraid that my lack of motivation is going to cause me to screw that up too. I started having anxiety attack about a year ago and they have increased in frequency the last few months. They are not to sound melodramatic the hardest thing I have ever had to deal with. If I am in panic-attack mode, any slight pain or discomfort quickly becomes a life-threatening illness that is surely going to kill me in the next few minutes. As ridiculous a that sounds, it is absolutely real when it is happening and I live in almost constant fear it is going to happen again. I have a hard time even driving anymore especially on the freeway and increasingly rely on my girlfriend for menial thing like going to the store. She is very supportive and is aware that something is wrong, though I do not think she understands to what extent. I have started completely avoiding any situation in which I have to meet new people and have a hard time even talking to people I do not know on the phone. These symptom have been increasing in intensity over the last month or so and exponentially for the last week I just lost my job . It seems like quite a few of you have been dealing with these sort of thing for much longer and I am sorry if my posting here so soon seems insensitive, but it already getting to the point where I know I cannot handle living like this for year on end. I have suffered from depression for relative to my age a long time and the anxiety attack are absolutely terrifying a little redundant, I know . It feel like the last year is the beginning of everything completely falling apart. I guess my posting here is a way to get the ball rolling towards getting some help. I do not have health insurance anymore and I am not sure where to go from here. I have been medicated in the past, but I have not taken anything in a few years. Though, without insurance I am not even sure that is an option. That is enough for now. Thanks for providing a resource like this. The anonymity of the internet let me say some of the thing I am afraid to say to everyone else.

An Open Letter Dear you, It is been three year since we decided to go our separate ways. We both had different goals, desire and aspirations. We were perfect together, but just at the wrong time. I am sorry thing ended badly. I am sorry that for month after they spiraled out of control. I am sorry. I am sorry I let you down, your family down. I am sorry I buckled. I am sorry I did not have the experience or the know-how to react to certain situations. I am sorry that I made mountain out of molehills. I am sorry at time I treated you badly, that at time I held you back. Three year later, we live totally different life than back then. I got that job. I traveled the world. I went to Italy - twice. I have been to Times Square at midnight, and so have you. I did it all, but by myself. It is not what I wanted. It is not what I envisioned. You cannot just replace somebody special with another person, and that you were. Special. It is been three years. Despite some triumph and successes, it still feel like I lost a war. An immense failure that did not personify my persona, it personified myself. On the surface, I am told I seem ambitious, fully ready to attack each day. On the inside, I feel defeated. In the end, you found somebody new, which is fine. I chose, whether consciously or unconsciously to stay on a different path. I have tried new women. Many beautiful on the outside, but they are not you. Oh no, no, no. They all do not have what you had. Not even close. Maybe one day I will end this crusade against myself, against the past. I cannot change it, I cannot alter the story, I cannot lie to myself. I wish I could tell you I am sorry. But it would not change anything. For you it is a battle that wa fought long ago. For me, I relive it more time than I would care to admit. I am emotionally crippled, distraught, defeated. It is been a long three years. I am ready for it to be over. I am sorry. Yours truly, Me.

I just really need to vent.. For a start, I understand everyone in life are at different level and that depression and anxiety is different for everyone and I am in no way stating who ha it worst or better. I have taken hour and hour of training in it and I am not here to speak or preach about how to help.. In a rare occasion in my life I am asking for help, guidance, I do not know the correct word but maybe if I explain myself a bit it may help. This maybe long and I do apologize but I just need to say all of this SOMEWHERE.. I am gay guy that recently moved from a conservative town in Montana to the amazing city of Portland, OR. I came out of the closet the summer going into my freshman year of high school, dealt with a simply put shitty childhood while growing up in the Bible Belt of northern Florida, with an abusive father and worrying, even at the age of about how my future would play out in this. My mom divorced and remarried a man that doe not accept my sexuality personally but support my life decision and say he love me. We moved to Montana my mom, me and him and I began to feel like I did have a purpose when I wa introduced to acting onstage at a local theatre that I fell in love with. Life, for a few years, wa amazing but my high school at the time wa having a crisis. Unfortunately four student had committed suicide between my freshman and junior year and, with the help of many, started a suicide awareness program in the city and lead that for a year or so. My senior year, literally three day before it started, my military brother committed suicide on base, it wa suspected it wa also his sexuality. But also in my senior year, near the end of it, I met a man whom I fell in love with which is what I am getting too, just bare with me . We were able to spend a lot of time together for a month or two before he had to leave to Portland before I had gone for a work internship where he would go back home to Brazil once completed. He treat me like gold, and I really mean that, he ha been nothing but amazing to me. He flew me out to Portland so I could visit him for two week where we fell even more in love. Everything wa shattered when he left for home and I also left for an adventure. After I graduated, I had the amazing opportunity to go to the BEAUTIFUL island of Taiwan, where I spent an amazing year learning Chinese Mandarin , meeting people all around the world, experiencing a new culture for the first time, it wa indeed a life changing time for me. But it wa not easy for my boyfriend and I. We fought in occasion, texting make it really hard to communicate emotions, and we only had about two hour out of our day to talk due to the harsh time zone differences. The year went by quite quickly and he surprised me with yet another plane ticket to Portland where he would also land only two hour after I did and we would be together again. It wa only for two week again but I felt complete.. He even proposed on the Fourth of July. He wa yanked away from me again soon after and it tore me down. My heart crumbled. My next chapter in life had started once I arrived back from Taiwan and had seen my boyfriend again. I had decided I wanted to move to a Portland permanently, found a decent student housing apartment, enrolled for school, I wa excited.. now this is where thing become a bit much for me and why I am here today. My, now fianc , wa able to stay with me for a full month this time. Now at this point I am sure you wonder if you are still reading , why doe not he move here?, or why do not you move there? Here is why He wa on an exchange program when I met him that the Brazilian government paid for. The requirement for that visa is that he must stay in Brazil for two year before he can legally move back into the USA. In other words, he is stuck there while I am stuck here both separated and both in fear of him being rejected. We applied for the fianc visa and now we are waiting for the approval. I refuse to move where he life because of how high the crime rate is and due to Brazil is economic status, we both agreed it would not be good for a white American target to live in a high crime area. I know I have talked a lot about my fianc but here is also what is going on on my hand a well that I just wa not ready for. Before I moved to Portland, I had to go to urgent care because I had no primary doctor and no money, only Medicaid, which they took. I went three time for small bump on my hand that turned out to be stressed induced and all three time I went the doctor said I have no idea! Try using lotion and see what happens! Nodded their head and left. Very pointless but when I got the bill I wa shocked and confused. I thought my Medicaid had covered it, which it did not because while I wa out of country my Medicaid had expired and no one told me about it, therefore I wa left with a bill. I heard it off for a while because I had other thing to deal with than the bullshit that the hospital wa giving me about it. Around this time a well, I moved in with my best friend due to a dispute I had with my parents, which really crumbled me, but they still do not know how upset I am about it. I moved to Portland.. and now I believe I am regretting it.. I moved with that same best friend where we would also share the space with two others, a couple from Hawaii. We had Skyped then ahead of time in our excitement of moving and we were all excited to meet each other. I had a job lined up for me a a barista, I had a saving plan lined up for what I could and could not spend for money, school would be starting soon, thing were looking pretty nice! Well.. it is not nice. Not nice at all. The Hawaiian couple doe not like my friend and I. They stop our oven mitten and tried to say they were there is and hid them from us, refused to let u use the garbage can in the kitchen, and held little meeting about what it is we were doing wrong and how we could fix it.. I wa so thrown back I ignore them at any chance and even had to take time out of my life to tell them how upsetting it is we had reached a level where they had to actually put sticky note on thing we could touch and could not touch. I find myself to be quite tidy and clean and fair but I guess there are two side of the story always. That is the first thing. That job I had lined up a a barista? Big joke.. I met with the bos who said the store is not open yet and asked if I wanted to be a cashier for the university instead. I said why not, the pay wa amazing at . an hour and had benefits. I did my on-boarding and wa quite interested. First day on the job however they lied and put me in food service where I wa demanded around by two chef and four manager who did not know what the fuck they were doing. One of the chef is actually spilt boiling grease on my foot and did not even apologize. The other chef wa racist and talked bad about the Indian worker so much I had to leave his presence. It wa a toxic environment. Income tax in Oregon wa so high I wa not able to afford my apartment and realized I need to be working minimum wage to sincerely support myself here. I left after a month and am now struggling on finding a full time again. On a side note, because of cost and issue with finding a co-signed for a loan, I had to pull my enrollment for school a well. That is the second.. When my fianc came to visit me for a month, my best friend roommate wa very difficult.. it is a harsh word to use but she ha a lot of learning to do. I have been on my own since I wa in doing thing myself with the exception of paying my phone bill and buying a car . Taxes, jobs, appointments, etc., were all me. She need some help getting there and she ha done and amazing job to get there but.. every opportunity I hand her to take one more step of becoming independent she reject and shuts down completely. The whole month wa very hard for my fianc and I over how jealous and upset she got and it wa too much. Currently she is back home for Christmas and I am alone and quite frankly I needed it. I just do not know how to handle that situation. It wa a if she wa using her emotion against me and it wa poisonous. It go so bad my fianc and Igor an Airbnb our last two night together so it could just be me and him. That is the third.. I had to go to the emergency room a well when my fianc wa here due to yet another kidney stone. I got one in the th grade, near the end of my exchange program and one in a restaurant where the pain wa so bad I needed to call an ambulance.. more money on shit I cannot afford. I can go on and on with these story but I need to get to this.. it is my anxiety. I wa diagnosed with depression in high school but wa taken off of medication. I wa doing actually quite well! But most recently, with everything that is been going on, it is gotten really really bad. I am constantly anxed about everything.. when I walk down the street, I fear what people look at me as. Now I am not fat, I would say I am average but my cheek are so puffy and it really embarrasses me to even look in a mirror. I am constantly wondering why my fianc want to be with me, if he is cheating on me, lied to me, etc. I over stress about the smallest smallest things. Example I cried and broke down because I failed my driver test for the Oregon license. I physically felt like I wa going to die or the end of the world wa happening.. why? Why wa that happening to me? Why is this ALL happening to me? I miss my fianc , I cannot get stable, I now starting out a an adult is not supposed to be easy but guys.. this is really hard. I spend any day I have off in bed and I have only had one meal within two days. I know I need help but I do not have the money for it or the time. I have never felt this insecure about my life, future, body, everything. I feel like I am climbing up an escalator that is going the wrong way, and no amount of running will get me to the top. I do not know where else to go or who to talk to. I feel like I have annoyed everyone already enough about me that I no longer want to talk to literally anyone. My fianc sometimes even. Well if you have made it this far I thank you sincerely.. I just really needed to vent.

My dad died today So I am , coming on next month. Today my dad died at . He ha not been doing so well for a few days. Yesterday his leg gave out and he wa stuck on the bed with his lung in pain if he lay on his back. For hours, no sleep, food, or drink. Many more problem that I cannot remember, and he is been feeling like shit emotionally too due to family issues. My mom went to check in on him before going to the store. Since yesterday she is been trying to get him to go to the hospital but of course he is stubborn. When she came back from the store, she decided she would have the ambulance come and pick him up because he REALLY needed to go in. Slurring his words, despite actually being sober in the mornings. When she went back to get his consent over phone to get picked up for the ambulance, he wa out cold already. Lips purple, cold, lifeless. It had been only - minute since she last saw him, alive, or whatever wa left of his life. I wa there to see a fresh dead corpse. My dad. My dad. To say my world is crashing around me is an understatement. I am just a fucking kid, going through my own battle with myself and now my dad is just gone. I did not have the best relationship with him but he wa a really, really good guy and this sting like a bitch. All of it feel unreal and at the same time scarily real. Everything is numb. I am lost.

Constant battle between ambition and not wanting to live. Since I wa about I have had recurring suicidal thoughts. The thing is, I do not have low self esteem or anything of that sort, it is actually quite the opposite and I always joke about being a narcissist. I may not be an actual narcissist, but I have always had a slight superiority complex. I do not hate myself, but I just hate my life and the continuous chore known a living. On the outside, I have always been the life of the party, but deep down I do not ever remember being happy. As someone who is highly ambitious, it feel a if there is a never ending struggle between wanting to be successful enough to be well known or have an impact on the world, and wanting to stop existing. Yet with the prospect of the latter, come the failure of the former. I know that if I lowered my expectation in life I would be mildly happier, yet the thought of settling for mediocrity give me horrible anxiety and fill me with dread. Recently thing have gotten worse due to my university workload. I have been having trouble completing assignment and functioning in general. I have considered getting help but I feel deeply uncomfortable at the thought of opening up to someone, since I am not a very emotional person. I have come to accept that I will probably never be happy. I have always wondered if I would be more likely to actually commit suicide if I ever attained the level of success I desire since I would have then achieved my goal in life, or if that would finally bring me the contentment I seek. I suppose it would be the former since I can never be content.

A letter to my sister, who ha conquered her depression The letter you always wanted to write.. Family stuff happened and those wound in you festered and festered. No one knew at the beginning. You hid it well under your sleeve and at the back of your eyes. Before it all happened, I sometimes looked at you and thought that this would happen to you. It is the way you used to hold your emotion. It is a if you were full to the brim with it, but you forced it down, shoved it into a box and hid it away. It wa strange, but I wa too young to understand. And then, slowly but surely, it took you over. You were so young. In my worst nightmare I imagined finding your lifeless body. I could not wake you up. You would not wake up. My darling sister, even now I still imagine your cold body. How can such a deathly and frightening disease exist? You wasted away. Your cheek were concave, and you did not even have to bend over for every bone of your spine to be visible. Your sharp wit and intelligent mind dulled. Your eye were dark hole in your face. They were so empty. You slept all afternoon and night. I would lay my cardigan over you so you would not get cold. But I do not think it made a difference. You were lost to us, floating in some different universe with no anchor or thread holding you to us. And then you tried to end it all. Multiple times. When I think about it, I blame you sometimes. But I know that the blame is not really towards you. It is towards me, of course. I am your sister. I should have been your protector. Is it OK if I say that I could not really do anything but stand there and watch it run it course? Or is that just an excuse? You are my best friend, even though I am not always yours. I wish I would be kinder to you, but I probably will always hold some of myself away. Maybe I am punishing myself. I do not know. No one can say it did not take a toll on all of us. You probably do not remember, but we were going to the corner shop together once. As we chatted, you were vehement that you were a failure. I asked you, what on earth were you a failure at? What life had you lived that you possibly could have failed? And you said I failed at life. So what wa the alternative, my dear? Death? I am telling you, I lived those few year in the fear that you would be taken away from u by your own hand. Even a I am writing this, I do not know where to start or end. In my mind, it is such a mess. It doe not matter because you are well now. I have never seen someone work harder. You are radiant and beautiful and clever and sarcastic and so special I could not tell you how much if I tried. I hope you will always appreciate the battle you have fought and won. I hope you always believe you are a success. I wish you all the happiness you deserve. Love you, babe. Your sister

Falling back into it I am , and this weekend, I got into a big argument with my girlfriend of months. We had not seen each other in weeks, and our plan to see each other fell through. I tried to save our plans, but she seemed disinterested. I wa so distraught and caught up in sadness and self-hatred that I, wanting to distance myself from the situation, not just leaving it alone, told her I wanted to break up with her out of sheer emotional irrationality. It turn out I wa sadder without her, and she reached out to me to talk soon later. We got back together, and she said she wa okay. The way she described the whole situation let me know she understood my plight completely, but I ruined her that day and she is been off ever since. She painted her nail black, screamed at her parents, texted all her friend to tell them how much of a terrible person I was, wrote Anon is a piece of shit cunt in her bathroom mirror in sharpie, and cried all day from the story she told. I have fallen into a depression of guilt to a magnitude that I have not experienced since I wa a self-loathing near-friendless th grader with pent up emotion drowning it all out with video game while tanking his grades, watching the few distant friend get reward after reward, trophy after trophy. I feel like I am a piece of shit that doe not deserve to breathe the air on this earth, and I do not know what to do. My parent are very unsympathetic and judgmental and my brother is borderline abusive. My girlfriend is the only one left who understands me. At this point, it is just me who ha the problem, a she is gotten over the whole debacle, or so she says. Her mom even said ehh, you two were just stressed out teenager , but I am still not convinced. I feel like there is something deeply wrong with me. Is there any advice or word of wisdom that I need to hear? I want to get back to normal. I do not know how I will deal with feeling completely alone again and losing the people close to me emotionally.

I do not know what it is like to be not depressed. Hi my name is ahmulz and I am depressed. Been depressed arguably since I wa now . I have joined a gym. I do pole dancing. I got a cat. I have a therapist. I am medicated. I volunteer more. I see occasional good thing in myself. I am not actively suicidal anymore. Yet.. I am still depressed. I have changed my life so fucking much and I am still fucking depressed. I still have more work to do to fix myself fucking diet, fucking exercise, bullshit mindfulness but it all just feel like so much goddamn work at the end of the day. I do not know what I am working towards. I cannot comprehend a world in which I do not wake up in an apartment that need to be cleaned because I am too tired and too lazy to do it or that I do not spend my time in a numb, self-loathing void. I do not know how people get through their day liking themselves or liking their life. It is frustrating and lonely. There are some day where I wish I wa suicidal because the rest of my life would not feel so long and full of drudgery. I cannot see me getting well. I just cannot.

I just need my spirit to settle In it totality it doe not have to be about win and loses, or what I failed to do. Neither doe it have to be about my past year and the thought that come with immense feeling that appears to haunt me. The behavior and mentality that I have doe not have to be the end all be all. One major thing to include that it not about growth or conquering something in life. I am not living to grow or to become strong after a catastrophic situation. I am looking for my spirit to simply just settle. I am not seeking any advice nor trying to raise my fist towards challenges. I am not seeking any of that just a settling of the inner me. To me, that is important than anything else because I would gladly be able to live with that when I one day be out of this earth. I am not the goal oriented type. Its not about climbing this ladder of life. I am not here for any of what most people are striving for. I seek for my spirit to settle for all these years. That is what I am chasing. Most people are chasing dreams, families, success, marriages, money, respect, and fame, but not this human. More power to them and I am sure they will obtain all those thing but I for one am not seeking to obtain. The human game is a serious thing filled with loss and wins. I do not wanna count anymore nor try to get to the next level of life. Cycling through the infinite regret and regression. The only goal is for this spirit to settle some type of way. I am gunning for an internal calmness. Something that can penetrate and flood the mind of mine. Something that can provide some internal at ease like affect for myself. So I say to my spirit, I hope you settle.

Does anyone else get very angry at just stupid little things? It seems like over the last few month everyone around me is getting all they want out of life, and I am suffering with depression. Which, of course, make me feel worse and then I feel guilty for not being happy for them. BUT, I also get angry when they flaunt their happiness around me. My roommate just started seeing someone she met off eharmony. We both signed up at the same time for fun, and while I wa rejected time and time again, she wa SO picky and then started seeing the first guy she went out with. I am happy that she found someone and she really deserves it, but I get so ANGRY that she is constantly doing thing with him. It is like I have been replaced. I feel like a year old for thinking that, but I just cannot help how I feel. Today, for example, I asked her if she wanted to watch a movie I had gotten off our digital cable. We have it until tonight and she said she would like to. I wa pretty excited seeing a how I had not been invited to a couple of event this weekend in lieu of ZACH going. Well, she just came down stair and said that Zach is going to be coming over now. This tick me off because she broke our plans, and I do not have a way to escape when they are here. I am sure she is going to want to watch that movie with Zach, and, I know I am being selfish, but I do not WANT him here tonight. I have not gotten to see Angela all weekend and the one night we have before going back to work HE is going to be here. So I have to put on my happy face and pretend that I am glad for her and happy that she ha someone and engage him in conversation when all I will feel like doing is crying. It is unfair! Why doe it seem like when you are depressed, everyone around you ha these GREAT thing happening in their life. Angela just got a promotion, a new car, and now a new boyfriend. I am stuck in the same job, same crushing car payment, and I have not dated anyone in over years.

I just took a shower for the first time in weeks, and I just washed my hair for the first time in months. I know that is absolutely disgusting, but Depression ha made me lose all will to do anything, and that includes hygiene. I know it is pathetic to be proud of myself for doing something normal people do every day, but I cannot help but feel happy about myself.

I am lost. I do not know what to do. Hey guys. This is my first post here, I made this account because I need to vent and I have no one else to listen to me. To an outsider, my life seems okay I am married to a great guy, I have a good job that pay well, my family is healthy and I have friends. To me, my life is unbearable. I am not ungrateful and I really do appreciate everything that I have in my life, but it is very hard for me to get out of bed in the morning and live out my day. One of my main problem is my weight. I know this may seem vain to some of you, but it is a huge problem for me, someone who already struggle with low self esteem. I have gained about lb in a year, and I cannot control what I eat, nor can I motivate myself to work out. I do not recognize myself anymore, none of my old clothes fit, and I cannot seem to be able to do anything about it. Every day, I tell myself, I will eat healthy, I will make better decisions, I will not hate myself, I will not speak down to myself, etc.. Each and every day, I fail. This kill me. My second problem is that I have a well paying job but it is very stressful and demanding. It take up the majority of my day and this stress feed into my poor eating habits. I have considered quitting but I cannot justify saying no to the money. I am scared that if I quit to try to focus on myself, I will just eat more and more because I will be le busy. I am a lazy, unmotivated person who is notorious for making excuse for herself. I really need some guidance. I hate waking up. I hate getting out of bed. I do not even want to shower or function. I do not know what to do.

This morning M finally confessed and now I know the truth This IS summer here. I realize I spend a lot of time talking about food, the weather and nudity on this blog, but these seem to be re-occurring theme of my new life and, really -- what is more important than having nice food while naked in excellent weather? Not much, I say. So, despite the long arduous month of patiently awaiting the promised beauty of a Dutch summer, what I am really getting is this Virtually constant canopy of gray black clouds? Check! Scarves and light jacket lest the freezing summer temperature turn your nipple to stone? Check! Got your umbrella for sudden downpour that may or may not contain hail? Check Check! Surly attitude because you cannot wear your pretty sandal unless you like blue toe and your boyfriend is been lying to you for month about the upcoming lekker warm weather? Check and check and check! Try to ignore that previous blog entry within which I detailed all the nice thing about Holland at this time of year and the fact that the weather wa oven-hot. Apparently, that wa a freak of nature. Though I do still love the little lambs.

I have had a rough time of thing lately, which is partly what made me search for this site. I have had recurrent unipolar depression since my mid teen with an associated anxiety disorder and a panic disorder that took root year ago after I beat a drink problem I had at the time between the age of and I used alcohol a a bit of a crutch which wa a huge mistake . Anyway these day I am teetotal, on anti depressant and only really get a bad time with my depression A during the winter month or B if something trigger an episode circumstantial . Usually it lift up in the summer month I think I might get a bit of SAD but last year my mother passed away on the rd of March and it caused a huge crash in my mood which never lifted in time before the winter episode took hold. I dealt with it by comfort eating I do comfort eat at times, but I also get bad food craving in the winter for food such a chocolate, cheese and carbohydrates, so pizza and chocolate ice-cream became my regular fodder for a while . Anyway that lead to weight gain which is besides the point but which I wa planning on correcting a I have done before this summer when the food craving wear off and my mood lifted. Unfortunately it is not lifted a of yet due to recent circumstances. Not only did I have the first anniversary of my mother is death to deal with, but my partner whom I loved very much decided that this would be the best time to dump me and completely rip me to shred in the process. He basically emailed he life in another city a few day before the anniversary of her death saying he wanted to end it. I tried to contact him but he would not talk on the telephone or by voice, and would not respond to any email I sent him. He then contacted me by IM on the day of her anniversary rd March to rip me to shred and tell me that he could not love someone like me before posting publicly on his journal running me down before posting disturbing reply to some of the post on my journal anonymously but I recognized his ISP number so I know it wa him even though he denied it making it sound a though the whole thing wa deliberate. I would not mind but it came out of the blue, the night before all this started he wa discussing a work transfer to move to where I am and signed off with I love you . Next day, wham. I am social phobic so do not really have many friend I cant talk to about this, my mother wa usually the one id turn to but she is not here anymore, so my mood, although it usually lift at this time of year, ha taken a nose dive and I am having trouble getting myself motivated again. The emotional pain I felt on that Thursday wa like nothing I had felt for years, I just literally felt like my heart had been ripped out of my chest. I could not sleep and I could not eat for the best part of that week, although I am eating and sleeping again now. Am I over reacting to what he did, because I am hurt a hell and completely and utterly infuriated with him at the same time? I know I can be slightly prone to being a bit of a drama queen at time over reacting to stuff and I can sometimes be a little paranoid. But the whole thing felt deliberate a though he intentionally intended to hurt me, and even now when I try to contact him to get answer he is being spiteful and running me down. Of course after this I spat a whole load of vitriol at him and now I am being painted a the one that wa in the wrong, and he is saying he did nothing that warranted the vitriol and is the innocent party in all of this. Of course he also interprets home truth a vitriol, and I tend to be very open and say thing a I see them, to the point of lacking tact now and again. But whilst I am willing to stand up and say I made a few mistake and apologize, he is acting a though the blame is all mine and he did nothing wrong. I just cannot seem to make him understand that the way he went about ending the relationship wa one of the most hurtful way anyone could have done it. I know he claim to suffer from bipolar disorder which he wont get treatment for, and I know that can make him highly moody, but I cant understand why he doe not understand the hurt he caused me, or if he does, how someone who professed to love me, doe not even seem to care. He seems totally and utterly cold, so cold it is chilling. I know he get period of emotional flatness because he told me, and he also told me he hears voice a well. Could he be suffering from some kind of depression related psychosis? One post he made to my journal wa Wisdom come only to those who seek it, and sometimes to those who deserve it regardless of perfection, intent or even understanding. The common denominator though, seems to be deed. For one must do, or be done to, in order for wisdom to take root. Am I misreading that? Or reading into it? So am I over reacting? Was I wrong to argue back with him? How can I move on and get my motivation back again?

Hi, I am pretty sure I am suffering from depression, and probably have been for the last month or so. It is only been lately that I feel like the rug ha really been jerked out from under me, though. I think it started in mid- when I became seriously ill. Between June and September , I spent three week in the hospital, umpteen visit to the E R, and finally, major surgery to correct the problem. Physically, I am fine now. But we had no health insurance long story , and when the hospital bill started rolling in, we tried our best to pay the bills, but there wa just no way. We ended up filing bankruptcy, I lost my home business, and we very nearly lost our home. Ever since then, I have felt like I am falling down a dark tunnel, even though the bankruptcy is over with. I wa drinking part of this time, but have stopped, thinking that may have been causing the problem. But it is actually become worse since I have stopped. Here is my symptom I do not usually have trouble falling asleep, but I cannot seem to stay asleep for more than a couple of hours. It is hard to go back to sleep, so I usually just get up. Weight gain because I find myself eating even when I am not hungry. The comfort food thing, I guess. I tend to be a stress eater, and goodness know I have had a lot of that lately! I used to enjoy camping and reading book etc. , but I do not care about any of that anymore. I could not sit down now and read a book no matter how much I wanted to. I get through or pages, and totally lose interest. That is depressing in itself, because I used to love reading so much. I have no desire to get out and do anything. I literally close myself up in my spare bedroom every waking hour, only coming out to use the bathroom and to fix supper for my husband. I feel like I have nothing to look forward to. I am not happy, but I cannot pinpoint exactly what would make me happy. I honestly cannot think of anything. I have no energy whatsoever. I have been dealing with a TON of guilt over the bankruptcy. After all, the bankruptcy would not have happened if I had not gotten sick, you know? I feel horrible for dragging my husband is credit down along with mine, but the way thing were, I could not file bankruptcy by myself. Our credit wa PERFECT until I got sick. My husband sold a bunch of his personal belonging to help pay bills, a did I, but it wa so unfair for him to have lost his stuff on account of me. He is never once complained, but I still feel terrible. I have also been kicking myself for the loss of my home business. I cannot help but feel like if it had not failed I could not keep up with it during my illness , that we would not have had to file bankruptcy. I have never been a crier, but I sure feel like it sometimes. I cannot seem to do anything right these days. Irritable!! Throwing stuff, being unreasonable, getting mad about petty things. The one thing I have not experienced thankfully is suicidal thoughts. A few random morbid thought here and there, but nothing I would ever act on. Last night I took several online self-tests, and all of them said I had mild to moderate depression. One even said severe. I guess the next step would be to go to the doctor, but I do not have a doctor. My sister is taking Zoloft for panic attack and a PMS disorder, so I guess I will ask her who she is seeing. What do they do .. just ask question similar to the online questionnaires? Or? I have been reading about all the different kid of medicines, and found the information about Wellbutrin to be the most interesting. Obviously the doctor would know what I need better than I would, but I sure do not want to take something that is going to make me gain even more weight or feel like a zombie. At least one good thing, though. We do, thankfully, have insurance now. Another issue is my husband and family. To them, depression is something that people should be able to just shake off . They do not understand that I CAN T seem to shake it off , otherwise, I gladly would. My husband is supportive in other ways, but he scoffed when my sister started taking Zoloft. To them, if they cannot see the problem, it doe not exist. I am sure they do not mean to be mean , but they just do not understand. Sorry for rambling. Any suggestion or thoughts?

How is it going, all who read. My name is Greg, I am and have had depression for basically a long a I remember. Here is a brief history of my journey through depression and the treatment I have endeavored. I began on lexapro. It seemed to be helping and then it quit on me or perhaps vice versa . After that I tried zoloft, and wellbutrin, but to the same effect. Then I turned my world to narcotic mainly, marijuana and DXM . They helped ALOT, but because they are illegal, I felt a constant public stigma and guilt. I could not take it, despite the amazing effect of both drugs. I am now taking Paxil CR, but I am going to quit it because it is not working. I am beginning to lose hope altogether. It seems apparent to me that SSRIs just are not for me, or maybe I just have not found the right one. The real problem with depression is that you have to wait a month on each drug just to see it it is going to work. Those month can feel like years. Anyways, that is who I am. I hope to make a few friend here, and a lot of advice a well. Does anyone one else share these symptom if so, and if you think you can help contact me please Chronic fatigue, lack of motivation desire, inability to enjoy life, insomnia including the other obvious and supplementing symptom The real killer is I know I have the potential to be someone great, but I have to become happy first..Greg

Maybe They are Wrong About It All We are always told when you are depressed, your brain is lying to you about how bad everything is . What if they are wrong? If someone is piss poor and starving, cannot pay their bills, replace their moth-eaten clothes or go out to do interesting things, surely their money situation really IS a bad a all that. If someone ha no family, no friend and ha been bullied abused by everyone they have met in life, perhaps their social situation really IS a bad a all that. If someone ha had lot of physical health issue like cancer, chronic pain, obesity etc, maybe their physical woe really ARE a bad a all that. Some people go through all of the above, all at once. So maybe life IS a bad a all that for them. The whole your brain is lying about how bad thing are thing often just feel like you are just imagining your problem . Like, I know depression etc make your brain incapable of dealing with them properly, but it doe not mean legitimate problem do not exist and that some people is life are not thoroughly worthless all the same.

Nice to see you too!! How are you today? I think you really have hit the mark on what I wa trying to express with this question - all the negativity and darkness that is contained in almost every medium outlet you can name. The disaster you mention, such real human tragedy but the way the medium went after it wa appalling and seemed to be muddled in politics and ratings. As for those forensic show - ugh! I used to be able to watch them but way before this recent episode of mine I stopped. I could not stand the heartache of knowing what evil lurks out there. Where I work now one of the first friend I made wa a gentleman who ha since retired. He told me that he did not read the news, watch TV or listen to the radio except for light jazz because he found that to do so wa just too much pain, it did not serve him to subject himself to that kind of pain. He seemed to be generally very happy and upbeat to me so there must be something to it. As for your friend - that is a tough one but maybe since she is your friend she might understand if you explain to her how incredibly painful her TV choice are on you. Does she ever read or post here? Anyway, it is GREAT talking with you again and I look forward to the next chat. I hope you have a wonderful day and weekend.

But I am still sitting here. Like in a shock. It feel like it is too late for the studying thing exam are in spring and I have no idea about the subject and skip all class I am paying for and I have no idea what else to do with my time. Any idea how to get myself to get up and DO SOMETHING? The sitting around is what is probably making me most depressed, because I watch my life burn down and kind of cannot do anything about. PLEASE do not suggest to get professional help. I know, it is the most rational thing, especially for the eating thing, but right now, I just cannot, I really cannot

SN, I hear what you are saying about not being able to weather another strike against your stability now. And I hope you do not have to go. I will pray with you that you are spared from the cut this time, but while you are praying and hoping, consider the issue of your personal power. If you are feeling shaky in other area of life, I doubt that you feel that you have any. I have been in that situation over many things. Remember the difference between what you DO have control over and what you do NOT have control over you can control the way you approach this job, your punctuality, your diligence, your politeness to other worker you CANNOT control the decision made on the top and how they will affect your status. I have been reading a book called Corporate Confidential by Cynthia Shapiro. She wa an HR manager for her whole life and spill the bean on how company decide who will stay and who will go. It wa an eye-opener for me. Perhaps it can help you at this juncture. In your own prayers, remember to ask God not just for the optimal decision to be made on your behalf, but for the power to see where you do and do not have control and for help taking charge of the area that you actually can control. When you are in a phase of instability, it seems that more and more garbage get thrown your way. But a turning point come when the indignation of being tossed on everyone else is sea propels you into action. That turning point came for me about year ago when a really awful roommate had to be ejected. I felt a power I had never felt before - the ability to take charge of my own life, not waiting for someone else is decision to tell me whether I wa going to be OK or not. I am trying to find my way back to that point. I hope you do too. It can happen.

I have posted a few time on these forum and everyone ha always been so helpful and supportive, so I am hoping I can get some help with this. For the last few weeks, my depression ha been so horrendous, worse than it is ever been, that I have not been able to go to work. I keep calling in sick, and then when I can finally make myself go, I hide in the bathroom cry or go to an empty office not in my cubicle and call my mother and cry to her. I have been in touch with my pdoc, who is in the process of passing me off to another doctor. Granted, it is at my request, a he is not on my insurance. However, he is not willing to put me on any other type of medication since he will not be seeing me regularly. I have spoken to my long - time pdoc from Dallas, my hometown, and he know me very well. I trust him more than any other doctor, which is not saying much, but he say that I am unipolar, aka major depressive disorder, and a mood stabilizer would be the next best thing to try since all the antidepressant are not working. wa taking mg celexa, just upped to mg when this all started. I am seeing a new pdoc that is covered by my insurance on Monday, so maybe thing will move forward. Ok, so back to the work thing. My supervisor is not sympathetic to my problem. In all fairness, I have not told her details. I find that most people do not consider mental disease a real medical problem. She suggested that I talk to Human Resources about taking some type of leave if I do not know when I will be better. I am working on that and hoping one of these doctor will sign for me. The biggest problem I have is the guilt over missing work. I never imagined that the depression could get so bad that I could not just suit up and show up. That is been my motto every time thing get rough. I guess I am looking for validation here. If I really do have it in my to get to work, I certainly cannot find it. I am a very responsible person, so this is not like me. The only time I have ever called in sick is when I wa having depression issues, but never more than one day. Everyone get a sick day, and I never get the flu or anything, so I do not feel guilty about those days. What do I do? Am I looking at this the wrong way? It is so hard to be objective when you are so low. My saving grace is that my parent who are far away in Dallas are being the most supportive people in the world. They believe me when I say I just cannot get to work, since that is not like me, but that is not like them either, so I know they want me to get there if I can. Thanks to anyone who took the time to read this. I am hoping someone else ha gone through it and can help.

Is it unhealthy to try and solve other people issue instead? I find that the worse I feel, the more I try and solve other people is problems. Is this unhealthy for me? It is always other people is mental issue that I am unable to fix but I feel like I have to try.

Just a little update - my temporary an hour job wa the foot in the door I needed. Two week later and I am on day one of a higher paying, with benefits, permanent job with these people. Granted it is still in the same agency a my last job down here, but different division. It is good though that I can just walk down the street during lunch and have lunch with the girl from my old office. I did miss them and their good gossip. By my birthday in September we will all be in the same building, we move in August and they do on my birthday, so that will be fun! While I wa pregnant I wa sure I would want to be a stay at home mom. After having Toby I thought I did then a well.. month later and I wa dying to get out of the house and back to work. I do miss him but I do not envy my husband is job of taking care of him and the house and our pacifier business while I get rest at work. I get to have lunch, take my time and go to the bathroom when I need to, and talk to real adult about non baby stuff in non baby speak. And the best part - I am getting out of the house! And I have a reason to not wear pajama all day. I also really do appreciate my time with Toby more. I do not see it a a chore anymore. Phew.

Hi, after post on the DF I am finally beginning to work out the format. Excuse the typo is a going through Prozac withdrawal and kind of shaky! I am year old, I live in the UK, Studied psychology, trained psychiatric nurse, behavior family therapist, and trainee CB therapist. Not sure if I can go back to my CBT course a I have missed so much time from university due to my current episode. This is my worst episode ever. I have had depression for years, and have been ashamed and embarrassed by it. As my life seems to be ebbing away, I have come out with it and seeking psychiatric help. My problem ha been that I work in psychiatry and have feared loosing my job career. It mean everything to me. It is the only thing I have and could not bare seeing it go down the toilet. Friends do not understand and know how to discus the topic with me. My family doe not know a it would devastate an already broken family. For year I have suffered in silence, cried silent screams, been tormented by my own brain. I hate imagining living a life like this especially when the long term effect I am reminded of every day my patient . The only person I had wa my ex girlfriend, we split last year. CAUSE? me. Stress got the better of me, my thinking became screwed and I have lost her, for life. She wa the only one I could talk to, some one I had known for, odd years. Depression ha ruined my life. This episode ha been an eye opener. This is the first time planet earth is hearing about my struggle. Something, which may have otherwise been lost. My secret buried with me. Do not confuse this a a suicide note. It is not. It is me talking about thing in this way for the first time. I am over the crisis point but nowhere near my usual self and need to sort my medicine out with my doctor a soon a possible. I have had a brave chat with my bos who is going to sort out a psychiatrist in the next days, all being well. I have only taken one OD in with a serious intent to kill myself. Doctors said I survived a I woke up. For year I have avoided talking about it, never wanted to see a psychiatrist but realize now well for now that there is people inside me. One is me, the other is depression and to stand the best chance of staying well and keeping well then I need to face I have a problem. Around week ago I wa so actively suicidal, I wa thinking of jumping off a bridge into the river, i searched the internet for way to kill myself. I am out of that acute phase but do not trust myself. I have tried SSRIs but they just do not agree with me so it look like I am going back on Mirtazapine. I stopped taking it sometime ago a I put on weight. Since last year I have lost stone through diet and exercise. In the last week I have lost lb a a result of depression. Right now my mind is blank. I have never chatted to anyone on this forum before but I know you guy know what I am going through. My life ha never been the same since . It never will be. My dad died in since then thing have worsened. I have so much to say I could write on but going to leave it for now. You guy are the first to hear my full well pretty full story. I have never had the courage to speak like this before. Bye for now

year I have been managing depression and I wa doing well, until last Monday. Quick back story m Ireland. I wa a competitive Powerlifter and represented my country on occasion with great success. My life wa lifting setting goals, reaching targets, smashing PBs..all helped with creating a future for myself. I started to feel unwell around December and developed a persistent, non-productive cough. Series of test led me to an echocardiograph where it wa discovered I wa suffering Heart Failure. Dilated Cardio Myopathy caused by a viral infection, left my heart function at EF. Apparently I had a few month to live if I had not caught it. Ironically, now, I wish they had not discovered it. My world flipped upside down. No Powerlifting, no excessive exercise, restricted fluid intake, no over exertion, med for the rest of my life, regular review in my heart clinic, multiple ambulance emergency ride to A amp E when my heart go irregular. Hospital, pharmacy, hospital, pharmacy.. Seems to be my life for the past year. Last Monday I snapped. It hit me. Everything I lost came crashing in on me. I got in my car, picked a place I knew well to ram my car into at mph. I wa screaming at myself to do it. My left hand steering towards the end, my right hand steering me to survive. An image of my dog in my mind kept me on the road. I knew she would miss me too much. I am still very low now despite all my meds. I still wish I had gone through with it. I still think of going to the Cliffs of Moher and jumping.. What a beautiful place to end it. I am dreading the road ahead because I know how Rocky it is going to be.. Help me please.

I am Weakest At Night.. I do not understand the reason for this, but for a long a I can remember I have always been weakest during the night time. I feel weak mentally, emotionally, physically, internally.. I feel like I cannot go on, like I cannot keep fighting, like I have had enough.. I freeze over, my body lock up, my fear paralyzes me, and my mind becomes my enemy.. Night seems endless because I cannot see much of anything no matter where I try to look. From minor fear to worst nightmare stalk me like I am nothing but an insignificant prey who is time ha come. I am exhausted and need sleep, but only nightmare haunt me or the fear of being attacked while I am immobile by unconsciousness.. And yet, though a part of me yearns for light, for the warm comfort of the sun, it only depresses me. In the light I can see what I truly am, I can see a reflection of something I have grown to hate. When I look at my reflection I want to smash the mirror so I can no longer see the truth of my insignificant existence. In the light I can see everyone else, either continuing on with their life without a thought of me or a second glance. Or I see other people like me suffering and it both hurt and give me a strange, and possibly, a cruel comfort. I hate seeing other is suffer, but I am so insignificant I am helpless that I might a well be dead.. I need the light and yet it hurt me..

I just told all student I teach I have depression in an email about final week I am an undergraduate TA at a university, in an interdisciplinary class about the brain. I absolutely love being a TA, but admittedly this quarter it ha been a struggle mentally, I often feel anxious that I am doing a horrible job. I sent out this email to all of my student about final Hi everyone, These next two week will be a really, really tough time for all of you. I know how incredibly hard you all have worked this quarter, and how hard you will push yourselves during this final stretch, but there are other thing I want you to know I, the other TAs, and our professor will not be disappointed if you do not perform a well you want, so you should not be either. Tests and grade are not always the best reflection of you a student scientists, and they are most certainly are not a reflection of your worth a a person. All a test ass is how much content you remember and how well you can take a test at a certain time on a certain day. It is simply one data point, and a you should all know by now, data point is not representative of the population. For many of you, you have other final presentation responsibility going on, and it will be difficult to find time to study. For others, you may want so badly to study a lot, but cannot because you are so stressed and anxious. I personally deal with anxiety and depression, and I know how utterly frustrating it is when your mind doe not work a well a you want it to. Take care of yourself. Eat good food, get some sleep, spend time with people you love. So, while you prepare for final these next weeks, keep these two thing in mind. You are all incredibly curious, kind, intelligent and important people. I brag all the time that I get to work with the most amazing group of student who bring unique and valuable contribution to this class everyday, and inspire me to be the best TA I can possibly be. Cheering you on!! austen I cannot believe I just told all my student about my mental illness, but it honestly feel so liberating to do so. It also feel so hypocritical of me to send this, because I attribute much of my self-worth to academic and do not practice much self-care..but I felt like this needed to be said .

Hello Tommy! to DF! I am glad you joined! This board is a great place for information and support. Take your time browsing through the topics. I am sure there will be lot of thing you can relate to. When you feel comfortable enough, feel free to share any of your thoughts, questions, concerns, experiences, etc..Congrats on taking your first step towards recovery! I think it take a lot of courage to start treatment. I know it took me quite a while to admit to myself I could not handle my situation on my own any longer. I think you did great starting on both talk therapy and medicines! I hope you find therapy useful and that you and your therapist can work towards better skill to cope with the stressor in your life. Concerning your medication. There is a room dedicated to your antidepressant Prozac. You will find lot of information there. Check it out sometime. One of the downside of antidepressant is the fact that it take a while for them to kick in. You only started about day ago so you will have to give the Prozac some time to be able to fully benefit from it. Meanwhile I hope you are not having too many side effects! Tom, thanks for joining. Keep u posted on how you are doing! Take good care of yourself!

Girlfriend attempted to break her arm to avoid going to work My girlfriend began her summer job in a hospital earlier this summer where she mostly clean and prepares meal for the patients. She ha been pretty upfront about the fact that she is stressed during the day and doe not want to go to work most days. Since we do not live together we see eachother about three time per week although le during summer since work prohibits that to an extent. She ha never during our two year long relationship showed any sign of self harm nor depression. However, today i saw her for the first time this week and I noticed bruise on her fore arm. She unwillingly explained that she had tried to break her arm in order to not have to go to work anymore for the rest of the summer. She said that she had had a panic attack and in desperation smashed her arm into a metal pole in order to break her arm. I joined yesterday and have been reading through some of the posts. Thought I had better introduce my self. I live in the UK. Looking back on my life I think I have always had depression. It got worse though, . year ago after the birth of my son. I though i had PND at the time. I wa always crying, felt really low and would panic if I wa left alone with the baby. It put a huge strain on my marriage and lot of argument because my husband though I had gone off him. I went back to work put could not cope, lack of motivation etc. but like someone said below I put on a happy face to make people think that I wa OK. I muddled through for a year then went to see a GP who put me on Prozac. Stupid me came off it after month thinking I wa OK. Slowly the depression came back, I wa not coping with my job, the simplest task at work and at home were impossible to face, I could not concentrate or make decisions. Last Spring it all got too much. I wa getting up cry every morning, I became agoraphobic. I phoned in work and said i could not go in. I saw the GP and went on Prozac. I took month off work. I stayed on Prozac until last September. And then, guess what, it all came back with a vengeance a few month ago. This time I wa also feeling suicidal which really scared me. So I am now back on the Prozac and determined to stay on it. I think I have generalized depression made worse by circumstances. The birth of my son, trying to keep a job down and be a Mom, and my husband. Last year my husband really turned to alcohol and ended up ill in hospital. He ha been on incapacity benefit ever since, so our relationship and our finance have really suffered. He ha changed to. Even though he say he love me he get angry a lot, shout at me, criticizes me, put me down. I do not know how much more of it I can take, without leaving him. I make excuse for him, that it is his illness and lack of earning power that make him like that but it is no excuse to turn me into a nervous wreck who is scared to say anything in case he shoot me down. The Prozac ha reduced but not removed my depression and I still have the odd day where I want to run away. I keep thinking will it go away if I leave my husband? I no longer love him but life ha dealt a difficult blow to u both recently and maybe one day when the stress have been removed I will love him again. Anyway that is my story sound similar to Vanyas who i have PM would .

The world need more lollipop moment . Back in middle school, I wa helping out at a sunday school, tutoring primary kids. There wa this adorable little girl who wa struggling to sing the right tune of a hymn. Even though I have absolutely no musical background, I tried to help her get her vocal and lyric right by singing the hymn together. Eventually, I told her to continue repeating it herself and that every practice is an improvement from the last. She would call me frequently just to sing her new hymn and I would challenge her to learn a new hymn every week, this routine went on for quite a while between ourselves.. Fast forward to today, I am currently a struggling undergrad student coping with depression and stress and well a deteriorating health due to extreme fatigue. Bad grade and crippling financial debt are the least of my concerns. Many day I would feel tired and unmotivated to do anything.. and barely making it to lecture only to zone off. At day I would think of suicide a well. There wa nobody I could turn to that I felt I could relate to or even understand me.. It wa not until a few day ago I received an email from the girl is mother, the girl wa unfortunately diagnosed with an illness that made her lose up to of her hearing. However, she wa recently accepted to a prestigious musical academy, and sent me the audition tape of her performance thanking me for my encouragement. That song that she performed, wa the very first hymn she struggled when I first came up to her. Knowing that the girl went through so much hardship just to chase the dream I stimulated her from her youth gave me so much hope at the darkest point of my life. Knowing that I had the capacity to influence a big change in a little girl life gave me the purpose to live. Even though I had to wait for year for this news, it wa worth it. TLR We all have the ability to give small act of kindness which go a long way. From putting a smile on your face to giving away your coat to cover a pair of cold shoulders, dont underestimate the impact it ha to them in the present and the future. What kind of lollipop moment do you have?

Post-Graduation Depression I recently graduated from college, and over the past couple of month I have grown increasingly depressed. I feel this profound sense of loss and it feel a if the color ha drained from the world. What is shocking to me is that I honestly hated college - I wa either working or studying x. I rarely had a single moment for myself or friend and wa constantly exhausted and anxious. Now, I have a great job, live with my girlfriend, have almost no debt thanks to working so much in college , and live in my ideal area. My life is comparatively so much better, but I feel this knot in my stomach a if I just finished a good book or beat the story of a video game and now I am finally seeing how much of myself I have given up to get to where I am. Life feel devoid of adventure and I feel like I have no passion left. I have struggled with depression for a long time, but it is weird to have it catch up with me at the point in my life where past sacrifice were meant to mitigate it.

I seem to have depression the worst, first thing in the morning lately. Just started with a new pdoc after months. with another pdoc since this latest episode occured. My old pdoc thought I could have a mild bipolar disorder but wa not sure. My mg of prozac had stopped working after several year of keeping me stable. She started me on lamictal and I am now up to mg day. Stopped the prozac in early January and got worse, but not right away. I wa having a good week bad week type pattern depending on where I wa in my menstrual cycle while I wa on the prozac. I have battled depression on and off for years. Particularly bad postpartum and this recent episode. I am year old and have not felt this bad since I had my daughter year ago. My new doctor think I do not have an ounce of bipolar and that I am just in a depression I tend to agree with her . We decided together to add Lexapro to the mix and see if that help me level out all the day of the month. I have been on it almost week patiently waiting for some result - I am well aware of the waiting game. I am also taking Xanax XR in the evening for sleep and to avert morning anxiety. I take my Lamictal in the morning and a very small half of the lowest dose of xanax a well. I seem to get moving and can be quite productive during my day after I take the Lamictal xanax - do not know if this is a placebo effect?? My question is, ha anyone experienced this a.m. depression that seems to lift a bit later in the day? Also, doe anyone take Lamictal for unipolar depression? The last thing I want is to be taking too much of anything and further putting off good health. Starting to wonder if the Xanax XR in the evening is giving me this early morning dread??

Martin Luther King Jr. And depression As my suffering mounted I soon realized that there were two way in which I could respond to my situation -- either to react with bitterness or seek to transform the suffering into a creative force. I decided to follow the latter course - King JR. Today got me thinking..We need to figure out how we can turn our discontent, anxiety, anhedonia, insecurity, self hatred, and the meaninglessness that we all feel into real world change that we can see, touch , and feel proud of in a tangible form. We need to figure out a a community, how we can re-direct our negative feeling into helping others, and maby in the process we will be helping ourselves. I think alot of u feel meaningless, and have a hard time creating motivation to get u out of bed, besides our rare and far between moment of clarity. If we could find a way to re-direct our negative energy and encourage eachother to work towards cause we believe in, we could change the world while at the same time changing ourselves.At this point in my life, I have a good job and financial security, but I still experience horrible depression and that underlying feeling that im a failure and living a meaninglessness existence . I have come to find that the only time I really feel alive , or any feeling remotely resembling happiness is when I am either on drugs, or when I am helping people and making a difference. The latter of those two ha actually improved my life, and I am hoping that a a depression community, we can motivate eachother to help re-direct our sadness to further cause that are meaningful to us, and hopefully squash our cynicism. The Law of Conservation of Energy, state that energy can neither be created nor destroyed energy can only be transferred or changed from one form to another
