Finally got a job, but do not really care. So, finally after about - months, I got a job. The job is not a bad one. Quite the opposite, actually. They specifically hired me saying that they were not looking for someone to just stick for a year and move on they wanted to hire someone and essentially keep them train them eventually up to management level in the course of hopefully a year or two depending how well I take it. I said yes.. though, mostly out of seizing a good opportunity. I am not happy, or excited. I just do not care, really. amp nbsp First and foremost, I am a minimalist. The urgency of I need to save and buy a house , or I need a secure career future , etc.. is non-existent in my life. Everything I own could fit in a van, and there would still be space left. I am not exaggerating. I have even contemplated living in one build some insulation to the walls, lay out some flooring, and call it home. I would be absolutely comfortable. Anyway My point is I actually have no reason to be taking this opportunity. The only thing that really ran through my head wa I will probably kick myself in the as in the future for not taking this . Considering this is a job that will eventually lead to a solid annual salary within essentially no time, and requires no degree or fancy stuff, it wa kinda hard to say no. But it wa also kinda hard to say yes. I do not have an endgame. I do not have a goal. At best, the closest thing to a goal that came to mind wa Eh, I would probably get back into riding, and buy myself a motorcycle or something . That wa it. My mind literally blank after that. Nothing else is there. amp nbsp I am not suicidal. I do not go to sleep hoping that I will never wake up again though I would not be upset by it , and I do not wake up upset that I am alive for another day in life. If I had to describe how I feel right now.. Everything is in a very, very quiet limbo. It is a very passive depression. amp nbsp The best way I can summarize it is that this world ha so much noise , and it is exhausting for me. I get exhausted just from thinking about it. I wish people could just relax, and stop stirring so much motion around. It is always been like this for my entire life. I am so tired. Everything everyone ha to move around with such haste, but all I want to do is stop. I just want to appreciate the colors. I want to laugh. I want to be happy. But in this world, you cannot be happy looking at the colors. amp nbsp You just.. cannot.

Finally on the path to getting myself back. I had a really bad panic attack last night that came out of nowhere and it enabled me to visit my doctor today and talk about my depression. She gave me some prescription and referred me to several therapists. I am finally going to start taking med so hopefully in about a month I will start getting my life back. Hell even if these particular med do not agree with my system, just the fact that I have taken my first step in my journey is enough hope for me!

Just venting Not sure the general gist of where this post is going but I just kind of want to write down my thoughts. I tend to feel better after I do so. Maybe along with that I can have the added bonus of affecting somebody else in a positive way with what I say or that someone else understands what I am saying. I am alone a I type this. I am sure many people who frequent this sub would describe themselves in that way. I feel over the year I have been getting more and more depressed. I wa depressed when in my teen then I hit a lull in my s where I just did not care about much and put thing out of mind. Now, I seem to be at a combination of both. A kind of dead, feel nothing type of feeling mixed in with depression. I have been getting angrier a well. Bitter and resentful. I feel like when I wa a teen I just thought strongly that I wa not very great in the general sense. I feel like I now know that to be true. After enough life experience and enough time with yourself you start to see who and what you are. Needless to say I do not like who I am. Maybe you do not either. I am not a strong, wise, caring, compassionate, friendly, hard-working, courageous, generous, et fuckin cetera that I would like. Well, why do not you change? Cause I clearly do not fuckin want to. Maybe I enjoy being depressed? Because obviously I have laid out terms, so to speak, for me to be depressed. Not courageous, hard enough working, kind etc etc. Yet, I do not do shit about it. So why complain a if I am depressed because of it? I think that is where the day to day numb feeling come in. It is like I am this way. I do not like being this way. I do not change being this way. Why tf are you even upset? I really do not feel I deserve what I have in my life. Like the organ donor program I feel I would want to give my body to someone else. Maybe they can make better use of my fully functional legs. My vision. Ever see those people do an absolute fuck ton of thing with their life? Those people who are so driven to accomplish a b c d e f g.. Every day of their life and they only have limb? Are blind? Live in abject poverty? I have NONE of these fucking hurdles. I, in fact, do not have anything anyone would legitimately call a hurdle in life and yet I feel depressed. It is probably justified that I feel this way. I do not do anything to try and feel better and I do not capitalize on advantage I have in my life to make thing better. To grow a a person. I do not do that for myself let alone for other people. And yet I want to have success.. I want to have profound love. Meaning and purpose. What a joke Just wish I could hit the fast forward button on this shit and get through with it. Oh right.. There is suicide. But even that hold it is own unique stigma to it. Next to no one would recommend you do that. It is not an ideal solution. So on and so forth. But you kind of have to admit that those that do go through with it.. It is a if you cannot question them. You cannot question their pain. Ca not question their sense of guilt or anguish or depression and sadness. They solidified it and made it real moreso than practically anyone could ever do when alive. Sometimes I wonder if those that commit suicide do so because it is either a the only perceived way out of their grief or b that it effectively prof to others beyond a shadow of a doubt what kind of hell they had been living through in the year leading up to doing it. You can never question someone who killed themselves a to whether their pain wa real. Not just in the sense that they are no longer around to ask but that no one would ask what everyone inherently knows. Of course they felt pain. I feel that might be suicide greatest allure. It effectively put a stamp on your sadness a legitimate. I have thought about it a lot throughout my life. I do not think I would ever have the stone to do it. Maybe my life or state of mind just is not that bad. Not yet anyways. Kind of a long read Hi to all those that like reading long post from internet randoms 👋

Whatever happened to Doctor - patient confidentiality?? I applied for short term disability because depression is affecting my job and I am barely function - able at work. The insurance company made me sign a waiver of privacy to both my therapist and psychiatrist. Now they can call them up and ask anything they want!! The insurance company called me yesterday for a telephone interview ! They wanted me to explain why I needed the time off, what my symptom are, how long have I been like this, really personal question .. They are going to be the one who determine whether I can get disability pay or not! Whatever happened to just taking the word of the doctor?? I wonder who the insurance company can tell? I forgot to ask them if this is going to be kept confidential. They also asked how this is affecting my job, I felt if I gave the wrong answer, they will decide not to pay me. I wonder what they are going to ask my shrinks, and how much info the shrink can give them. Also, I understand that the shrink therapist can break the confidentiality rule if you threaten to hurt yourself or another -- that I can understand, but if you are ever on trial for something they can subpoena the doctor and they have to tell ALL! That is ridiculous! What happens if I am just a witness to some crime, but did not do the crime. What happens if the lawyer want to discredit me so they put my shrink on the stand to ask what a nut I am? Just ranting, but opinions, feedback would be appreciated.

I am year old female. I have been on numerous antidepressant and anxiety medicine since I wa year old. I never had a problem with sexual dysfunction because I had never been in a serious relationship, I had never been sexual with someone. Now that I am in a sexual, serious relationship, I am having problems. I believe this is a result of Lexapro. I have never had a problem orgasming at least not to this extent and I have been on Zoloft, Prozac, you name it, etc. These medicine were changed because they were either making me too drowsy or simply were not working . During the summer, I wa only on Wellbutrin and had no problem orgasming. However, due to overwhelming anxiety during the start of the school year, I started taking Lexparo and continued the Wellbutrin. Ever since I added Lexapro, I have had an EXTREMELY delayed orgasm, or no orgasm at all. It is really frustrating. My doctor suggested switching medicine, but since Lexapro is working so well for me a far a anxiety goes, I said I would rather not. I cannot lower my dose because I am on the starting dose for both Wellbutrin and Lexapro. He said I could switch to Effexor or another SSRI medicine, but I may have the same sexual dysfunction. I wa just wondering if anyone here ha had a successful combination of Wellbutrin plus an anxiety medication that did not cause such extreme sexual dysfunction.

Intrusive Thoughts I feel like I am standing on a grassy hill and the blade of grass is blowing in the wind around me, the sky is turning darker and darker. I can feel it becoming colder and the rain starts. When it rain it pours. The intrusive thoughts, the little will I have left to keep myself upright, the wind make one big push and I fall. I fall hard. The wind is keeping me pushed down a I lay flat on my back and watch the storm go by, it cold, dark and rainy. People close to me are pushed out and a large glass cup is placed over me. They cannot see I am struggling and if they do they cannot get in. How long is the storm going to stay this time? I am not sure. The sad thought are like my safety blanket. Whenever thing feel okay the thought come over and hug me tight. I am constantly depressed. When I laugh or smile, it is like putting a band aid over a small cut. It feel better and it can start healing, but when I feel sad it like the band aid rip off and I am faced with the hurt all over again. The mask I put on, the adhesive fall right off when it no longer need to be on. I am falling apart yet I am hanging on by a thread.

My Story - There is hope. TRIGGER WARNING - includes graphic language. Hi there, first time posting. I see a lot of post from high school college aged people, and being through that myself, all I want to do is reach out and hug them and tell them how special they are. Instead of writing all the typical stuff you are so young, you will grow out of it, go see a therapist take medication, etc., I thought I would share how depression affected me mentally amp emotionally and my journey through college. I got to the point where depression wa life threatening, and I had given up all hope. I wa lucky because my mom and my dad were committed to my recovery, even if it meant I deeply hated and resented them at the time. I realize not everyone ha that, but in sharing my story, I hope that maybe certain aspect can resonate with people going through the same thing I did and help them not feel so alone. How Depression Affected Me - trigger warning It find a way to connect to memories. To healthy feelings. And twist them into something dark. It craves uncertainty and pain and tell you that you deserve only that. It make you seek out the deepest crevice of your mind and get lost. To the point where you do not even know what is you and what is the sickness anymore. It almost feel good to indulge because it is so familiar. We are taught that enduring pain is somehow one of the most beautiful thing a person can do. But what if that pain is not real? In college, I wa so afraid of being alone that I would not want guy to leave my room. And there were a fair amount of them. I would beg them to stay longer and tell them I had separation anxiety. As long a I wa focusing on them, I did not have to focus on me. I justified it by saying that I wa enjoying my college experience and exploring my sexuality. I thought it wa normal to not see color, to not ever be excited, to want to drink until my body wa a numb a my mind. I wondered how other people could live life with relative stability and thought I wa weak for not knowing what they knew. To me, it seemed like common knowledge that life wa pointless and ultimately a waste of time. I did not understand why I wa the only one that could not cope with that fact. When I wa home over a break, I told my mom that I had accepted I would never be happy. When my mom said she wa hurt by that, it did not even occur to me why. I thought I had learned the secret that everyone else knew, the secret that let them go to class or work or see friend or make friends. Even though by the end of my freshman year, I wa cutting myself and promiscuous and drank with the purpose of blacking out so I could have even just an hour of relief from myself, I could not admit that I had depression. I thought I felt and acted like that because I wa lazy, stupid, slutty, weak. Every semester, my grade slipped a little or a lot at a time, and my parent grew more and more disappointed in me. I had been a star student in elementary school, frequently getting the highest score in class and got into every top middle amp high school. I felt like such a failure. At this point, my parent sent me to a very expensive therapist, which ultimately wa a waste of money because all I did wa bend the truth to hide every aspect of myself and life. I do not think I could have even been honest even if I wanted to at this point. The first semester of my junior year, these thought grew too heavy. I did not want to be there anymore. I wanted to be nowhere, not awake, not asleep, not alive, not dead. I spent my time with people that encouraged all my doubts, and I pushed away people that cared. I rarely went to class and even if I did, I scraped by on the assignments. I lived for the moment of escape when I could go to party and drink and hook up with guys, no matter how repelled I wa by them. Outside of those few hour of escape, I could not sleep. I never went to the cafeteria with friend or even to get a real meal. I only ate Lean Cuisines that my parent had bought me at the beginning of the year. When I ran out, I ate solely Pizza Rolls and peanut M amp Ms. I did not do laundry once in those few month and barely took showers. The only time I put any effort into my personal appearance wa when I went to a party because all I wanted wa to be perceived a carefree and sexy, not the lazy slob that I thought I was. Even then, I wore wildly inappropriate clothing compared to what everyone else at my college wore - one time a girl yelled out to me, You are going to get raped! Another said judgmentally to a friend, She is not wearing pants. I wa wearing sequined booty shorts, okay . My only happy moment that semester were with a boy that then tried to sexually assault me with a visiting alumnus. His excuse wa that he wanted to get into the alumnus frat by impressing that brother. When he tried to apologize the next morning, I told him he should not apologize. I wa so disconnected from my body, I did not even view it a mine anymore. After that, I did not blame him and still spent most of my free time with him. Free meaning when I wa not laying on my bed trying to gather enough strength to even leave my room, going to a party or the rare occasion I went to class or very very rarely attended a sorority event. My last night at that school, my theory that I had borderline personality disorder wa weighing on me. I had been thinking about it for a couple of week after I had finally figured out that my behavior and thought were not the typical college experience, thanks to my extremely honest roommate amp sorority sister. She told me that other girl in the sorority thought I wa trying to fuck with their guy friend and slept with too many people. I tried to go to the student health center earlier that day. When I stated, I think I have borderline personality disorder, they just said, What do you want u to do? The only action they were equipped to take wa to call the on-duty counselor who had to drive minute to get to campus. When I told her about my self harm and drinking and promiscuity she replied, How doe that make you different than any other student? This further cemented my past notion that I wa just weak the numbness and loneliness - the desire to feel anything at all - wa normal, and I just had a huge character flaw by not having the strength to be normal. That night I got wasted and tried to swallow a whole bottle of caffeine pill at my friend is house. My intention wa to induce a heart attack. He wa one of the only people that I knew understood what I wa feeling, but I never got a chance to tell him how close to the edge I wa since his freshman girlfriend and two of her friend were with him that night. Not that it wa his responsibility, but I just wanted confirmation that something wa not right with me. While I wa at his house, I tried to stay true to my carefree, fun person that I tried so hard portray while his girlfriend and her friend complimented my shirt and hair. It made me feel like such a fraud. Towards the end of the night, after I had swallowed those pills, my friend tried to get me to throw them up and then drove me to my dorm where I could not even find my room. I stumbled around and ran into the RA that had just gotten out of the shower and clung to him. I wa scared and confused and felt so alone. I eventually got to my room and started cutting my already scarred wrist with baby scissors. I tried to cut into my femoral artery with those scissors a well, which wa entirely unsuccessful. I settled for cutting my knee. At that moment, campus safety knocked on the door. I kept calm when they asked their usual questions, Have you been drinking tonight?, etc., until they asked me to show them my wrists. That is when I panicked. Started screaming and cry uncontrollably. They escorted me to their office. I later learned one of the officer asked my roommate if I slept around. While I wa incoherently yelling, an officer handed me a phone. It wa my mom, and I cried that a death of a young man I knew in high school wa my fault, and that I could have done something. Background His death wa not my fault in any conceivable way. He OD ed. I barely knew him amp did not even know he wa an addict, but I had a huge crush on him at the time and never acted on it. Through my warped logic, if I had been braver and talked to him, I could have isaved him. The next day she wa at my school ready to pick me up. She had flown on the next available flight to get to me. When I returned home, I went through month of therapy and psychiatry and yoga and meditation all arranged all by my mom. In the beginning, I wa okay. Broken down and exhausted but seemingly on the mend. On some level, I wa relieved that I had finally been diagnosed with something went from depression to bipolar II to a depressive mood disorder . I worked really hard with my therapist to understand my guilt, disgust and trauma, which ironically had been entirely driven by way I tried to cope with my depression. However, fully expecting to go back to college for the next semester, I wa informed that I wa not allowed to return yet. When I chose to leave in the middle of the semester, the dean did not share the information that they had never let a student return from health leave until after six month of treatment. I had withdrawn from all my class and sacrificed a semester is worth of my parent money thinking that I would be returning shortly and only a semester behind. After that initial blow, my parent eventually gave me more freedom, I met and got involved with a guy that got me more into substances. He wa going through issue of his own, which is why I connected with him. One morning, my parent tried to wake me up but could not. No need to go into further detail, but it wa one step forward and two step back I no longer wanted to be nowhere but wa now using.. alcohol.. frequently . Despite alcohol being one of my main coping mechanisms, I wa fortunate not to develop any dependency or addictions. A handful of month later, after my parent had taken away my phone and forced me to be supervised by them every night, I wa accepted into a local university. I had also found a new therapist and psychiatrist. Their word stuck to me Depression suck and it most likely will be with you forever but there are way of treating it. and You get to a point in your recovery where you cannot blame your depression anymore. You just have to stand up and do your homework go to your job go to class. I wa also lucky enough to have a couple professor that understood on a basic level what I wa going through. One told me to show up to class no matter how miserable I was. I did not bother to explain that depression wa not about being miserable, but from there on out I did everything within my emotional power to go to class, even if I had drank before that happened a couple time or did not participate happened almost every time . I ended up getting a C or D in the class, but I take that a a win since I easily could have failed. Another professor asked student service to reach out to me after I had not shown up to class a couple week in a row. I learned there will be a lot of people that do not get it and do not want to get it, but the one or two that do make all the difference in the world. Throughout my time at the new university, there were a lot of ups meeting a close friend and actually making personal connection with people, excelling at the course in my major and down failing multiple class and having to proactively withdraw due to ispecial circumstances, finishing an entire bottle of wine in an hour, cry and writing gibberish about how guilty I felt then inviting some random year old I had met on Tinder over to my dorm room , but slowly I wa piecing it together. I eventually got an on-campus job, then a full time internship then a full-time job. While I am not perfect these days, I have been at a job I never would have dreamed of for the past two and half year and have gotten a promotion. Still, sometimes when the depression get the best of me, I think that is who I really am. This broken, beaten down person that is ashamed of basically her entire young adulthood. I fear that I do not want anything of substance. That I cannot find anything of substance. That I do not even know what I want. No path. No passion. When it get that bad, it take every ounce of strength I have to fight it. Even on good days, I can feel like it is in the back my mind. I am terrified that it will come back, and I will not be able to control it. I will give in to the thought that say I am not good enough. You will never be good enough. Everything you have dared to want will slip through your fingers, and you will not even know. All I do is think about how far I have come from that girl who swallowed a dozen caffeine pills. That girl who thought she would never be happy. And it give me just enough strength to deny those feeling and smile. I hope this wa not too personal, but I wanted to be a raw and honest a possible. Thanks.

Emotionally offline I should not be writing this, I have three final project due in the next couple of day and I have not started on any of them. But I do not have the energy to even get started..I do not know what to do. It is too late to ask for extension but I do not want to fail my class that mean nothing to me . Whatever..I guess I will turn out fine because I wa doing well grade-wise up to this point, but it is gonna be fucking painful. Over the course of the last couple of weeks, I feel a if I have gone emotionally offline. I feel like a shell of myself. I am not sure what happened. I think the real downturn started when I wa walking on campus two week ago and saw my ex-girlfriend of a few month with her new boyfriend, but that is definitely not the only thing that is bothering me. It might have been a death-by-a-thousand-cuts situation because if I take an itinerary of what is going on in my life, there is not much there. If my life had a thesis statement, it would be that I have nothing to look forward to. Hardly any aspect of my life can bring me out of the apathy that I seem to be stuck in every day. I do not find any of my class enjoyable, and now the thought of doing it a a career is starting to give me nightmares. I have friend but I do not much enjoy hanging out with them, and overall, any attempt to meet new people just seems to amount to nothing. I have no dating life, and I am still admittedly stuck on the aforementioned ex-girlfriend who ha completely moved on that I dated for seven month and have been broken up for the same length. All I can think about is that if she saw me today, barely able to get out of bed and go to school, I am also certain she would feel even more justified in breaking up with me. I keep thinking about this new person she is dating and in what way he is likely a complete upgrade. I do not even know what their situation is, I am just inventing scenario in my head. I need to stop that. Fuck. The only thing I have is that I am in fairly good shape and my GPA is . although that is certain to go down after this week, which scare the ever-living shit out of me because it feel like the only real thing I can put on my resume . I am also fairly consistent with working out it is not a huge part of my life, but holy shit, if I did not do it I cannot imagine how depressed I would be. Right now, all of the emotional energy I have for the day go to getting myself to the gym at the least. With my career, I am interested in how technology affect people and society like internet addiction, social media, artificial intelligence, etc. That is kind of what drew me to my major in the first place, which is User Experience Design. However, I do little of that the research side of things, which includes talking to people and learning their stories, then coming up with conclusion based on that data on how you can improve a digital service and more the design development side of thing like visual graphic UI design and web development, just building the fucking thing , which I am good with, but it both stress me out and bore the shit out of me. I think it would be fulfilling to be a UX Researcher for a popular social app just because I would be able to study how people interact with it. Or do that for a consultancy agency or something, and start a blog podcast about technology society. I kind of largely detest the Silicon Valley tech utopianism that is sweeping the country, it seems to be making everyone I know and myself unhappy in really subtle ways, but it is become almost a cult of sorts. I could turn what I learn about user research to that. But if I want to keep pursuing this path, I have to keep doing the part that make me depressed design and coding for a significant amount of time so I have just kind of lost motivation to try at all. I know I should just push through, but I have pushed through my whole life and honestly, I am tired of fucking pushing. Everyone is telling me to keep moving forward because I show talent in it the design code side of user experience and it is lucrative but fuck man I can only do this for so long. I would rather use my creativity on music or writing. I have three internship interview this week which is not good to have hanging over my head when I am asking all of these questions. I constantly wonder if there is a better, more fulfilling, and le depressing route to the other side of all of this. The social life issue is more simple, I do not even want to write about it. I need to be more vulnerable to people and go outside my comfort zone, and that is gonna take a ton of work no matter how you spin it. The first part of this video with James Murphy of LCD Soundsystem is basically my entire life in a nutshell . Ditto on the dating life, although that might be a little more complicated. I have only even felt attracted to one person since my breakup, so I guess there is more going underneath the surface there. I cannot imagine dating anyone in my current state, but man, the ever-present loneliness really drain me. Is not it ironic though? I want to go into a career where I study people all day, yet I struggle to actually build and establish friendships. I am like a people is introvert, it make no sense. I seem to use daydreaming and fantasizing a an escape. I spend an embarrassing amount of mental time each day imagining myself a a frontman for a successful band I really look up to someone like Father John Misty, I feel we have similar sensibility on a lot of things. And there is just something about pouring your emotion and thought into an album, performing it live and connecting with people through that authenticity, that really make me regret not taking learning music seriously up until this point in my life. I could really use that sort of emotional release right now. Same with writing, when school is not consuming every moment of my waking day I like to read a lot, so I would like to write a book one day on something I care about. I am reading what I wrote and it is kind of frustrating. I clearly have dream and desires, why cannot I manifest them into anything that make me remotely proud of myself? Like am I even depressed? I feel like way too many people here have it worse than me for me to complain about my depression. Maybe I am just a shitty person looking for an excuse not to do anything useful with my life. I am just trying to make it to Friday. My favorite band is coming to my city and it is the only thing I am looking forward to. Its the only reason I am ignoring the thought of suicide..I need a break from all this bullshit. I am gonna schedule a doctor is appointment today to get a blood panel done to see if anything is happening there. I might look into SAD because depression always seems to historically hit me around this time although this time last year wa the happiest I have ever been, so I am not exactly sure . I already see a therapist weekly but I might look for a new one because I am not sure if we are making any progress. I am gonna try to get back into meditation if I can find any time. I just want to know when it is gonna get better.

I am actually feeling a little bit like a fraud at the moment, because I have read so many different topic today and realized that there are people who have suffered far more than I have. I have joined this site, to start to try and get some help for myself and to talk about the thing that have caused me to feel like this over the last few years. My doctor ha told me that I am depressed and prescribed tablets, but I refuse to believe this and have not taken them. I know that this is wrong, but I hate the idea of being labeled depressed. Before I went to university, I wa happy, adventurous, nothing could keep me down. I wa in a fantastic relationship, but then I moved into halls, in a flat with six others, who I absolutely adored. One of them in particular, who I fell in love with. Little did I know that he had also fallen for me in the same way, but we were both so shy and I wa in a relationship, that neither of u did anything about it .. until we moved into a house together in our second year with others. This is when everything went wrong. We were always close, really close in fact, and I admitted to him that I kept getting urge to kiss him, hold him and never let him go. He felt the same way a I did, but still nothing wa done by either of us. Then one evening we were both out, getting drunk with friends, we found ourselves alone when we got back to the house and kissed. I have never felt like I did that night since. I did not care about anything around me. We were the only people in the world at that moment. The next morning, we were both a bit bemused and did not know what to say do, so pretended like nothing had happened. The end of term came and we had just moved in to another house with the same people, but were all going home for the summer. I wa devastated knowing that we would not see each other until september. I began to resent my boyfriend who I wa still with and my family were going through problem because of my father. When september came, I went straight onto my final teaching placement, which meant up at work all day, home, eat ,work and then in bed by pm. I wa tired all the time and did not have the energy to go out in the week, but He wa always there for me, and yes, we were still pretending like nothing had happened. After the christmas of my final year, I decided to party like never before. It wa great, but there wa still the issue of him. By now I had been trying to convince myself that I wa still in love with my boyfriend, purely because I did not have the gut to leave him and be on my own. How pathetic wa that. Anyway, we went out to the union for a major drinking session, danced like a couple, felt like a couple, got back to the house and one thing led to another. We ended up sleeping together in his room, he initiated it. It wa amazing. However the next day we were so confused that we did not speak for days, until I told him how I really felt. That I had been in love with him since my first year, but could not do anything about it, that I wa going mad inside because I wanted him so much. He returned my feelings. From then on, we were inseparable, but to anyone who saw u together, we were just very very close friends, who lived in each others pockets. We were having an affair of sort and living a lie, but we found comfort in each other and could not let it go. I know how wrong it was, believe me I do, and I would be devastated if it ever happened to me. We left university in the june of . It wa the worst time of my life. I felt like I wa losing part of me, and wa never going to get it back. Before we left and before the lie really started, I had agreed to move in with my boyfriend in leeds for his final year. I did not want to do this anymore, but wa too chicken to say no, so this went ahead and for the last year, july until now, I have been living with my boyfriend. Things have not been good and I have still been seeing Him from university a often a I can. The most recent one wa a couple of day ago. We have both joked about running away, children, marriage, but neither of u ha got the gut to do anything. It is so wrong and ha made my life so difficult, putting on a brave face for friend and family, pretending that I am happy all of the time. I do not think I can do it much longer. One last thing, while all of this wa going on in my life, my dad wa causing mayhem at home. I wa being pushed and pulled between the people that I thought could get through anything and that were truly in love. How wrong can you be. I wa like a piece of meat being fought over by animals. They constantly bitched about each other to me, leaving me with no - one to talk to. I found myself being dragged further and further down in to a pit which I cannot get out of. I am in love with Him, but will not leave my boyfriend for fear of being alone, I resent my father for what he ha done, I resent my mother for being callous, there is no - one that I have told this to over the past years, nobody who I felt that I could really trust. I do not know what to do anymore. I cry at the smallest thing, hate thing changing at all, but most of all, I cannot see the point of going on anymore. I just want these feeling to end. My one savior ha been my work, teaching children. caring for others and helping them make the most of their life make me feel like I am doing something worthwhile. I am not expecting any replies, I just needed someone thing to listen.

It is even gotten to the point where typing is difficult for me--every other letter I find myself making a stupid typo, and it irritating. It should not take every ounce of will and concentration to type a stupid reddit post, yet here we are..

Poem about mental illness I wrote When you ask if I am okay Of course I am okay. I am alive, But not quite living. I am okay but I am trapped, Watching those around me Live their lives. I am okay but I feel lost, Or rather I cannot feel at all. I am okay but I am screaming As loud a I can inside my head. I want to be heard But suffer in silence. I am okay but other is are not I make them feel helpless As they watch me sway Between okay and isolation. Isolation from others From myself From my passions. Isolated from my own feeling Sometimes there is nothing left but the dark. You feel helpless? I am helpless I am drowning in the darkness. I am okay But I am not really here Here or there I am everywhere My brain cannot straighten up. I am okay but I am not living I feel trapped within myself. I am not okay.

I felt happy the other day and now I am worse off I went on a date the other night, my first one in a very, very long time. It went surprisingly well and the guy wa really sweet and understanding. The whole date I felt the overwhelming sense of loneliness I struggle with disappear. My mind wa clear and I wa able to be quick witted, funny, and upbeat. I wa happy for the first time in ages. Now that it is over, I feel worse off. I forgot what it feel like to not be crushed by depression and all the shitty thing that come with it. The depression ha seeped right back in and it hurt more now. I should be grateful I wa able to escape it for a moment, but fuck no. I almost wish I did not have to be reminded of what normal felt like.

I would love to talk about dreams. Only thing is for every dream, there can be a hundred interpretations. Or so ha been my experience. I always say that I will keep paper and pen next to me at night, so when I have a dream I want to remember like last night .. I will write it down so I will not forget. But I do not do this because when I wake up I think I can remember..no problem! After all, a lot of these dream are so profound that how could I possibly forget them.. guess what?? I almost always forget the word that meant so much to me in the dream. I remember the subject matter, but it is the word many time that I want to remember. So here go my dream from last night or early this morning .. A little background first for those who do not know or remember who I am.. my mother died quite suddenly from her leukemia in April . We were at odds with each other at the time. I started taking care of my elderly father at the time and he died this past August . I have been wanting to dream about my mother and feel her presence and love since she died. I have only had a few dream about her, maybe .. And they have all been upsetting, never nice feeling dreams. Last night I had a dream of my mother. She wa pregnant and ready to deliver her baby. She looked younger she wa almost at her death but in the dream we knew she wa older like she wa alive today. She said I am ok now I am going to have a baby At least I think this is what she said. My dad wa in my dream a wa my dad is cousin, who is also deceased. My mother is cousin-in-law wa in the dream and she wa sobbing. This same woman wa cry out of control at my mother is funeral. We were at a hotel in Disneyland. Ok everyone. What doe this mean?

Is it okay to be tired of pretending everything is okay to spark optimism? So I have alot going on in my life -- too much for me to want to spend five hour writing about it for this post. What is bothering me is that lately, thing have been weighing down HARD. My patience is paper thin from year of abuse and I feel like in these last few months, I am receding into myself because I do not have patience for even reasonable flaw in other people. I am tired of being stepped on and dealing with the hand I have been dealt in life I am CLAWING my way out of poverty ALONE, caused by a narcissistic parent kicking me out and attempting to kill me at -- just made . I finally told my boyfriend today, not mincing any words, that I am so fucking tired of being optimistic. That I am tired of pretending anything is going to be fine because alot of the time I feel like it will not. Faking it till you make it ha worked for me in the past, definitely, but being optimistic to KEEP myself from being depressing depressed is not fucking working for me. It is idiotic. It is not that I think thing are pointless -- I am working on a set of skill right now to get myself out of my minimum wage job to get a much better one. amp nbsp But I am just exhausted from trying to not worry other people and not expressing how fucking done I am with everything. Is this normal? Is this healthy? Like I said, not giving up. I am working forward. I just feel like the fake optimism is an extra step and a formality at this point and honestly complaining today made me feel better, not going to lie, a I do my best to not do that because I feel like I am pushing myself on others my situation is so bleak that people almost never know what to say in response anyway because there is nothing close to an immediate solution . But I feel angry and spiteful that people who have been given everything or that can recieve assistance from family telling me how I have to perk up because It is what they do when thing are hard when their hard is I stayed up all the time in college to study and it is hard v I stay up all the time to study my new skillset AND risk my life every day on a chinese scooter that give out at time to do delivery in all of the element to make a wage that is not even livable, having one or more panic attack a day because of dangerous driver . amp nbsp I also feel bad because my SO is always trying to be an optimist. He is somehow perfected this even being depressed himself. Sometimes that bleeds through but he is usually hyper optimistic and it is exhausting. We have gotten in argument in the past when he wa le acquainted with my depression because if I wa not immediately cheered up by him making joke while I am cry to make me laugh let me work through my emotions, damn.. Stop and think for a moment It is like stumbling around in the darkness. You cannot see, you can only feel. Blinded by the pain of reality. You beg it to stop, a the throbbing in your heart grows stronger. But it is not gonna stop, no matter how hard you beg. Your so called friend abandon You, because your depression talk ha gotten too dark. But what is the worst part? That you cannot control it? That you cannot stop it? Maybe it is the fact that just maybe.. just maybe you do not want It to stop. You cling onto your pain, because after all..it is familiar. It is been with you for a while. You stand upon the dark edge, upon the highest edge you could find. You feel the wind blow in your face. You freeze. All the good moments, All the good people. It all come in flood of part nostalgy and part regret. What took you to this edge? What made you so desperate, To take such drastic action? While the pain is temporary, This thing you are about to do - It is permanent. Stop and think for a moment. Because no matter how long a storm lasts, You still enjoy the rain.. You still love the sound of thunder.

No one ha a monopoly on suffering. We keep living our life because depression is pain and illness is suffering, but both do not happen without something happening to us. It is at these time that we are changing in some way..Suffering can give u greater empathy and understanding. It can strip away all the other stuff. So many say they will always be depressed .. that may or may not be the case but everyone ha right to live their life .. suffering included. However, there is a vast difference between simply suffering from depression and finding the courage to live with long term cyclical depression. You can, learn to live with depression. It may profoundly change your life .. take much away from you, but you can learn to live with it. Long term depression is not static .. like any illness, it changes. But we know depression is different because it so cruelly take away our hope of a brighter future. But be stubborn and it will change again. To state in a forum like this, that you want to end it all is a big responsibility to place on the shoulder of other people. It hand the possibility of that personal choice on to others .. which is unfair. Genuine suffering can bring more empathy and awareness of the plight of others in similar situations. There are time when i feel like ending my life and the thought nudge at me constantly but I recognize them now for what they are the depression talking. With each episode I have learnt new way to try and tag these thoughts. Ultimately .. the illness is happening to me the thought happen to me. But I would not burden others with the knowledge of their presence. It is only afterwards that i might mention that i had these constant thoughts, because to tell them in the middle of the depression would only darken their life a much a the depression is darkening my own. Please think before you make threat of suicide in the chat room or forums. There is an increasing number of people using this technique of gaining attention but it is unfair. by all mean we can talk about it .. but saying i am going to do it. is simply selfish and smack of attention seeking. Such behavior is destroying the integrity of genuine sufferer of depression in the eye of so many. It is eroding the help which is so lacking for so many .. and is probably the reason why the mental health hospital near me is a relic from the is and yet the cancer department is brand new and state of the art. Please .. stop attention seeking and stop using depression a a convenient coat hanger for emotional immaturity and lack of personal responsibility. For so many people .. this really is a matter of life and death.

Alright, this is a bit weird to explain, but I am having a lot of trouble making this decision so I am going to try and write it down. If anyone ha any suggestion or advice to offer I would appreciate it. A while back my brother and I let a stray cat in and fed it, and we got really attached to it. It is probably the most needy animal I have ever met and will sit with people all day, love it when you pet it, and I really like the cat. I wa not thinking at the time, but later I realized I needed to pay a pet deposit like the rest of the people in my complex, so I could keep the cat. So my mother called up our landlord is office and they said that we could not have the cat. It seems really unfair to me that everyone else is allowed animals, but for some reason we are not. I do not think there is anything I can do about this and it make me really sad. We did not want to get rid of the cat so bad that we decided to hide the cat away, letting it inside only at night, and living in my brother is van in the day while we were looking to see if there wa somewhere else we could move to. The problem is, I think I would only barely have enough money to move and I think it would be too risky that my family would lose our assistance if we were to go through with such a thing. Not to mention that I keep my spare money around in the case of emergency and if something bad were to happen, I would not be able to deal with it financially. So the only option I know of that is left is the animal shelter and I really do not want my cat to be locked up and possibly die alone in a cage. I know that it is getting old and that people take younger cat from animal shelter much more often than older ones. I want my cat to have a good place to live and do not want it to spend it final year in a cage, without loving owners. I am having so much trouble making this decision.. I love my cat a lot and want it to be taken care of well and to be happy, but I am endangering my family the longer I try to hide it. My mother and brother keep telling me that it is my decision to make and I just keep procrastinating. So I posted this here because it is making me depressed and stressed out. Are there any option I am leaving out? Do I either have to spend all of my money to move or give it to an animal shelter? They both seem like such terrible option

Hey, I guess this is the place to post this. I do not really know if I am depressed and if I am I am not sure how to go about getting help for it so I figured you guy would be able to help me out a bit. For the past year and a bit I have been feeling really out of sorts, pretty down and kind of lost in general. I left school in July and started a year out before I went to university. That is when I started feeling strange and I put it down to and still believe it wa just a weird kind of feeling when one leaf school and their life change forever and it is the beginning of being an adult which is a scary time for anyone. Over the year I would go through different stage where for a few month I would feel really positive and enjoy spending time with people and then for a few month I would feel lonely and sad and not go out with friend for month on end. Then I went to university in September and felt very very sad. I think it wa the shock of leaving home, living away from everyone I would ever known and also the feeling of being back at school. I knew immediately that I would made a terrible decision starting university, it wa not what I wanted to be doing with my life and for the week I wa there I would stay in bed pretty much all day and not eat much. I think I lost about a stone and a half and even now, month after dropping out and moving back home I am still half a stone lighter than I wa last summer. So now I am back at home and I have started a job cleaning table in a cafe where I got on with the people I work with and I am back in the same city a my girlfriend again and thing should be ok but I keep dropping into really low moods. A few week ago I thought that maybe it wa depression and so I took some test on the internet with what seem to be the basic questions. I tried to answer a truthfully a possible, you have to understand that depression is not something I want to have, I have known too many silly teenager who think that having depression make them interesting to other people and so they exaggerate emotion to try and look sad to find it appealing. So even though I found myself answering question that I knew were making me seem depressed I answered the anyway because it wa the truth. Things like a lowered libido, I find myself wanting to have sex with my girlfriend far far le frequently than I used to and to be honest a lot of the time when I am having sex I feel that I am just going through the motions. My sleeping which ha always been a little odd ha become increasingly erratic and I have found myself thinking about death a lot. To be honest though I thought that everyone thought about death and dying and that it wa natural. I fin myself becoming very easily bored with people and situation and where I once used to enjoy writing story I cannot being myself to do it anymore. The worst thing though is the mood swing I have and the low mood I find myself in quite frequently. When I feel like this I do not want to be around anyone or have anyone talk to me and I cannot stop myself thinking about bad thing that have happened to me or could happen on a personal level and making myself the centre of blame for them. So am I depressed or is it just, a I am leaning towards, a natural part of growing up and finding myself in the world of work and adulthood and trying to adjust to it. And if I am depressed how do I stop myself being this way? The thought of going to my doctor and sitting there and saying I think I am depressed doe not make much sense to me. I have always thought that with problem of that nature you must be told that you are ill and not decide for yourself that you are. Sorry if this ha been very long and poorly punctuated, I wrote it all fairly stream of consciously. Any help at all would be very much appreciated, I am feeling pretty vulnerable and down right now and do not want to feel this way anymore.

I am a yr old university student and I think I am getting depressed again. One of the debate I am having with myself is whether or not this is really depression. Things got better after a few month and so of course I stopped taking them cold turkey. Obviously not the best idea in the world, aside from this being one of the worst thing to do because of the possibility of reoccurrence, my body went through heck and I had some pretty nasty side effect even worse than when I wa actually taking the med . Fortunately, it did not reoccur and I have been feeling fine until the past couple of months. I think I am feeling the warning sign again low energy, crying, circular thinking, apathy towards everything, skipping school, sleeping all day, anxiety .. I just feel like maybe this is not really depression, maybe I am just a person who doe not handle stress well. Jeeze, when I read this it sound so ridiculous. It still feel like depression is being weak. I know, I know it is just like having diabetes and your body need the chemical to be normal but sigh I still blame myself. Difference between antidepressent starting side-effects and hypomania? Hey all, So I have read about how SSRIs can send bipolar people who are misdiagnosed with unipolar depression anxiety into hypomania or mania. I have also read that SSRIs can have activating effect during the start up period including insomnia, restlessness, distractibility that sound similar to some of the symptom of hypomania. So if someone starting and SSRI experience trouble sleeping, restlessness, increased energy, increased distractibility, period of euphoria, spends money like it is nothing, increased pressure to talk sing dance, increased response to music and caffeine, starting up old hobbies, etc., how can they know whether it is a combination of start-up side effect of the SSRI feeling much better from the SSRI or maybe placebo excitement from doing something about the depression or an antidepressant-induced hypomanic episode? I know it is a question for a professional but I like to hear experience also.

I am and have been depressed since I wa maybe year old. I wa emotionally abused by two confused parents. Depression alcoholism run rampantly in my family - fortunately I escaped the alcoholism. I wa diagnosed a having major depression when I wa about and I have been on medication since then. I have also had intensive psychotherapy and done lot of research on the subject. Nothing era the stigma!! Depression is misnamed. It should be called serotonin-deficiency disorder or something long and fancy so people will respect it. Too many say, Depression? Snap out of it! Or Do something to cheer yourself up. What bunk. It affect every part of your body. Last year I realized that some of my depression wa caused by kidney failure. I escaped dialysis and will probably be OK. But what a relief to have something serious to blame my problem on! Everybody respect kidney failure a a real disease . I had to disown my brother last year because his reaction to my failing health wa to call me a loser and an embarrassment. Very typical reaction from him, although the rest of my family were supportive. I now have no brother. I should have done it a long time ago. It take such a long time to come to a point where you believe you deserve something good in life. I am intelligent, employed and do not do drug or alcohol, never have, but sometimes I feel like a bum, a worthless waste of space, not worth the effort. I have to argue myself out of that mindset every day, and it is so exhausting, and people wonder why I am tired all the time and have no energy. I am very angry, too. I have never had a successful relationship and do not believe I ever can. I do not even believe it exists. No kids, either, but maybe that is a good thing. They take a lot of emotional energy. Anyway, I hate to sound like a whiner, but sometimes you have got to whine!! And I am happy to listen to everybody else and give them my support. We are all in the same boat here.

I am working on a new app startup to help you guys. Please read this, I would really appreciate any help feedback. Hello everyone! I am a current sophomore in college studying Computer Science and this summer I decided to work on a new app that caters to depressed suicidal people who are going through bad times. I want this app to connect depressed user to people who are volunteer at crisis center or just regular people in general that are willing to devote their time to helping the users. This app will be similar to twitch where the volunteer will go live and you can see their face and any user can instantly connect with them. First, the user will enter their information like what their favorite tv show movie music artist are, where they are from, and what type of gender they would feel most comfortable talking to. All this information gathered will be used to connect the user with a volunteer that closely fit those preference the user can swipe through all of the option that are given to them and they can actually add these volunteer to a list that they would like to come back to . I want it to be a one on one session where the user can decide to turn his her camera on, or if not, just use the microphone, or if they do not want to do either of those options, they can just use the chat box provided. I want it to be a social platform where user can connect with other user and see what they are doing. Basically a user is becoming friend with their streamer volunteer and other user a well. Also, these one-on-one session can be changed to a room where there can be user to one volunteer and that way more people can connect with each other with like a chaperone . I would not dare dream of making any money from this app and I know I need funding from VC is to get this thing skyrocketing. That is why I am getting all the resource I need from my school is entrepreneurial program and they are going to connect me to the people I need to know. I hate to say it but if I need to make shareholder money, then I will do it, but I do not want to make a single dime off of an idea that caters to people who are struggling through something so drastic. This may sound far fetched but my biggest dream for this app company, is to have a box filled with goody being mailed to user when the holiday Valentine is Day birthday come around that include letter voice message from volunteer saying Happy Birthday! Or Merry Christmas! Or Happy Valentine is Day! followed by more message that ha to do with the user. This box will also include a lot more goody that ha to specifically do with the user. I used to be like you guys. I cannot say that I suffered a much a you guy but I came to this sub a couple of time when I had no one else to go to. I had no shoulder to cry on in my freshman year of college which is why I think this app could actually mean something to someone. Please, we need to try and put an end to the huge suicide rate among child adult in America. Please provide any feedback, whether good, bad, or helpful. Anything helps, really. I can also answer any question you might have about this app. Please excuse my bad grammar, I am a computer science major for a reason haha.

Aha! moment during therapy So I have been meeting with a therapist about once a week since October of . It is been really great, and ha helped pull me from the brink more than once. Background I am gay, and wa raised Catholic in the s. Guess what happened next! Spoiler I wa bullied mercilessly. If I wa not too gay, I wa too fat, or too tall, or too weird or too unpopular. You get the gist. It it wa not my hair, it wa my mannerism if it wa not my high voice, it wa the dark circle under my eyes. Gee, what could have caused me to be losing sleep? Flash forward to today My therapist guided me through a meditation today that instructed me to visualize and speak to a younger version of myself. I described what I looked like, what characteristic defined me, and how I saw myself. Then I wa instructed to, a myself a the adult I have become, speak to that child and tell him what I wa feeling. I spoke with kindness and compassion and love and respect for that child, and told him everything would be alright. I told him that all of that hatred wa wrong, that it wa incorrect and that those people who say all those nasty hurtful things, they probably are not even going to remember saying it, so do not waste your time holding onto it. And it got me thinking about all of the baggage I have he would onto my life. All the glance and side comment and nasty, hateful things. And how I have internalized it, and believed it. And that is when the Aha! moment came. All this time, I have been so worried about all the bullying that other people did, I wa not even thinking about all the bullying I did to myself. All this time, it wa me. Sure, it wa other people who planted those seeds, but it wa me who perpetuated it, who told myself that they were true. After all, if you say something enough, it might a well be a true a anything else. So there it is. There is one step. It might just be one step, but it is a step in the right direction. There is my holy shit moment of the day, and I just wanted to share with you all. There is hope. There is progress. There is love. And I hope you all are able to find it.

When I wa twelve, one of my younger sister got leukemia. Despite my failing memory I can still remember a lot of what happened back then. I can remember being picked up at the park where I wa playing to rush to the hospital where my sister had been getting tested. You could say I wa whisked away from my innocence, but you are pretentious and I am not. I can remember how my mother broke the news to me. And how her voice cracked a little when I asked how bad she had it. I can remember sitting in the front room of my grandparent is place, where I wa staying so my parent could be with my sister in hospital, speaking to my cousin and saying that I felt it wa somehow my fault. What followed wa roughly a year of total disruption. My sister became the focus, understandably, while the rest of u learned to cope with the cloud hanging over us. Where a small rise in temperature could send heart racing. But that ha mostly been forgotten. Not blocked away, just forgotten. It wa another age and doe not feel real anymore. In the past few month the hospital ha been doing a study of ex-patients and their families. Tonight it wa my turn to do the phone interview. I would been avoiding it, mostly because I am lazy and I only ever seem to do thing that I feel will be enjoyable to me. Anyway, so they called through and I spoke. I do not think there were really any surprises, although it wa bizarre when I became conscious to the fact that I occurred to her getting cancer a it or that. I think I only said cancer once in the entire interview. Does that mean I am crazy? Struggling to cope? I do not know. Of the question they asked, I do not think I answered any that would cause a worry.

Hi everyone, I am new, and feeling kind of lost and shy. To introduce myself a little, I am a year old female. Up until about a year ago, I would never had any problem with depression or any other mental illness, though all of the other woman in my family have depressive tendencies. Suddenly, I started to feel differently in my mind - a feeling which ha gone on getting worse and worse. The last four month in particular have been a downward spiral. I moved house from a big city to a small village late last year, and I am not dealing with the change well. I do not know anyone in my local area, and I do not drive so I am stuck in this little isolated world I work from home . I lack the energy and the confidence to go out and meet new people. I tend to organize run everything in our household so basic routine have just fallen apart, and my long-term relationship is under strain. My partner doe not understand how I feel, while I resent the fact that he is making no effort to recognize the problem and take some action to help. My family and friend are mile away, and I do not feel able to talk to them. This last week, I found out my Mum is having test run for breast cancer. I know it is early day but it is just the last little thing that ha pushed me over the edge. I am walking around either in a state of complete, grey numbness or in a state of unutterable misery, unable to react to anything in a rational way. I have not left the house for days, because I hate the village where I live and being there just sends me into a blind panic attack. I have had an initial assessment for counseling in a city near where I live, but it will be week before I can get an appointment. I know that I need to go and see a GP and get some medication, but I do not have the energy even to pick up the phone and talk to the receptionist, let alone to walk on my own through the horrible village. And I am just so exhausted all the time. The internet is my only point of contact with the outside world at the moment. If all this sound familiar to anyone, please reply - it would be a lifeline for me. Thanks Wizzy.

Hi - I am dad a new member today I like what I have seen so far and have a need to express myself and get some feedback from others. I will try to summarize my story. About yr ago, I wa laid off tech field ..it wa very hard to find another good position. We were so spoiled, I wa making K - K in the past few years. We took it for granted. We built new house since - and did well. We enrolled our kid in a private Christian school a high priority for u THEN - My wife wa in a auto accident and ha spinal damage. She is mobile , but ha chronic pain. She is also suffering from depression. I managed to find another job, but it wa a very dysfunctional place. I had to take a few leave-of absence - then I became pegged a a weak person. They eventually let me go for too many LOA is I am paying for COBRA - we cannot do this forever..the pressure just add to my anxiety. After seeing my psychiatrist, he took me through MANY medicine and even ECT is.. we tried for three year to find the most effective drug. Presently I take Zoloft, Cymbalta, Lamictal,Xanax Valium for anxiety. I also have osteopenia bone density loss , so I take, fosamax and Tylenol narcotic for back joint pain. Lastly, I use Soma for muscle strain. I do not know if the medicine are helping me or adding to the problem..? I admit I lean on some of the medicine a a coping mechanism. I have had so many situational event in the last few years, I suspect my depression is more environmentally caused..? I seem to ruminate on the bad event of the past too much. I am stuck - and just cannot seem to get aggressive at my job hunt. We just sold our bedroom house and are now living in a three bedroom apartment. I feel guilty that my family ha to go through this. I know that I have skill and experience but I do not have the self confidence - my ego is on the floor . My sleep pattern is crazy and my appetite for food and sex is GONE. My wife is getting frustrated with me and doe not always build me up .. Her depression ha her down too.. With two depressed parents,it is very difficult to support each other. I feel stuck and do not know what to do..sometimes I just feel like giving up.. Any comment or thought would be appreciated!

Hello everyone. I am here because I am starting to have doubt about my mental health.. First off I am a year old male college student, and up until about year ago I think I have been fine..but lately I am not so sure. For one thing I cannot seem to concentrate or focus on ANYTHING anymore and it is becoming very frustrating. I find myself daydreaming or pacing only minute after I sat down to do something important and because of it I cannot get anything done. I cannot even focus on thing that should be fun, or the thing I used to be dedicated too. I have also become very philosophical. I always find myself spending a lot of time thinking about life and death, the nature of existence, etc..But it seems like it becoming an obsession. I always feel like I am wasting time but I cannot bring myself to do anything constructive. Sometimes I am disgusted when I realize how much time I spend simply pacing back and forth. I also cannot fall asleep at night anymore..I just lie awake thinking and I cannot make it stop. I also have constant fear about becoming old and having regret about how I lived and what I accomplished. I also have constant regret about the past. It seems like there is nothing I can do in life to satisfy myself and it driving me crazy..especially because for all the ambition I have I have no motivation whatsoever anymore. Also it is hard to explain, but I get the feeling that I cannot feel life, if that make any sense? It is like time is moving so fast that I cannot even realize it. Anyway, I wa never like this before and I have no reason to be like this now. I do not have relationship problem or family problem and I am not religious. This all just came out of nowhere with no apparent cause. Basically it ha come to the point where I know something is wrong with me but I do not know what. I have kept telling myself this is nothing but it getting more intense and now I feel like I am spiraling into a void or something. I guess I am simply here to seek some opinion on what my problem could be. Thanks a lot for taking the time. PS I may have posted this in the wrong place but it my first post so I am not sure..

Severe Ibs and depression combo is a death sentence Hi I posted a few time on this forum last year April sometine due to my depression and I am posting again because well, it is back. So I am just going to write a few thing about myself and why I am posting here. Im a year old guy from London, England and I have been depressed for about year now. I wa also diagnosed with IBS about or so year ago. I wa at university for digital medium and I finished. My first year but when the second year started my IBS symptom got worse and I wa I physically unable to go. thankfully the university gave me a year off and said I can start my second year next year after I get better. However it just seems to be getting worse not better. I can barely go outside without going through severe anxiety attack which lead to horrible pain in my stomach for which I need to go home to go toilet for, when it wa really bad I would feel very faint and start having panic attacks. It reached the point where I wa practically housebound. I spent like month playing games, watching anime and TV show and the pain started to get a bit better. Then day ago I went toilet and it happened again, severe pain, feeling very uneasy and then boom out of nowhere crippling depression, the wave just hit me. I began feeling hopeless again, I felt unsatisfied with life. Not just my life, but life in general. Thanks to my love of Anime, Webnovels, Games and Movies I started to wish my life wa like that. I know it is childish, but deep down it is just how I felt. I could not accept reality, it wa too mundane for me and I wa not satisfied just sitting there everyday just watching or reading things. But I could not do anything about it because everytime I try to do something my IBS kick in and basically cripple me. And I know that even if I try and do something, it is not really what I want. I do not want my life to be normal. All I would really be doing is trying to avoid the pain that it will never happen. I know this is long and it might be hard to emphasize with me if you do not really understand it. But I just felt like I really wanted to say something and see if maybe there were other people like me. I guess you could say I am looking for friend who can understand me, I am hoping that maybe it will make living a little easier if I have people to talk about the thing I love with who also understand what it is like going through depression. That is the conclusion I came up with anyway Thanks for reading

Glad I can help! Firelizardee ha helped me a lot over on the effexor room that is where most of my post are . I have never really posted my story, but for what it is worth, here it is I live in northern New York State where I grew up on the family farm. My brother and I run a feed hardware farm supply store. I have got a terrific wife and two daughter age and . My depression hit in January during a bout with the flu my youngest daughter wa hospitalized with febrile seizure and that might be what put me over the edge. My nervous breakdown seemed to come out of the blue, but I would had an extremely stressful six month between job, illness, and adoption. I am also a hard driving firstborn perfectionist, and several family member have had alcoholism or suspected depression. So I guess depression should not have been so big a surprise, but it was. I am a happy person with a great life! But I feel like I have been right to the edge of the precipice and looked down at Hell. Now I am doing everything I can to ensure I do not relapse..but I actually think I am a better person having been through this. I am much more appreciative of a good day and I am much more attuned to the suffering of others. It is amazing how many people I know have similar problems. And I hate that it ha to be this way, but suffering doe bring me closer to God. I hardly dare say that depression and anxiety wa worth it ..the memory of the anguish is still too vivid, and besides, it could come back tomorrow. But right now, today, I feel more contented with my crazy, precious, stupid, dear, wasted, amazing life than I have been in years. I am very lucky to have stumbled onto the right medication the first time, and to have a supportive family that did not tell me to isnap out of it . And I am very lucky to have the people here in this forum, who know what it is like. I hope, tvk, that in a few week you too will be a recovering depression survivor. Till then, we are here when you need us!

Am I crazy for wanting to get back with her? So let me give you guy a bit of a timeline first - April we met at work, became really good friends. Jake made her feel terrible for it and cut her off completely, leaving her to say that she hated him and wanted no part of him. - September October she told me she is always been attracted to me, but wa not ready for a relationship. I wa in love with her at this time, after knowing her for a while and her being everything I want in someone. Suggested being FWB, which I took her up on. But whenever I tried to make a move on it, she did not seem to want to do anything. We hung out just u every day, would always be talking, but for some reason when the time came around to make a move she never seemed to want to do anything. Mid October she said how we would be better off being friend since we did not seem to be going anywhere and that it wa hurting her self esteem, and that she started talking to Jake again. She is currently still dating Jake, but from what I hear from her are on the verge of another breakup. And now I want her more than ever. I wa absolutely heartbroken when she cut thing off with me, and I am still not over her. And she know this. If she cut thing off with Jake, I do not know what to do. I want her back more than anything, but at the same time it is like she put me through such pain and I do not want to chance that happening again. Am I crazy for feeling this way?

This is a great topic. It look like people associate with what wa shared. I wa laughing a little because for awhile I wa so hypersensitive to sound I would not even consider turning anything on that created noise, even the noise from light wa too much. I used to go to a counselor who had a radio on in her waiting room. I could not stand it and used to turn it off. Then someone would turn it back on, having no understanding of what it wa like to be me at that moment. That is funny to me now. I still do not like noise but I am lucky since I have pretty good control over my environment. For awhile I wa working in cubicle and wa not sure I wa going to make it. The one comment I wanted to share wa what I experienced when I did turn the TV back on, read the newspaper, listened to the radio. I went without it for two years. What I experienced wa the way the news wa presented. I wa captivated not by the word or circumstance of stories, but the tone of voice, the selection of what sound bite to use, the background chosen for a shot. I am still fascinated by all that and even dreamed the other night I had been hired to be that person who decides how to present something. In my dream I wa having a moral dilemma. My integrity is important to me and, in my dream, I wa talking to my bos and trying to explain the emotional angst I wa in. She kept saying, give them what they want, who are you to decide what is best for them. I woke up before I decided to quit or stay. But those word stayed with me through a day, who am I to decide what is best for someone else? What I do now is selectively listen to the news. I like NPR and sometimes enjoy McNeil Lehrer. I find if someone is expressing a strong opinion I will get annoyed if the presentation doe not also include an opposing viewpoint. My main issue is selective presentation. I feel disrespected if someone is asking me to just trust them. I want to know what are the observation leading to a conclusion. I want to know what level of uncertainty there is. I do not like anyone telling me how to think or feel. I am perfectly capable of creating all the drama I could ever use, on my own. I am not clear where to place blame for all the drama the industry of information put out there. I know someone is to blame. If only I could find that person or group then my hatred would be perfect. I am kidding about that last sentence. I am just trying to get a rise out of someone reading my share--I am being frisky. I support public broadcasting and free speech. If I wa in charge meeting would last forever because everyone would get a chance to speak. Would not it be great if there truly wa free speech in America. Would not it be great if the principle of dissent wa truly an American ideal. Is not it supposed to be?
