Where to start.. Well, I guess I am here because I think I have depression. I did recently talk to a therapist about it a couple of week ago. I guess it did some good because I feel like I may have gotten to the root of my problems. She told me that I wa depressed and that I have probably had a low grade depression for most of my life. I kind of thought that I wa depressed, because when I would read an article about depression with yes or no question I would usually answer yes to nine of them. The original reason my wife and I went to a counselor in the first place wa because my wife wa mad about my occasional habit of looking at pornography on the internet. I understand this bother her and I do not want to do anything that will upset her. I could never give her an acceptable reason why I did it. I really do not know why myself. I do not think that I have an addiction to sex. It doe not dominate my thought or life by any stretch of the imagination. In fact, I think that I am pretty tame compared to most males. Anyway, this cause a lot of strife in my marriage because my wife considers this cheating on her. Well, back to depression. We got to talking about this in counseling and the counselor asked me if I would ever been molested before. Oh boy. Well, this ha always been the big secret part of my life. When I wa or years, a female cousin of mine, who wa about year older, played some touching game with me over the course of summers. It wa all just touching, but I knew it wa wrong. She would tell me that I could never tell anyone because I would get in trouble. So I did not, until that therapy session. No, I had never told my wife because I always felt embarrassed and like I wa to blame because I did not do anything to stop my cousin. I pretty much told the therapist and my wife of course , everything that had happened to me. I got REALLY upset and probably cried more than anytime in my adult life. I felt somewhat better after talking, but inside I still feel ashamed and responsible for it. The counselor said that because of those incidences, I have had a low grade depression all these year because of holding it all in. I have ALWAYS had a hard time expressing my feeling about anything to anyone. That is just me. I told the therapist that I could see the low grade depression in my day to day life, but there are time when I feel like there is a huge, massive black cloud on me. I can be doing just about anything when suddenly I have this overwhelming feeling of dread and emptiness. There are time that I feel like if I could wish for my own death at that instant, I would gladly do it. When I do not have those bad lows, I just feel numb. The therapist said I might want to try medication, but I already take two different thing for chronic physical conditions, and I really do not want to take anymore drugs. I do not like doing anything that I used to do reading, sports, movies, etc. I have a teenaged son who is just terrific. He is extremely intelligent and just a great kid. I do not want my condition affecting him anymore than it already has. My wife is sometimes supportive, but I think she is tired of my moods. I have not had the porn problem any longer and I feel like I have gotten past that. The therapist attributed those time of porn weakness to depression and looking for a way out . I feel like since the counseling session that the low grade depression ha gotten worse. I am glad that I talked about the thing that happened and how I have felt, but I really do feel worse than before. Is there anything I can do besides more drugs? I just do not think those are the answer. Maybe I am wrong. I do not know.

I just want to find a way to make it bearable

I have lost the last of my hope for my turn . I M think that without making the conscious decision to, I have given up. I think I have just reached the point where I have stopped kidding myself that it will all get better or work out someday like people always tell you. What I cannot seem to shake is the faint screaming in the back of my head trying to get me to fix everything, the one who still belief happiness is possible despite my entire existence thus far indicating otherwise. I work at a job in an office doing pointless work that I used to swear to myself in high school and college that I would never wind up doing. day a week I wake up at , leave at , work from -, and get home at my parent house at . Then I eat dinner with them, watch TV with them, and they go to bed, so I turn in at , watch more TV, and go to bed myself. On the weekend I typically do nothing. When I do go out or hang out with a friend, we do nothing, just sit and watch TV or a movie. Unless we can find some fictional world we can discus Marvel, GoT, Star Wars, etc we do not even have much to talk about. I maybe have - friend that I do this with, and again, not too often. I do not currently have, nor have I ever had, anything even resembling a love life. I wa foolishly in love with a close friend who felt nothing for me thru high school and most of college before I managed to stop kidding myself on that one. I have never had sex with or even kissed a girl. The closest thing I ever did wa cuddle with a really close friend, and I even fucked that up because I overthought everything a always and did not make a real move, and she instantly lost interest gave up on me, and now we are barely even friend anymore. I am an introvert with no desire to change. I have no interest in going out to bars, clubs, or anything people my age for some reason enjoy. All I want is a person to love and spend my time with and provide each other with the human contact we need. My idea of the perfect evening would be cuddling on the couch with a girl I love and watching Netflix, just enjoying the closeness, maybe some kissing. Sex is something I want but not even on my radar right now. My life goal can be summed up in saying I want to find my person have a kid or two, and do what I can to make them and myself happy. I just honestly do not see the path to that reality, though. Nothing matter to me anymore. Just my parents, and I can honestly say that I am safe a long a they are around because I care more about them than myself. However, if they were gone tomorrow, I think I would be close behind. I just do not see a path out of this pointless existence that I feel capable of taking. I feel like I am just serving a sentence, going through the motion until it is mercifully done. No question really. I just felt the need to say it and acknowledge that I am done. With everything. TLR I am done, burnt out. Life is never been good to me and I have stopped expecting my turn . I see no way to achieve the few thing in life I want.

Alienating family Do you ever get tired of saying you are okay when you are not but you do not want to talk about it? So instead you just stop talking to them but then you feel worse for alienating your family and they have no idea why or what is going on with you. My family ha never been super close. We get along with each other and talk to each other but we are not a support system and I do not feel comfortable talking to them about my problems. I feel like I will be judged and gossiped about so I just keep it to myself and a a result wind up pushing them all away. The only person in this world I feel I can talk to about my problem are my husband and I know that is a huge burden on him to be my only outlet, my only friend. It is putting a strain on our relationship and I blame myself for this. It is a lot of pressure to put on someone. Living with a person with depression is hard enough under normal circumstance whatever normal is but add the burden of being the only friend, the only person that knows, the only person period. Eventually that only person is going to get tired of it.

It is been almost years.. years.. Holy shit.. It will be year in May.. It still feel like yesterday when I got that call from your dad, telling me what happened. I lost it.. Could not control myself, and I could not stop crying. When I had to say goodbye, it broke my fucking heart.. Losing my best friend, my fianc , wa the hardest day of my life. But every year after, the pain slowly faded away, and it did not haunt me anymore. But last week, when your dad called me and said that he would be in town for work, and wanted to get together, it made my day. Had not seen heard from him in about months. But last night, when your sister called, and told me that your dad passed away in his sleep from a heart attack, it wa like the whole world had stopped spinning again.. Fuck, it is been a long weekend. And damnit, it is gonna be a long week.. P.S. Mr Rhodes, give Elaina a hug for me, and tell her I miss her, and that I am doing alright. I will see you both again one day.

There truly is no hope. For any of us. This is the bleakest truth of all. Everything is more complicated than you think. You only see a tenth of what is true. There are a million little string attached to every choice you make you can destroy your life every time you choose. But maybe you will not know for twenty years. And you may never ever trace it to it source. And you only get one chance to play it out. Just try and figure out your own divorce. And they say there is no fate, but there is it is what you create. And even though the world go on for eon and eons, you are only here for a fraction of a fraction of a second. Most of your time is spent being dead or not yet born. But while alive, you wait in vain, wasting years, for a phone call or a letter or a look from someone or something to make it all right. And it never come or it seems to but it doe not really. And so you spend your time in vague regret or vaguer hope that something good will come along. Something to make you feel connected, something to make you feel whole, something to make you feel loved. And the truth is I feel so angry, and the truth is I feel so fucking sad, and the truth is I have felt so fucking hurt for so fucking long and for just a long I have been pretending I am OK, just to get along, just for, I do not know why, maybe because no one want to hear about my misery, because they have their own. Well, fuck everybody.

Hi all, I have just registered here.. I have been depressed for quite a while, my dad died when I wa and my best friend died when we were . After the death of my father I wa in counseling, but my counselor stopped coming to school to see me and I do not think I ever got anywhere from it. I am currently , almost and male, from the UK for those keeping count I have felt crap for ages.. I hate my job, and doing that along with the stress of my final year of university sent me on a downward spiral. I would worry so much about my workload, but have no motivation to do it and get out of the situation. I hate being single, but cannot find someone special who like me, who I like back. I want to leave my job, but I cannot afford to until I leave university and get a job doing something I want to. I had thought about suicide, but I know the pain of losing people close to me, and I could not inflict that pain on someone else. I considered cutting myself too. I thought that maybe if I wa hurt, I could get extra time for university work, and maybe someone would help me. But I realized that I should not do that, and should see someone about it. I also did not have the ball to do it. I think bad thought a lot but I do not think I could go through with them. I wa worried about going to the doctor though. My previous experience with a counselor ha put me off them, and I do not like talking to stranger about my problem - that said I do not like telling people I know either because I feel that they will judge me. I wa also concerned about medication because I do not know if I like the idea of chemical altering my brain apart from alcohol that is! But about week ago I finally went to see my doctor. He ha put me on mg of Fluoxetine a day, although I am not sure whether it is doing much. I have been having headache and going a bit dizzy a well a getting sleepy among other side effect . It is weird though, I do not know whether I am feeling better or not, my friend say I seem different and better for taking it but I still feel bad at times.. I still lie in bed at night worrying. But I think maybe I need to take it more and see how it effect me long term. I guess even on medication we all have good day and bad days. I wa scared to tell my mother that I wa on anti-depressants, a she work in mental health. Some would see this a a blessing a she understands the field to a great degree, but I wa worried because I thought that she might think I wa mad. I eventually got the courage to tell her after about day though because I wa very dizzy and I thought that she would suspect me of being on illegal drugs. She is being very supportive now, while still keeping enough distance that I do not feel like she is worrying too much about me. It is good to know that she understands that it is going to help me cope though.. and she say it only a minor drug compared to what some of her patient take to stop the voice telling them to do things. Anyway I decided to look for somewhere online where other people know what it feel like, and I am glad that I have found this place. I hope I can make some new friend here, and maybe I can help a couple of people too.

Frustration I do not understand why I am depressed.. I am pretty sure I am depressed, I do not feel much joy in life, I have trouble feeling enjoyment outside of compulsive harmful activites, I just feel numb, pointless. My thought turn to suicide quite often, but I would never do it. I can say that I think of suicide somewhat le than I used to.. so there is been improvement. I do not understand why I am not better, or what else I can do outside of medication. I run, I work hard and do well at work, I am a dedicated father and spend lot of time with the kids, I am dedicated to making sure they feel loved and cared for, their need are ahead of my own. I try to do new things, and I do them well, but it all feel so flat and empty. I do not understand what else I can do to improve. I can feel myself starting to slide back down and it is really scary and frustrating. I feel like I have done every thing I can, but it is no use.. I do not know what to do.

The last few week I have slid back almost a far a before I started treatment. Just when I thought I wa improving. I finally went to the drop in center called Sunshine Place, a someone wa giving a talk on depression. The counselor spoke with me for about half an hour after her talk and said she thought I needed more help than my GP wa giving. For the first time in a few month I actually broke down and cried again - which is very annoying to me. She wrote down the number of the Mental Health Center with some suggestion for them. I rang the next day for an appointment and that wa hard just to ring . She had told me I might have to wait a few week for them to see me, but they made an appointment for the next day. The psychiatirst there wa okay I did not even cry like I normally do when talking to a new doc but I told her I wa tired of telling the same thing to every new person. The short of it is they are changing me from Lexapro to Avanza and organizing for some CBT. I see my regular GP next Tuesday so I am pleased they said they would inform her of the medication change. I wa also warned that I would probably feel a bit more depressed while the medication change wa taking place so I duly warned Mom and Matt not to take any notice of any strange behavior. Matt a usual just laughed and said yeah, Mom is going to go psycho . Now I just wait for them to contact me about the CBT. If I do not answer any post you will know why, but I will try to just put a little emoticon up every now and then to let you know I am thinking of you all, and that I am still listening.

I feel worse everyday and I am worried I will have some type of breakdown I cry every single day, it is been days. I talk about it but is like talking to noone at all. I talk all the time. My self worth used to fluctuate between oh, i think i am good? to I am trash intermittently but lately it is just the bad one. I feel like I do not deserve happiness, love, attention. I am worried about how long can I take this. Can I become numb at some point? This part it is just extremely painful and I do not think I can deal.

Lately, I have been going to sleep later and later into the day just so I can avoid ppl and avoid dealing with depression being sad. But, by the time I do wake up cannot sleep anymore, I feel more depressed than when I originally was. And yet, despite all of that, I still have this need to sleep excessively because I keep having dream that are more entertaining, adventurous, and exciting than what is currently going on in my life. And even when I rewire my sleep schedule back to normal, I still end up going back to the messed up sleep schedule just cause I hate feeling depressed and hate dealing with it.

Oh please please please.

In college year ago I wa the victim of a gang rape. I have read up quite a bit and identified with all the stage and normal reactions.. I went through the self blame, and guilt, and anger, and depression, and I came to realize it wa not my fault. I never reported it and after a year I decided the best thing would be to forget about it. I pretended it did not happen and went on with my life. I forced it out of my thought until it wa no longer a struggle to do so. Eventually I almost did forget about it. I never thought about it and when the subject wa referenced in other context I never even thought about my particular experience. It almost became some movie I saw, or some girl I knew about. I am married now with a four year old child and I have a really great life. About six month ago I started having these rape fantasies. I have been too embarrassed to ask my husband to act them out, but he doe oblige in rough sex, and I started asking for it more often. I have felt confused a to why I would want this with my husband and it is always with him .. I do not desire this with anyone else when I have this history. It started me thinking about them even again. Then I started having nightmare about three week ago. Horrible realistic dream where I actually wake up and I am still hallucinating that men are holding me down. Last night I punched my husband full in the chest because I thought he wa attacking me when he wa just trying to wake me from a nightmare. This along with the COMPLETE lack of sexual desire where before we had a very healthy sex life. I am a big fan of the STOP THAT approach to self help, but I cannot seem to stop this. I am beginning to dwell on it now. Also I try not to ever deny husband and with the high job related stress he is having right now he is seeking sexual gratification every night. I am beginning to dread bed time, and after he is asleep I am up on the computer and drinking!

I am a year old woman living in Florida with my husband. I have been severely depressed for months, and now looking back I can see that it actually started about a year and a half ago. If only I could go back and warn myself. Like many of you, I have been suffering depression since I wa very young. In fact, I can remember being in first grade, coming home and going to bed for the rest of the night. Of course, back then it felt more like fear. In th grade, I asked my mother if I wa a manic depressive because I had read about it and I felt I had all the symptoms. She scoffed and said it wa just normal teen hormone that made me feel that way. I love my mother and she ha always been there for me. I used to call her at in the morning cry and she would talk to me until I felt better. However, when I call her up today, she still doe not understand when I tell her I am depressed. She think I need to get up and start doing thing until I snap out of it. I try to tell her I have bill screaming at me and I still cannot get out of the house to find work. I think she is in denial. Now, with all of the information I find on this site, I think I may even be bipolar. When I found the man I wanted to marry, I warned him that I had experienced many deep depression in my lifetime and that it wa probably likely to happen again someday. He said he would stay by my side no matter what, and he has. Unfortunately, it is painfully apparent that he ha no idea at all how to handle it. When he try to talk to me and cheer me up, I say mean thing to him until we are both raising our voices. Let me tell you, when I am like this, I do not back down either. I usually say something hurtful and then grind my teeth in anger for a while. He get mad too, but it is also painfully apparent that he forgives me. Then, I feel like a real jerk. I just started seeing a psychologist, since I have not had a job since last August and it is clear that I do not know my way out of this. I have only met with her once, but I think I will like her. She ha told me to do a few simple thing everyday until our next meeting on Wednesday. She want me to get hour of sunlight everyday, minute of exercise, and try to make a simple daily schedule to follow. I am a bit worried because I have not been able to do them because I just do not sleep right anymore. It is am and I have not slept yet. I may fall asleep in a few hours, only to toss and turn and then wake up in the evening feeling like crap. I have tried some medicine but they do not help. Have any of you had this problem? What did you do?

Me too. You want a friend. You want someone to be there with you when you are weak, and someone to comfort you when you are down. You wish you were not alone but you feel invisible. You are trapped in your thought and nobody can reach you. You feel like you cannot do anything right, like you are useless. Everybody ha friend except for you. You are a burden and nobody actually like you, you just exist. You push people away because you feel like you do not have anything to offer, so you would rather just be left alone. You cannot wait to die because life is pointless. You do not want to get up anymore because you have been knocked down too many times. You are so tired and weak, and the weight is crushing you even more. Every day that pass is the same and you feel like you are waiting for nothing. Life cannot get any better because it just suck and you wish you did not exist.

No lodging for the sad Being depressed sucks. That is easy to grasp. Most people who are not clinically depressed understand this. What they do not understand is that being depressed and honestly trying to get better is extremely difficult, and our ruggedly individualistic society doe not give a single fuck about you. You need help? Fuck you. Your wealth is not just something you have, it is seen a a reflection of your worth a a person. Poor? Sad? Find it difficult to wake up? Find it difficult to complete things? Do you procrastinate because of underlying psychological issues? Fuck you, you are just lazy. The clear message capitalism sends me is that if I cannot work, or I cannot work enough, or I cannot work doing a high value job , or if I need help to get better so that I can do those high value job , I probably ought to just go die, because I am clearly worth nothing.

Well, it is been a year now since I tried killing myself A year ago on December st I tried to kill myself. I spent a week in a psych ward and have been on lot of med and doing lot of therapy since then. The therapy ha helped quite a bit, I have slowly learned how to listen to myself and how to take thing one day at a time. As far a med go, my anxiety is much more controllable and my sleeping med actually work mostly so I cannot complain too much. I do not think I am ever going to overcome depression. I have kind of learned to live with it, sure, but beating it probably will not happen I am way too cynical to beat it. It is just how I am wired. There is a lot in life I probably will not get to experience because of how I am. And I still do not know how to change that, or at least make some good out of it. What is wrong with me? I just want to know what is really wrong with me, should I get help or something..I often think about myself like I am a negative person. And what worried me, I could not think of anything, still after thinking for like an half our, there wa nothing. Do not get me wrong, I still laugh and sometimes even smile, but for me positive and happy people seem fake. Anyone in a similar situation? Some advice would be appreciated.

I miss the day where I at least had depression sleep to look forward to. More of a vent here so bare with me. I have not had a good night of undisturbed deep sleep where I wake up feeling refreshed in years. I used to be able to sleep through anything and for many hour at a time. It wa awesome. Idk, just like I am riding a vicious cycle of depression worsening sleep, sleep worsening depression slowly downwards to the point where I think not existing would finally feel like the best damn rest I ever had. Anyway, thanks for reading and stuff. Felt good to vent a little.

Dead is better than alive imo. I would not say I feel particularly sad or depressed, a a constant state. It is all over the place. But I think I do want to die. I choose to believe there is nothing after we die no afterlife, no heaven or hell, no reincarnation, or godly ascension. Just a beautiful, peaceful nothing. And it just seems so much better than being alive. When you are alive, you feel so much. Yes, there is happiness, excitement, surprise, love. But there is also sadness, anger, hate, jealousy. Why would I chose to bare such thing when death can provide none of these things? All the good stuff about living doe not weigh out the bad, in my head. A nothingness after death just seems like the better, more rational option. Am I wrong to think this?

.. being that I do not know anyone here yet, but I feel like I am about to boil out of my skin if I do not get some of this out. Last week I left the house for the first time in nearly a month and saw my doctor about the state of my head. It wa the hardest thing I have ever done that did not involve burying a loved one a I wa brought up to believe that one should not talk about one is feeling with other people. Although the sawbones made all the right noise I do not know if he even belief me. I do not know if seeing him wa the right thing to do because since walking out of his surgery all I have had is deeper anxiety, more guilt, and a feeling of total and utter desperation - I think it is actually a little worse than before. I feel like this is not going to get any better, ever. I am scared .. I do not know how this is going to end up for me. I cannot see a way out. I have been depressed for a very long time but since losing my job a little while ago I have hit the proverbial bottom. I have suffered from anxiety for many year but recently it ha been getting worse - I had my first panic attack last year. It doe not matter what I try to do to stop it, all I can think about is death, pain, more death, failure, and yet more death. I have been having horrible nightmare for month and have not slept properly since my teen . Long story short ish when I wa little the Infamous They told my parent I wa gifted . They had high hope for me. I won a scholarship to a good private school, where the other little girl made fun of me. Then the scholarship ran out and I had to go to a state school. Where the other little child made fun of me, spat at me, physically attacked me and eventually my parent had to take me out of school altogether. They found a better one, where the other kid continued to make my life hell. When I wa about or I started self harming cutting my arm with broken light bulb glass . My mother noticed once, shouted at me, and then never raised the subject again. I continued to do it until I wa about . My dad bullied me when I wa a kid basically he subjected me to about year of mingled disinterest, public humiliation, and emotional abuse. Then he did a disappearing act three year ago - leaving my mother in financial trouble. I have not heard from him since. I have wasted my life. Nothing I have ever attempted ha succeeded - really nothing, and I have never been able to please the people I wa trying to please. I used to think I wa a talented artist wanted to be a comic - book artist but now I have no self - belief left. I have not picked up a pencil in week and I cannot even bear to look at any of my work. I cannot do anything anymore and there is nobody I can talk to - my mother is my only close family and she doe not believe in mental illness if I mentioned it to her she would, at best, get angry and tell me to grow up stop being so self indulgent . I have two close friend who have their own problem to deal with. I am seeing the doctor again on Monday but I fail to see what he can do to fix the fact that I am a useless failure. I am so scared and confused. I have been cry for about a week now and it is getting really tiring. I am scared that maybe what I think is depression is really just an excuse to attempt to explain my pathetic behavior, that I am really a hypochondriac my anxiety is now constant and I have convinced myself I am going to die any minute from any terminal illness you would care to name and I am wasting the doc is time resources. He offered me sleeping pill but I said no a I wa afraid to have such thing in the house. Basically, not a good week. Sorry to vent like this but I had to get it out .. sorry for being so selfish.

Hi everyone, I am new to this site and my name is Elie. I am a -year-old married mother of three girl and one angel baby boy who wa born still . When we lost Conner due to an underlying infection and when I had the amniocentesis the infection got to Conner and he died a month later. That wa very devastating to u but I have had a lot of support with an infant grief group in our area. After we lost Conner three month later we got pregnant with Charlene and she is so beautiful. Anyway thing were going good oh I forgot to mention the fact I remarried my ex husband. We were divorced for year and we got back together . One day when the baby wa month old my husband accidentally spilled hot coffee onto Charlene is leg and she had a blanket sleeper on so she wa not that bad. I wa dumbfounded I have known this doctor for hears with my girl Marissa and Jessica, so how dare he. I wa so upset, but we have a DSS worker in our life because of my middle daughter who ha mental retardation, she is in a residential home because of her behavior which in a way wa excellent for us. We are constantly in and out of court now because of this and then my husband wa feeding the baby oatmeal and I wa warning him to be careful she flail her arms, well she flailed and knocked the spoon out of his hand and the clump of oatmeal landed on her face .. we cleaned her up not noting anything bad a she did not cry or nothing she wanted to eat. I had a date on Saturday. It went great unfortunately. I have a friend that I will call H. I have known her for year now and I really like her a a person. I recently discovered that she wa interested in dating me, which boosted my self confidence so much because who would be into someone like me . Well a week ago I worked up the courage to ask her out on a date, and this Saturday we went on one. It wa great. We went to a small local coffee shop and sat there and just talked for almost hours. It wa seriously such a good time. On the way out I asked if she would like to do it again and she said yes. Awesome! Later that night I get a text.. she doe not think it will work out in the long run. I ask her why and she say we both have very different plan with our future, she is still getting over another break up, etc.. Well that sucks, but I understand. I wa texting H about it a bit more tonight and this is what I get in reply to how I feel about the whole situation- i feel like there were so many expectation from others that it wa made into something i thought i wanted, but then i realized it wa not. That attraction she had to me? It wa not real. It wa all made up because of her friends. And of course it was, because who would be into someone like me? It hurt so bad. I am cry while typing this. I feel like such an idiot for believing someone would actually be attracted to me. I am a fool for believing it and I hate myself for it. I do not know what to do. I thought maybe it would help posting here or something. I do not know.

My story, i have to get this off my chest. Life suck Hello everyone, This is a post about my life basically, i just need to get this off my chest. Its a long post but i just have to do this. Let me introduce myself first. Currently im a yo boy who turn in March, I live in Belgium grammar will be bad sorry . I have older brother, loving parent who are still together. And oh yeahh i have a very cute pupper a well. Financially everything is fine. Basically a family some people only can dream for. I mainly play on nintendo console switch, ds, gba, n and the MMORPG runescape dont laugh I consider myself a extravert to my friend but an introvert when im talking to girl lol or strangers. I have always had a rough time fitting at school. Our elementary school wa VERY SMALL, it only had kid including kindergarden . I wa always the odd one out , but because it wa so small i had friend. We played alot together and it wa a ok time really. but when i wa most people around me started to notice that i made weird random noises. And that i made small movement with my shoulder unnatural one . Friends got annoyed, parent got annoyed, everyone got annoyed. Eventually my teacher screamed at me telling me to shut up, RIP ME. Eventually mom took me to a specialist and it turned out i have Gilles de la Tourette syndrome, if you youtube this you will get extreme case where people shout fuck and ass, and move uncontrollably all over the place. THIS IS NOT THE CASE WITH ME. I think Tourette affected my life ALOT it still does!! . I wa always a really shy kid until i wa , i started to accept my tourette and wa a happy yo. -- HIGH SCHOOL from to yo, it devided in class . This is where the problem started, when i just started high school i wa scared but excited like everyone. Unfortunately for me i got the SHITTIEST bully in my class. I had no friend in year , they made fun of me becuz of my tourette i didnt tell them becuz they wouldnt understand . It got to a point where i just smacked someone on the head with a baseball bat. Teachers knew of my situation so we both got week detention. I wa depressed during that year, you know the teenage life, it hard. Year they changed me to another class and they were OK. They didnt bully me but they didnt talk to me either. They just left me alone really, during those year i had friend who i talked with but he also had his own friends. So most of the time i wa alone. But that friend had no common interests, so i ended up playing runescape all day, u can talk with other player there and i had plenty of friend in there. It felt awesome to have friend and i spent all my time there neglecting my studies. But somehow i passed the first year lol. I thought year wa bad, but then i met year different school . I got bullied even more in this class, they called me names, ignored me, humiliated me in class and started bitching if they had to sit next to me. Luckily they never got fysical with me idk if thats the right word . In the middle of that year I decided in the middle of the fucking winter it wa snowing in morning to take the bus mom wa always home and it wa near our house and to step of early. Spent hour in a small freezing cold chapel playing on my nintendo ds, go to my house after mom left and spend playing game in my room. After day the school called, my mom found out. I wa stuck and told her everything about the bullying, about me feeling like absolute shit and that i had no motivation to go to school. She let the teacher know, went to school, got me to a psychiatrist. The bullying stopped, but they still ignored me, i still hadnt any friend and i still didnt feel any better. I somehow survived the next month and passed. If i had . lower in total i would have failed that year. The only way i felt better wa with playing runescape. YEAR - IS IN THE SAME CLASS WITH THE SAME PEOPLE, in year three people joined Year kinda went the same a year believe it or not. The classmate were ok, they didnt bully me, they talked to me when needed but that wa it. I spent my time with some kid i met on the playground. But u know they were those kind of friend u just spent time with becuz nobody else is around. They never invited me to go to party or to hang around or anything. This year wa also the st year i told them about my Tourette Syndrome i got some damn weird look at time and i didnt even realize i wa making sound . They understood, they acted more nice to me, i didnt feel left out so much but wa still unhappy. And on runescape i got into a community clan , made some good friend there. It wa the only place in the word i wa truly happy. Year , same class a last year. people joined and of them became a friend of mine. To be completely honest he is still one of my best friend today, but i come back to that later. Lets call him J, Ok so now i had a friend. We had a small group of people now, S other classmate who wa nice to me , J and me. others from another class joined the group somehow and i finally made some friends. We started going to party and they invited me. Unlucky for me they dont play runescape and have different interest in gaming, thanks to this im not that close to them. But i wa finally starting to be happy becuz i had friends. All the small thing that bothered me sitting alone, always last chosen at sport etc etc.. , bothered me alot le becuz i wa super happy i finally found something positive in my life. I survived year and fairly positive compared to year and . We all graduated and college time arrived -- COLLEGE This wa last year, so this is super recent. I decided to study orthopedagogie , it doesnt have an english translation. Its working with mentally disabled people or troubled young people, stuff like that. Ofcourse I begged my parent for a student room, i wanted to have a great college life like in the movies! Everyone say it the best time of your life and you should enjoy it to the fullest. Oh boy i wa so so dumb for believing it would be that easy. And ofcourse i also joined a society. Finally growing up like an adult and living alone, I WAS FREE. In my class i got along with most of them, we had some good laugh during breaks, went to our class etc.. but i wa the only one who had a student room unlucky . So ye that wa that. In my society i tried making friends, but it didnt work out really. I missed some first important party becuz i decided to go with some classmate i still think to this day that this wa a huge mistake , when i went to party alone to make friend because i realized my class wa lame they already a friend group . I didnt know and still dont how to make contact with them and make friends. I wa really really really lonely last year, i just spent all my time playing runescape, talking with my online friends. November i met someone and we became super super super super close. he is american, not lover just friend . We still talk to each other everyday. Man we even were planning to go to japan together but my mom wont let me. But coming back to that later. During the weekend i had my old friend group from highschool, we still hang out x per month, we still do. But they mostly spent time studying and hanging out with their uni friends. They didnt left me out or anything but i had lost alot of contact with them. I failed of my courses, i decided to call it quits. I wa happy that i could finally leave that student room. uni year wa HORRIBLE. I liked the study i wa doing, so i decided to try it again but in a lower degree, it in a school for adult . Its hard to explain but basically i ended up with out of people to be and have kids. It wa class x a week and internship idk if thats the right word . day per week. I wa working with adult who had a mental disability. Last year i never had internship, only class. It turn out that Orthopedagogie is not the study for me. I dont want to do this the rest of my life. I had officially quit november . -- We finally arrived to the present time, thank you for the people that made it here. So here i am, a year old boy almost , wasted . year in uni, wasting parent money.. I have no idea what i want to study next.. The only study i consider doing is social work, luckily for me u can start in february. So i have to do some shitty job from november - february. I still have my highschool friend who i hang out with x per month? I have a loving brother and parents, good financial situation. I can earn some quick cash for month and go back to study. But to be completely honest.. I DONT SEE THE FUCKING POINT. My whole life i have felt lonely, sometimes with a good reason, sometimes really without a reason. I have dealt with depression not officially diagnosed , or atleast felt like i was. To be completelty honest. I feel like a sad little fucking sack of shit. What have i achieved in my life? Fucking nothing. I cant even think like a fucking normal person, people think im weird, i dont have logical sense. Everyday i have to force myself out of bed. Its been like this for so long now that im starting to get used to it. Even now that i dont have a job until feb, i simply dont have the strength to get out of bed. I sleep hr per day just so the day pass by faster. I dont feel like going out, i dont feel like talking to people. Runescape wa always my escape, but i simply do not have the motivation to even play runescape . On the outside i still act normal, i laugh and act like everything is fine so my parent wont worry. Whenever i have a job they fire me because i work to slow . Once i worked in a storage for a store and had to get the order from customers. You have to use common sense all the time, and they said i didnt have that enough for this job. This happened x.. Remember when i said that i have tourette syndrome, well i always told myself that it also doe have a mental side to it. I can come across different then the normal person , or use the wrong word in sentence to express myself. And i interpret thing differently at times, i usually need to hear the explanation multiple time and they have to explain it very clearly. My parent just said im a slow learner but with hard work i get there . This fucked me over so many time in life, and whenever i tell people friend about the mental side of tourette they all have that expression on their face. The face of ohh that explains alot, but i also feel so sorry for you . Im so fucking sick of it, im not even sure if this happens becuz of my tourette. Im really starting to think this is just all in my head and that im just retarded. my iq is average tho . I often imagine myself having some disorder to make myself feel better, i really dont know what to do with myself. I feel like an absolute loser who cant even think like a normal person. Last month i bought myself a nintendo switch some game to cheer myself up. it get me trough some day but in the end i still end up having no energy to get out of bed. BUT i feel like an arrogant asshole writing this, i have nothing to complain about.. Alot of people had the worst childhood, or had a traumatic experience.. I have a family many people can only dream of? financially im good. I have the chance to try studying again.. I HAVE NO REASON TO FEEL THIS WAY AND IT MAKES ME GO INSANE. Im having alot of negative thoughts, and i cant get them out of my head. I dont see the light in the end of the tunnel. Not stuff like suicide or self cutting btw . As i said earlier i met someone a year ago trough rs. I can always talk to him, i never met him in person but we discord at time and message each other everyday. I feel more connected to him than my IRL friends. They have no same interests, other life goals.. How sad is that? Fkn someone i met online is my best friend? He is the only that know how i feel but he doesnt understand how i feel. He try to support me, but it doesnt help. -- Im not making this post so everyone feel bad for me.. Im just so sick of life.. I dont know what to do.. My parent have their own problem and think im over exaggerating.. Grow up son? Everyone ha to get a job Grow up for once . But they dont know what it feel like to drag yourself trough the whole day atleast i hope they dont . They think im just lazy and dont want to work.. I feel isolated from the world and i cant get out of it. Ok god damnit im re-reading this post, at this point im just rambling.. Idk what i expect from posting this here.. Maybe it just to give my empty brain a boost.. I will just end this post now or i keep adding stuff. EDIT i have no clue how to get the text all the same size

I often ponder the idea of giving up completely. Has anyone given up completely? How doe it feel like? I have had extreme depression for years. For a long a I can remember I have tried so hard to stay alive. There wa a point in my life where I gave up. I remember my mom wa beating me and I put up my hand to block the belt and I wa crying. I remember after one of the time she struck me I started to think what if I gave up? And I just shut down. In that moment I stopped putting my hand up, stopped crying, and rolled into a ball while mom kept beating me for a few more minutes. For a few year after that I stopped caring about my appearance. I got so fat and I just kept eating and eating. I stopped caring about my grade and did not even try. I would just turn in a blank paper with my name on it. During high school I woke up and started to try again even though it wa really hard. Since then I have not stopped. I regularly do thing I do not want to do in an effort to make it by. I get up at , I shower every day, I go to the gym, I do my homework, study, etc. Currently, I have been working my butt off to be able to join the military to get away from my parents. My depression is acting up so much, it is getting really hard to keep trying. I often find myself daydreaming and pondering how good easy it would feel be to just stop what I am doing and give up. Get in bed, stay in bed, go eat, eat some more, and more, finally not caring about my appearance and just not doing anything in general.

We were all given about five minute to decipher what the fuck this meant. Now, Mr. Runge had a reputation for being a tough teacher. He would not let you get away with ANYTHING. If you fell asleep in his class because you were out all night in some cornfield with a bonfire and a bottle of Jack, he would kick your desk in such a way that your head would fly upward at warp speed and your hangover would instantly get very very bad, and then suddenly disappear. Mr. Runge had some freaky special power that student could not tap into. I knew what the acronym stood for. But that is only because my high school boyfriend wa a year ahead of me and gave me a head up on how the first day with the Jolly Green Giant would play out. He is going to write this on the board, make you feel incredibly stupid and then it will be over. TINSTAAFL, pronounced TinStaffel. There Is No Such Thing As A Free Lunch. Runge went on to explain that free did not exist. The free lunch at college tour were paid for when your parent registered you were charged a service fee. Or, more on my level, Clinique never REALLY ha a Free Gift with Purchase . Because, you see..you have to make the purchase, dumb ass! And they over charge every other product just enough so that you are really paying for your free gift. This burst my bubble. Because now, whenever I take something marketed a free, I know I am paying some sort of overhead or some poor schmuck is working extra hard so that I can get . ounce more of my favorite shampoo for the price of the regular size! You would think that I would have held on to this knowledge while looking for apartments. While scanning the ads, I bypassed the one that used word like full of character , because I knew that meant dump and TLC needed , because I knew that meant dump. The one I honed in on boasted country living, quiet, serene, pond, lot o land and everything included! I love where I live. I cannot say it enough. If I did not think raccoon would eat me at this hour, I would jump on top of the roof and scream to the surrounding hill I love you and all your coniferous smell and the creature you shelter! Yeah, apparently the rooftop would make me a tad wordy. My landlord are awesome people. Salt of the earth. Nice, down-home, trusting folk. And, a the contract for country people reads, Coon Hounds Must Be Owned and Bred . I had never seen a breed of this type until I moved here. The momma dog wa so sweet and gentle and quiet. She wa quite the fatty too! Then suddenly she wa not. And in her pen were ten little squeaky pups, eye shut tight, blindly falling into food and water dishes, only to be rescued by momma. Cute, no? Who doe not love puppies?? If you bring Jackson up, I will have to cut you. It is been about month. Puppies have found their voices. All ten of them. And even the momma is begging for a release. Tigger is in the window, constantly doing a head count to make sure everyone is in their place and not a single one wanders off into oblivion. He is exhausted. Momma is exhausted because at night she performs a constant howl that crack my heart. She is begging to be released from those needy fucking kid for at least ONE night of respite. And I am exhausted. Because momma will not shut up and deal with her fate and every time a puppy so much a peeps, gaymancat is all over my head doing a get-up-because-they-might-run-into-traffic-and-get-hit-by-one-of-the-four-cars-that-pass-by-here-at-night dance. So I get up. I get a drink. And the howling stops. And Tigger fall asleep in my space on the bed. Yeah..a great apartment, a story book front back yard, nice landlords, cute puppy and SLEEPLESS NIGHTS. All included!

In a bad headspace after a breakup with someone who finally made me feel like thing would be okay It is been a week since I returned from a six month exchange program overseas. There, I ended a y relationship with an addict, who I still cared for but could not love anymore. Then, of course, I fell in love with someone. We were inseparable for the six months. As I struggle with depression, anxiety and schizoaffective disorder, it ha not been the easiest for him. We planned to end our relationship and continue a friends, but just could not bear to at the departure gates. We decided to try a long distance relationship, but after a week, he is had enough of me. He ha his own problems, and we live hour apart with a h time difference, so I do not blame him at all. I do however carry a lot of resentment for myself for being so down in the past week and pushing him. I used to be really sociable, but a multitude of issue have led me to slowly isolate myself from people. I still have friends, but they either do not actually gaf or they have their own problem and I do not want to add on to their burdens. It is also very difficult for me to meet people without any alcohol or drug to calm the anxiety something I am trying to stay away from a my addiction problem have led me to the psych ward. Besides, how much can friend be there for you? It is you alone in your bed staring at the ceiling til noon the next day for day on end I have had terrible insomnia since coming home . I am still on school break, cannot really occupy my mind by going outside to meet friend or take a part time job or just walk around due to anxiety and psychosis, and all the thing I used to watch do to cheer myself up music, slam poetry, writing, youtube, netflix, game I have associated very strongly with him a we have very similar habits. So anything that could make me pas the time make me sad. I have loved and lost many time and I know it get better eventually, but currently it get very very dark in my mind and I am not sure what I can do to survive in the meantime. I am in a very bad place and feel very anhedonic and suicidal thought are back having been accumulated from all these problem . He wa the one person that made me feel like someone understood and wa there in this big bad world, and without him I feel like I am floating and nothing will make me feel okay again for a long time.

The only time I can enjoy my life is when I am watching anime listening to music Every time I put on those headphone that allow me to leave this miserable reality, I feel alive. Any other time I feel like I am just lifelessly struggling to deal with my responsibilities. That is why I listen to music all the time. That is why I only get excited when watching anime. I need fiction to get me through a day or else I go completely numb. So uhh is this a problem? Or is it normal?

I have been having a difficult time lately. In addition to my mental state of disarray, I have a medical condition that can affect my mood. My medication ha changed lately my body ha not caught up the difference yet. The last few day have been particularly bad, especially at night. The familiar sensation lurks again on my upper leg. Scissors. Half-dozen line -- my usual, though in the past I would sometimes keep cutting until my self-hatred wa momentarily spent. Pressure on the blade to force the skin to gape slightly and bleed more. I am not proud. I knew it wa not the best way to cope. I did at least take the precaution of using a sharp blade, knowing that a jagged blade could leave a jagged wound, and of lavish aftercare. I washed it out with rubbing alcohol, which cause renewed bleeding but wa necessary to keep everything clean and infection-free. Covered everything with a jumbo Band-Aid, the kind kid put on skinned knees, and have not dared to look since. Afterward, I wa afraid that I wa back to my old ways. I told myself in near-hysterics that this wa strictly a one-time backslide. The surprising part is that I believed myself. This doe not make me a cutter again. This doe not mean that I have lost everything that I have gained. All it mean is that I have been having an extraordinarily bad time and resorted to extraordinary behavior in order to cope. My situation will improve. My body chemistry will even out. It is better not to cut, but I am not a bad person even if I do cut. The word are stupidly simple. I do not care. They are my magic that keep me going.

I want to pay off my debt then kill myself. I came from a really poor family, worked hard during primary and secondary school. Got a scholarship for college which paid me k a year a well a covering my school fees. Gave parent the money, it paid for the bill a well a my sibling is school fees. Thought life wa good, studying what i love. However, i got bullied until i cant take it anymore and requested a change of class, the school rejected my request. I then requested to take a semester off school, but the contract for the scholarship state that i have to complete school by year or the contract will be terminated. Failed a module and i have to extend my time in college by a year, which caused my scholarship to be terminated. Which in turn placed me in a k debt. Now, i do not have money to pay for school, so i had to leave. Im out without any qualification except for a secondary school cert, with the organisation that offered me the scholarship requesting k per month for installments. I have always looked forward to my dream job, i wa so close, i volunteer every weekend to get experience from that job. Now it feel like everything is taken from me. I appealed to have my scholarship reinstated times, explaining the issue that i had, giving them the medical report from my doctors, bringing up the volunteer work i did. But on the latest attempt, i got a call saying that they never planned to accept my appeal. It really feel like everything is taken from me. I feel like just working to pay off my debt so a to not burden my family a the debtor will go for them if i die now. There is nothing to look forward to anymore. year of suffering incoming

I think I may have been on this forum it looked different back in when I had a major bout with depression and anxiety due to some serious financial worries. I have always been prone to this I guess, but I am starting to figure out that it is big, nasty life-changes that trigger it. Well, here I go again. This time it is relationship-related. My wife and I are on brink of divorce. I found out almost a year ago that she ha been emotionally involved with another man, and wa no longer in-love with me. We somehow muddled through the next several months, even though I found out it wa still going on, we kept trying anyway, and thing were still tolerable and ok, I guess. We still shared same bed, got affectionate, cuddled and even made love . About week ago, I discovered that it still had not ended, and they were actually conspiring on getting together in March. Well, all hell broke loose and thing got worse than ever. I am now in a separate room, sleeping on a single bed, and I am miserable. I resumed Wellbutrin when this all started last spring I took Wellbutrin for about month when I had my episode in , and have been taking it since. But since this really bad turn of events, I knew I could not take it, and to be honest, even before I discovered again, my therapist told me that I need to revisit my doctor and prescription because I have got some serious anxiety issues. So now I just started Zoloft mg day in addition to the Wellbutrin. I do not know how thing are going to turn out. I am in limbo while I give her time and space to figure thing out. The Zoloft I think started to kick in today, but not in a good way. I am actually feeling MORE depressed when I came in this morning..I almost broke down cry in front of my computer -argh! My mood swing are horrible. All I can think about is going home and crawling into my bed and taking an Ambien, even though I hate that bed and want to be in the big bed with my wife. I almost wish at time that she would just say, That is it, we are done , so I can know what is going on and just move on with my life. I may end up single and lonely anyway, but at least I will have the opportunity to look for someone else. Right now I feel like a prisoner, being starved of basic human needs, like hugs, touches, affection. Does not that sound lame from a guy?? Well, anyway, here I am..here for the ride..

Despair is the normal state of my life I have not drank though. I have no urge to drink. I just want to stop. Stop moving. Just end. I keep picturing myself walking out on my job. Getting kicked out of my apartment. Living in my car. That being repossessed. And eventually ending up in a gutter, wrapped in a a blanket but still freezing to death. Just frozen. Not moving, not willing and thus not physically able to bring myself to it. There is no point to it. It is never enough. Not matter how much you work, how hard you try, it doe not work. I do not get ahead. Everything I am, someone is better at it. And anything I do, I can be replaced. And if I do find success by some small measure, I acclimate and find myself just a miserable. Nothing ha changed. I did a long big post a few week ago about all the supposed progress I made. It doe not bring me happiness anymore. I am so fucking far behind I will never get to a place where I feel safe, so fuck it. I just want to exit. I am sick of being a cog in a machine I never wanted to help built or run. Life is just work, sleep, and distract. I am not sure why I am writing it. I do not know how I found the motivation.

Well, a little update then. For those who do not know me that well yet, which is everybody I suppose I am the almost year old that chose to take a break from school, due to pff what will it be? Anxiety, depression, health problem regarding sleep energy. I tried it again at some point, but after week found myself to be, not cured yet. I figured it had to end, so I went looking for help. Social worker, well that is all nice and stuff, but not too helpful. Then the official psychiatrists. Well let is pick up from there the first one, in the Adolescents department directed me to another shrink after the first intake meeting, my help question not sure. But something wa keeping me from being able to fit in the system. I also had concentration problem but she did not want to dig into that. So this new shrink, on a different department, made me fill in some form and we had some talk and well, apparently the concentration problem IS a big issue and causing a lot of damage a well a my past divorced parents, being bullied all my life etc etc. Okay fine, so I say maybe I need something to help me sleep? And she suggested I go see my house doctor and ask for sleeping medicines. Which I got, and used for two week now and ..nothing. Well, the first day were good, the after that were le good, and I do not even remember the one after that. I woke up automatically, and sometimes sleep wa okay. But after week I am still SO tired everyday, it is killing me. I try and keep up a new rhythm, but it is so exhausting and I feel like doing all sort of happy thing but I just do not have the energy and then I go do it anyway and I end up so hurt and tired. Now, I cannot take the medicine for more than two weeks, so today wa going to be my last. Well, I sort of should have read the booklet I got with it before use. It said I should not take them EVERY day but every other day, and like I do not know, it say it build up and stay in your body. Well, I am fine do not worry. They warned about some side effects, but I seem to have been okay. However, the side effect include ALL the thing I already suffered from BEFORE even taking the darn medicines!! So it is been a complete and utter waste. This one day, I tried sleeping without medicines, and I just could not..just, cannot fall asleep. So yeah, I had that talk with yet another shrink today, and now he want me to see some other person. And he think I SHOULDN T take sleeping medicines. So like, ARGH, people keep telling me opposite things, and now they want me to see this person, who will help me fill in my day and get organized?? That is all cool and well and all, but I got there myself already. I figured it all out before I even started seeing these professional and now they are telling me what I already came up with on my own?? It is another week wait. And I do not know anymore. I am confused about all this, and beginning to think it is been a huge mistake in the first place. And now that it is Spring again, I am feeling sort of happy. So depression is still here, but, I do not notice it much..or do I? I am still feeling so alone and my family still doe not get me..I just want out, I just want to be away from here, which brings u back to the original problem. I am so annoyed, and after this, today is just going to be another day that I just do not do anything useful.. Sure I want to go back to school, but it take time..I have some time, then again I do not.. I had so many plans, and ARGH this sleeping problem, which is going to be my main focus now, is just so darn annoying. I could listen to countless piece of advice, but in the end, it is just no good to me.. Even the stupid sleeping medicine do not work..And every time I go see a shrink about one problem, they point me to someone else, and then another problem bother me and they send me back but that still did not fix my first problem. I am like, fine I will go fix this darn problem myself then. I really feel like cursing, but I will not because it is not proper so I will release some rage when I am done here, but just know that I am really upset and annoyed . After all, it wa me who had to fix everything all my life right? So I might a well start now.. haha such a laugh, I will procrastinate till the day I die.. So very tired. I cannot do a thing.. ugh, I am so sick of it. I want to go sleep now, but I just know I will wake up late in the evening and will not be able to sleep tonight. Such a drag.. too young to be broken already..

Law of Attraction is bullshit. Also hard work doe not pay off. Everything in life is based on chance and luck only. Our society preaches the fiction of hard work paying off because we need most expandable people to work hard, so that the rest can just chill and live off their backs. Also every fucking motivational coach and self-help guide is a fucking scam. Focusing your goals, working hard and putting effort in to achieve them? Yeah, tell that to people with terminal disease or people living in poverty without the chance to ever get better, people dying of famine or living in war zones. Tell that to the legion of people who did not make the cut and never will. Yeah, tell them they just did not work hard enough , did not want it enough while you completely ignore how fucking lucky you got to be in the privileged position you are in. This world make me fucking sick and I get sicker every day.

I always wanted to go to the therapy but my very huge and overprotective gossip-loving family made this impossible for me to do Not only that but even a little hypothetical talk about it would instantly gain unnecessary panic like attention and after several phone call to friends, family member with something like Hey Clara, he want to go to the therapist. Is this normal? Which one should we call? Do you know anyone? Ask John please! And next day there will be several people touching my hand and saying Hey are you fine? Making it feel like something is wrong with me when I just want to talk to a professional in person without feeling like a babe. How do I know? Because my sister wa depressed once and I have seen how everyone reacted to it. You see, my family is never changing mentality is we need to fight together! We are there for you goddamn Fairy Tail guild or something . I do not blame them and I bet there are people who would exchange everything only to be with someone a supportive. But I have always hated attention so much since I remember my self a a kid. Ironically enough I have had the biggest birthday party in the town to boost this weird hate. Doing it secretly will be risky because I actually work in my family is business a well so my tight schedule and the fact that my town is pretty small make this almost impossible. And if someone find out I secretly go to talk to a doctor it will have even worse reaction than just straight out telling them. Maybe I am overreacting and have too much pride in me or no ball to admit to my family but sometimes I wish I could get invisible for just a week to sort my inner problem out. Sorry If this feel like I am trying to make it harder for you guy to make some suggestions. It is way more complicated than that I just wanted to let it out. I have read some post here and some of them were so so dark that my problem actually fade away a bit and I felt better because I said to my self yo.. you are being a bitch right now, look at these people suffering here, you are not even close! do not know if I am being terrible for healing my little wound by reading how other people suffer . Anyways, Idk why I have not visited this sub earlier, a I type these last word I already feel better because it is the first time I am doing something like this. Feels like I have talked to someone. Thank you!

Journal Entry - AM Monday, December th, Just thought I would share my thought from last night. I occasionally lurk Reddit looking for a relatable story, so I figured I would share some of my own thoughts. I do not want a job. The hardest part of having a job is talking. It is bad enough that I have to make eye contact. Having to speak on top of that can be nerve wrecking. Meeting new people is also tough. It is even tougher when you are the new one. Who are these people? Do I even want to know you? Are you going to try and get to know me? Am I going to allow it? Customers are easier to deal with, but just a drag to have to deal with. It can be monotonous. Often, it is annoying. But all the while, I just feel drained. There are good day at work. But there are also bad days. And those bad day make the lasting impression, in my experience. I am thankful for those good days. But the bad day remind me that I want better for myself. I am tired of working in restaurants. I am tired of wearing a stupid hat my hair can barely fit under. I am tired of repeating phrase I am told to repeat. I am tired of seeing the disgusting process of how people is shitty food is prepared. I am tired of cooking, something I enjoy, feeling soulless. Historically, preparing a meal and feeding someone is a virtuous act, at least to me. The commoditization of it is a bit of a shame. I detest consumerism, generally speaking. Customers are not my favorite people. Along with restaurants, I hope to avoid customer interaction at my next job. I really do not want any job. When it come to time amp energy vs. money, I am all for the money until I find out what I have to do. Then my my time amp energy feel more valuable. Because it is more valuable.

My roommate asked me move. My car died. And I put myself in the hospital. Girlfriend is over it and want me to get my life together. With out without her. She doe not want to be around me. I am ubering to my job at the moment. I just basically shut down at the start of sundown. Shut down and drank for or day with the last one with me on the phone with a rope on my neck. I feel absolutely help less. Do not have money to pay rent. Do not have enough money to Uber to work. My next logical step is to move back to my mother is. Which is not only depressing. She is just minute from everything. I am not even thinking suicide. I am just thinking like life pretty much ha a depressed shade over it. Probably from me recovering from withdrawal. I do not want to move back to my mom is. To sit there away from everything I want to do. And now I gotta start over. Fuck this is why I drank. the panick begin to consume me.

I feel like I am lazy I feel like I am lazy because I have no will, desire, or energy to work. Sometimes I do not even want to walk.. and I am tired pretty much always. It is a work out to even brush my hair. I am physically fit, young, and given special treatment because I am society is fit of attractive. I cannot keep a job because I simply cannot force my brain to do the work or I have to miss because I am sick.. which really is just anxiety I am sure. No one understands that I care about how lazy I seem and that it is just that I am so tired and every thing sound awful other than just sitting some days. I feel like I am crazy. It just make everything worse too. More financial problems. More people who do not understand. Substance abuse to numb. How do you guy get energy? I have started Zoloft and it is changed my life, really improving my ability to deal and not feel hopeless, but my motivation is still completely zero and I cannot make myself do or care about anything. Is it just immaturity or is something in my head doing this?

I am curious to know how you raise child when you have major depression with bipolar. I feel extremely guilty that I am having a hard time being a mom. I have no energy and I am completely overwhelmed with every little task it take to raise these kids. My husband seems to be running out of patience with me .. and I have really only been battling this recent episode of major depression for months. Sometimes I feel like we all would be better off with me out of the picture .. whatever that take .. because I am sick of the guilt !! I also am suffering from herniated disc in my back with sciatica down both legs. So doing thing just suck. My husband made the comment today that we should sign me up for AARP .. at least we could get some good benefits. I am . Plus these medication make me feel like shit! I really do not want to have to take care of anyone right now. God I am selfish!! Down in the dump and full of anxiety,

Why plan for a future you have no intention of experiencing? And now I am stressed because it look like I am going to finish high school and idk what the fuck to do with myself.

I just need to get this off of my chest. This is my first time posting. I am not sure if trigger warning are common place here, but before you read on I would like to say warn that this mention suicide. A family member took their life last week and I am really, really struggling. I am absolutely devastated that my child will not be able to grow up with them around. I am struggling to keep it all together. I just want to cry all day. But I do not want my kid to see my crying. Everyone around me is just carrying on like normal. I have a history of depression, I am currently in therapy and on medication. I feel like my family is wrapping me in cotton wool. When I first found out how it happened, I obsessed over article that described the process they would have went through while dying. I kept wondering what they were feeling in that moment.. if during those last moment they had regret. Then I kept tormenting myself with the what if? I have been able to stop doing those. But now.. I just want to be a sloth. I want to sit on the couch and watch TV all day. All motivation I had prior to last week ha just gone. I have never had anyone this close to me die. A friend who I had grown apart from committed suicide last year. I wa upset,.. but I wa not this upset. Let me stress this - I am definitely not having any suicidal thoughts. Due to the unexpected cost we have had, I cannot afford to see the psychologist, that is why I am posting here. I am just so devastated.

Im about to spend two year of my birthday and the holiday alone. Again. I spent the holiday and my birthday in Basic Training, and it about to happen again. I stay in the barrack because I have no one to hang out with due to them being on leave. I can choose to go home, but it is too expensive and I do not have the fund to do so, all of my family is back at home. I do not have any friend to hang out with and finding friend off post is even harder for me. I can not drink because I am underage. This sucks.

She stopped texting back Hi, i am and for a long a I remember I have always struggled with self-confidence and my depression. I rarely use tinder because I do not match with many people, I am below average looking like but it doe not help swiping for age and rarely getting a match. I know it is just a glorified hook up app for the most part but the other night I matched with a really cute girl who wa way out of my league and we started talking, one thing lead to another and next thing I know we are up to after am talking about Pok mon of all things. I feel like there is a connection there so i ask her out and she say yes. It took alot to do this and it honestly made my month a the last few have been pretty meh. We kept talking the next day and that evening she did not reply to one my texts, I tried to think nothing of it because it wa not really a question or anything and tried to restart the conversation but nothing again. This morning I said Hi and she replied Hey back and then I asked her what she wa up to and she just did not reply again. I do not blame her if she is not interested, that is fair enough it happens. She wa sending x is up until she stopped texting back though and it not something i thought i wa being naive about thinking she wa interested in me but maybe i wa wrong. I kinda just wish i knew where i went wrong. I just feel so unattractive and like there is something wrong with me. I know this probably sound really petty and unimportant but it really hurt and I just needed to vent.

Just a thought I have been having. Have a good night.
