My mom asked me What held you back Today I went down to the city,I walked around for a while I went down to the river and stood there for a while than I went up to the bridge and stared down.I ran away from home.I did not have my phone.My parent did not know where I was.We had an argument for at least hour and I just had enough.I had depression since I wa I am .My mom always said I wa just imagining it.When I got home they started yelling at me rightfully so,I wa away for hour they were about to call the police,but I had to be alone for a while .An hour ago my mother asked me why did not I just jump off if I have a missarable life. All I could think of were these two thing .I should have done IT .I wa right about her Any comments?

I am a daca recipient and I fucking hate it. I wa born in Mexico and brought to the US when I wa . This of course mean I am one of those nasty illegals everyone seems to hate. My goal ha always been success. Ever since I wa a kid I daydreamed of owning a mansion with fancy gates, a huge lawn, a big pool. This wa always my goal. I wa not going to accept living in poverty like my parent or having an average life. So I worked hard for it. I wa always top of my class, I wa on the dean is honor list in college, I started and failed my first few businesses, joined clubs, went to a lot of event to meet people, and landed an internship. I wa even in the middle of starting my next business. I also got my credit score up to almost and started funding my retirement investment account. Because my whole life ha been focused on success, I attempted suicide a few time when I found out I wa illegal and could not even go to college in high school. Obviously they all failed. However in , the year before I graduated, Obama passed daca. Because I had been here since I wa a toddler, wa going to finish school, and did not have even a single misdemeanor, I wa able to get a social security number, a work permit, a driver is license, open investment accounts, and received protection from deportation. Now Trump ha ended it. The final decision will be made in early August, but it is most likely going to be rescinded. What am I supposed to do then? Just fucking accept losing everything? Everything I worked towards will have been for nothing. Even if daca continues, am I supposed to just keep living in fear of it ending again forever? I am losing all my fucking hair stressing over this. I have had a cold for month that ha not gone away, and everything hurts. I cannot even talk to anyone about this. Everyone just tell me to man up and work some shitty job picking fruit in the fields. No one understands that I actually have goal in life. I refuse to accept a life where I work hour a week, breaking down my body, for k a year with no room for advancement and living in fear every day. I have never been fond of life in the first place. The only thing that ever gave me happiness wa growing my net worth, and pretty soon I will not even be able to do that. Why should not I end it all at that point? That is it. I needed to rant. I am sorry if I sound like a spoiled brat. TLR I rely on daca to have an even somewhat decent life. It is being taken away. I am losing everything.

Is it obvious when you have depression? I wonder if I have some form of mild depression or I just have low self esteem. I became a mute quite a few year ago after acouple of event that got me down. I think it may have been catatonia. But I am not . Ever since then I do not feel like I got back to my normal self. I am a lot shyer and I do not have much luck socially or romantically or in my career. The best way to put it would be I lost my personality. I can really beat myself up sometimes because I hate myself. When something bad happens I really start self loathing quite badly. I do not feel suicidal. I hate myself more than I hate my life. I blame my lack of success on myself. I do not enjoy thing a much a I used to so I have no real hobbies. I do not think I am likable and I cannot even pas interview these days. I lost my personality and that is why I hate myself. I am unrecognisable to who I used to be so I isolate myself a lot more these days. I do not think significantly depressed but I wonder if mild depression is the cause of my loss of personality? Or could it be something else that caused me to change? All I know is I have lost a lot of confidence and I am always beating myself up about it

I would like to say hello to everyone, I have bipolar and wa doing a bit of research into my illness, which I have not done before a I have always denied having the illness. I do have funny story to tell. A few year ago now I lost the plot and lost my home wife and child a a result. Not that funny but at the time I did not know I had bipolar. New life spending load of money racing up the career ladder on a High I meet this fantastic girl. We went on holiday together had some great times. After a year or two I moved in with this girl gave up my good job and planned a future for u both marriage extra. There wa one thing holding u back we both hard bipolar and never told each other about or illness a we thought this could change everything. As you can imagine if she when on a high I went on a low , and when I went on a high starting company and buying thing I could not afford she would go on a low. Our relationship did not last for much longer a she would self harm and I would attempt suicide. It wa not until I went into hospital that it all came out in the open. We are still friend but both agree that two bipolar people do not match. My doctor did smile and we did laugh about it. Anyway I am new and just want to say hi to everyone.

I am so very angry. It is eating me up. I am sick of it. It is not healthy. It cost me a lot. Yet even this make me angry! rrARGG! I feel like the female version of the Hulk. Do you know how it feel to go through the cycle of feeling nut alone to gaining a semblance of normalcy? Well, that make me angry. I get angry when I start to get happy. I get angry when I start to feel sad. I get angry when someone show me love. I get angry when thing go well. I get angry when thing do not go well. I get angry, I get angry, I get angry. This weekend I had this clear clear vision. I wa immediately present for the first time in a long time. I felt, I breathed, I listened, I laughed. I saw. And I got very very angry. I do not belong where I am. I do not belong. I screwed up, I fell asleep, I got depressed and now Look at all that ha changed! Nothing is the same and I feel like I have traveled through a million mile of time in one short weekend. This is all too much. Who the hell am I? How did I get here? What am I going to do now? Shit!! All this time I believed I could do it alone. All this time I tried to be strong. All this time I tried to put others before myself no matter what the cost. Now I am alone. I am like a ghost of myself. When I speak, what come out is all wrong. I am nothing like I used to be. I am scared, I am torn, and I am alone. My old friend look to me you are so great. You are here for me and you are strong. Blah blah blah .. in reality we are just too lost soul traveling the highway alone. If I see you, I see you. But you are not going be there for my funeral. You will probably not even know when and where it is. You will sleep through it and read about in the newspaper or some shit. You will cry to the person next to you, and that will be that. Family look at me and say oh we love you so much. You are so strong and what? Are you going through creative or man pain again? Gee, I love you too. But you are not the answer. WE are just traveling the highway alone. You keep looking for the answer. I know there are not no answer. We are alone wine song and comforting arm and all. I am angry because I know this journey is mine and I am not doing so hot. I get disorientated, I get distracted, I screw up. And you know what?! That is ok. thanks I needed a good angry rant Maybe there is someone out there who doe not find this completely insane. If I do not speak it, it will stay inside and explode in some other form.

Even so, listening to them fight right now make me really uncomfortable. You would think my hate would just make me careless about it but it just not

I am year old and I have been living with depression a long a I can remember I think it started when I wa . However I wa diagnosed with major depression only year ago. Since then I have experienced recurrent episode of depression. I thought that knowing what wa my problem, accepting it, taking medication, seeing a therapist, working on cognitive therapy, would make my life better. Unfortunately, I still have those major episode of depression where I am hopeless and sad, and the only solution available to stop the pain seems to kill myself. No fun in there. I know that depression is part of who I am, I know it is part of my life and I accept it. What I cannot accept is the fact that it is not going to be easier. I need hope. I need to hear from people who have had recurring depression not just on episode and have been able to deal with it and are able to enjoy life. Please tell me it is possible.

this is my first post , so bare with me. I have been married a year and just found out some interesting news about my husband. He told me that the man he call dad is not really his father. He told me that his mother never told him until he wa year old, and had to go to court to change his name. I always wondered why, he and his father never got along. His mother will not tell him who his real father is. I feel I need to help him find him, so he can close the door, and get answer to all his questions. My husband doe not like to talk about feelings, he wa raised in a family where no one talked about feeling and if you had a problem you kept it to yourself. I wa raised totally opposite. In way this ha left him hurt and confused. He feel like he doe not belong sometimes. He told me sometimes he would like to know who his dad is and other time he could care less. But, it seems like it is always on his mind, when family issue come about. The man that raised him, is an issue all to his own, he is very abusive, physically, and mentally. He is always telling my husband, he is wrong and will never be able to be successful. He ha heard that all his life, but he ha never believed it - he is strong and ha a good heart - It just hurt me when I see him lash out. He take all his problem out on me, I now understand why. I have not told him, but I found out who his father is. All I have is a name. I want to tell him but do not know if I should. I have already posted on this forum but I never really introduced myself. So here go My name is Amy, and I am year old. I have two beautiful daughters, age and . I am also raising my little brother, who is . I have suffered from anxiety attack since I wa and became seriously depressed about year ago. I wa hospitalized once .. when the doctor put me on Zoloft. Since then I have tried Effexor XR and Klonopin worked for month and am supposed to be trying Wellbutrin and Buspar now scared to start them . I self - harm when thing get too hard for me, and have scar covering much of my left arm due to cutting. I wa recently dismissed from my therapy psychiatrist due to missed appointment .. and I do not know if I am going to find another one yet. I think about just letting go sometimes. Nothing really help anyways. The one thing that depresses me the most is my fear of spending the rest of my life alone. Men seem to think I am only good for one thing .. and I guess I agree. I hate that I go from being okay .. sometimes for week at a time .. and then everything fall apart. My family support me .. sometimes. At least, my mom let me crash at her house when thing are real bad. My mom and my sister try to be there .. but they get tired of me. I cannot say I had a bad childhood .. I cannot remember my childhood. I went under hypnosis .. had a vision of my dad and became extremely afraid. I never had a chance to go back and find out why. Missed too many appointments. My dad wa accused of being abusive to my mother and having a violent temper .. and of molesting my sister and I. Do not remember. My dad say my mom left u for two year when I wa or year old and wa always drunk. Do not remember. I spent much of my teen year drunk high and being promiscuous .. let is just say even my mother knew I had a reputation. Why? Do not know. I have never felt like I belonged .. and the past few year I have felt like I have not really been living. Disassociation, I suppose. I am usually moody, never have any energy, and have started and quit school time to date. Never accomplished anything but getting my GED .. and the sad thing is .. I am smart. I live day to day .. never knowing if it will be a good day or a bad day. My daughter had missed a lot of school because I cannot seem to get her there by in the afternoon. My mom say she will help .. but I know I am on my own. Neither of my daughter father is are any help. My dad left my little brother with me in November, sends down some money every month.. and ha not seen him since. Some day I feel like I am on top of thing .. most day I feel like thing are on top of me .. and smothering me. I have started writing my daughter a letter letting them know everything I want them to know when they are older .. just in case I am not around. I cannot say for sure this will not beat me one day, and I want to be prepared. I love my kid .. but also believe with all my heart they would be better off without me. Sure .. they love me and I am their mommy .. but not all mommy are good mommy and not all mommy deserve to raise children. Love is not always enough .. because God is he even real? know I would die kill for my girls. I know the answer to nothing and have so many questions. This is my life .. Scared to be alone .. but I always am. I read this somewhere and it sum up how I feel I am not hungry .. but I am starving. I am not tired .. but I am exhausted. I am not bleeding .. but I am dying. So hi to everyone who is fighting the same fight .. I just need to know that I am not alone.

If people treated broken arm like they treated depression.. Person He dude, your arm is broken in half. You should probably call for help . Me I have tried calling for help, it doe not work . Person Really? Who did you call? Me I wrote a post on reddit and saw my school consellor once . Person Dude WHAT?? That is not how you fix a broken arm. Call the hospital, they are professional and they use professional treatment that fix this shit! Me It doe not work the same for everyone you IDIOT! Person Yes it does! They deal with thousand of type of breaks, hairline fractures, ligament damage and all sort EVERY single day! Theres an an entire field of medicine dedicated to treating broken arm and it is all PROVEN, time and time again, to work! You need to see someone who know how to fix your arm! Or at least, stop the bleeding right now! Me You do not understand what it is like to have a broken arm. You have never had one before. Person Yes, actually, I have had a broken arm before. I went to the hospital and they fixed it after surgery and month of rehab . Me Well obviously your broken arm wa not a REAL broken arm. Mine is worse. You do not know what it is like to have a REAL broken arm . Person I had three compound fracture and internal bleeding. They said it wa the worst they have ever seen. I have become bored with the job and dissatisfied with being forced to work from home. Majorly boring! Last year I started going back to school to pursue a Masters in Fine Arts in Graphic Design. I promised I would post regarding what I perceived to be a meltdown. As previously posted, I told all y all that I would been taking Neurontin. Since it wa not prescribed for seizure but for sleep, insurance would no longer cover it because they said it did not fit into the category of antidepressant or psychotropics, and so on and so forth. All red tape. So, the Neurontin wa stopped, through no fault of my own. Well, this disturbed my therapist. So, after almost week off of the Neurontin, during which each week I seemed to be going more off the deep end. Meaning, I could not sleep, eat, had the shakes, horrific mood swings, unable to think positive about myself, and piggyback panic attack and I subsequently wa going off on some cry gig, etc. So, on the nd when I saw my doctor she said with everything I wa describing, that indeed I wa having withdrawals. Like Duh, I already knew that. It seems the combination of the med I wa on wa balancing me out and the mere change in the medicine did in fact change the way the other med worked, or did not work. Since I am so hypersensitive to just about every medication, it took forever to find the right medication and dosage to keep me on the straight and narrow the doctor said she would like for me to go back to the psychiatrist that originally prescribed the medication and see if they would try another antidepressant. Another one? That did not set well with me and I guess I wa at the end of my rope. I broke down and ended up staying at the doctor is office for almost two hour while they had to give me a pill to calm me down. I felt so vulnerable and of course in my state of mind I perceived this a another crisis. I also felt extremely istupid for breaking down that way. That is why I said I had a meltdown. There wa not much I could physically do on Thursday, but, I knew I had to come back to earth. After calming down, thanks to their cocktail pill , which I did not ask it name. I agreed to see the psychiatrist. What choice did I have. I think the cry episode happened because I remembered all the bad event that happened while they were trying to find the right med that would balance me out. It is scary. Of course while I wa at the doctor is, I kept asking stupid question like, why do I have to be on anything? Is that denial or what? So, to cut this short. I will be going to the psychiatrist a soon a they can fit me in. But I need some help. I am asking any of my friend here to give me any input you want. I have been doing pretty good the last couple of day doing the cognitive thinking and just staying busy. It is the down time that is unsettling. And obviously, if you see the time this is being posted, you know I am not sleeping much. I am thinking positive. My doctor called me Friday to check on me. That wa surprising. A doctor really calling back. So, seeing how she is my new doctor, maybe we will be compatible after all. Thanks for taking the time to read this and for anything you would like to add to help. I really appreciate all of you and the joy I receive from reading and writing to you all mean a lot to me. Your kindness mean so much.

I am new to any kind of discussion like this. I am new to any kind of support like this. I go to Therapy once a week, or rather I did, but it wa not really making a large difference. I am going to be twentytwo soon, and my life is nowhere how I wish it to be. The funny part is that to get it where I would like it all I would have to do is go out and get a job, start working. I just cannot seem to leave the house. I am not a shut in, or anything. I love people. I try and keep friend with everything, but I get self - conscious all the time. My early life wa pretty difficult when it came to that, getting bullied badly for wearing glass and being a bit of a dork. I never really learned those little social rule that everyone else did. Sometimes I just feel like I am not on everyone is page, and nothing seems to help. I became a father at nineteen, and it wa difficult. I loved my girlfriend very much at the time, and dropped out of school to support her and our daughter. I love my daughter, she is everything. My girlfriend left me for another man when our daughter wa four week old, I cannot help but feel insecure about this. Logically I should know she is just not so bright or genuine a person with me, but I cannot help but feel part of it wa me. She stopped letting me see my daughter a short time after, I had to go to court and battle thing out. The only accomplishment I have made in the last year that I could feel proud about wa to get partial custody and three day a week with her. I am attentive and loving father. I have a great relationship with my little girl. But I cannot feel good about it. Sometimes it is like, a soon a she is gone, I forget she wa even here. I spend all day in the house, like a zombie. I am either on the computer or at the TV, watching baseball. I know I want to have a healthy and happy life, and I want to have money and security for my daughter, but I cannot motivate myself to do anything. My parent were never attentive, and fight constantly, but I am twentyone and should be over that. Instead, it make me more down now than it ever has. I am like a giant pit of negativity all the time. I wa involved with a girl, but that faded quick, and just like everything else it brought me down. I do not do drugs, or drink, but sometimes I really want to. Funny part is that I have never felt any kind of relief doing them in the past. In fact, usually my insecurity and negativity are worse. I feel like I need to get moving soon, or I will never get moving. I tried killing myself after my girlfriend stopped letting me see my daughter, I know how bad that wa for me. I know how I made others feel, and I know how miserable I was. I do not ever want to get that way again. But for some reason, and I just do not understand, I cannot get myself to get moving.

I failed English and nearly failed Spanish in th grade because I wa too lazy to put in any effort. I barely ever brought home friend or did extracurricular activity most of high school. But for some reason I am their grand vision for who is gonna make the family proud.

Really struggling with self image - any tip to build self confidence? I have struggled with my overall view of myself for a long a I can remember - in particular with my weight. Where im at, at the moment feel like the worst it ever been, I keep having full blown melt down about how much I repulse myself. Throughout my life Ive been on more diet than I can count and tried multiple different excercise routines. About year ago I gained kg really fast and after moping and feeling sorry for myself i decided i would kick it up a notch and started taking thing really serious. day a week at the gym, personal training, strict meal plan - the works. This worked so well at the beginning, I dropped kg in the first few months. It came to a halt and for the past year I have continued to lose weight slower - im at about kilo down in total now. I thought I would be further along by now. I live and work on the road at the moment travelling from town to town so ive dropped the gym membership but I try and make up for it with doing workout session on my own, lot of hiking and swimming. I recently switched to a keto diet from the previous meal plan I wa on. I am fitter than I have ever been and what I can achieve now in a physical capacity is so much greater than ever before in my life I wa le fit even a a child The problem I have is that im still so overweight, I very rarely find anything that fit me in store and i dont have an address to order thing online. I feel like people could look at me and assume I dont give a fuck about my health when I do and that make me feel worse. Anytime I talk to doctor about unrelated issue they make it about my weight. I feel like outwardly im the worst version of myself, I look in the mirror and get angry. Does anyone have any tip on how to pull myself out of this? I feel so crushed when I am reminded of my weight because I dont feel how I look. I want to be proud of my achievement but I am not, I feel annoyed that it not better and I havent reached a bigger goal. I think ill never reach a weight I am happy with - which is not only devastating to me but bother me so much more because im genuinely trying my hardest. Ive had hiccup and time where I have literally tried to eat my feeling away but I always pick myself up and try again. I dont know how many more time I can fail. In an effort to help me stay on track my partner started eating the same food a me. Weightloss had never been his goal or something he wa focusing on, it wa just to make it easier on me not to see him eating a toasted cheese sandwich while I wa eating salad with no dressing. He wanted to limit the temptation and helped cook me awesome healthy meal that tasted a million time better than anything I cooked. For him it worked a treat, he wa never overweight just a bit stocky, but he since lost so much weight and look amazing. And whilst im so happy for him it hurt a it just show how much progress i havent made. As stupid a it sound I think it highlight my weight more when we are together cause he look so fit and healthy and I look like I sit around eating kfc all day. I want to be confident or at least more confident but I am so critical on myself I cant even begin to let the confidence through. Any thought on this are appreciated and thankyou to anyone who took the time to read this.

I do not know what my problem is Hello, I have never posted here before. I am a year old guy and have a decent job that I like, it is quiet and involves a lot of puzzle solving and I am pretty good at it. I have never had a ton of friend because I am very particular and not very open with people so it take a long time to build up relationships, but the friend I do have are outstanding and I would not trade them for anything. I am kind of the funny guy but my humor is very blue. I got bullied a lot in grade school and learned to make people laugh because it would get them to not make fun of me. I think it just kind of stuck. I do not know if any of that information is really important, just wanted to give it in case that is something that people do here. For at least years, I have a hard time doing anything outside of my job alone without crawling up inside my head. All the thing that I used to do for enjoyment like listening to music or playing video games, I just cannot do anything anymore. It is like a wave of apathy that very rarely lifts. Occasionally, I pick up a razor blade and will press it into my shoulder or hand and I do not really know why to be honest. I do not know if I like the pain or maybe I like having something else to focus on for a minute. Or just to feel something that is not apathy for a moment. I think about dying sometimes. Why we are here, what is the point if it end the same. I doubt I would ever kill myself because there are thing I care about here that I would not leave behind like that, mainly my mom and brother. I worry my brother will end up like me. Is there anything I can do? I do not know what a pill could do for me or if a pill works. I think the brain is so complex that it could not, but I guess I do not know. I do not want to be in a mental fog or be unaware or not be me anymore. I have also always kind of thought that it is human nature to feel this way that everybody get down, get bored, think about their mortality, etc. and that I am just being soft and need to suck it up. Life is difficult, I just need to learn to deal with it maybe. I do not know what is going on but I do not like feeling like that. If I am hanging out with friend or family I am usually fine, it is being alone with myself and having time alone where I cannot entertain myself and waste away. I cannot really explain it. Does anyone else feel like this? What help you? I have never talked to a therapist or anything like that and understand you cannot give a diagnosis on here, but if you know any method to help me get out of that feeling, I would be eternally grateful. Is this what depression feel like and I have just been in denial about having it for years?

Why doe depression do this It is destroyed my ability to properly feel love or empathy with those closest to me. It is driving me insane and making me feel like I do not care about them anymore. But before depression I would have laughed if you would told me I did not care about my family. I have always been full of love and empathy. Now I am just angry and snappy with them. I feel like a monster.

I want to die trigger warning Trigger Warning My trauma happened when i wa , I am now and still suffer from it daily. I actually suppressed the trauma completely until I wa , when it all came back to me so I guess I have only really been dealing with it for year now. I have severe PTSD, severe depression, anxiety, severe panic anxiety attacks, OCD, severe memory loss, and had an intense eating disorder for year that I am still struggling with constantly. I have not gotten a good night sleep in years. I have constant PTSD nightmares, regular nightmares, and insomnia constant fatigue and exhaustion. I also disassociate a lot and self harmed for years. Currently clean from self harm for about a year and a half. I have been admitted to a hospital because of all of my mental problems, and honestly wish I could go back sometimes. I wa gaslighted for year to believe that my trauma wa normal. My home environment wa constantly hostile. I go through long period of feeling suicidal. Currently in that period. Do not know what to do, honestly. Years of being in therapy and being prescribed pill and yet I still am nowhere near being close to healthy. Looking back, I cannot even remember the last time I wa genuinely happy. The period of my sadness last longer than my period of calm. I am so afraid of waking up when I am and still feeling the same way I do now. The thing about being an adult that spent their entire teenage year thinking they would have killed themselves by now is realizing that your mental illness have real repercussions. I have fucked bone and a fucked stomach because of an eating disorder that lasted so long and a GED because I couldnt find the will to do schoolwork when I wa just trying to find the will to live another day and not cut myself again. I cannot afford college because I did not do any extracurriculars to get scholarship because the thought of having to stay after school made me want to have a panic attack and i just wanted to sleep. I have no friend because when people invited me to hang out my anxiety made me cry myself to sleep instead. I did not have any real thought-out grand plan because I wa too busy hurting myself and getting high and wanting to kill myself to really sit down and plan thing out. I said I wanted to do thing but never took the time to think it all through. It doesnt seem fair that I went through this trauma, had have all of this mental illness, and now have to do with the repercussion of those illnesses. It doesnt seem fair that I am suffering so much still. I do not know what to do anymore. I am tired of trying so fucking hard. I know this is self-pitying and emo but I just do not know what to do. I have no one to talk to. I really just want to die.

Escapism and depression Sorry about the self-pity rant that is inbound, needed to get this out there somehow. This morning I wa taking a shower sitting down with the light off - I know, pretty edgy behavior, but it is my way of unwinding and resetting myself between bout of work. I finished up a relatively escapist story the night prior. Stupidly, I had allowed myself to suspend my disbelief and got sucked into the plot. The writing wa not even terribly good - the only reason I enjoyed myself wa because I could temporarily forget my current self and take up the role of some other more relevant and admirable character. The story ended with a shoehorned but unbearably happy ending where the main character get married, settle in with his newfound friends, and all is good for the time being. You know, the typical insert generic ending here bullshit. Fast forward to this morning. I am in the shower and start thinking of my day to come, making mental to-do lists, and stressing about my current temporary problems. But somewhere along the line, I start thinking of the stupid story. I cannot help but start comparing my life with that of the main character and think about how much I would give just to be able to live a more meaningful, le real life. Then I start comparing myself to the character, and realize just how useless I am. Like holy shit, I am almost an adult and am still a passionless idiot who doe nothing outside of schoolwork. Of course I cannot lead a meaningful life, I am not worthy of any of it. Thinking about this evidently stressed me out a bit too much, a I started puking what little I ate all over my shower floor and crying. I do not know. I enjoy escapism probably to a fault, but it is the only way for me to feel at least a little relevant. I will probably come to term with my role a human being ,, someday. Many thanks to anybody who bothered to read this wall of text.

It is been so long since I have been here doubt anyone would remember me! Lots ha been happening. My job ha become busier so I have become more exhausted when I get home and I just do not want to do anything. Then on March my brother from my adopted mother died of a heart attack so had to go through that experience with my niece, his only daughter. Then right after that my husband got really sick with pain in his belly. We took him into emergency and they did a CT scan and could see only massive infection and could not tell where it wa coming from. So he wa admitted and given antibiotic and scheduled for a colonoscopy. He wa also very low on potassium so he wa given bag of potassium and taking pill on top of that. His colon wa clear so it wa determined his gall bladder wa diseased and needed to come out. But right now it wa so swollen and infected the surgeon wanted to wait until the infection cleared and swelling went down before he took it out. So husband is now on a non-fat diet to reduce the swelling and still on antibiotic to clear out the infection. Fortunately, being vegan, non - fat is not too hard for u to do. He go in for a pre - exam on Wednesday and then surgery a week later. But through all this I have not been doing my routing of medication and exercise and am suffering for it. Fibro and migraine have hit me really hard. I am still trying to take care of my husband though by preparing his meals. He lost almost lb through the last week of this whole episode. In the meantime, I have an appointment Monday with a neurosurgeon to discus if something need to be done with my tethered spinal cord. I have had it for year and it cause weakness in my leg and pin and needle in my feet. It could also affect bladder and bowel function but I have not had that problem yet. I have read that sometimes they cut the end of the spinal cord to get it out of the way of the vertebrae. I am not sure how serious my case is but my neurologist thought it wa serious enough to send me to surgeons. It is a rare birth defect I guess found in adults. Usually they catch it in infants. So, in a LARGE nutshell, that ha been what I have been up to

The last day felt like the first day of my life. Today feel like the beginning of the last days. I have been having depression since Senior Year. I have been fighting non stop for years. I took gap year to fight depression. Until last October, I thought depression ha gone cause i felt totally normal at that time. During the time, I had a lot of ups and downs. Lots of tears, lot of laugh. But i have never given up on myself Last November, my brother did sth bad. And my ex attempted suicide. That is when i got depressed again. The first time in year Until day ago, I met a girl. Perfect stranger is the word that would suit her the most. My situation with her is exactly like in the movie Before we go by Chris Evan. stranger meet each other out of billion people but they would never see each other again. And day after we met we hung out everyday for the last day , she is gone. We still keep contact but I dont think i would ever see her again please dont ask why . She know about depression. She made me make a promise to reach out to her every time i get depressed. The last day were the happiest day of my life. It feel like I actually live for the first time. But i also got depressed since. I got depressed because i could not recall her image. I couldnt recall her face. I could not recall what she looked like when we first met. And i couldnt remember why those were the happiest day of my life. I just recall those were the happiest. All i can recall is a brief moment of her smile for like - secs, her voice, and the moment when we were about to say good bye that i poured out my heart. Everything is so blurry. Then i went on to google to search for blurry memory and depression. And it lead me to depression and memory loss and depression and Alzheimer . Then i started to shed tears. I wa thinking about the day i actually lost my memories. What if it actually comes, What if one day i wouldnt remember her, my mom, my best friends, and even myself ? I wa teaching in class when i shed tears. I had to run to the bathroom and cried in there for mins. Luckily noone noticed. I remembered my promise to her. I wa about to text her. And then i started to cry again. I will bother her. I will make her worried. I will waste her time. And i cant afford to hurt people i love. This is the beginning of the end. Please help.

Am I Depressed or is it something else? This seems like a dumb question because to an extent I know I am depressed but not to a clinical level. Like I hate the situation I am in. I hate being in debt. I hate living where I live. That sort of thing. However, I am not unmotivated. Like at all. I am not hopeless. I am not suicidal in any way. I am terrified of death in fact one of my biggest fear is that I will get so depressed that I will become suicidal which is weird, I know but the point is, nothing in me want to die. That being said, I am tired all the time. I mean physically exhausted. Which seems to contradict major depression. I get up every day, shower every day, though I do not really want to go to work I go to work and do work with no issue it is more that I do not enjoy my job that much on most day honestly some day it is super fun it is just one of those thing it really ha to do with the fact that I am older and I am not doing what I thought I would be doing by this point in my life more than I hate my job . I cannot think of many reason why I would be this physically exhausted all the time. Literally every doctor say You you are just massively depressed . No, I do not believe I am depressed to the degree that it make me physically exhausted. If I still have plenty of hope for the future, want to get up, want to get dressed, want to shower, want to look good..how is this major depression to a point where I am also tired all the time? Is it possible to have some major depressive disorder and not be hopeless and still be motivated to work hard and try new things? Because if it is, someone need to tell me that. Any time a doctor tell me I must be depressed if I am so tired all the time and I tell them that I am not hopeless or suicidal or unmotivated then they go, Oh well I do not know what it is then . I am very annoyed with this because I never used to be physically exhausted like this before and doctor seem to just dismiss it a depression when I am positive my depression is not so bad it is ONLY making my physically exhausted and not having any other emotional affect on me. I am frustrated so, if anyone can answer this it would be helpful so I can see what avenue to pursue next. Note It is not a problem with my thyroid or adrenal gland I already had those checked twice by two different doctors.

ok, so today i had another freak out. I woke up feeling good .. it wa supposed to be my first therapy session which i and my boyfriend were happy about and then after this i wa supposed to meet up with my boyfriend for lunch, check my test marks, and then go to the library with my boyfriend to study. These plan changed.. When i walked into the therapy office, they said no appointment wa scheduled. All of a sudden i felt really rejected, not worthy of an appointment like they gave it to someone else , anxious, sick to my stomach, a little dizzy. I have been waiting since February for this appointment! I could not deal with my anger properly or the fact that my plan for therapy were ruined today. I started stuttering kind of i kind of got all dazed out and really sick when the receptionist wanted to schedule another appointment. So, it is tomorrow at am .. am!! What bastards. Anyway, so because i got all weird .. i did not want to be around people. I called my boyfriend .. could not get a hold of him. I cancelled .. did not check my marks, did not go to the library, or lunch or see my boyfriend. I left. I told my boyfriend i had bad anxiety. So, now he want a break. And I have been in my room since i got home since about pm .. feeling really low and weird and lightheaded .. I have been rocking a lot too on my rocking chair .. it is a weird compulsive soothing mechanism i have. Do not ask. I am mad at my boyfriend because he decided to take a break when i needed him most. Is this cold or what?! At the same time i understand he want his brain clear for exam studying. Whatever. I guess it is hard being with a depressed, neurotic girl. No one want to be with a depressed girl. Let is not kid ourselves here.

As you live life and learn new thing you grow more mature. Life is not about growing up and making plan for tomorrow, it is about enjoying every moment a you are living. Happiness is the most important thing and people have forgotten that. The world is full of so many interesting thing that all cost money and we believe having a lot of something is the key to happiness. And since money is the thing that buy u the thing we want we sort of become obsessed with getting a much of it a we can. In my mom and my situation we have tasted what money can buy u and we do not want to go back to the way thing used to be. But the thing is we were both happy then and now we are not. I have learned money cannot buy happiness. My dad and Julie do not have much money and they are happy. There is something we can all say we regret from our lives. I regret regretting. Everyday I have lived ha come to this moment and even after all the thing that have gone wrong recently, I can pretty much say I am happy with they way my life ha turned out. I am happy with who I am behind my mask. I am happy with what I know and what I want to know. Lately I have been wanting to die. Actually no, I wanted to want to die. Depression is all about seeing those bad moment and ignoring the good time in your life. When you are depressed the only thing that matter are the bad times. I do not think I wa stupid for wanting to want to die. When something go wrong you tend to act out of spite a soon a it happens because you are so overwhelmed with the moment. Most people do this - it doe not mean we are stupid it just mean we got carried away and we sometimes do thing without thinking. Now I am starting to realize that the break up with Scott wa a good thing. We were forcing something that wa not making either of u happy. Of course I did not think about either him or me and our happiness I just wanted to keep u together for a long a possible. Besides I have too many other thing going on in my life right now that I need to work on and if we were still together I would have ignored these things. I do not want to become one of those people who throw their entire life in their online journal so I will not go into everything that is going on with me. If you are my friend you know. I am through acting like someone else in order to please people. This is my life and I am the one living it. Other people will not be around my whole life but I will so therefore I am putting myself and my happiness first. No more staying in one place because I am afraid of change. I want to experience a much a I can because to me that is what life is all about. No more dwelling on the past it cannot be changed - move onto today that is were thing are happening and decision need to be made. I do not want to slip off the road by looking the wrong way like I did on my driving test which by the way I failed. But that is ok, there is always next Thursday. OK enough with the thing I have already learned and experienced. Onto new things, new places, and new people. I am tired of feeling sorry for myself and wanting to be someone else. I am going to be me again and do what make me happy. I am going to take advantage of the help I am getting and I am going to help myself get better and not depend on others to save me. And I am also sorry to Scott, one of the reason why I wa so dependent on you wa because you helped me and I thought you could save me entirely and make all the bad thing go away. I now realize I am the only one who can do that. I am sorry I turned you into my therapist. I am through with the break inside my hole, time to climb out.

I am quitting my job. I have been working at a department store for about month yet, and I just cannot do it anymore. There is too much to know and I just cannot keep up. Is it stress, depression or burn out? Hey, I am a diabetic with Autism. For the past year i have felt constant fatigue, no motivation, sleep issues, stomach problems, bad memory and concentration issues. I took antidepressant Cymbalta mg before this during month for major stress and it helped me with almost no side effects. But after i quit antidepressant Cymbalta mg ,the fatigue, no motivation, sleep issues, stomach problem and concentration issue ha been persistent in my life. Now for years. No matter how much rest i get i feel tired. Even if excercise, eat healthy, do yoga and meditation. My blood sugar level ha been up and down lately. But even if they are controlled i feel the same. A cause could be that i have worked on a lot of project during the past years. It went a far a that i started to get suicide thoughts. I do not feel any ups or down in my life. Things i used to like to do isle enjoyable. I rather stay at home than being social. I believe i have major depression and i have visited psychologist and psychiatrist who have advised me to take antidepressants. But the question is if I am stressed, have major depression or simply burnt out. I certainly feel that i have a huge major depression. My OCD thought are back and i have been stuck on testing my blood sugar - time per day during the past year. Which also could bring my stress level up. The past year ha been very stressful for me work wise. But even if i get a weekend of rest i do not feel rested. I have been to different psychiatrist and psychologist and the conclusion is either major depression or burn out. I barely have the energy to clean my apartment anymore, wash my clothes or think about my hygiene. I feel tearful occasionally on some days. I have thought about taking antidepressant again, particularly Cymbalta since it worked for me the first time. But i have been afraid of taking them. Instead my psychiatrist described me brintellix Vortioxetine , mg per day for my depression. But the question is, i am i stressed, depressed or burnt out? Anyone have been in a similar case? Any experience of the antidepressant brintellix Vortioxetine for major depression? I am so afraid of starting to take them, but i do not want to feel this way of every morning waking up with no motivation for anything that the day brings me.

I wa diagnosed with Dysthymic Disorder and have been on and off a couple different kind of medicines, one of which wa Effexor and the other one I cannot remember the name but it started with and S. I have a bad habit of remembering every bad thing that ha ever happened to me and continually go over and over it in my head. I will bring up something with my brother or sister and they say I cannot believe you remember that and yet sometimes I am lucky I remember my own name. I just started a new job recently and will not have insurance until the end of January. I am seriously considering going back to a therapist and possibly getting on medicine again. I am tired of carrying around this baggage and want to do something about it. There are so many thing I want to do with my life and seem held back by my depression. I found this site one night after feeling really depressed over something that I cannot even remember now in the hope talking to people who knew how I felt and what I wa going through.

NOTES FOR A SUCCESSFUL EFFEXOR WITHDRAWAL After doing research on this board and others, I prepared the following withdrawal regime and carried it out, making slight adjustment a I went along. It worked for me, although the withdrawal wa not easy. I share it with you all in gratitude for all your advice and sharing over these past months. I hope it will be a help for you preparing to come off Effexor . MY SITUATION a. Length of Time of Effexor . year b. Dosage mg XR c. Reason for Effexor TMJ, myofascia and migraine due to a displaced jaw disc, lock jaw and stress. d. Other medication Flexeril periodically over the year but not in past year when thing are bad Trazodone, for sleep vitamin and herb a needed. e. Status Age , Height - Weight . Married, no kids, work from home. f. Reasons to Come Off Generally feeling better with the help of physiotherapist life situation ha become low-stress and stabile secure job, good marriage, work from home side effect of Effexor becoming irritating, especially the emotional distance from my own thought emotion and simply feel that I cannot be on this drug for the rest of my life. . MY WITHDRAWAL REGIME Procedure Drop my dosage by . mg XR every two weeks. month total time to get to zero. Divided mg pill into two part to equal ., depositing each part in new empty vegetable gel cap available at health food store . In general a. No caffeine -- not even decaffeinated coffee. b. No alcohol. c. Exercise every day heartbeat up for minute or more . d. Steam Room Sauna Hot bath or long hot shower every day. e. - hour work weeks, night weekend off for down time . Daily a. Vitamins one dosage each in the morning and night B Complex mg C mg E iu Omega mg Glucosamine Sulfate glass of water. b. Continued with my Trazodone medication for sleep during entire tapering process, took no Flexeril. Experience during each tapering of . mg First hour no side effects. hour very bad day grumpy, anger, rage for someone relatively sweet natured nausea, dizzy, balance problems, headache when moving head too quickly would become nauseous body pains, disrupted sleep with periodic nightmares. The main thing is to be a far from other people a possible since any conversation would rub me the wrong way. Asked wife to take nothing I say personally, agree with whatever I say, or simply get out of my way . Eventually we found sending her away for the day shopping or whatever to be the best. On these day I would plan to do a lot of non - thinking busy work around the house fix things, garden, etc. Spent extra time at gym and in steam room. hour very low energy, dopey, foggy, wanting to stay in bed, body pains. My energy would then slowly gain over the next few days. Some of the above side effect would appear briefly without warning between drop in dosage anger, bad night sleep, sluggish . Once at zero mg. Symptoms All of the above, but slightly increased in all areas. Acute allergy symptom -- sneezing, headache, stuffed up from morning to night -- ache and pains. I took Benadryl during this time which helped a lot. Detox Period Now I had to remove the toxin from Effexor from my body. Regime a. Steam Room Sauna Hot bath or long hot shower twice every day--with cold shower break in between heat session to mimic the aspect of fever. b. cleanser Triphila and Psyllium husk powder twice a day c. Dry brush my skin the skin hold a of the body is toxin d. day juice fast, with day before and after of raw vegetable fruit only. Stopped all medications, vitamins, benadryl, colon cleanser, everything during this juice fast. I scheduled the fast approximately week after stopping Effexor. e. Exercise regime every day. . AM I NOW IN THE CLEAR? Here I am week after the end of Effexor and Trazadone -- which I replaced with melatonin . I continue to take vitamin and will do so for quite a while. So .. How am I feeling? - I do not have word to describe how wonderful it is to have my feelings, emotion and mind back, where I feel that my mood are my own and not manufactured by Effexor. - Allergies continue to haunt me daily, but each day it get a bit better, and I take le benadryl. - No need to remember pill time is wonderful, le dry mouth. - Still a bit low energy , but it get better each day. - Mood is upbeat, feeling hopeful and looking forward to clear windshield everyday! I hope this help those of you out there planning to come off this drug. I am grateful for Effexor for all it ha done to help me over the years. I wished they warned me about the withdrawal. I am grateful for all your suggestion and comment that helped me research and put this regime into place. It worked for me and I probably would not change a thing if I were to do it again.

If you do not want period or PMS at all there is the monthly injection - Depo-provera - in the UK. It doe not work the same for everyone like all medicine but for me it stopped all period and kept my depression down to such a level that I could function normally . I stopped having the week mood swings, week misery, week mood swings, week ok cycle. If that is not an option for you there is a herb supplement that I tried called Agnus Castus. It seems to have beneficial effect for most woman is problem from aching breast to full blown menopause. And it can have the side effect of weight loss not a bad thing for me I wa on it for ten year at a time and got to the stage where when I came off it and had a period again I had completely forgotten what they were really like! And thing have wing now. The PMS did not cause my depression but it certainly did not help it. Hope this is helpful

Feeling Trapped Hello, I am and had quite severe depression during the age of -. My past year of life from the age - have actually been great and I have had no problems. I have had a girlfriend since the age of whom I love. I have worked a few different mundane jobs, and have been going to school for electrical engineering. I am entering my last year of undergraduate school in the ASU online program. The reason my depression ha returned is because I feel trapped, mainly due to my living situation. I would consider my upbringing to be the low end of middle class, and yes I realize there are people much worse off than I am. I grew up in a family of , parent and sibling including myself. For the past year we have lived in an sq. ft. town house in California, right off of a busy street. There are room in the house. The master bedroom is rather large, I would estimate about .x a big a the other bedroom. Up until a few month ago when my sister moved out, all of u sibling were sharing the smaller room. Now there are of use sharing it, but still two bunk bed taking up the same space. There is absolutely no space, and I am tall and do not really fit into my twin size bunk bed. My mom ha kept the large master bedroom for herself over the years, and ha forced my father to sleep in the living room, despite the fact that he is the one who pay the bills. She is a selfish person. My desk, which is where I try to study and work, and where I spend most of my time, is in the living room. My dad is usually in the living room watching TV, and there are lot of noise and distraction from other people and the kitchen etc. which make it nearly impossible to study or just relax. This did not really bother me much a a kid, but now that I am , it is getting worse and worse everyday. Because I do online schooling which wa not what I intended , I have little to no interaction with peer and my schooling is basically sitting in front of my computer at home. I feel completely trapped. The bedroom I share is completely cramped, and usually one of my other sibling is in it. In the living room I am surrounded by distraction and other people, with absolutely no privacy. It is hard to study or focus on anything. I feel like I have no space to myself, like there is nowhere to go. I often feel extremely anxious and depressed, and feel a though someone is cramming me into a box. This make me just want to cease being conscious. All I think about is how badly I need to move out. Every night it is getting worse and worse, until I decided to come here tonight to post. Due to school payments, and buying a car, it is not possible to move out with the mediocre job that I have. There is still another year until I graduate school, and even then I do not know for certain if I will be able to get a job that will enable me to move out. I will still have to pay off school loan after that. The thought of staying here for another year, or even worse - year is completely unbearable. My girlfriend and I have made plan to move out together eventually, but that probably would not happen for another year minimum. This had made me extremely depressed and anxious the past months. Does anyone have any advice for what I should do? I have been considering spending more time at library during the day. I have also been trying to spend a little more time outside and at the gym etc. But if anyone else ha been in a similar situation, please give me advice. Note I know there are people who have it much worse. Homeless, disabled, etc. I realize that and that is the main thing that I try to think about when I feel depressed and anxious. That I have it better than some people. But this is just my personal situation I am trying to deal with.

I have always felt different, i guess i am a little weird, loner gay, but at the same time smart loving, people admire me and respect me . i felt depression back in . tried different medications, until, effexor worked for me, then i felt good for several year now depression ha come back again, and with much vengeance. it took my soul and mind, I am back with my partner after a short break up which i think caused the monster to come back, i lost motivation in life and i called my ex to come back into my life since i wa feeling suicidal, he claim he love and will be there for me, and he ha been a great deal of support for me. i am taking cymbalta for week now but my doctor say it will take more week until we decide which medication i should stay with. in the meantime there are suicidal thoughts, running in my head a well a some of hope. i would hate to miss out on my son is high school graduation, or my own graduation from the RN program. a a nurse i know that there is hope, but no matter how much knowledge you have you will always feel lost and helpless when depression is in your body. my message is that we should be patient and continue to do positive thing because at the end, all this mess in our heads, will only seem like a period of time where we were sleeping or we blanked out, i am hurting so much and i know there are many more hurting out there, but let is be kind to ourselves and give ourselves word of appreciation and affection, over and over, take care of yourselves and be PATIENT, just like i will be. God is there watching over u and will not let u perish, unless we want to.

I feel like depression ha turned my brain into mush and now I cannot be successful in anything Last year I stopped being productive at work and it is now seeping into the rest of my life. There are day where I can sit at my desk for hour just thinking about how I should be working on something. But then when I try, it is like I cannot think straight. I am not able to do breath meditation myself, so I am a fine one to talk, but I have read that it works. The thought will come, no matter what you do. Supposedly the trick with breath mediation is that it give you distance on the thoughts, help you stand back from them a bit, and feel the accompanying emotion but not get a carried away by them. This reinforces your ability to know that they are just thoughts, and they will go away if you do not act on them. And supposedly either with breath meditation or without, there is an element of fake it till you make it at work here. It is been shown that acting out anger a a therapeutic tool actually make getting angry easier than letting go of it, because it maintains the neurological pathway that anger uses. One meditation teacher call it rehearsing anger . So supposedly if you replace negative thought feeling with positive ones, like caring for the part of you that is angry and hurt, then eventually your brain will reprogram itself to think and feel positive things. Breath meditation ha become a non-religious phenomenon in recent years, like yoga. Three book that are just good reading anyway are The Art of Happiness by the psychiatrist Howard Cutler with the Dalai Lama, Destructive Emotions - How Can We Overcome Them? , by the psychologist Daniel Goleman with the Dalai Lama, and Anger- Wisdom For Cooling The Flames , by Thich Nhat Hanh, all of which discus breath meditation a a simple practice for mental hygiene a opposed to a religious practice of any sort. Supposedly the Dalai Lama wa really surprised to hear that self-loathing is common in Western culture, because it wa so uncommon in Tibet- there wa just no concept. The point of all this is, with or without meditation, is that if you notice a negative thought or emotion when it arises, rather than struggle with it to try to put it out of your mind, you should just quietly label it a negative thought and let it go away, and or replace it with a positive thought, like caring for the wounded child within you . It is odd to notice that John Bradshaw, the king of healing the wounded child , and Thich Nhat Hanh, a Vietnamese Buddhist monk, say the same thing about this. But it is being said that there is a great similarity between Cognitive Behavioral Therapy and meditation practice, because meditation practice recognizes negative self-talk and replaces it with positive self-talk, and supposedly condition the brain to react in positive ways. In Destructive Emotions there is a part about brain imaging that show that people who meditate are activating more positive part of their brains. And again, these book are just good reading anyway. But like I say, easier said than done. Supposedly it work for some people. I cannot do it, but some people can. Maybe you can. If nothing else, all these works, including Bradshaw, are good reading and you may be able to develop positive mental habit and replace the negative mental habit with them. Both breath meditation and Cognitive Behavioral Therapy have been shown to be good adjunct to recovery from depression, even if the depression itself is being treated with medication.

Here in India, we do not get to pick our class individually. In junior and senior year, you pick what stream you want Commerce, Humanities, Medical or Engineering . The first two bore the hell out of me. I would like to do Medical but I do not think I can study for another year after high school. Help, I am not sure if my partner is depressed. I need help moving forward. A little background on my partner and our relationship, he is and I am . He lost his mother to sickness when he wa year old, dropped out of school because of that and moved away to complete a foundation course. We met while he wa back home but he currently study overseas to complete his bachelor is degree. However, he is been home for the past . week a he is having his semester break. We began dating a year and month ago. He is been nothing but the most supportive and kind partner I have ever had the honour of dating. Very caring, remembers the little thing and is very physically affectionate. However for the past . weeks, he is been incredibly hot and cold with me. The worst instance having been on Thursday day ago . We had planned to meet at pm, but at pm he asks if we can meet at pm because nothe weather is too hot . Fair enough, so we decide to meet at pm. When I meet him, he is cold and withdrawn and doe not even acknowledge me. I reach for his hand and he let me hold it, but the bus ride is filled with nothing but silence. He is looking out the window and he doe not want to speak to me. We reach our destination and head to a restaurant for early dinner, but he order one tiny dish and doe not want to eat anymore because he ha no appetite. I asked him what is wrong and he said he is just tired. I asked if he is angry at me and he say no. He continues being very physically affectionate by holding my hand and holding my waist but he doe not want to make eye contact with me or kiss me. He smile all of time while we are out. We then decide to head to a bar his decision, even though I told him I am okay with going home , but we just drank our beer in silence, I tried telling him about a book I had just bought but I could tell he wa disinterested. While on the way back home, I teared up while telling him that I have been trying so hard to communicate with him but I have just not gotten a response. He tell me that he is tired and it is got nothing to do with me. We head back home and I tell him to text me when he is back home but he doe not. It is been day since then and I texted him last night but to no response it is been hour . Other reason why I think he may be depressed are - A week before he came home, he found out his dog of year passed away. - He ha a very erratic sleep schedule. He will sleep at am, wake up at noon. - He doe not want to do thing that we planned to do. We wanted to go for an exhibition and he said we will go next week but that ha not happened yet. - We have not had sex in a week. - He ha not met his best friend of a few year even though he is been home for . weeks. - He ha not made contact with me for days, this is out of the ordinary. - He is totally checked out of social media, not stayed up to date with meme and Instagram story with the only exception being last night when he watched my Instagram story - His Instagram and Twitter bio is Have fun. Be kind. Die. !! I feel so lost and helpless, and I feel like I am grasping at straw trying to figure out what is going on. If she ha not, I might suggest approaching the letter with just the first issue of the way she treat you without the father issue in one letter. That might open dialogue and allow you guy to focus on fixing that first. I understand your fear of authority figures. When I wa that age I am now I could not talk to anyone of authority. My mom, who wa shy herself had to do that kind of stuff for me. Could another one of your relative go with you to take your driver test? Nana or Sonny who you mentioned in the letter? If it help to hear, I did get over my fear of authority figure and sometimes I go overboard and challenge them to make up for lost time? . I never had psychotherapy, but I wish I had. So do not discount it, nip it in the bud if you are able to. One other question I have is..is your mother ALWAYS this way or doe she show moment of tenderness, sympathy or interest in your life? I think that if you have seen the mom in her in the past, it sound like she ha some internal problem that she take out on you, but have nothing to do with you. Do not worry about how you should be at this age..everyone ha their own time clock inside. If we were all the same, this would be a very very boring world. You sound like an interesting, thoughtful man. I wish you could see that.

Sometimes I just get hit so hard by realizing I have lost out on most of my life. Castle on the hill got me messed up Do not know why the song suddenly got to me, I have heard and seen it before but now it make me so sad. I never had that, I do not have friend I could go to, get back to, I just have nobody. After half of my life I would not say I am depressed anymore, but now I have to deal with the fallout of year and year and year of digging myself in a hole, I have to start everything over. I have no foundation to build on. I feel sad, maybe a little fearful that I will never manage to achieve that genuine bonding and feeling of belonging I could have gotten in my teens. I am proud I am still here, I am proud I have come so far, but right now I am incredibly disheartened and I do not know how to process this sadness. Edit everything seems suddenly so meaningless and fake

What ambition are left to aspire to if you do not want kids? I am a male surrounded by mombies and a culture that I do not fit into. School Psych and a teacher prep program. I withdrew basically because I wa apathetic about the job goal mission. I studied philosophy psychology during my undergrad and I feel extremely content with all the knowledge I have accumulated, but it just feel like I am getting old. It feel like friend are moving away, the world is getting smaller, le wondrous. It is like realizing I am too old to aspire to great thing like being an astronaut or something. I feel like my role model are way too big, or that thing are just downhill from here. So I am asking myself question like why bother working? Why bother moving forward? Maybe I am pessimistic and think the US political situation is horrible and it is affecting me. But I wonder how older people without kid keep going forward. What push them? I firmly do not want my career to be my only reason to live. I do not want to live to work.

Today is her Birthday. I thought I wa moving on. Today is your birthday. You enjoyed the celebrations. You always had a plan. I loved to help make it special .It wa your day. Today is your birthday and I want nothing more than to tell you I love you and hold you tight. To never let you go. Today is your birthday and I want to make it special. Today is your birthday and for the first time in year I am not there to share it. Today is your birthday and I thought I could cope. But your birthday is just a reminder, a reminder that I am sick. Today is a reminder that I let you go because I did not know how to hold on. Today your birthday and I cannot tell you I love you. My wish for you drift off into the empty void of your absence. Today is your birthday and I yearn to hold you and keep you safe. Today is your birthday and your loss cut to my soul.

How much longer can I fake it? I am , had a full-time job for several year and have a young son. I took a leave from work in for mental illness, at which point I wa diagnosed with depression and anxiety disorder, prescribed Zoloft and wa back at work when my short term disability ran out. This wa the first time I would been on anti-depressants. I felt tired all the time, had no sex drive, and started gaining weight, but at least I wa functional. Over the next year, I received a few verbal warning and written warning at work about my poor performance. Eventually, the mask broke and I wa on leave again in . This time I wa away for much longer, wa diagnosed w dysthymia, tried several different medications, found out that just about every SSRI gave me horrible side effect sweating, nausea, insomnia, no sex drive, I am actually thinking now that maybe they caused serotonin syndrome and eventually landed on Remeron and Wellbutrin. This combo actually started to work, without any side effect except for weight gain, which I have been managing with a diet now . This time, I returned to work because I received notice in the mail that my employment wa going to be terminated because it wa coming up on year without being at work. I figured if I wa going to be fired for not returning, I may a well return, make some money and worst thing that happens is I get fired anyways. I wa not better when I returned to work, I wa functional, I wa able to smile, but the low mood persisted in a big way. And so here I am, still working, trying to fake it everyday, feeling like a house of card thats ready to topple. I am afraid because if I go off work again that will have been leaf of absence, and I really do not think I could show my face around here anymore after that. I remember how horrible my life felt when I wa on medical leave. I remember falling behind on child support, having to borrow money from my parents. I remember trying to convince my girlfriend that my low sex drive wa because of med and not because of her. I remember trying to convince an insurance company that I am sick, while simultaneously trying to convince myself that I can get better. I remember feeling like a useless waste of skin that drained on the resource of everyone that dared to care about me. I guess what I am saying is I know, right now, I am suffering from depression, and I am afraid of what might happen if I admit that again.

I am a year old man with a history of depression I wa diagnosed when I wa and of standing apart -- not refusing to fit in out of some sense of rebellion, but not fitting in simply because I could not. I have never been married. I have had only one long term relationship -- it wa long - distance and very turbulent for both my partner and I the relationship ended three year ago . To this day I wonder why I do not measure up , why I cannot seem to find my place in life. While not physically stunning by any means, I never thought I wa hideous, either -- though my look have most often been pointed out to me a a shortcoming, so that is the explanation I tend to go with most of the time. When I hit my teenage years, panic disorder became a problem, too a I realized how little control I had over my life and the way it wa going to turn out . At the beginning of each year, I stand back and take stock of my situation, asking myself where am I right now? Which direction am I headed in from here? What are my options? Up until now, I could always find some reason to be at least a little hopeful, to keep going -- but this year I cannot. I have been out of work for a long time, the panic attack are getting bad again, I have had a number of relatively minor but still worrisome health problem in the last few month -- and worst of all, after so many years, I am still alone. There are no prospect out there no one want to be with me. I am in a lot of pain and I do not know how to make it better. This is not just a temporary slump, it is my whole life, but it hurt even worse now than it used to.

Why did they forget me? I wa never someone people would consider anti-social. Rather, I wa the opposite. I loved talking to people, meeting new people, and just being social. In highschool, I never had a group of friend per se, but I knew almost everyone in my grade, and wa friend with a lot of them. After high school, I went to a local university, so I would have to commute to my school, unlike the rest of my classmate who went to to school further away. My current university is a huge commuter school, so there is no on campus experience to be had, and I am actually transferring to a local community college instead, so I can transfer out later. Through all this, the friend I had in high school have all kind of forgotten about me. Even in high school, I would be the first to message people, or the one to initiate hangout and whatnots. But now, in college, it the same but so much more lonely. All my friend are away, and I am rotting here. I feel so alone. On top of this, I miss my ex from a year ago. We went from meeting, to best friends, to huge fallout, to reconciliation, to best friends, to dating, to nothing. I miss the friend part. This loss ha dampened my mood for a year now. Just overall, I feel so lonely. A year ago I felt on top of the world, and now, I am back to shit. All I ever wanted wa someone to message me first saying Hey dude, how are ya? Its been a while . The worst wa Thanksgiving break, where I had excitedly messaged a few people saying I am so happy to see them and we read I asked to made plan to hangout. A lot of them fell through. Others postponed till Christmas break. I messaged people one day, desperate to talk to someone. I feel like I will never be anyone is everything ya know? I want a dog. Not just because it cute and all, but I want a companion that will never forget me, and will love me. I hate myself. Depression sucks. Loneliness sucks. I just want to cry.

Depressed people get sick, too How stigma in the medical community made me sicker I have often found myself in a chicken and egg situation with my doctor when it come to depression. When I say I am sick, they are too quick to assume the depression is the cause of my pain and not the other way around. After five minute listening to me breathe, looking into my throat, and and touching the outside of my neck, they are stumped so it must be mental illness. It got the the point that when I wa having severe abdominal pain, I did not go to the hospital. I had to push for any kind of testing, which took forever. When I finally found a doctor who listened to me, she told me I should have gone to the ER. Then I wa depressed about that I had let the other doctor make me doubt my own sanity. Turns out, I have been pretty sick and needed surgery. Nearly all of the issue they blamed on depression were due to a chronic, painful illness with no cure. It is bittersweet, I have solved a big piece of the puzzle for sure. But I am still struggling a lot. I just found out that I may be infertile. After my doctor said having a baby could help my condition. So that wa depressing too. I do not think my depression caused my infertility. Checkmate, doctors! I did start seeing a psychiatrist, and he is a kind man. He diagnosed me with depression and anxiety. He ha never suggested that my depression is the cause of my physical problems, and he seems to be sympathetic to me a a chronic pain patient. He is given me depression medication, but I do not know how much it is helping. Chronic illness is a thing that happens to people and it is just depressing . I have always had depression, but this just make it worse. He ha never dismissed me for feeling that way or written off my pain a being in my head. Just wanted to share my experience with others who might understand. People with depression can experience health issue and get dismissed so easily. It took me year and year to get anywhere. It is a struggle to cope with both mental and physical illness. Here is to getting through today, friends.

The last couple time we dated she wa always angry with me for cheating which I never did later to find out she wa the one cheating on me. I wa extremely depressed once we finally cut tie that I went back and talked to her and then she told me she cheated in detail so she could bring me down more. I have tried getting my old habit back which work for a month and then I lose track again. I guess my overall issue is I compare myself how I wa when with her to where I am now, mostly with my appearance. I am also still very depressed and feel that it put me below her now. My only real win is that I have nearly kicked my drug addiction mainly weed, I wa using it to runaway from my problem but now I cannot seem too kick my other habit of nicotine addiction and taking any kind of pill or cough syrup just to not be sober.
