Today is gonna be tough I have been doing okay for a bit now and have not really been in a slump for a couple week but today I cannot help it. Been thinking all of last night about it and now I am pretty torn up. By no mean am I a traditionally religious person. I believe in a god, Jesus died for our sins, and all that good stuff. But I do not walk around preaching and forcing what I believe onto others, instead I try and be humble. I am really struggling here with my depression here a I write this out on my lunch break at work. I do not know if I can make it through today. I just got to thinking last night and a few day before at this point, is it faith or apathy? I just do not really care about anything anymore, not for a long time, many years, in fact. I have always run my life according to my faith. God will provide, God will meet me half way, be thankful for all that I have. I am not struggling with my faith or anything but why am I still around? What am I looking for? What am I waiting on? I am by no mean struggling with my faith but rather where doe the line cut off between having faith that thing will turn out versus just not giving a shit about anything hoping thing will turn out? I do not know, I guess I just want to lay down for awhile. Dream it all away. Pretend that life is not bearing down on me or that I am happy. I just want it to be over. All of it. Just take me home, wherever that be.

No where feel like home. I remember thinking when I wa younger I just want to go home. Even though I would be in pajama and in the house that I grew up in. I feel like I do not belong anywhere and I will never find my place. The future just seems very bleak a though nothing good will ever happen.

I feel like nothing work or will work out, can someone relate? It is always like I try something and want to better myself, have high expectation and then life comes, uppercut me, spit on me and just scream You thought, bitch . I had a really good therapist but she suddenly quit due to illness. I had to wait several month until I got the final answer. Had no therapy in that time between and also we only had like sessions. Now I have a therapist who is ok but I just do not vibe with her that much. And I cannot change because of insurance. Nor do I have the money to pay for one myself since I am a broke as student. I told her once that I do not want solutions. I want someone to genuienly understand me. At first she tried and now it is all solution again. Try this, try that, we need to experiment . I get the thought but I feel like my deep down feeling are just irrelevant once again. My first therapist really understood me and listened. I could cry my heart out and afterwards I felt so much lighter. I really miss that feeling. Now it is just an obligation I have to do. Back then I never used to come late to my therapy session because I really looked forward to it. But now I am constantly running late because deep down, I just do not want to go anymore and give up. I do not have energy for that. I also took anti depressant Tianeurax if anyone know that one . At first it helped me, especially with processing feelings. But then I turned super suicidal and had mental breakdown over mental breakdowns. I completly stopped and now I feel numb again. I want to feel suicidal and emotional again, to be honest. At least I processed something. Now I feel empty and dead inside once again, like how I used to be all the year before I started therapy and taking anti depressants. My new therapist asked me what I can bear more. My suicidal state or this passive suicidal state. I told her the last one. But honestly, I want it to be the first one. At least I felt like a human. At least some people cared because they were afraid I would do something to myself. Now no one cares. I am alone. I do not go outside anymore. I am just isolating myself again. No one really talk to me and I am just a bother to everyone. I honestly think about taking my anti depressant again, just to get suicidal and off myself. Despite often being a bad actor, I am just so well at playing this role of Of course, I will try! I will do my best . I am good at pretending nothing bother is me and everything is fine. I am good at pretending to say Wow, your advice helped me so much, thank you for listening! . But I am just a fraud. Nothing helps. Afterwards I just want to die more. Sometimes I ask myself, why the hell do I even put up with all of this. The only reason why I have not killed myself yet is because it would financially ruin my family. I do not even care about emotions, I doubt it would be that bad. No one like me anyway. Just so they do not get into debt with my death or sth. I often find myself also thinking that I will never leave a goodbye letter or tell them goodbye. Because no one care anyway. I told them many time before why I want to die. I do not feel like anyone deserves that anyway because they do not put a much energy into me a I put into them. Whenever I feel like it go up, it just crumbles down. I really do not know how much of this I can take. I have been like this since year old. I am now. I do not know why I got thrown into this world when I am ridden and infested with mental illnesses.

You do not have to read this, it is just a short story. A few year ago i wa in love with a guy, we were in the same course at school. I got so nervous every time I saw him. However, he did not say a word to me. He ignored me. He did not even look at me. I did not want to ignore him, i tried to get his attention, but i just did not manage. It frustrated me. I just did not understand why he deliberately ignored me. I wa so down, I started cutting again, did not eat for days, .. It lasted one year. The whole year he never said a word to me. Not even when my sister died. I do not understand it today and I never will. I never will forget the pain. However, i do not blame him for ignoring me. Everybody ha the right to ignore me. But it hurt me so much. And today I always get the feeling people ignore me. And when people i care about do so, it is horrible. Maybe they do not deliberately ignore me, but i always think they do. For me it is the worst thing you can do to a person. It is worse than hating somebody. I wrote a poem for this guy, it is not good, but i want to share it. Do not blame me Do not blame me for thinking of you, because you just do not know how i feel You never knew me and you never will, but i know you so well, yes i do. Do not blame me for dreaming of you, because you just do not know how much it hurt You are so far away, but you are in my dreams, there i can reach you, yes i can. Do not blame me for searching for you because you do not know how much i miss you You never looked at me like i look at you, I need you, i always will Do not blame me for loving you, because you just do not know how i feel You never knew me and you never will, but i love you so much, yes i do.

I feel like culture is a big reason why a lot of people do not seek out professional help I do not know much about other cultures, but I live in a Hispanic American household. I feel immigrant family are typically a very work focused group. They expect you to just tough it out and push through everything . Most people in these community do not see depression a an illness, but rather a an excuse for being lazy or unmotivated. There is almost a macho type mindset that you are not supposed to talk about those bad feeling and that shit really sucks. It is pretty much frowned upon to even consider looking for therapy because it is for crazy . I have been chronically depressed for year but I am finally going to seek professional help Monday. I have been having suicidal tendency for year and if I ever have kids, which I very much hope I do one day, I will be damned if they feel they cannot come to me to talk about any bad thoughts.

Feeling Good is an excellent book. I have re-read a few time when I have felt the need. If you are looking at something for anxiety and panic, I suggest Mastering Anxiety and Panic revision II map- by David Barlow. I suffered from anxiety, panic attack and agoraphobia from the time I wa until last year..that is years. Nothing had ever helped until I found a therapist that us that program. A different way of looking at thing and I have to say that I worked miracle for me. I am driving, flying, going to concerts, sporting events..things I have not done for over years. I NEVER thought I could get better and only went because my boyfriend of year wa honest with me and told me that he did not know if he could spend the rest of his life going every place alone. That wa a wake up call for me and to my surprise, I found that I COULD do it. I still have my depression and I am endlessly working on being medicated correctly for that.. all of you know how that is. You can buy just the workbook .com Oxford University Press . Well worth the money.

i am a year old. i think i am depressed, but i do not know how to tell. um..it is like i am afraid to tell my parent because i know them, they will brush it off a no big deal or make me sit down and tell them what is going on. Did they ever think that i do not want to talk to them? My mother is like a roller coaster ride you cannot wait to get off of. One day she could care le that i am sick, or that i need to tell her something, and then the next day she is all, talk to me, tell me what is going on. God it can be so annoying. i know that i have a problem with my emotions, i just cannot seem to control them, when i am upset, stressed, angry, sad. There are always three thing that i do. First i cry, then i scream, then i run to my room, and sometimes i might knock something down. And that get me another, what is going on talk. Two year ago my grandma died. We were not that close and i think that is part of my problem. every time i try to go to sleep i just lay there and think about my life, and realize, there is not that one person, you know, everyone ha one, that one person that you can just call up and say, hey, i am in a bad mood, can you talk.. or hey i just got in another stupid fight with my mom, do you have time to talk to me.. and maybe that is what is wrong with me, i do not have someone to vent to so i keep it all inside. i mean i try and find way to let my anger and frustration out like, i am a poet, sort of. Everyone tell me i am at least, but what they do not seem to understand is that maybe i am a good poet because i have nowhere else to let all of this out. No one can see that, no one can see that i need someone to talk to. i try and talk to my mom, but she is so busy, and that is not her fault, it is not like she is ignoring me on purpose, she ha school, she ha work, she ha my brother is wrestling match, she ha a meeting. then i try and talk to my friends, and i know that they would listen and they would try and understand, but i do not know, i just do not feel a though they need all of my crap on their shoulders, not that you do either, who ever is still reading this. i guess it is that sometimes, i feel ignored. i turned sixteen this year. Happy Sweet Sixteen..right? i wanted to have a party, i wanted to go out and have a good time. But that did not exactly work out the way i had planned. At first i thought that my friend had forgotten about me, no call on my birthday, no card. And then they threw me a surprise party, nothing big and fancy, just small, just the four of us, the way we like it, but still it felt weird, it just did not feel right. i am supposed to be driving, i have my temporary permit, i have had them since October, you know how much i have driven, about one hour. i could have gotten my license last month, but i cannot go to driving school until i get more experience, and i cannot get more experience until one of my parent decides to let me drive. They used to take my brother out all the time, they would let him drive everywhere. i do not know, i just feel like sometimes being the middle child and the only girl i get ignored. i am a cutter. i tried to tell my parent three time that i wa a cutter and i wanted to stop. i could not tell them in word so i wrote them a letter, they never read it. you probably think i am some selfish person, but i just have been holding all of this inside of me for three month now and there is more down inside of me, i just need to slowly let it out. Sorry if this took up to much of your time. Thank you for listening to me..it feel nice to know that maybe there is someone out there listening.

This sub is useless I do not want to appear pessimistic or a negative person, but I do really believe this sub is useless. It is been a while since I have written and I decided to start off again with a bit of a bang. I am going to post my story of beginning recovery, this is to try and cheer some people up and to let them know that they could do it too. Well now, where to start.. About a year and a half ago the beginning of Grade is when I started to notice the changes. Not physical but emotional. I had been told many time that this wa very normal for teenager so I thought nothing of it. There wa an incident with a rather immature and nasty young man, who I just happened to have an ENORMOUS crush on. Anyway we both kind of lead each other on for a while but nothing happened, than he meet this girl at a hockey game. He immediately started talking about her all the time and how he really loved her so much. I began to feel more and more useless. After that I started rolling down hill like a circle of cheese, and by March of that year I wa quite close to suicide at several occasions. This is when I started noticing that this might not be normal and tried many self-help methods, all of which failed. I thought Grade could be a new beginning, it wa not. My grade were starting to slip and I just could not be happy anymore. Finally after a close call in December I told my mum all about my failed attempt and how I wa feeling. She agreed to get me a new doctor. I visited her and I got diagnosed with depression and wa prescribed Cipralex. Of course that took a while to work too which involved me missing a lot of school, falling really far behind, and having several more close calls. Finally I started feeling a little better and wa even stable enough to start going back to school and going to visit my family in the East. Well I just got back from that trip and I have never felt better. I am ready to face the world. That trip wa just what I needed. When I get through these next week until my birthday all I can see is a varely clear path ahead! For the first time in a year and a half I can concentrate and tolerate le than perfect circumstances. I hope everyone here will feel this way, you can if you just push through! Power to us! Rock on!

No friend whatsoever. Living in isolation. Please help me I am in my final semester of undergrad. I am . I live in a university apartment. I have severe social anxiety. I have gone through therapy before, stopped for a while, and am now trying to find a new therapist that take my insurance. Every day is almost total isolation. I go to class. I fantasize about working up the courage to talk to someone or say something in class but never do. I go back to my apartment. My randomly assigned roommates, all several year younger than me, keep to themselves. I am too afraid to talk to them. So I hole up in my small room and play video game or do homework. Day in. Day out. Rinse. Repeat. This ha been my life for several year now. I am incredibly insecure. I have some combination of body dysmorphia and an eating disorder. I am probably quite good looking but I have never been in a relationship I am still a kissless virgin. This eats me alive and make me afraid to talk to women. Another reason to isolate further. I am losing touch with reality. I have loving parent but their advice is not particularly helpful. What I want is a friend, someone to talk to--but the anxiety get in the way. I can talk to people in a structured setting, like therapy, or online and easily and freely at that . But it is the act of doing it in the real world, in a natural setting, that is just impossible. I fantasize a lot about killing myself though I do not think I could ever actually carry it out. If someone could just be there for me I would feel better. But I have given up almost all hope.

Hello I am from the UK, I have suffered from depression I would say most of my life, but have only been on medicine mg of Prozac for just over year on and off, I have had time off the medicine and relapsed back into depression and the last time I saw my doctor he said It would be better for me to stay on antidepressant long term. The Prozac is working for me at the moment However I find the medicine interrupt my sleep and I wake or time a night and the sleep I do get is very light and dreamy sleep, plus I seem to be a bit lightheaded and reckless, on my motorbike for example I do stupid thing like speeding and other dangerous stuff to myself not others , which before off the medicine I would never do because I wa very paranoid and cautious. I wa off Prozac for a while late last year and thing went down hill fast, I wa cutting my arm and wanted to kill myself, I felt I had no reason to live, I wa drinking to relive the depression, and I wa drinking about to can of lager or bottle of wine a night, thinking about it I wa wrecking my liver and feeling even more depressed in the morning, plus I wa putting on load of weight with all the beers, which wa another reason to make me feel like crap. After New Year I made the decision with my doctor to go back on the antidepressants, and cut the booze almost out I still drink about or a night but that is all because thing could not get any worse. I feel a lot better, I am back in the gym and getting back into shape, and my job is going well, I am in a recovery stage at the moment, I just hope I do not f--k it up again like before. Anyway I hope everybody on here is ok. Warm Regards to you all

It go by a few name .. a spiritual eclipse .. the black hole .. the shadow .. my own prison .. the downward spiral. I have named it a lot of different thing .. like it ha a life of it own. In a way it doe .. my life. For too long and too completely. It is getting better but at time it seemed it could not be much worse .. unless I did the unthinkable .. at least most of the time it is unthinkable. Divorced for a little over a year know .. removed from a wife I came to realize wa a classic borderline personality look it up .. I never realized how far down I wa on the ladder of life and spirit until I got away from the witch queen. A true chameleon who changed and kept me guessing and off balance for year .. never knowing who to expect. Finally starting to figure it out .. I think. Two DWI is since the split in rapid succession and then finding out I wa self medicating without realizing it. No license for the last month to go and recovering emotionally and financially with Mom and Dad. Thank God someone cares. Two child I had to leave with the Queen of misery because of the threat of false allegation against me if I dared to go for custody. Hungry and lonely for someone to just be nice to me and care about me .. at least a little bit .. I find myself in my own prison having to acknowledge the fact Why would anyone want to have anything to do with me? Hard to accept, but the truth .. too much baggage .. my ex is baggage she handed off to me to spare herself her own truth. At time I wished I could just flip a switch and just go away. Times I thought about driving into a bridge abutment or into a truck at the last second. Absolutely crazy stuff. I can now see what wa so logical at that time to be so desperate from too much pain suffered by the abuser she was. I can now see the so called glimmer or hint of a silver lining in the most simple of thing life offer to everyone each and everyday. Thank God .. finally. Things will get better and hopefully someday great. I keep trying remind myself thing could be a lot worse. Two great healthy kid who love me and miss me terribly. I am their entire world. I now realize that. That alone ha kept me here . Realizing now that I have been lost in that vortex of hell tugging at me for year .. I actually want to keep going on to life is next challenge. That spell hope and progress in itself. I have made it this far after going through hell with her .. why stop know when thing are just starting to look up I do not want to go back into that dark hole that life wa for far too long.

I do not particularly want to go into detail about how I have been feeling the past couple of years, only because it is too much for me to go into, and I do not want to leave out important detail or anything. In September , I voluntarily admitted myself to the hospital is psych ward through my psychiatrist, the reason being because my depression had grown so severe that my muscle gave out and I could not move anymore, and my will to live had vanished entirely, I stopped eating, I wa dehydrated, I stopped going to school, all I did wa lay in bed all day, it is the only thing I could do. The decision to go to the hospital turned out to be a very, very big mistake, and I regret making that choice. I felt no connection with the other kid there, especially because I wa a week away from turning eighteen, and most of them were thirteen, fourteen, and maybe one or two sixteen year olds. We were similar in an emotional aspect, but otherwise I could not relate to any of them. I just bored them, and the way they talked and the thing they talked about just confused me. I did get involved with them to an extent during the last couple of day there, but I regret that now. This is a story in itself, but I also got involved with a girl there. She fell in love with me, and so did I fall in love with her, briefly. Only because a girl had never shown any attraction to me before, nor did a girl ever show any interest in me like she did. My feeling for her quickly faded after talking to her a couple of time outside the hospital. She turned out to be a real mess of a person. I did not suffer from the relationship, though. I do not talk to her anymore, and I actually became a better person because of it - I wa enlightened. My depression practically disappeared following my discharge from the hospital. I do not know if it wa because of the Zoloft that I had begun taking, or because I wa finally free from that prison. By the way, I do have a form of claustrophobia. I am not particularly afraid of being in narrow or tight spaces.. I am afraid of being locked in narrow or tight spaces. And the hospital wa very small, and they did not let you leave or go where you wanted. You were confined to your room, the main recreation room, and the hallway connecting those two places. The day before I wa discharged, I wa constantly shaking, sweating, and going to the bathroom. I could not sleep, and I wa afraid to move. I had to stay in my room most of the time and skip out on the group sessions. So anyway, even though I felt better right after getting out of the hospital, that quickly, VERY quickly changed. By mid-late October, I wa on home-schooling and will be until I graduate in June this year, I am a Senior in High School , and attending group therapy several day a week, a well a seeing a psychologist once a week and a psychiatrist every several weeks. All of this therapy did NOT help me. I wa feeling extremely depressed and suicidal one night, after a brief fight with my dad I accidentally bumped the curb while parking, he yelled at me to watch the curb, and I got very upset, pulled the parking break, and walked off while screaming about slitting my throat.. , and called one of the therapist at my group therapy to help me. I would locked myself in a room in my grandmother is basement, and I had called her so she could talk with me and help me to relax. Instead, she threatened to call the police if I did not open the door and let my dad in. So I opened it, but after that I completely lost my trust in her and could not stand being around her anymore. Another counselor at the group therapy also lost my trust. I felt a connection with him, and trusted him a lot, so I told him about my girlfriend whom I had met online - another story and he kept on accusing me of things.. like using her for sex, or not really being in love, and etcetera. So after having lost trust in two therapists, and then all sort of insurance problem came up. I stopped going. A few week ago, I stopped going to my psychologist a well. I felt like I wa being lectured by him instead of actually helped.. On top of that, he wa taking weekly co-pay from me while he knew my insurance did not require co-pay for anything psychological! i.e. Counselors, psychologists, psychiatrists, etc. And he still owes me a couple hundred bucks. He also charged my insurance for appointment I had cancelled. Basically, I took two step forward, and then three step back. My depression is not a bad a it wa in September , but I am pretty much tired of living. I am constantly thinking of suicide, and have even written brief suicide note and made plan which I never carried out . My Zoloft ha been at mg for the past couple of months. It is helped my social anxiety slightly, but my depression - no. I am aware of the state that I am in, and I am simply tired of it. My future is all dark, I do not see thing getting better. When I spoke with my girlfriend this weekend, I cried the entire night.. I just could not take everything anymore. I saw a new psychologist last week, but again, I feel like I am being lectured. I am eighteen year old, and being talked to a if I were twelve. It is insulting and make me feel even more left out of thing than I already do. I do not know.

Dear depression, please please let me be. I know I can do so much good and actually get somewhere in life but you are constantly holding me down, suffocating me. Once I think I have escaped your grip you show me you never let go and I am reminded of how tightly we are woven together. I cannot breathe. I cannot eat. I cannot sleep. all I want is some peace. you creep into my bedroom at night when you know I am alone. you destroy everything inside me until I am just a hollow shell of a small sad girl. why?! why cannot you let me be? let me succeed? you bring fear, doubt, guilt, all the bad thoughts. I run and fight for the little bit of light I see through my window in the morning. but every night you are back. sometimes you do not even leave and it can be days, weeks, month til I get another chance at seeing the light. This is not living, this is not a life i wish my son is to see in me. You have taken me from myself. it is not fair. I just want to be free of your poison. I need an escape from the never-ending torment that you bring. please please, just let me be.

He cheated on me, controlled me, I could not even go outside without him beating me. He would come in from his girlfriend is house and if I said anything about it, he would go off and throw thing and call me every name in the book, take aerosol spray can and a lighter and throw flame at me until I wa in the corner begging and cry for him to stop. He beat me in my stomach and said he hoped I lost the baby. He said if I ever left him he would kill me. I had to get stitch over my eye where he busted it. Things got worse and when my daughter wa week old he got in one of his mood and wa beating on me and his grandma. That is who we lived with. He went out in the yard and took an axe to all the car and his dad came over to stop him. I have had quite a few life situation that have probably contributed to depression.. I grew up in an emotionally sexually abusive family..but the type of abuse that is just over the line enough to mess with your head, to make you wonder if it wa really abusive or if you were just sensitive. I still talk to them and see them at times, but vast quantity of thing go unsaid. . I left home for college, and almost immediately wa recruited into a religious cult where I stayed for or so year I just got out a couple of year ago. . I had my first major depressive episode while inside and although I found a supportive therapist, she too wa in the cult and therefore some of her advice at time wa influenced by their beliefs. Also I wa alternately shunned and ostracized, rebuked harshly, or encouraged to give up medicine therapy by various member in various level of leadership in the cult. . I very recently switched job to a much better job situation, but am still adjusting the environment. . We are in contract to purchase a home, which is great, but also an adjustment. The Question. My psychiatrist think I have been depressed for most of my life. Which make sense when I look back over my journal and look at various thing I did, said or experience. Thing is, to me, depression a a state of mind became normal. I did not know anything different than how I wa feeling. So what happens is this I mention something I have been experiencing to my therapist. She is concerned and asks if I have brought it up to my psychiatrist. When I do bring it up to my psychiatrist, he says, Why did not you mention this before? To which my response is I did not know I should. Translation I thought it wa normal. Right now I am on Effexor, with Adderall XR a a booster plus synthroid due to a nasty run in with lithium. When I started I wa okay. Great even, minus the utter exhaustion at the end of every day. Lately though I have been feeling..things..that I cannot describe. Sadness..but a feeling bigger and diverse than the word sadness can contain. Tired..but a tired with an emotional component. Feelings I do not have word for, but that pierce me to the bone. And that are not connected with anything in real time that I can think of. Is this normal? Deep strong feeling that surface out of nowhere for a time and then dissipate..usually on the weekend when I do not have work to focus on? Not feeling much of anything in between those times? Being vibrant and full of idea yet calm and productive first thing after I take the medicines, but gradually fading to sort of numb, definitely tired, somewhat negative by the afternoon with exhausted, sink into the couch with the remote, hit the bed for a nap by , sometimes pm? How do you know what is normal if abnormal ha been normal for you for so long? How do you know when it is time to have a sit down with the psychiatrist again?

I wa rejected amp I feel great Last night I asked a close friend of mine on a date and wa rejected, but strangely enough I do not feel dejected but rather proud and accomplished. To provide some background, I will be turning on the th, and last year, just day after my th birthday, I wa diagnosed with Persistent Depressive Disorder. This disorder is characterized by long lasting, essentially uninterrupted period of depression lasting AT LEAST years, and in many cases, such a with myself, far longer. To provide a rough estimate, I have been depressed somewhere around a total of year of my life. The depression ha had a serious negative affect on my love life, at time making me cold and even cruel. The most egregious example of this wa when, after having dated this girl for a few months, I stopped talking to her almost entirely and started flirting with other girls. Eventually she had to get her friend to break up with me on her behalf because I wa refusing to talk to her. At the time, because of the depression, I thought little of myself, seeing myself a a worthless scumbag, and so I started acting like one. I wa also afraid to open up to some else, so instead I became emotionally cold and avoidant. I hated this behavior in myself, and held a deep guilt for how I had treated woman I had been with, so about year ago I stopped dating entirely. Despite being rejected, having finally had the confidence and self respect to ask out a woman and accept the no graciously is a major growth in my self esteem and wellbeing, so having done so I feel a great sense of accomplishment. This ha really helped boost my self esteem and confidence, even though I wa rejected. There is no real point to this story, but I just wanted to get this out there, because I am really proud of the progress I have made so far.

Hi all, I am new - just joined yesterday. I am a -year-old wife and mother of five. I have struggled with depression my whole life - came from an abusive household and inherited some mixed-up genes. I wa misdiagnosed last year with bi-polar II and spent a year on mood stabilizer and various other junk that made me a zombie. I am now on Effexor and just beginning to feel sort of like myself again. I am a freelance writer and I have a weekly column in our local newspaper. I feel like my creativity ha gone to pot and I am waiting for it to come back. Over the last month I have become pretty reclusive - do not answer the phone, do not get out much, just take care of the basic family need each day - so I have felt very alone. I stumbled upon this site while doing research on Effexor. I have read a lot of the post and have felt some hope that this might be helpful to me right now. My husband is worn out, a am I. I just want to be better. I want to be a better mother. I do not want to live my life this way. I have felt like half a person for the last months. I want to be whole again. I am really struggling with self-esteem and guilt - I worry about what all of this is doing to my family. I hope and pray that my child are strong enough to go through this with me. Anyway, that is me, in a nutshell. I am glad I found this place.

Struggled with depression and anxiety for year and made it through Hi everyone, I just wanted to share my experience with depression and anxiety in the hope it might give someone else a reason to keep going. I am new to reddit, so I hope this is okay! I have struggled with severe depression and anxiety for the past three year and it is honestly been the most difficult thing I have ever dealt with. Mental illness is silently crippling. I have spent more night than I can remember wracked with sobs, feeling incredibly alone, and fantasizing about suicide. I have spent more day than I can remember feeling hollow, being apathetic, and not caring about what happened to me. Depression is a fucking bitch, and even now, when I actually feel happy and loved and excited for my future, I am not naive enough to think that I will never have to struggle with my mental health again. But I think I have learned how to best cope with it. Medication did not work for me, and while I do believe that professional therapy can be invaluable to people struggling with mental illness, it did not make a big difference in my case. But I learned to focus on the present, to rely on loved one I am lucky enough to have, and to forgive myself. Take it one small step at a time. So what if you could not leave your room today? That shit is fucking hard! You got up and you got out of bed, that is the first step. Learn to love yourself even through the despair and self-loathing. There is no one path to overcoming depression, and sometimes it is not exactly the cure-all you envisioned but rather learning to live with it. But I promise you all that one day, it will be better. You will be happy again. And until then, I am happy to listen to you if you ever need anyone to talk to or have any questions.

The one upside of being depressed I have recently noticed something that has, strangely enough, somehow helped me a bit with my depression. See, I have started not sweating the small stuff. For example stuck in traffic? It is okay. Spilled my coffee? Oh, well. My co-worker is annoying? Does not phase me. My thought process is like this when I wake up and feel like dying, at least the spilled coffee give me something to do in the mean time. Or standing in a queue force me to be more in the present and not a much in my head. Since I came to realise this, I have noticed an increase in my general mood, or at least I have become better at coping with going outside, shopping etc.

I am a year old female and I am extremely ugly. Despite having tried a slew of product recommended by dermatologists, and washing religiously, I nonetheless I have the most disgusting skin ever EVER. You know Freddy Kreuger? He suddenly start to look quite appealing next to me . And I have .. unfortunate features. I have a nose that would shame Pinocchio, small eyes, and a manly jaw. This never used to bother me too much, because I have lived with being Unfortunate Looking my whole life, heard all the insult in school, and I figured that anyone who did not want to know me because of my appearance wa not worth my time. I try to make the best of what I have got - I am not especially clever or talented in anything, but at least I dress nicely, get my hair done, wear makeup and all that, and I try to enjoy myself. I knew I wa unattractive, but I hoped that people enjoyed my company, and that one day I might even charm someone with my lovely personality enough that he might want to date me despite my appearance it ha not happened yet, but you have got to tell yourself SOMETHING, right? . I have lot of friends, and even though I am forever boyfriend -less, I am the one that people seem to depend on for everything but sex, and that ha always been a comfort to me. But yesterday, I overheard a friend - a friend! - saying that my skin is disgusting and I ought to do something about it. He said that it wa no wonder I wa single. He said it wa a shame I wanted child so much, since no one would ever want to get close enough to impregnate me . The person he wa talking to suggested IVF. I do not think I will ever be happy again. I want to cut my face off. I want to cut my face off and stick a grenade in my mouth. I do not want anyone to ever, ever look at me again. I cannot believe how utterly worthless I feel. It is not just that they think I am ugly - that is hurtful, but I knew I wa hardly God is Gift to Men. But that they would speak about me like that behind my back .. use THAT word in connection with ME?! .. I cannot believe how much I have been kidding myself!! The message is loud and clear if you are ugly, you are not worth respect or friendship or love.

I checked myself in to a Mental Hospital I decided after dealing with month of annoying suicidal ideation that I should go to a mental hospital. I say annoying because I wa aware of these increased thought and wanted nothing to do with killing myself. While I wanted a closed environment away from home stressor to solve my issue I wa also afraid of going somewhere unknown. I went through with it despite cry and feeling emotional on the way there to get my life turned around. I feel very often that horror story are told of hospitals. In reality, if you need the help, please seek it out. You may have a completely different experience than someone who claim they do not remember their stay and wa drugged up to their eyeballs. My experience wa a pleasant one overall. I went there and focused on fixing my issue and I would say I came out feeling better. I am not sure if I can or should give the name of the place but I am sure someone can let me know down below. I just want to share my experience and help people not feel so afraid of going to one. The place wa pretty clean. An adult area for people and over, room and hall split by gender. Bathrooms only seemed a bit off towards the end of the day or during the morning when people would shower. Roommates were sweet and tidy thankfully but the option to change roommate if there wa a problem wa always available to me. Groups were informative and engaging a well a encouraging for others to speak up if they wished. You had a good amount of personal time to do whatever. Outdoor activity were available permitting the weather. The place wa meant for short stay of up to a week so anyone who is still there for longer may see the group a too repetitive. The food wa surprisingly delicious and great. Honestly expected school lunch type of food but there wa variety and option for those allergic, vegetarian or needing gluten free food. There were staff member around whenever you needed them for anything. The treatment team could have been better. They were good to me but not to everyone there. Changed med without informing me. I went from to to mg of Abilify. Good Lord I felt it once I wa home. Then REALLY felt it when they made a mistake and I went cold turkey for two week because I could not get my prescription filled. I will update once I am properly back on it. So that is my experience. After a week, I came out feeling better. I got off of Wellbutrin after determining it could be the cause of my increased depression. The Abilify give me energy to get up and not be stuck in bed all day. I feel better than when I went in. I know this is a long post, however I have been afraid of sharing my experience with others. I do not want to feel afraid of ashamed of having went, so here I am with this post. If this is also posted in the wrong place, please let me know and I will gladly move it to the right subreddit.

My psychiatrist is saying I should take them indefinitely. As I have no side effect I am happy with this, but I am concerned about some report saying that they start to work le well after some years. You cannot really tell if others have depression from the outside. Neil year young, from the UK

I have also unfortunately had to deal with sibling who are dealing with this tragedy by lashing out and trying to put themselves ahead of myself and my brother. My sister and other brother . Anyways, I just wanted to know other then counselling, if there is anything you feel that might be of use to me and my brain to move forward without Dad. Depression ha creeped in the last few day with the grief to give it a double whammy. Also had a massive panic attack yesterday a well, which I expected but it never prepares you for it. Anyways. I have my ECT consultation today and I have never felt more alone. I have a good support system around me but somehow I have never felt more alone than at this moment. Nobody else that I know ha had depression a severe a mine, or ha ever been in this position where the choice are be miserable forever, or zap your brain which might seemingly cause permanent memory damage and may not even work after all that. Last night wa the first time I have felt really suicidal in a while mostly I have just been miserable and have not even been motivated to plan my suicide . Why go through all these awful, invasive treatment when I could just end it quickly and quietly and then everyone else could get back to their lives? I feel like an immense burden. I have been severely depressed for the better part of year at this point. It ha totally disabled me, robbed me of a career I loved, and made most thing difficult or unbearable. I have tried different drug to try and get it and my anxiety under control. No cigar. I do not necessarily want to die, I just do not want to live, if that make sense. I feel a if my husband, friends, and doctor are keeping me artificially alive with all these treatment that do not work, when in reality, I am that painfully sick dog that need to just be put down already. I never thought the potential for another treatment would actually make me more suicidal, but here we are. Thanks for reading.

I want a cat so much due to depression and loneliness.. I once had a cat I had got for my th birthday over year ago before she died at a bit of a young age just almost a year ago. She helped me so much whenever I had suicidal thought when I would get them and tell myself how much I should die, I would think of her, and then ask myself Who would take care of her? She would be so devastated if her own master wa gone. I could never do that to her. But ever since her death, I think I have been more depressed and lonely without her. I have been so much more angry and isolated, I think. I want a furry companion so, so much, but I do not think it will happen anytime soon, no matter how urgent or how much I rather need one, and that make me even more depressed. There is been so much going on, so it is not a good time to look for a kitten however, the thing is, I do not know how much longer I have to wait, and I do not know how much longer I can wait, because my family moved, and the house we live in is being renovated, so I do not even have a room yet. My wild guess is that it could take maybe a year for everything to settle, but I cannot wait that long at all before getting a cat. I am torn. Should I just get a cat for the sake of my health, or should I endure the wait a little longer so thing can settle down a bit more?

I have never had dream that I can remember, before I started treatment for depression. Oh sure, everyone once in a while, I would wake up and know that I wa in the middle of a dream when I woke, but I know at time I could go for week on end and never feel a if I had dreamt or if I had, I could not remember. I also know or have been told, we all dream every night, it is a fact, we just do not remember them. Since I have been taking medication for depression Effexor and Klonopin , I dream every night! And not just one, several dreams. They are very vivid, most of them do not make any sense but some of them do. It just amazes me how much I dream now and the thing I dream about and can remember! Has anyone experienced this and can it be related to the medications?

I am new here - wa not quite sure where to start but special new member posting area seemed appropriate. I think I have been battling depression off and on for some time now. I saw a therapist briefly, for a couple months, but had to stop when it got too expensive and when I could not take the time off work anymore. I actually did not even start seeing her until the worst of my depression had already passed. Not sure I got that much out of it, but maybe I did not give it enough time. I wa doing so well for a while, but in the last week or two, I can feel myself sliding back into it. There are certain things, issues, that tend to pull me into that hole. I would done so well at avoiding them, I felt like I wa over it. But I am dwelling on them again, and I do not know what to do this time to break the hold. The smallest thing set me off crying, and I have completely lost interest in the thing I wa so excited about two week ago, along with most everything else. I feel completely isolated - I have no one to talk to about this, which I guess is why I am here online. OK not sure what the point of this post was, but thanks for letting me get it out. Sometimes it feel better just to tell someone, anyone.

What Depression is Like For Me. Having depression is like sailing with a hole inside your boat and only a bucket to keep you afloat. Depression is wanting to have friend but are too anxious to go out and stay a while longer. Depression is forcing yourself out of bed, not for yourself but those who count on you. Depression is having an empty feeling inside your chest while your head is crowded with self loathing. Depression is where people tell you it will all get better but only hearing the silent whisper of the wind. Depression is where you slowly lose your personality, joy, and interest for those thing that you have used to love. Depression is where a stranger tell you I will be here for you and you take it a an insult. Depression is where you hurt, crawl on the floor crying, grabbing on to dear life alone in your dark room with your thoughts, too tired to do anything and then go to bed only to rise again to pretend that nothing happened. To pretend, nothing happened.

hey there depression, it is me, ya boi a letter for u by ur truly dear depression, look, my dude.. i have not showered in a week, and although i bleached my hair so you cannot see how dirty it is when that happens, i can still feel it and would really like to use that coconut shampoo i bought that make me smell like, well, coconuts. i am not sure what i smell like right now, but it is probably not fruit. maybe that lavender febreze i spray all the time, if i am lucky. i have not done laundry in a month or so. i wore the same two dirty pair of pant to work all week - the long ones, because even though it is been around F all week, i have not worked up the energy to shave my leg in forever. like sure it is and girl can be a hairy a they want these day woo go feminism or w e but jeannie from accounting noticed when i had two vaguely different sock bc i wa too lazy to find a matching pair and i do not need to give her any more reason to open her big mouth tbh. i only got out of bed today to pee and eat a sandwich which i thoroughly enjoyed - the sandwich, not the pee.. but maybe the pee a little bit too.. not in a weird way tho - so it is nice to know i can still enjoy things, even if i have developed an unhealthy coping method with food and am going to get fatter and hate my body even more. but hey, at least it is not drug . which also reminds me that i need to do dishes.. or i could just keep buying disposable dishes, so that i can let that pile up in the trash i desperately need to take out instead. i have shit i have got to do that i wa supposed to do last weekend, but also spent that weekend in bed you are terrible in bed btw , and considering that i am writing this at am instead of sleeping like i wa supposed to start doing several hour ago - after i wa supposed to take the med that i did not get up to take - the forecast for today is pretty bleak a well. of course, you know all this, because you like to stop by every couple week and make sure of it. i think you are more regular than my time of the month which would probably be more regular if i could just stick to taking my birth control every day, but we already established that i suck at taking pill that i am supposed to . i wish i could just get up and do what i need to do like a real adult - so many people do it, and on my best day i can even pretend to be a real adult a well. but with you here, lurking around my apartment without even helping with the vaguely overpriced rent, i cannot seem to get anything done. so if you could just, like, leave for a couple of day before i run out of clean underwear too, i would greatly appreciate it. sincerely, a concerned citizen

I used to know exactly what I wanted to do in life, but now when I look foreword all I see is eventual suicide. My whole life I have wanted to go enroll in Animal Studies at NYU to eventually get a degree in zoology. It is been my dream for a long a I remember. I wa going to get good grades, get my driver is license at , stay in shape, eat healthy, get married, have kids, earn enough scholarship that most of my college wa paid for, and get a job that I loved. Basically be the perfect woman. But now, everything seems so impossible. I am currently failing most of my class because I cannot find the motivation to do assignments, which cause anxiety to wrack up even more than usual. It is just been awful. Anyways, when I try to look foreword once again that my young, stupid self had planned out when she wa little, all I can see is.. nothing. I just want to be clear that the only reason I am still on this earth is that I know suicide would crush my family. I want help, I really do, but my pride will not let me ask. And even though I temporarily decided to live, the call of the peace after death still call out to me. It reminds me of our past flirting through the angry wound criss-crossing my arm and the knife bloodied with my own blood under my mattress. I just want, more than anything, for this pitiful excuse of an existence to end.

What would you do? What do you do when your depression effect you so much to the point you do not eat or you over eat, you do not sleep or you over sleep, you do not talk to anyone or pretend to want to be around people. What do you do when your depression doe not allow you to be motivated and take away all the enjoyment from your life that make you happy, removing music, dancing and laughing in replace for dark rooms, teary eyes, and silence. What do you do when you will not answer your phone being that only the bill collector is calling, cause you are not able to pay the credit thats pilling up that help you survive, being that you cannot work or cannot make money cause of no interest too cause of lack of motivation, cause the thought running through your head being that you cannot talk to anyone, or that you will not, or that you are disappointed, or that you feel like a burden. Now your phone off and there is no call but the collector is there, no text this shit is not fair, so what is next? Social media? You can make it or it can break you, driving you to want to do the very thing you try not to think of day by day because you do not know what to do. What would you do?

I Saw Someone Jump Today I wa driving over the main bridge in my city this afternoon. This bridge ha been used before. I wa driving downtown and I noticed someone on the opposite side of the railing. I crossed the bridge, pulled over and called the police. I wish I could have helped, yelled something, gotten out of my car. I do not know. I did not even know her but I feel a though I have lost someone close. I struggle with depression myself and I just wish I could have talked to her, I know we could have related on some level. That almost excites me, getting to relate to someone, even over something sad, to just feel that. Thanks for listening.

Girlfriend on antidepressant no affection Hi everyone, my GF of year ha been on antidepressant for about months, there is a definite lack of sex drive since then, but I understand that can be a side affect and she is acknowledged it and we have spoke about it. It make me feel shitty and lonely when I am consistently the one pulling her in for a hug etc. I have spoken to her about it and she get defensive and say she give me plenty of affection and make it seem like I have got a problem. I am just wondering whether anyone ha any thought on if this is also a side affect or whether lack of affection is completely down to her a an individual?

Does anyone else feel like this? Do you know that feeling where you just feel.. lost? You feel trapped in a world that you did not want to be in, forced to try and functional like a normal member of society. You want to die, but you are so conflicted about death. You are conflicted about everything. You cannot decide whether it would be better to feel nothing or to let out all your emotions. You procrastinate so much, because it all feel so worthless. Happiness last a few minutes, but rarely through an entire day.

When I am lying in my bed, I think about life, and I think about death, And neither one particularly appeal to me Nowhere Fast - The Smiths This is me in one sentence. Nothing matters. I literally could not give a shit if i live or die. What doe it matter. We are just a tiny flash on a rock flying through space. We do not mean shit. I do not mean shit. Life doe not mean JACK FUCKING SHIT. I am not even sad. I am just totally numb. Happiness, sadness. Does not exist. Love, hate. Does not exist. Reason, meaning. Does not exist. We waste our short time on this world then we die. That is it. So why should I give a shit either way. I could kill myself right now. Would it change anything? Not really. I could go and get help, Meds and stuff, and I could probably be happy if I tried hard enough. Would it change anything? Not really. When nothing ha any meaning then why should I do anything? I do not particularly WANT to die. But I see no reason to waste even more effort trying to live. It is a weird situation, but like I said before. I literally could not give a shit.

I want to tell her how I feel and that I wish I could be her friend still but I am worried it will just create a bad situation. I really do not know what to do.

How are you? I am not okay. I am in a kind of adverse situation, my thought are all over the place and I really do not know how to break this cycle. Basically what happened wa that a few day ago, I sent my best friend a message before school, saying that I would not attend class because I wa not feeling too well, that I felt like giving up and that, in case I also would not have been at school the following day, I had probably killed myself. I wa not joking. Sometimes I get these sort of impulse , most likely caused by me being overwhelmed by my emotions, my thoughts, and a a result of that, it feel a though I lose my common sense, my ability to think rationally. My thought pattern become unpredictable, but so far I have managed to not act on them, or else I would not be writing this right now. Currently they have been happening a lot more frequently than usual and that seriously freak me out because during those time death seems like such a good solution to my problems. So, back to the story. Obviously, my friend got really concerned and encouraged me to come to her place because she would been staying at home that day. BUT she also contacted my mom, which I did not know until hour later, and told her that I wa not at school and made a concerning remark, but I do not know exactly. My mom started to call me like every minute and I started to panic because I thought a teacher had called her, so I did not pick up any of her calls. I spent the rest of the day with my friend, but called my mom in the afternoon. She asked my where I wa and it sounded like she wa cry and I told her that I wa at my friend place, but after that she declined the call. That night I slept at my dad place, my mom called him and told him that she did not care anymore about what I wa doing and that kind of hit me. It wa the last thing I wanted to hear in that situation. I just do not know what to do. I really do feel miserable. My friend is beating herself up because she think it is all her fault and I do not know, I just feel bad for feeling bad, if you know what I mean. That message wa a cry of help in a kind of way and I do not understand why my mom reacted the way she did. It just make me think that maybe everyone is really better off without me. I have been depressed for nearly five year now, but my mom never really paid attention to it and just marked me down a lazy. I have been doing great for a good six month in , but then somebody really important to me, somebody that kept me going, passed away in December and since then everything had taken a turn for the worse. Life ha become so hard for me, I am sleeping the day away because I cannot bear the thoughts, the guilt, because I am too much of a coward to face reality. I am trying, I really am, but no matter what I do, this feeling, this feeling that eradicates my will to live, remains.

I guess I am writing because I do not know how to think or feel at this period. I feel that I have hurt a lot of people by having my depression, especially my parents. I have not phoned them in weeks, I just do not have the courage to talk to them. I guess they feel that I blame them for my condition. Same with my remaining sisters. Dang what a situation I have put myself in! I still have a group of friend that like me a lot, but I have not told them about suffering from depression. I hide it inside and either act in anxious way or I do solitary activity such a write poems, play the piano or swim. I guess the main embuggerance is that I finding the third year of my course a real struggle at the best of times, but having understanding tutor and talking to doctor that have depression help. I do not know why thing have turned out the way thing are, why I struggle with anything remotely challenging, but I guess that will never be explained. Sometimes i feel frustrated with the way thing have turned and I can do very little to change the current of of my present situation. I feel kind of sick with stuff at the moment. Not that I am assuming a victim complex, but just that in all the poem I write about, I always seek a sanctuary from the business aspect of life, you know the dog eat dog, go compete with others to get a job and survive for the next year of my projected lifespan. Yeah pretty heady thought I am having! I guess I am just scared of the future. I do not know how to survive, I kind of want to blank the future out. I guess all in all, I want to live a simple life and be decent to others. I would like the people I meet in the future to say hey that Haymond guy wa a splendid fellow who really loved people and would go out of his way to help them, because he could. But than an inner anxiety know that I have hurt people from withdrawing into myself and by depression is virtue being too self indulgent. That hurt the most, knowing I hurt people from my depression. I never intended to harm anyone or be this way. If I could smile and be happy I would, but I can only show the scar of my mental pain a a testament to self torment. Do not get me wrong, I smile sometimes and even rejoice in the company of those friend in normal health, but I guess I feel rejected. Self rejection and by that of the stigma of the people of the same age I encounter on campus and at home. I want this to stop I guess. I want a placebo pill that will transport me to the Elysium fields, because sometimes reality is a bugger to experience. I guess the main message is that I want respite from this life, some form of relief and rest, where I will achieve or obtain this elusive elixir of peace. But I am here, still standing, still finding a lot of life a challenge, still merging into a crowd of people who are too proud to admit that sometimes thing may be too much. Who am I and what am I doing here .. I have not a faintest clue. Yeah, I am scared of defeat, of a battered ego that even a shred of self esteem that I had will be allowed to fly in the fresh wind. Its sound like I am asking for love .. I guess I am. Also that I would love some help, and in no small measure I have requested that help from doctor and therapist and talked to you my dear friends. But I find it extremely hard to help myself, to make amends with the very mind that hurt me so. I do not know what to think is what I wrote at the top of the blog, now seems apt to include it in the conclusion. I guess spilling my emotion ha made me feel somewhat dizzy! I guess I will wander, spinning round in circle until I get what the whole dang thing of life is all about.

Driving back home from dropping my cousin off, I began to think about my future actions. I am fully committed to this. I know that when I start, there is no going back. If I do not succeed, if this becomes a botched suicide attempt, there really will be no life after that. My parent will hate me. My friend will leave me or treat me with kid gloves. Either way, I suffer even more than I suffer now. It doe not seem possible that my suffering can grow but I know that if I do not continue or succeed, it will. I honest to goodness do not know what is wrong with me. I mean, why do I have to feel like this? Nothing I have done to make thing right with myself ha helped. Things just keep getting worse for me. Before, I let it go because I understood that the bad need to happen before the good. That you have to have the bad with the good. I kept on waiting for the good. I did not expect sunshine and rainbow but I expected some sort of light, even a tiny bit. I expected a slight reprieve from the evil, dark thought swirling in my mind. No. Everything just seemed to worsen with time, with me. They say that time heals all wound but time ha just worsened mine.

Here is my answer to your age question. Sadly, I am year old sniffle Do not get me wrong. I do not want to be completely alone for the rest of my life. There is a sentimental part of me that yearns for companionship with a guy, but I have such a tall hurdle to overcome before I can even get to that yet. Yeah, but I can relate to the peace and quiet thing by myself. It really is such a luxury nowadays personally speaking . One thing I reflected on wa that I live in a family of people, and maybe that is why I feel so claustrophobic and irritable around lot of people. Essentially, there is no secure privacy, really. Yup, like you I used to live independently when I went to school. I am on a bit of a break right now, but will go back in September where I will share an apartment with a roommate I do not know. Right now, I am mooching off my parent food and shelter. At age , I feel like a little child. And by the way, I am unemployed too. I tried all summer to land a job, but in vain. I only worked one day for Elections Canada, and that wa it. Oh well, a paycheck is a paycheck, right? The thing is, I cannot stand living with somebody I hardly know either. Sometimes I just do not want to greet somebody at breakfast, or say a polite hello, how are you, or how wa your day? . When I battle depression and social anxiety, I really really need the comfort of familiar people around me at times. The last thing I need is a complete stranger sharing my quarters. But, it is something I cannot help. I will probably isolate myself in my room for a while. At least I get cable TV and the internet. Then again, I will probably become a complete hermit during the school year.

So depressed that I developed disassociation. So I am going to bed after posting thus so sorry if I do not respond right away. I am . She basically called the police on her way home from work, had me put in jail for a week on false charge and since I moved out of the state I could not call my family while I wa incarcerated and charge eventually dropped. It broke me so terribly that I literally split personalities. I have the me that stare deep into the darkness all the time and the me that deal with and try to make sense of the aftermath. For the record Yea I do see a psychiatrist, a therapist and have a great support system. It just suck because even with all that I am losing thus battle. Thanks for reading.

Depressed? Or Just in a Bad Rut? Long Post I have never really felt like I have had depression before. I am turning at the end of the week, and this is the first time I have honestly wondered about myself. Usually, I am pretty happy about things, and my outlook on life ha always been realistically positive. But, lately, I just feel absolutely lost. And this morning, after I got off of work, I sat and cried. I am not much of crier at all, and the only other time I have cried in the last ten year ha been at an uncle is funeral recently. This past summer, for me, wa a pretty great time. I wa in a relationship with a girl who really made me happy, more than any other one had before. I seemed to be having fun every weekend, whether with her or with some friend of mine or family. I had a lot on the horizon, and a lot to look forward to. I wa getting ready to finish up my degree, and it seemed like thing were going in the right direction. The only thing that wa a problem then wa that my job wa a third shift job, but it wa day a week, and usually - hour shifts, meaning I had time to do stuff outside of it. But, my then girlfriend and another friend had solid connection that they thought could help me land a much better job where they worked, which would carry me pretty well until I finished school. Things were looking up for me. I wa pretty happy. I guess thing started to slip for me when my uncle got hit with a terminal diagnosis in August. At , and with young children, nobody in the family wa prepared to lose him. And the disease, an incredibly rare degenerative brain disease, wa the same one that killed my grandmother year ago. We lost him in early September. The thing with this disease that nobody in the family is talking about is that, if it hit twice within the same bloodline, there is a chance that living relative within the bloodline will get it in their is or is. There is nine of u left in the immediate family, including my mother, my brother and myself. And since it is so rare, there is absolutely no treatment plan. That, for me, wa a lot to process. I am not worried about myself, but the idea that I could still be losing relative to this disease for year sucks. It is hard enough seeing it happen twice. During this time, thing started to fall apart with me and my then-girlfriend a well. I kind of hid out with her for a while, because my family wa perpetually sad and in a state of distress. And since I worked nights, I wa kind of isolated. Things started to hit a rut between me and her when she started her own treatment for depression. I tried to be supportive of her, while doing whatever anyone in my family needed while my uncle wa sick. She really seemed happy that I wa there for her, and thing really worked out since she lived so close to my uncle anyways, and I could bounce back and forth from place to place on my day off. Both my family and my girlfriend were very important to me, and I guess helping them out made me feel good about myself, even though the situation wa shitty. I kind of let school fall to the back-burner though. And I kind of neglected my other friend for a while a well. But between work, my family, and her, I wa consistently busy. My uncle passed in early September, sending most of my family into a pretty bad state, and only a week later, my girlfriend decided she wa done with me, because she wa afraid that if she recovered from her depression with me around, then she would equate me with happiness, and if I left her then she would not be able to recover. Which ended up being mostly a made up way of saying, I do not love you anymore, but I do not have the courage to tell you. Obviously, it wa not fair to her to be stuck with me if she wa not happy with me, but there were so many better opportunity for her to break thing off, and she chose the one that wa the most tedious and mentally draining for me. My state of mind after it ended wa not great at all, and I said some very mean thing to her after it ended, I guess, at the time, I thought it wa constructive criticism, but it wa all just mean and awful and embarrassing. Understandably, she ha not talked to me since, and I feel like I burned any bridge towards reconciling with her. I missed my uncle a lot, but doing favor for his wife and kid helped me at least feel like I wa contributing. My mother is still kind of a mess about it, but she ha my father for support. My brother had a hard time for a while too, but his job keep him well occupied. But, lately, for me, the thing I can help with anymore have been fewer and fewer. Right now, I just want to fast forward to like March or April. I do not want to deal with my birthday, since the plan I had with my ex-girlfriend are obviously not happening anymore, most of my friend are busy with work and school, and my family is still not back to being normal. Nobody seems to want to do much for my birthday anyways, which is, for lack of a better word, normal for me. When I got home from work this morning, I cried thinking about it all. I have never had that kind of emotional reaction to anything before. The only thing I look forward to in life at the moment is my night or two out with a friend a week. The holiday are going to be rough on my family, I know now that my ex girlfriend who I still care for and would probably take back ha completely moved on from me, and the once promising prospect of a new job is not nearly a likely a it used to be. And, school kind of got caught up in the shuffle, and I am not where I wanted to be with that, either. I am going to be out on my own come January, which might help, but right now I am just dreading the next month. I feel like the thing I care about are slipping further and further out of my control, and it is hard for me to deal with. I do not know if this is just a rough patch in my life, or a sign that I have a more serious problem. But right now, I have very few people that I can be open with, and it is been tough. Work is, for lack of a better word, quiet for me, meaning I spend most of my time thinking, and it doe not help much. Since I have never really had a stretch like this before where I have been a mentally drained and just sad, I am not really sure what to do. But there is very little on the horizon that I am looking forward to, and I am worried about that. tlr Stretch of life events, most of which out of my control, have wreaked havoc on my emotional state. I now feel kind of hopeless. Do not know if it is just a rough patch in life, or something worse.

I want to share my experience moving to NYC from Israel - four month ago Hello everyone, I just thought it would do good for me to share my experience moving to this city among other new yorkers and maybe hearing some new voice of people who are living here and know better than me or even went through the same thing. So basically, I am year old and moved to NYC four month ago with my wife. My wife is doing her Ph.D. at Columbia University, and I just joined her with a work permit during our stay here , and we are going to be here for at least . years, but we could choose to stay for five year if we wish to. At the moment I do not see it happening I have to say that moving here ha been the most difficult challenge I have ever been through in my life. First, though my English is not bad at all, I am SO, SO insecure about it. I am feeling afraid to open my mouth and say complicated things, and it is depressing me. I am a person who is talking a lot by nature. I have always been like that And I feel like someone took away that ability from me and I am much le charismatic in English than in Hebrew which affect my confidence tremendously.. After smoking weed for - year almost every day in Israel, I quit doing it since the first month I got here only because it made me feel very anxious it used to make me feel quite the opposite before I used to be a teacher in Israel and pretty quickly I have found a job a a teacher that teach Hebrew here in New York. In Israel I used to teach History which I found much more interesting than teaching a language, but that is what I got here, so I have to live with that A few day ago, I had a conversation with my boss, and apparently, they are pleased by my work there, and they asked me if I am willing to continue for next year which is nice to hear even though I do not like this job that much. I guess I will have to compromise. My wife and I are supported by an excellent scholarship, and we do not have to worry a lot about money or health insurance so, on the financial field, we are kinda covered. Except that I feel like I am being le of a man. I am broken. I do not know what to do. I can see myself being suicidal, but not in the sense of killing myself, but for looking for someone to help me. But I think that not working for so long, and the fact that I do not have friends, make me need contact with people. Any people. I just do not know how to do that.

Unrequited Love Crept Back Up to Haunt Me First off, I felt the need to create this fake reddit account so that my post could not be linked to my actual reddit account, and I could vent to reddit without worrying that any of my family or friend will read this. Unrequited love is the worst. It consumes your mind almost every second of every day. I am usually a positive person at least I try to be . Grew up with this girl in the church. We were the best of friends. In high school, we went to homecoming and senior ball together. I asked her out times, once in middle school, once in freshman year, and once in senior year, all three time given the response I am sorry, I do not like you in that way. It messed me up. Even affected my first two relationships. I got with my first girlfriend solely because she liked me. Part of me hoped my best friend would get jealous. I genuinely liked my second girlfriend and she liked me. This girl gave me the butterflies, but because neither of u made a real effort to be boyfriend and girlfriend, we did not last. Before, after, and sometimes during each of these relationships, I would wish it wa my best friend I know, a dick move . Then I messed up. I wa influenced by a terrible person to say some thing I should not have. We went to the same community college like we planned but three year passed without ever seeing each other because we were fighting. The time that we spent apart allowed me to clear my head. Before, I used to think about her all the time. Now, days, even week would pas without her crossing my mind. I met plenty of people in college and made ton of good friends, focused on my hobbies, it wa the happiest I have been. Eventually, we got tired of fighting and I realized what it wa that I fucked up an extremely good friendship. After I made an effort to show how sorry I was, she made an effort to let me back into her life. Then I thought, Do not fuck this up. She doe not need you to like her. She need you to be a good friend. I said some harsh things, and because of it, we were not friend for to years. So naturally, we tried making up for the time we had lost. She invited me to hang with her friends. I invited her to hang with mine. We would do thing together, play music together, video game together, and just genuinely hang out. We talked thing over and settled our fight by blaming that terrible person that we both dislike from before. We eventually went to the same university together and some of her closest friend became great friend of mine. We took a class together. Would exercise together. And we have gotten to the level of No judgment a she call it, where I have told her some of my deepest, darkest secrets, and she did the same with me. Problem is, a we spend each week almost always hanging out or day out of the week. I find it harder to come to term with u never being together. She is never dated, but she tell me about guy she is liked, little thing that happened to her like small romantic contact like holding hand . She ha A LOT of guy friend that she is close with, and a few girl friend that she is really close with. And though it only bothered a little back then, it is something I am jealous of now. Each time I see her, I first think to myself be normal, be funny, do not show any sign that you may still have feeling and it works. I am happy with the way thing are, u spending lot of time together, hanging out at each other is house for hours, trying different foods, and just having someone like her I can talk to. But thinking about the guy she who will eventually be her first boyfriend, or her husband whom she may have kid with, that future where another guy becomes the guy she sings with, dance with, go to church with, doe romantic stuff with just pain me to think about. Well, it is late like in the morning and this is the time when I am usually in my feelings. If you have invested time to reading my story this far, I thank you and would like to know what you think about my situation. I am a bit dramatic, and I overthink like a muthafucka, but I am an honest fellow, and this is first time venting to reddit. And it is a bit ironic, cuz I should get some sleep since she is coming over tomorrow. P.S. I thought about solution like slowly drifting apart from her, but I have come to the realization that I would rather have her in my life a a friend than not at all. But it still hurts.
