I will be on the road in le than hours. The last month ha taken a serious toll on me physically, cognitively, emotionally, and spiritually. Things have suddenly gotten so crazy. Nothing look even remotely familiar to me Aggers, . I have held My Sweetie with tear in my eyes, hoping her to buoy my hope for the future. I have been overwhelmed by the enormity of change and possibility, fallen to my knees, bowed my head beneath our roof, and prayed in earnest that it will not be the last. I have wrestled with the stranglehold of others denial, silently observing time crush their last defense a the flurry of last-minute demands, requests, and desire are left unfulfilled. I have ended my beloved employment, said goodbye to supervisor and peers, returned keys, cleaned out my desk, and stood at the door of my empty office with the first true inkling of the magnitude of what ha become the most difficult life transition I have yet faced.

That broke his heart and his spirit..he left. Of course, I went into a tailspin. Finally got of the couch last weekend, three month later. I stopped my counseling and medicines. I know I have to get it back together again. I guess looking for support here is a step in the right direction. I am trying to figure out how to go on when you lost the best thing that ever happened to you. Thanks for listening

Well, I have to admit that a a male I have always viewed my own depression a personal weakness. I still do, I cannot help it ..it is a notion, feeling or philosophy or whatever that is been instilled from an early age. I know this is not a popular or realistic way to feel about depression. I mean, it is an illness, right. I have never been to a doctor to have my condition properly diagnosed or treated. At the moment, I really cannot face my doctor with that sort of issue btw, I am in my mid-s and I have suffered from depression since a long a i can remember - I have learned to cope, in a fashion, but probably at the expense of a reasonable sense of social normality - i.e. divorced, emotionally empty relationships, enormous amount of time spent alone, dissatisfied working life, etc. One cover up disguise the depression at work, at home, and wherever whenever necessary..and then, when you are all alone, the demon can come out to play or even before you are alone - but at least you maintain the expected external masculine dignity, most of the time. For example, today my son wanted to come over to visit me but because I have been feeling so miserable and morbid and soaked in ennui this week, I made an excuse to put off his visit because I did not want him to see me feeling low depressed and weak and thus ruining his day week. Instead, I went out on a freezing mile walk alone to try to physically squash the depression. This is a regular occurrence - I get depressed, I hate myself for being weak, so I do something physical to try to alleviate the symptom and also to punish myself for feeling depressed .. it works..temporarily. In my mind, this sort of masochism is or ha been preferable to taking alcohol, drug even prescribed medicine , fags, therapy or inflicting real self-harm and so forth because, at least, it keep me feeling physically fit-physically balanced and I guess that is important to me even if it is not always an effective cure for one is depression. And I can keep up the public pretence that all is well. Sorry, back to the point - yes, it seems a lot of men do tend to suffer depression in silence one wonder what the real percentage could be! .When I joined this group yesterday it wa the first time I would openly voiced the notion that I DO suffer from depression. Not so macho. Perhaps my condition is getting worse.. or maybe I am just feeling a little more realistic about what it is to be a male suffering from depression. Are there MANY woman or even men out there who are truly sympathetic to male who suffer from depression? Unfortunately, I have not seen much evidence out there so far?

I think you guy might understand this. I wa walking with a close friend after having lunch together, and I told her, I feel a if I am living on borrowed time. She asked me to explain further, but I could not find the word to better express that perspective. She then proceeded to recount to me all of the myriad way she is nearly died on some of the trip she is taken. I confessed that I could not really relate to those sort of situation or how they have affected her, a she ha more zeal for life than anyone I have ever met. Whatever she wa describing about perceived proximity to death did not suit me. Then the word came to me. I feel a if I am living on borrowed time, because I feel like I could, at any moment, lose what little will to live I have left. It is like I am waiting for the other shoe to drop. I see it in slow-motion, slowly falling to the cold pavement, but I do not know when it will finally make contact. In the meantime, I am existing, trying to experience new thing and connect to people a much a I am able to, but I cannot shake the conviction that I will eventually resolve to leave by my own hand, despite whatever life I have made for myself. The fight is already been lost, and at some point, I will have to accept defeat.

I have always resented my mom for being emotionally abusive growing up and blamed her for my depression. But I just told her I am depressed and she responded in the most perfect way. I feel really weird. I am an adult now and have had crippling depression since childhood. Growing up, I never had emotional support or love. I wa called name and my mom took out her relationship life issue on me. I wa distant from both my parents. I have hugged my mom only once in my life. This is just one issue out of many that led to me developing a fragile self esteem and crippling depression. Over the years, with distance, we started to talk- like once a month or so. The more educated I became, the more I came to understand why she acted the way she did although I still harbor much resentment I am going through a depressive episode just now. I feel so alone and I texted her out of desperation. I told her I felt alone and depressed and could not get out of bed to study. Instead of judging me or saying something mean..she just listened to everything and all of my symptoms. She said that she felt so sorry for me and she wished she could help me. And she told me to never feel alone because she love me and I am very important to her. She asked if she could do anything to help me..and I realized, yeah, if we could call each other every morning, I could have someone to talk to and tell her about my daily goals. Then I could feel more motivated to get out of bed and feel le alone that day. I just feel weird, because I do not have a relationship with her. I am scared it is going to be awkward, but I am desperate for any support I can get right now. I also still resent her, but at the same time understand. I do not know. It is just weird. But, I am happy she acted this way, for sure. Edit I also do not mean to brag or anything like that. I just wanted to share this with someone, and wa wondering if someone had a similar experience maybe in forming a bond with their parent longer into adulthood.

I used to be you It get better You have to love yourself first amp other lie Not even sure if I should post in this sub, but.. To the people who used to suffer from depression, from trauma, from anxiety, from whatever made you miserable, I am not you. You were once miserable, like me, you saw no light at the end of the tunnel, but then, you did not give up. Something happened. Now you are happier, now you have got your happy ending, now you have got people who love you for who you are. But I am not you. You probably changed, you probably were capable of change, were strong enough to change yourself even. I am not you. I have been gone for a long time, now. There is nobody here but bad habit and terrible feelings. Sometimes I feel a semblance of someone who just wanted to make other people happy and be loved, but I think the misery just piled on like mile of permafrost. I cannot blame people for not loving me, but I do blame them for lying to me. Do not they know it hurt more to say I care when they do not, and it take me much too long to figure it out? How am I ever supposed to trust people when they say they care if it is been such a common lie? The worst part is, nobody can prove it, because nobody can help me, because nobody know how or want to , I do not know. I have been asking for help for a long time now but nobody take me seriously. You, who say that I should not give up. Why? I am not you. Years from now I will not be surrounded by people who love me, I will not be anywhere closer to happiness, I will not find anyone who love me. If that person exists, and perhaps they do, I will not ever have the luck to meet them. You tell me I have to love myself before anyone else will. Those who grow in complete solitude do not even learn a human language. So tell me, if there is nobody to show me how to, how do you expect me to teach myself to love myself? I think you just want to place the blame on me. I do not love myself and so that is why I am miserable. Not because of depression, not because of isolation, not because of poverty, not because of heartbreak, it is because I do not love myself in a world that is only taught me to hate and criticize myself. In this world where the people I thought I could perhaps give my heart to, say I care about you and then show me those word are meaningless. Forgive me for being skeptical about getting better when I have only seen my life decline since it began. I am not even asking for pity, because I know it is just the luck of the draw and I wa dealt a particularly shitty hand. But can you please understand that not all of u are going to be okay in the end? Just because you suffered for many year and I have suffered for many year and you no longer suffer like you used to, doe not mean I am not going to continue suffering a I always have been.

Does anyone else is depression show itself a exhaustion? I find a I get older, that certain heavy type of exhaustion that can only be caused by depression get more and more pervasive. I have no energy to do my normal daily tasks, the thought of going through my evening routine before bed seems like climbing a fucking mountain I barely have the energy to do anything other than sit on the couch and stare into space. The physical lethargy always come hand-in-hand with the Brain Fog. Forget trying to study, forget going through the bills, my brain cannot handle anything except moving my index finger to scroll down Reddit and watching cheap entertainment on youtube or Netflix. I am writing this because I am in it now - in the Fog - and I am lagging behind in life. Does anyone else feel this way? Does anyone know how to get out?

I went to this meeting. It wa for people who have depression. The leader said to me that I wa so knowledgeable I should be well. I wa very sick at the time. Which went to show me I had knowledge but no wisdom. For year I knew this. I read all the book and nothing changed. I really felt like maybe I wa on the wrong line of thought to get over the depression. Yet I did feel better. I thought my life is not changing though. I have so many hope and dream for my life and here I am sitting around wasting it. I still feel like that at time but then something bad happened and I did not react to it. I did not feel worse. Then someone did something stupid and I did not yell at them. I went to a friend and asked if she thought I wa getting better. Her answer was. Hell Yeah. You bother to talk to me now. It seems she wa doing all the talking at one stage. I did not know. It is been year since I first got depressed In all the test on the computer it went from severe depression to moderate the other day I got mild depression. Ok today it back to moderate. I think the reason for this is that I am nearly there with a thought process and I just cannot get it. I am kicking myself for it for being incompetent and those word from that woman came back you have all this knowledge you should be better. Do I need to go back and do some stuff on self esteem again? Is this what this is about. I look inside of me and see my self esteem ha fallen apart again .. and I mean again! How many time is this? ? a times? Why cannot I work this out? I do not know what is wrong. I think if she asked me now, I would tell her, I have not got all the answer yet. Somehow I wished she wa right. That with what I knew I could just be better. I am off to hit the books. Is not depression ironic? You can feel bad about anything even a compliment. By the way. I am still procrastinating. It is better though. I think. Not that much though I have so much to do. OK that is wrong is not it? I am heading to the quiet of my bedroom to study. I hope.

The base is bound box of Remerol tablet similar to Effexor . Above that is my trusty mg slow release wellbutrin. Next, Sonata for occasional use and then onto concerta per my request. Finally there is Risperdal and Topemax - a headache medication. I tried to kill myself last spring and came very, very close. This event ha opened up spiritual dimension more terrible than I thought possible. Forgive me for sounding weird, but with my life just one little hop, one small step away from obliteration, the return back became a long journey. And most of me did not even make it back - after the attempt I wa hospitalized on a ward with a sociopath a my neighbor. I wa naive and even befriended him. Far too late in the relationship I realized that this person may not have my best interest in hand. So I left the hospital but I left beaten. Then I went home to my family and some of them reacted terribly against my illness. I felt powerless, like I wa spreading some miserable disease. My struggle go on but at least I am alive. I believe in many thing I never used to now, and that give me hope. To anyone reading this, I just hope you will not toy with your life. Live a long one, it is important you do.

I wa sexually, physically, and emotionally abused by my father, my uncle and my grandparent from the time I wa five until I wa fifteen. My mother had taken my father and his family to court for it but everyone said that she made me say it to get back at my father, since I wa only five and not old enough to know anything. None of them were punished for it and I had to keep seeing them on visitation until I wa sixteen i am still sixteen and I told my dad I did not want to see him anymore. This obviously did not make him happy and he know it is about the abuse. Every once and awhile he email me or call and try to make me feel guilty about it and when he doe I get upset all over again just when I had started to seem to get better. I really wanted to write a book about my life, but I figured that because my dad and his family wa not punished or proven guilty that I would be sued for it. I want to change my last name and then get a pen name, but my mom say I have to wait until I am eighteen. I do not exactly want to wait that long to write my book, but I feel like I do not have a choice. I have considered taking them back to court but I figured it is probably hopeless and I feel guilty and doubtful even though I know it happened. Anyways, I do not want to put my mom through all that again. A lot of time I think that I imagined it all and deny it because I wish it did not happen. I really want to be a writer and to help people who have been abused, but without proving my abuser guilty I feel a if this is impossible, that it is not my right. I am scared they would be found innocent and then try to kill me for taking them to court. What should I do? I know everyone here is having a hard time and I really do not mean to be a bother. I feel guilty just talking about it because there are so many others who have had the same thing happen to them but I really needed advice.

I am taking citalopram at present and waiting to see a psychologist but she say I am not ready for her help which is very frustrating she say I would not be able to function if she started therapy with me. I work full time so I guess it is for the best. I am beginning to understand about depression a bit more now it would be nice to here from anybody out there who ha suffered from depression and have found practical way to deal with it. How do you get out of the dark hole, how do you feel like you are partaking in life and not just spectating. Anyway nice to know I am not the only one I do not feel so much of an alien now. Bye now Phil.

Hi everyone. I am a yrold mom of three, and under. My depression started a a teenager, but somehow back then I wa able to talk myself out of it and perhaps had enough going on to keep me distracted. I got married right after high school, and nine month later, overnight, really became a mom. I never intended to be a mom at nineteen. I had dreamed of going to college, enjoying year of freedom with my husband, and then, carefully planning our first child. Well, seven year later, we have planned only one our last , and strangely enough my only planned child wa the hardest to recover from emotionally. After the birth of my first child I struggled with denial over all my crushed dreams, and fought back depression and suicide on a daily basis. I saw a psychiatrist who put me on various medicine over the next few months, to no significant improvement. When my daughter wa three month old I wa voluntarily committed to a behavioral health facility and stayed there four days. I came out fully charged, and within a matter of days, wa right back where I started. So I started seeing a therapist who did me little good, and continued on the latest medicine combination I wa prescribed. Shortly after my daughter turned one I finally gave up on the medicine and the therapy and pretended to be better, even though I wa not, because of the sheer frustration that nothing wa helping so I might a well just get on with life. I continued to battle depression and suicide on a daily basis, and also struggled with behavior that wa contrary to what a good mother should be. My husband wa military, and it is during time in his absence that I have become her , my alter ego, someone who is intolerant, impatient, selfish, and ugly towards my kids. And blah, blah, blah. Do you guy get tired of telling your life story, because I do. I have lost count of how many time I have told it to various therapist in some vain attempt to help them understand me. So let me tell you where I am now. I am a person who is deeply confused. On the one hand I dearly love my kids, my husband, and I have the desire to live life and see my child grow and strengthen my relationship with them and my husband. On the other hand, I am sapped of every last ounce of purpose, life becomes extremely monotonous, and I strain to see the point of it all. Even now, a I write this, I am wondering, why am I wasting my time? These people will never know one tenth of a percent of what is going on inside me. And that is how I have left every therapy session I have ever gone to, feeling like my time wa utterly wasted and like I have made a chicken scratch in an issue solid a ice and twenty foot deep. I balance on a fragile thread of life and death and I am scared that it is only a matter of time before something tip the balance just far enough that I finally do it . My biggest fear is that by the time I find a way to heal myself, if I make it that far, my kid will have paid the ultimate price and be a product of confusion and sadness too. I am sick and tired of trying to feel human. In talking with others, I feel intangible, fake, this intellect in human form but incapable of human understanding. My emotion are real love, hate, empathy, grief, anger, happiness, but I still do not feel real . I feel like I am missing some vital component that tie it all together, and without it, I am nothing more than this body walking around, emulating those around me, operating on some kind of autopilot. It go beyond frustration and confusion, and I feel this pent up rage building inside of me, and I want to scream at the top of my lung until I turn blue, throw a chair through a window, send dish crashing to the floor, something through which I can channel the anger and get it a far from me a possible. And then, sorrow. Black a an abyss, tormenting hopelessness, and it is then that I contemplate suicide. Fortunately or not I will then remember something, some reason for why I cannot do it. The other day wa my sister birthday. I did not want her to have to remember her birthday a the day her sister killed herself. Then I bawl, because there is no way out. I cannot leave, and staying mean continued torment for me and the people I love, and for some reason, love me. How long must I endure this cycle? Once again I am off medication. After the birth of my third child I went on the latest wonder drug, Lexapro, and after a year with no improvement I have abandoned that a well. I also made another mental health check in when the baby now wa a few month old, for six day in duration, and once again came out feeling like a hundred buck only to crash again. I have examined the perspective that, like the book title, Depression is a Choice , and have even embraced the idea. I have also embraced the idea that it is certainly not a choice, and that medication is the solution, with equally unhelpful results. I grow weary of this fruitless search to fix myself . For those of you who would suggest God, yes I am a believer. I turned to him three year ago, after year of Agnosticism, in utter desperation to fill in the missing link . But for whatever reason, He still is not enough. Which is the biggest blow of all, because I truly comprehend the sacrifice that wa made in my behalf with the Atonement, and yet for some reason fail to utilize it. So here I am. One big mess. And I am joining the group, lucky you! See you around

I die a little inside with every customer TW Let me start by saying I have been getting help for chronic depression and anxiety since January. I take sertraline mg every day, and it is helped me tremendously. I wa hired a a cashier at a fast food job in November of last year, and it wa a huge step forward. No education, no GED, no transportation, no job experience except for working for a family company since I wa a literal child needle to say, I felt like I overcame a hump that had been looming in front of me for quite some time. I have had extreme social anxiety since my early teens, so diving headfirst into a cashier job seemed a bit counter-intuitive. Now, I do not know if it wa the medication or simply having no choice but to face my fear every day, but the anxiety ha completely faded. Gone. Zilch. Good, right? Well, in it place, a little seedling sprouted, and a time go by it swell inside my heart and head, push against my skull, crush my organs, my spark, my will to move forward. I hate people so fucking much. I am so damn tired of hearing you complain that the price of a sandwich ha increased by fifty fucking cents. I am so damn tired of cleaning up after your little brat after they throw their food on the floor. I am so fucking fed up with you cancelling an entire fucking order, after it wa already prepared, because the soda machine wa out of cherry Fanta. What the fuck is wrong with you? I go home and utterly dread the next day of picking up the slack of my coworkers and dealing with a shitload of entitled, spoiled assholes. Every now and then, there is an angel. Someone who is not a total asshole to me..it could be something so small to you, but it can make my entire day that much easier. Perhaps you already know what you want to order, and do not hold up a line of ten people because you are picky a fuck. Perhaps you tip me cents. Usually, it is treating me like I am a feeling, thinking human instead of the shit on your heel. I bend over backwards for these people and do my best to let them know that they are truly appreciated. I have come so far, and yet I am so close to giving up. It is wearisome forcing a smile every day and powering through a if I have a promising future, when I do not. I pretend that I do not slice my thigh with razors, that I am not covered in self harm scars, that all is well. I pretend I do not fantasize every day about diving headfirst in front of a semi truck. I pretend the love of my life and best friend is not homeless and is not living in a tent with a heroin addict. I pretend, I pretend, I pretend. I am so tired.

I am too much of a coward to even kill myself I am posting this here, not primarily to garner attention or sympathy, but because I have nowhere else to turn and I do not know what to do with myself. I also want to try and combat some of the embarrassment and shame that I feel in regard to being clinically address, so perhaps voicing what I am thinking here, it could potentially be therapeutic for me. Now that is out of the way,this might get quite long, so I will put a tldr at the end of this. Context I am a year old girl. My whole life, my sense of worth wa dictated around whether I could make the people around me happy. I had extremely strict and controlling parent and so I had no real sense of worth other than the fact that at least I did not harbour any malicious feeling towards anyone, or try and hurt anybody deliberately. I had normal teenage angst and moody, brooding periods, but absolutely not depression at all. I wa completely, for want of a better word, normal. In April , I first had feeling of depression, when I realised how badly I had hurt someone who used to be very important in my life. it is an extremely long story and I am slightly more at peace with it now so I do not feel the need to explain because it would take forever . I wa incapicitated for a week, I would cry constantly, not leave my bed, and my mum would scream at me and tell me she wouldid not have time to deal with my shit . However I had a REASON for feeling this down, so whether this wa the start of a biological depression, I am not quite sure. Fast forward to October . This is where my current situation and problem begin. I am currently studying abroad in Japan- something I have been envisioning and looking forward to for years. Honestly, I had been constantly dreaming about this for an extremely long time. It wa what I felt my life wa gearing towards, everything led to this. However, it all went downhill. My host family is incredibly lovely, I had made a couple friend on social medium before even joining the university, and there were so many intercultural exchange opportunity to join. Yet, despite this, I could feel my mood slipping gradually. I have always been a shy person and not good with strangers, but I began to feel a creeping anxiety looming up on me, that told me to not bother others, that by interacting with others I wa causing them inconvenience and discomfort, and the best thing for me to do wa to just be alone. I partly attribute it to the fact I had a really awful teacher in my first semester here. Now, I think some people might think that this might be a cultural shock issue, but I am pretty sure that she wa crossing ANY acceptable line, no matter what culture. Firstly she would be very rude to me in front of all my classmates. Say if I came in without makeup, in jean like, still showered, hair done, not sweatpants or anything, just not completely dolled up she would say in front of everyone Your face is not pretty enough to not wear any makeup. You are scaring everyone. You know girl in Japan care about their appearance. You should do too, for everyone is sake . Also my Japanese is perfectly adequate to understand interaction like that, so I know for a fact that this wa not a language barrier issue. If I got a question wrong in class she would say You know, I do not know why I bother asking planyourspontaneity for answers, she is so useless . Or if we had to make example sentence she would pick example like What doe planyourspontaneity need? Oh planyourspontaneity need to learn how to make some friend . And this became like a running joke in my class. I have never been bullied, so I never learnt to grow a thick skin, so this what felt like daily victimisation began to really grate and tear down my self esteem. I felt isolated so my social anxiety caused me to isolate myself, and people ignoring me, creating a vicious circle. I began to be completely mute in class, ignoring the teacher, be on my phone, having headphone in, and this obviously spurred her on a she would berate me for how I wa a terrible student. Also I feel like it might be relevant to say how I told this teacher that the reason why I wa so withdrawn and using my phone a lot wa because my stepfather wa undergoing cancer treatment and I wa worried this wa true . But she still kept calling me useless and nothe worst student I have ever taught to everyone. If I seemed withdrawn though she would stroke my thigh and lower back and neck I think this contact thing might be a cultural difference but still in front of everyone, which obviously made them think I wa a total freak. If I made eye contact with them, they would quickly shuffle away or look disgusted. Around November-ish time I began to suffer with very extreme bout of depression. I felt awfully ashamed- here I wa living the dream I had longed for for about a decade, and I wa here for some reason feeling absolutely dreadful. Even if I had had a fun day, I still had this lingering sadness, and I would get home and cry. I started seeing a counsellor which wa one of the best decision or rather, my long distance boyfriend decided for me I ever made. In December time it reached the point where I would barely go to class because the idea of seeing people, going to class, and even just getting out of my bed just seemed overwhelmingly difficult to me. I would cry all the time, tug my hair and cut my forearms, and would call the suicide hotline. My teacher emailed me numerous times, all very inappropriately about how her parent were dying to and how I should turn to God not that I do not think that that is a viable avenue for some people, it just seemed like weird advice from my teacher I tried going on anti depressant Escitalopram? but they made me vomit after just one pill so I stopped straight away. I travelled with my long distance boyfriend who came to Japan to see me, and felt nothing. Then I went to Nagano with my host family, and felt some kind of peace, and calmness. This calmness and general mellowness resided in me for some time, until now. Current situation My depression came back with a vengeance yesterday during the day. At lunch time I locked myself into the bathroom to cry and cry. I took a tranquilliser that had been prescribed for me during bout of extreme depression to curb the urge to self harm and it did nothing. I hate myself so much. This exchange, this is what I wanted my life to lead up to, and my fucking brain is ruining it all for me. Aside from this, I had nothing to look forward to in my life. I just want to be happy, I want for people to not hate me. I know most people hate me because of the way they act around me, they will not invite me to any class activity even if I am right there, and I will be the only one not in the class group chat, class karaoke nights, etc etc. Literally the only one. I am scared of going to intercultural lounge to interact with people because they all know each other from last semester, and I cannot even talk to people in real life in the first place. I just feel like an alien. I do not feel like I wa meant to be born in this world at all. All I want is to be suddenly transported into a different world. I do not want to be here anymore. I just want to be asleep forever. I want to be dead. But I am scared of death. I wish I wa religious so I had some motivation for either killing myself and going to heaven, or for fear of hell having motivation and stay alive. What if it hurts? What if the nothingness is unbearable? But I want to be dead. Every time I see a train go by I want to jump so badly. I know my boyfriend and family would be sad but they would get over it. He would get a better, non depressed girlfriend so he doe not have to deal with my shit anymore. My dad ha a new daughter he treat better than he ever did me. My mum would be devastated but I do not know if I can hold on just for her sake. Anyway, I know I am not such a loss to the world. If anything, the vast majority of people in the world would be happy because they would not have to interact with me. I have nothing to offer anyone and my existence is just a waste and if I am not happy why should I even be here. I wish I could gather up the courage to just do it and end it all but I am a coward and I am scared Thank you for reading, sorry for taking up your time.

I find the word crippling depression very true. But I think it is also a vicious cycle. Anyone have ever done this? It is like you stay in bed or sit around because you feel depressed. And then your foot kind of go numb and it make you feel worse. It is like a vicious cycle. We are supposed to be using our limbs. We are not statues. Anyone ever tried walking around all day keeping sitting minimum? What are the effects? I am thinking of trying it tomorrow. I will just try standing around or walking around all day in my house.

I finally came out to my close friend that I have depression, and now I am being alienated because I am not mentally stable Probably a rant, but what the fuck. This last college semester wa horrible on me, and I came out of it with depression and depression meds. I am M in college right now. I thought it wa pretty obvious, but I wanted to tell my friend about why I have been talking le and have been hermitting myself out a little. So the next time we are all together, I tell them that I have depression and that is why I am taking med and that is why I have gotten so quiet, ect. And.. Barely any response. Basically just some oh, ok.. Like really? But it get is better. So the night after I tell them, I get a message from one of my friend , whom I wa going to room with next year. The message said, and I can quote, that they do not feel safe around a mentally dark person in their house. Ok, what? Even better, the convo go on and say that my group of friend were talking.. And they do not want to, in quote again, Associate with a mentally dark person a a friend. Like what the fuck? It is been a week and they have lived up to it. Suddenly I am not getting invited anywhere or anything. If I am with my friend I still try to hang out , I will get heavily ignored. Like what the fuck, my depression ha now gotten so much worse. I want to ditch every single one of them, but I honestly do not have any other close friend outside of this group. I am trying my best to find new friends, and if that happens, I will happily leave these people who consider depression sufferer dark and unstable and unsafe . Just needed to rant Edit Also thank you for all the hug PMs they really do help - Edit Wow this blew up, in my point of view anyways. I am going to talk to them, and cut out whoever is still toxic about it. I am going to try hard to make new friends. I WILL MAKE A PART TO THIS IN MAYBE A WEEK OR TWO, JUST TO UPDATE WHAT IS HAPPENING BECAUSE A LOT OF PEOPLE SEEM TO HAVE GONE ARE GOING THROUGH THIS AND I WANT TO HELP THEM IF I CAN WITH MY CURRENT STUGGLE Edit REALLY THANK YOU FOR ALL THE HUG COMMENTS AND PMs -

I have never talked about this to anyone I have struggled with depression since I wa in nd grade. For the last year it is gotten worst, I am at the moment. When I wa I wa raped occasionally. Being raped when it first happen did not bother me a much because I didnt understand what wa happening until year later. What did bother me at the time wa that I felt alone. I have always felt alone, never felt like anyone cared for me or about me. I fought with my mom and step dad a lot which made me feel even more lonely. I never talked about feeling lonely to anyone because I wa always embarrassed about it and still do. Because me and my parent had a rocky relationship I would be abused by both at times. One time I wa arguing with my mom and she ended up getting a by and started hitting me with it. I never rasied my hand at my parents, just talked a lot of shit and wa an asshole to them. My parent kicked me out of their house when I wa . I ended up living with my grandpa. This made me feel unwanted and even more lonely now that my parent gave up on me. I lived with my grandpa for about month before he sent me back to my parent because he could not afford to keep me. I wa not an asshole to my grandpa nor wa I mean to him, I just wa a teen who stayed up late and took long showers. My grandpa giving up on me wa heartbreaking for me. I felt like no one wanted me and if I ended everything then everything would be better. I did not even last a week at my parent house, they shipped me off to live with some family who lived in the rural country area instead of the city. I lived there for maybe month and finished my freshman year of high school there. I did not feel welcomed anywhere I went and for the most part I felt more beyond alone. Majority of the time at my uncle is I wa in my room, alone and desperate for a friend. After lonely month of really being alone I wa given back to my parent again. After coming home broken I learned to keep to myself. No one wanted me and no one cared. When I got back home I wa sent to an all boy high school. Once again I had to go to a new school and try to fit in somehow. I wa lonely for a while until I met this girl. I am afraid to write her name incase she ever read this and it hurt reading writing it but I need to get this off my chest. I met this beautiful girl named Cindy at a school function. She went to the all girl school down a couple streets. Both all gender school would make event for each other to get student that social interaction. Anyways I meet this beautiful girl named Cindy, she wa nice to me and I wa nice to her. We dated for over a year and while it lasted it wa nice. The way she broke up with me literally broke me. I wa having a really sad day and told her about how I struggle with really bad depression and that I have suicidal thoughts. Her response wa oh and she slowly stopped talking to me. Eventually she stopped talking to me and when she did talk to me she made excuse about not having time to talk to me. She wa my only friend, the only person I wa close to. She could not be there for me when I needed her most, when I needed a friend most. So I stayed alone thinking maybe school wa too much for her at the moment. Then one day I get on Facebook only to see her on it, I clicked on her page and saw that she had been on hanging out with friend and having the time of her life. She slowly broke me, I could not handle it and called her to confront her about it. She made excuse and talked about how she didnt have time for me at the moment, so she hung up and left it alone. I wa reaching my breaking point, I wa going to commit suicide. I sent her a text message talking about how I needed her to talk to me and be a friend because I wa getting worst. She never responded to me however she did get in contact with my school to let them know what I wa dealing with. I wa so embarrassed that she did this to me, I felt betrayed and hurt that she made me the school problem instead of hers. It hurt ne so bad. I wa embarrassed that the school knew, I wa embarrassed that my parent knew now. I wanted to kill myself more than ever now. I wa so hurt by this and wa angry at Cindy. I went home and tried stabbing myself. My mom went in my room to talk to me, just so happened at that moment I had a kitchen knife in my hand to stab myself. My mon fought me over it and sent me to a psychiatric hospital. I stayed there until December rd. At the hospital I tried killing myself twice. First time wa when the guard resident give you cracks, I ate the cracker but stuffed the wrapper down my throat. One if the resident heard me making choking nosies and came in to save me. Second time wa when I started swallowing my food instead of chewing on it to choke me out again. They put me on these medication that did not help but I acted like they did so I can go home. I wa alone again, Cindy stopped talking to me. It broke my heart and broke me. It is been year since Cindy and I am not over it. It still kill me about what happened. I am still depressed and suicidal. I honestly wish I did kill myself when I had the courage to do so. There ha not been much for me other than pain. I have not moved on and I have not gotten over everything. This wa my deepest darkest moment in my life so far. I wish I could say thing got better for me since all of that but true is they have not. I am still the same lonely person I have always felt I have been for the longest time. I have tried dating in college and I have never had feeling for anyone. Do not have many friend and do not have any real reason to be here still. I am just waiting on that one thing to break me down to give me courage. If you read this thank you. Im sorry I made you read a lot and I am sorry that I am this way. I will get better one day but not soon.

Have you ever cried for missing your childhood so bad? Well I often do, quite sometimes frankly. I just miss those good old days, when life wa just so beautiful and easy. Nothing to worry about, nothing to cry for other than silly childish little things. My childhood wa so beautiful. It wa in France. It is been now a whole decade since I left France - the country I have always admired and will always do. I remember going to school, having so many friends, I felt like I am the happiest child on Earth. Then suddenly one day, everything changed. The passing of time took away from me my childhood, my friends, my beloved France. Life suddenly just changed like that. No more joy, no more innocence, no more real friends, no more homeland. No more beautiful sunny days, only darkness, depression, nostalgia and tears. I am trying to survive day by day through this hell on Earth. Each time those memory of my childhood flashbacks, I cannot help stopping the tear that drop from my eyes. Whenever someone mention France, I get overwhelmed. I am living the hardest time of my life. A -year war in lifetime , a I call it, still going on, and doe not seem to have an end soon. I know those good old time are just memories, obviously. Tomorrow when I wake up, thing will be just the same. But my hope will never die. My redemption will come, soon or late. This moment of my life will also be just memories, just like those good old day of my childhood in France. I did not go in detail cause I do not think many people will be interested in my story. But if you are, I would not mind sharing you the whole story, a long a you can share me yours. And how about you? Have you ever cried for missing your childhood so bad?

I want to share a personal project I am proud of A month ago I wa feeling completely unmotivated to do anything. I wa feeling that none of my connection with friend are a deep a they used to be, that I am not a close to my family a I used to be, that nothing I do at work really matters, and that my health is slowly deteriorating. I just wanted to quit at everything. Then I wa hanging out with a friend I had not seen in a while, and he admitted to me that he had been struggling with depression, so we both opened up about it. He ended up recommending the book Feeling Good to me, since it had helped him improve a lot. I read it and wa initially a bit disappointed.. some part were underwhelming, some felt annoying condescending, and the solution to every problem seemed to be the three-column technique. But after trying a few of the exercise in the book, I admit it turned out to be somewhat helpful. One of the exercise quiz in the book is the Depression Checklist, which a I am sure many of you are aware of ass your level of depression on a scale from to . At the time, I wa scoring in the Moderate range. After a couple week of applying some of the exercises, I wa down to the Mild range. So I decided to create a project that might help me learn a bit more about myself, with regard to the effect of my daily habit on my level of depression. What I wanted to build wa a simple web app that would let me score my productivity on a daily basis based on exercising, reading, socializing, meditating, etc and then plot that against my daily depression score. I wanted to see if there wa a correlation between higher productivity and lower depression, or if certain activity had a greater impact on my mood. Ironically what I discovered wa that working on the project itself wa a huge mood-booster for me, since it gave me a sense of purpose and wa a great outlet for creativity. As I have gotten further along in the work, I have noticed my depression level ha slowly started rising again. But for a while, I wa actually in the Normal range of depressive emotions! I could not believe it. Regardless, the project ha also given me more insight into a few thing that drastically help my mood. Even though my mood is not at the level it wa a couple week ago, it is nice to know that investing in personal project give me a lot of satisfaction Also if anyone is interested in trying out the app, feel free to check it out here . It is stupid simple and still a work in progress, but I am still kinda proud of it.. and if it were able to help even just one other person, that would make me pretty happy lt

Dropping by to mention you should take some Vitamin D supplements. Of course, check with your doctor. Etc. etc. Vitamin D is the sunshine pill that most people are deficient in. This is also much more of an issue in colder area or for those who cover up from the sun often. The best way to get vitamin D is through certain food combination and routine in sitting in delicate morning sunlight and in most cases, taking a supplement is necessary to keep this vitamin flowing in your body. Vitamin D is best absorbed with calcium, so if you are taking a supplement, finding foods, or sitting in the sun consider to add the calcium a well. You will find that your mood will be better or more stable with vitamin D consumption. Make sure to strive for a more regulated sleeping schedule a well and something to keep your mind stimulated without an electronic screen. I may have butchered a lot of this vitamin D thing so please take the time to read this If you need anything, message me.

Why my relationship is killing me Okay, disclaimer, former relationship.. but it still ha a huge effect on my life. This girl wa my best friend and my first serious relationship. I met her when I first got depressed, and we went to the same church together. I told her then that I did not feel ready for a relationship, but she essentially stalked me all those year ago. Christmas , after dealing with a crap load more grief and depression, I wa essentially forced into a relationship with her. I had just got over my main stint of depression the previous September, and my life wa getting better. We still hung out a friends, but she kept pushing for more. However, she is so messed up. I have to say that now. I do still love her, and that will probably never change, but she need professional help, and my mistake wa thinking I could help her. She wa my best friend after all. So, after a string of breakups, moving too slow and moving too fast, a well a her cheating on my several times, she finally called it quits one week after my birthday November just gone . I had no say, because she would throw a tantrum, but I had to take the initiative. Why? Because she no longer wanted to have my baby. In August, she fell pregnant. This could have been the week prior the Anniversary of our first kiss, but the nurse dated it on that specific date. That wa one of the night she cheated on me, with her friend is boyfriend, but it wa just a kiss . She tried to miscarry by drinking heavily for the next few week before coming to me about it she had broken up with me the day after she cheated. I asked her there and then if she wanted to keep it. She said yes. We went to speak to my mum. My mum asked her. She said yes. She wanted to announce the pregnancy, to start all the planning, and looking forward to the future. I got a well paying job to provide for our future, a job I travelled hundred of mile for each week, and it wa only for a few months. But whilst I wa away, she decided she missed all the drinking, drugs, and sex she wa missing out on. She wanted to live with her friend who she actually hate living with at time , and countless other reasons. However, she kept stringing me along until the scan, where she sent me a photo of our child before telling me she wanted to abort it. Oh, and I had planned a weekend away for u to relax and see some friends. She had me believe this wa the start of my happy ever after, before ripping it away from me. She did not speak to me for two weeks. When I finally did manage to get in touch, it wa to collect my stuff. I took a mutual friend with me, the act a a buffer, and they could not believe the stuff that she said to me. Then I get a load of hate off her because people are contacting her about her choices. Remember, she ha been posting on FB all about the baby, making sure everyone knows. She ha not spoken to me since. She ha blocked me anyway she can, even on WhatsApp only recently.. not that it matters, because she want nothing to do with me. This wa my best friend, and my stalker, who for year wanted to be with me, have a family with me, worried I would not want her because of PCOS, and got jealous over people talking to me on Twitter, and kittens! She could not even handle me showing up with chocolate and flowers! All that I have done for her, supported her, sacrificed for her.. and this is how she treat me. Now, I am pro-life, and pro-choice. Well I am getting ready to go back to school so I am trying to get sober for a while and see i can clear my head. So far I have been sober for about day and i must say I am not feeling any better. Some of the problem is probably zyrtec which I am taking for my allergy but really i just feel really irritable and confused. i cannot really think too well and it is making me want to drink. Drinking slows down my mind somewhat so i can focus on thing in my head. Normally it not till the next day after a good night of drinking that i feel good for most of the next day. i am more talkative and can come up with thing much easier. There are people who use Prozac and other anti-depressant drug not because they want it but because it make them feel even better than they normally do. This is somewhat my issue with alcohol however i do not fell good normally i feel like s t normally. i guess i should let u in on what is really bothering me. First ill just list the problem i have i find most worrying. Night blindness fuzzy vision bad sinus pressure moderate fatigue all the time short term memory problem random ache and pain major depression, anxiety, and ocd bad allergy acid reflux. To be honest most scary one is night blindness. Trying to explain is pretty difficult but ill try. It is like being able to see all the con and rod and your eye flash on and off constantly kind of like a bad channel on a TV screen. I have had it for year now with no one who can really give me straight answer about it. i went to my doctor recently and got up the nerve to tell him but thought he gave me some good info he probably thought i wa mad. Anyway one of the first thing your body will do when it is over exerted is give u fuzzy vision. Now normally night blindness is caused be a vitamin A deficiency. Maybe there is something wrong with my stomach that is making me feel the way i am and i did have kidney stone when i wa which is very rare. i know this is a lot of information but this is what i deal with on a daily basis. My daily routine is almost exactly the same except on weekend when i do go out and drink with my friends. my will is low and energy just a low so i find myself kind of in and out of this trance that is supposed to be life. Each day i go to work, come home, eat, and up to my room for pretty much the rest of the night. do not get me wrong i do other thing during the week sometimes but i feel most comfortable by myself in my room a opposed to human contact which sucks. So if i have to drink to keep from going over the deep end then i will do so until i get some real answers. If anyone ha any answer I am all ears.

I am just so fucking lonely and I am tired of pretending I am fine Fair warning I am about to just spill out everything I have bottled up into this post I am so tired of being alone I cannot bare it anymore. My depression and anxiety is slowly killing me. I am a year old male, trying to restart my adult life in college after many failed attempt at succeeding anywhere else. I work and I go to school, I see hundred of smiling and happy faces, and I feel like I am not even really there with them. Like a one way mirror where I see them but I am never seen. I have no friends. I used to be a part of rather large group of friends, but a of now I could not tell you the last time I talked to any of those people. They have either moved on and some of them are no longer on this earth. I have acquaintance with people at work, but they have their own life to live and when it is time to clock out, again I am left to go home alone and broken. The only person I have is my mother, and she tends to make matter worse when I try to open. I am also desperately single. I have not been in a relationship, let alone just dated someone, in years. And it is soul crushing. I see all these happy couple around campus, beautiful men and women, having the time of their life with each other. And I am so fucking jealous man. I want that happiness so desperately bad. I want to love someone, I want to FEEL loved! I want someone to help me through day like today, and to be there for them when they have those days. I want the cheesy shit like cuddling and laughing over stupid stuff. I want the inevitable time where we are pissed at each other about something, but we work through it and end up going crawling up next to each other in bed at the end of the night, and wake up to see each other to start the day. I am tired of waking up to this massive empty bed, cold and alone. But most of all, I am tired of pretending. Of having to pretend. To wear this mask every single fucking day of my life just to pretend to be normal. Just so my coworkers will not think I am weird. Just so my mom will not go off about how I just need to get my shit together. Just so I can hold up the chance that one day I will be able to overcome my massive wall of social anxiety and try to talk to someone, make a friend, maybe meet a girl. All in all I am tired of pretending I am happy, that I am fine. BECAUSE IM NOT FUCKING FINE! I am not happy, I am slowly dying over here and I cannot take this shit anymore. I desperately want to change. I desperately want to live a normal life, and I just keep sinking further and further down while everyone else pass me by. I guess my rant is over. Thanks for reading if you made it this far.

Long Winded Post From a Failed Year Old I do not even necessarily want to write this but I need to clear my head. I have been a depressed pissant for a long a I could remember. Some of my youngest memory are melancholic and sickly devoid of confidence or even reason. I grew up dirt poor. I remember spending a night pushing a needle through the rubber of my shoe to get the sole back on. My mom had a stroke and an aneurysm but survived. Sort of. She became a wicked, wicked creature who loved pitting me against my sibling and I never came out on top. My entire life ha been from the cowering creature perspective. Life is not experienced but something that happens to me. I joined the Army at . I had gotten recklessly married a month prior to shipping to basic. I ended up fucking up and missing a bus which led to a Lemony Snicket series of Unfortunate Events type shit. I went through partial infantry brainwashing but never made it past the build-up. So I ended my career, the only thing I have wanted to do, before it even took off. Luckily, it wa more of a this is not working so we will forget it happened type deal and my enlistment ended without anything terrible. But I never recovered. At least back then I had some sort of tenacity. Now? I am a fucking shell, mate, of what I was. A completely hollow individual. I am year old. I have no education. I have no passions. I used to enjoy writing but I cannot bring myself to write anymore. The moment I try I go back into wounded animal mode. No, this is not good enough. Nope, neither is this. Why bother? Why try? I cannot help but think these things. I am still married and that is the only reason I have not killed myself. I did try early on because of relentless hounding from my father in law. It is obvious I am not what he wanted for his daughter. I cannot figure out why I am alive at all. I can barely live my life. I am depressed constantly. No matter how happy I know I should be or how wide I smile I am in the grey of storm cloud that seemed, at least until this subreddit, to be only over my head. I have had so many job that I just explosively quit. I have got Intermittent Explosive Disorder a well a depression and anxiety. So I coil up and wind tightly before my brain dump chemical that make me explode with no regard for the damage done. I am currently unemployed. I left my last job like that. I loved my job. I loved the guy I worked for. I earned several raise within a few month and wa promoted quickly because I threw my back into that work. It ha been too long though. I cannot seem to find another job. I cannot even bring myself to apply anymore. I do not have a car. I rent a couple room off the main house of my inlaws. I failed so hard in giving my wife a life worth living. She spends her time working and though understands and doe not mind my unemployment it is killing me. On Dec.th I lost all interest in anything. I used to escape in video game but now I cannot. I load up Ark and just stare. I have anxiety about everything. Recently installed Heroes of the Storm and I played a mean Lili and Abathaur but now I have got butterfly even playing against bots. The smallest, most simple of task seems beyond me. I am stupider than I used to be. How I interpret the simplest of sentence or instruction is out of whack. I have trouble reading though I have got ton of read Omnibuses from Warhammer k on my bookshelf. I have trouble speaking. I talk slowly and can barely push out the word off my tongue. I am only recently able to make phonecalls without losing my mind anxiety wise. I am so full of regret. I hate what I became. I hate that I married someone and am dragging them through the mud. To never have a real apartment or car. I cannot hold a job. I barely take care of the house. I do dish now but it is a real struggle. I have been thinking a lot more about suicide and I am already sure I am too cowardly to really do it but I think about it a lot. How it would hurt my wife but I think it would be good for her to find someone else. I just do not see the point in continuing. I am an adult now but I never learned how to properly be an adult. I do not know what to do. There is a burning hole in my chest and I feel guilty that I am the way that I am. Even on the subreddit. I know people feel that people who have a significant other cannot be a depressed but I am swimming at the bottom of the barrel. I want this all to end. I do not know how to survive. I do not know how people manage it. I do not have that self-preservation sense that keep people going despite it all. I am weak. I am weak in way that I can barely accept. I struggle a lot with the fact veteran a day kill themselves but I am still around. I carry endless guilt that better people die and I am still alive. Goddamn it. People are dying from disease and cancer while I exist. While I cannot so much a go outside without feeling like all eye are boring hole into my psyche. I hate that all I do is sit here and lay in bed. I hate myself. I feel if I do not get this out, even if it is never seen by anyone, I will implode. I am on medication and it helped my depression but then the reality of my life struck me and I think I am worse off than I was. At least then I wa able to lose myself in video games. Now I am here with the stark reality. I am not meant for this world. I am too sensitive, too weak, too weak-willed, and too much of a bitch to handle life. I will go back to lurking now. Thanks for listening.

Hello everyone. My name is Amy. I discovered this page just by searching on the internet for depression forums. One good thing about me, I believe, is that I am very mature for my age. I am seventeen, and really hope everyone here is open-minded to age being just a number. So please, do not reply telling me I will have it better later on, or my problem are because of my age. I know there is a possibility that thing will get better, and believe me, I really do not think this ha to do with teenage hormones. I have read about many middle aged woman and men with the same problems. I understand that I am a very negative person, most likely due to depression. I am very irritable, only maybe once a week I am happy for most of the day. I also know that I have never really been happy. I have never been optimistic, and have always been sensitive, emotional, and not very confident. At the moment I do not have any friends. I have not really had any friend for a few year now. Once every few month or so I will go out, and then just want to leave within a couple of hours. It is very stressful to me. And when I do want to leave, I just tell myself I have a problem, because everyone else I know seems to get along with people just fine. I am also like this with jobs. I go in and out of jobs. One time I even faked a family emergency just to leave work..and I wa cry about it. If one thing go wrong for me, if I smile at someone and they do not smile back, if I feel insecure in any way, my first reaction is to flee. I also, for the most part of my life have always been in a relationship. My boyfriend a of right now and I have been together for over a year. Both of u cheated on each other in the beginning of our relationship, which might be the cause of our jealousy problem now mostly mine . But, before this relationship, I also had the same problem. I never felt good enough, I believe I will never feel pretty enough. I have big issue with porn, and basically every little thing you can think of. Recently I have been reading about depression and anxiety. I feel the more I understand how and that it is a part of me, the worse I feel about myself. And the more insecure I feel. I feel like I am not fun to be around since I am irritable and sad most of the time. I feel like my boyfriend will find someone who ha more of the good qualities. I feel that I will never satisfy or make my parent proud, since I keep leaving jobs. They tell me I am just lazy. I have quit every single thing in my life that I have tried since I wa young. But I really think it is because of my mental state. Going out in public is terrifying, because I do not want to feel bad, ugly, unfun, or not funny. I fear social situations, because I am horrible at making conversation. I have been considering therapy and depression anxiety pills, but my mom tell me people who take them basically just do not feel anything at all. And I am also afraid to see a doctor and share my feelings. I feel like I have no one to talk to. My dad and I have never had a good relationship, we maybe say two word to each other a day. We have had kind of a bad past, and maybe that is the reason for our lack of communication. My boyfriend doe not really know how to talk about important or emotional things, unless they have to do with him. I feel like every time I cry I push him farther away from me, and feel I have to hide everything because me being depressed is a turn off to him. I do not know. I guess we all have to vent somewhere, and to know that there is a place where people feel the same is a great thing to me. I wish there wa an easy way to feel good about myself, and just be happy for once. But I suppose these thing take time and a lot of effort. I am sure I left some thing out, but this is all I want to throw at you all for now. Thank you for listening.

Here is a new update for interested readers. Bad news first I got a voicemail last week, it said my mother wa in the hospital. It took me awhile to get more info, I called and left a message where she lived because it wa too late to get anyone on the phone there. I finally found out where she wa and called the hospital. They said she wa having problem walking, that maybe she hurt her back. That she wa getting breathing treatment because she had trouble breathing. Part of it wa she could not smoke, part of it wa probably because she doe smoke. They did not seem to find out what caused the problem with her legs. Then she had some other stuff wrong. Part of the good news wa one thing they thought wa wrong wa caused by a shot they gave her, and it wa solved the next day. Now, I called her Friday and she said her heart test showed a tear in a valve. She is getting a more detailed test next week, the doctor said it is too early to tell how serious it is or if it need anything done to it. He told her, it could be just something minor that need to be monitored and could cause no problem at all or it could require heart surgery. So I wa very worried about that. My first thought when I heard she wa in the hospital wa that she would end up having cancer from smoking, or liver disease from drinking. But I did not think of any heart problems. I am hoping that it will not be anything serious, or that if she need surgery that it will be successful and she will recover without any complications. I do not know much about heart surgery, I know I have heart that many bypass patient have good surgery but get sick and die from complication after the surgery. I hope and pray that she will be ok, I live far from her and cannot do anything but call her and pray. Now some good news, my new job is going to switch me to fulltime hour next week. I still have to find out if it will be temporary or long-term, but I am happy either way. I went from poor and going to be homeless, to having a place to live and a low-stress job in a short time. Each day I wake up and am alive and have a place to live mean a lot to me now. It kind of give me a better perspective on life in a way. I know so many people have it worse, so much suffering in the world and I am lucky. My formative year were spent in small towns. Until the third grade, I lived in Indiana. From the third grade through my junior year in high school, I lived in a small lakeside community in southwestern Michigan. You could walk or ride your bike to anywhere - down to the lake, out on country roads, wherever. My father wa a Lutheran school teacher, principal and church organist. From time to time, he would take a call to serve in another Lutheran school in a different town. In the summer of , right after my junior year in high school, he decided to take a call to a school in the north side of the city of St. Louis. It wa quite a culture shock for a sheltered young woman who had only lived in small, insular town all her life, to move to a city the size of St. Louis. Quite honestly, when we arrived here I absolutely hated it. I felt a if I would been thrown to the dark side of the moon. I had to start my senior year in a new high school in a completely foreign environment. Everyone else already had their group or circle of friend going back at least three years. Now you had to have a lot more gut and fortitude and self-esteem than I had at the time to break into already established group and make new friends. This wa the year that would set the stage for the first major depressive episode in my life. This wa the year of my first therapist, the first of many to come. The start of a lifetime of self-discovery.

A little background I am just coming off a very successful year period where I started a complicated new business and got married again. However, during these last few month I have been unable to work at my previous pace, putting my business in real jeopardy. In fact, there are only a couple of day per week where I seem to be able to work, and typically only a few hour at a time during those days. When I do work I get exhausted quickly. Today, I had a major conference call that required some preparation. I wa very up during the call, but then collapsed afterward in complete exhaustion. Seems to be the story for me recently, I can psych myself up for short burst of performance, then I quickly decline again in an inability to concentrate on anything other than light web surfing. I continue to get up early and exercise daily. I live a healthy lifestyle, eat well, and walk mile every morning. I sleep regular hours, however, will sleep a few hour during the day during my wouldown days. Looking back at my past, I am now clearly seeing time in my life where my performance level went down drastically, or where I had problem with relationships. At the time, I did not realize anything wa going on, or I simply did not understand it. I can now go recall having real problem with my grade during my freshman year of high school. At the time, I recall saying to myself that I could not understand why I wa performing so badly. It wa a it something wa holding me back and I could not overcome it. At the time, I just kept studying and working harder, but I wa unsuccessful. Eventually, I got through it and my grade went back to normal. But all of these year I never really understood what happened in that freshman year, until now. In summary, there have been many other time in my life where thing have fallen apart and I have not understood why. My past is littered by successful business that I have created and then have eventually failed, usually by my inability to maintain my performance level. There ha obviously been a pattern that I do not yet understand, but at least now I am beginning to see why there wa a downturn. Thankfully, I have now met the woman of every man is dreams. While she know I am depressed I have not yet let her know the depth of my despair or of my recent understanding of my past behavior. The good news here is that I have great family support, but I am wrestling with how much to tell my wife about what is going on inside my head. She get stressed easily and will worry deeply about me. I am not sure I want to lay that all out on her. Anyone else find themselves in this dilemma? Well, thank you for giving me the opportunity to share and to join this forum.

I can absolutely relate to what you are going through. I understand how difficult it is adjusting to so many different personalities. Ten people in one apartment is overwhelming, to say the least. I used to live with four other girl who had diverse interests, and unfortunately we all kept to ourselves because of the different personalities. It wa best that way. In your case, it seems like you are making a much effort a you can to be social. There is no need to go out on a limb to prove that you are not anti-social. When I had depression I really needed my space and the last thing I wanted to do wa socialize with my roommates. Luckily, I am in my own apartment and have been living alone for three year now. It ha helped enormously. I wonder if you can request a transfer to a bachelor suite where you can live by yourself. I did that in my rd year and the apartment manager put me on a waiting list, and I wa able to get my own living space by November. Even though the moving wa a hassle, I never regretted it. As for finding way to spend time away from the noise of other people, I usually take the bus to visit a bookstore that is far away from campus. I go there every weekend to relax and read. It is away from campus life and it ha helped me sort out my thoughts. The suggestion made by others such a the library, and a park are wonderful too. Maybe you can purchase a bus pass? I have depression and social anxiety, so it wa difficult dealing with the university atmosphere on my own. I made only a couple of friend who have since moved on or graduated. I too saw a school counselor, but it wa short-lived. What helped me, other than getting away from campus, wa getting some online support from forum such a this one. I also kind of clung to one friend at a time, instead of many group of people. I would go to the movie theatre and watch something funny, or I would take long walks. You are not alone. Hang in there and keep posting if you feel really down. I think this forum is very supportive and people will try to help you the best way they can.

I have lost Marines to depression and almsost lost a th. None saw combat. I need help understanding. Hi. I just had my th funeral in year for yet another Marine. A few day ago another one called me with a gun to his head and i talked him down. These Marines, a far a i can tell suffer suffered from depression. Pretty much every one of them wa intelligent like way too smart for the Marine Corps and each of them stood out a the funny one . To say very few people understood they were struggling would be an understatement. The Marine Corps ha done a lot to try and help suicidal Marines, but all our training video depict some clearly distressed person telegraphing an intent to harm themselves. In reality none of these people let on the depth of their suffering and only one made an attempt to seek help. What I am asking As someone who ha never suffered depression Ive been depressed but that wa from external factor like a job not working out or a girl leaving me. I consider that normal human emotion , how do I identify Marines under my care thst may be suffering and need help. They are NOT giving the outward sign in the stupid Lance Corporal Decker video we watch once a year. Thanks. Edit been at work all day then went to visit a former Marine that dealt with some serious issue in his day but is doing well now. Mulled over a lot of this with him, then checked back in here and saw all these wonderful responses. I have read every one, some several times. I have a lot to consider and learn, but thank you for helping me find some direction. One thing i did not mention is my role in all this. Im not sone big wig commander with tool at my disposal. Im a newly promoted Sergeant and a squad leader with just a handful of guy under me. The one we just burried wa not in my platoon, but i knew him enough to be deeply saddened by his loss. The other three were guy i wa close to back in training, but i wa not currently stationed with them when it happened. In fact i found out about all three of them on Facebook. This recent one, and the one that called me with suicidal thoughts, have made me want to be much more aware of the mental health of those around me. The scary thing to me is, even with hindsight, i would not have picked these five guy out of the lot a having ANY kind of issues, let alone suicidal tendencies. I have also noticed, maybe because of my nature or leadership style, that im the one people tend come to with problems. I make it known that im here for that purpose, and people take me up on it. So I guess now i want to make sure i can spot when someone need more help than they may be openly asking for. I will be more vigilant in my assessment of the need of those under my watch. Thank you all for the detailed and informed replies.

I had told her the day before that I did not want anymore drama, if i went over with my family I did not want to hear about my dad and sister. I just wanted to have a good time. She then texted me and a lot of other family that she loved me. that it wa not my fault, she bought the gun.. I took her to get that gun for protection so I always told her if she did that I would feel to blame She would say SON I bought it! Dont feel to blame I hated that! Still I never belived she would do it.. I wa so bitter about her not wanting to be possitive I hadent called her. I ignored her suicide text and just decided to let her cool off.. th, st-th we hadnt spoken.. I had a bad feeling but didnt know why.. she hadnt called.. so i figured she wa angry with me.. I get a call from my aunt on my dad side who she wa very close with.. Is it true? The rumor about your mom? I wa picking up my kid from school.. I said huh? what she say about me this time hahaha? Call your sister she said.. I called and she told me to go home right away.. Then she said when getting home Mom.. mom.. cry .. Moms dead.. she killed herself I said dont say that about time breaking down more and more each time I repeated it.. I fell apart cry for who know how long.. day one wa hard, day two wa harder, day wa numb and empty and I could not cry or sleep, day I then hit a new horrible moment.. I found out she had been in her apartment dead since the th.. the complex lied and said no one heard anything and thats another story.. they are being sued soon.. her body wa in there so long that we will not have an open casket this week in her funeral.. Then i went into her apartment to start gathering her things.. i smelled the death and decay.. I have never felt so sick and horrified in my life. I will never forget it.. i went to where she did it and saw the carpet cut out and her bed gone.. her place wa left just like I last saw it.. it killed me.. I am now on day and her ceremony is tomorrow in her home town.. Idk what to think or feel anymore.. my wife is trying to support me cause her mom died when she wa but i am changing.. She can see it, I dont want to run my company, I dont sleep, I have this numb feeling.. I cry out of no where.. I can not stop picturing her lifeless body, I cant stop thinking wa she in pain? picturing her bleed out her exit wound for over a week.. I cry and can not stop.. I feel like dying.. I feel so empty and full of rage.. I wounder why she left me here.. I wish I could of took it back, I feel it my fault I should have went over or called..
