I am still in love with her, but we can no longer be together. I am scared of the world now. Constantly battling anxious thought and worries. I spend my day now trying to stay above water, to not drown in the depression. But no matter how well I swim that day, the pull is still my depressive state. Everyday it is like I am staring into a black abyss that probably go down infinitely. It is hypnotic and my main goal for the day is to pretend that this gaping exist actually doe not exist within me. So that is just what is been on my mind lately. My new normal.

I feel like I am barely supporting myself, and honestly I have not talked to my brother since the youngest one birthday April th . Because I feel like I failed them. Everything ha changed.. About four year ago I wa the typical loner. I wa in the middle school. Nobody took me seriously, because my hobby were not shared by anyone else. I am from a small town, so it wa difficult for me to find someone who actually liked the thing I did. At the time I liked thing like anime, video game and MLP. I am a year old lass now and I only like video game now. In the final grade of my middle school I met a girl. She wa about two year younger but liked the same thing I did. I wa so happy to finally meet someone like me. We have bonded a lot and she wa the first person I truly loved, except for my family, of course. About two year ago we started to get distant. She kept talking to me about thing I wa uncomfortable with, but whenever I tried to talk about something that bothered me, she told me she wa busy and did not hear me out. It escalated in June of . I started talking to her friends, because they seemed like such wonderful people to me. Then we met up, all of us. She kept cry and making scenes. Few week before that, she accused me of liking HER friend more than I liked her. But when we all met, it seemed alright, save for her cry etc.. When I got home the next day, she told me off. Really badly. She told me to go to hell, called me all sort of name and I feared.. I feared I would never be able to find someone like her again. I tried to end it. Swallowed sleeping pill and drank alcohol. I woke up the next day in a hospital. I woke up to a text from her. One that said she wish my mother wa torn apart by the girl is dogs.. It is been two years. I have gotten better, met friend that helped me out a lot and I will probably never be able to repay it. But this past of mine, it still haunt me. I do not think I will ever be able to trust someone like this again. I have gotten so cynical and careless about everything.. It still hurts.

Having a really bad stretch of days.. Hi all, I know this sub move kinda fast but I just wanted to vent, hopefully some of you read this.. So my story is that I have had depression and social anxiety for about year or so at least that is when I recall starting to feel off .. I am now .. Because of my poor decision to bottle thing up and accept that I am unhappy I put off seeking help until about a month or two ago in which I started going to therapy. It had taken a rather bad mental fallout that occurred in early December for me to finally reach out for help. In my session we have been working on technique to combat both my SA and depression, these include going to place alone such a coffee shops, yoga classes, shopping malls, etc. Keep in mind I have functioning social anxiety where I can physically be around people but I am extremely uncomfortable the entire time and have a very difficult time interacting with people .. The thought process being that my depression stem from loneliness and my SA contributes to that.. It is been a big step for me to try and go out on my own, but I have been doing it almost every day even though it doe not seem to be creating any improvement. Unfortunately the last few day have been incredibly difficult, I am getting a very sick feeling of hopelessness and worry that my life is now just constantly shuffling around desperately trying to find something in the world that will fix me. I tried to sit at home last night to give myself a break and I could not even do that, I started becoming consumed by those bad thought and began having a panic attack.. So I decided to just go drive aimlessly even though we were in the middle of a snow storm.. I feel miserable again today and I am just running out of steam to keep going, I really do not know what to do anymore.. I am exhausted from constantly forcing myself into uncomfortable public situation but at the same time my home feel like a prison.. I have nobody to talk to or gain support from anymore, the couple of friend that I have all have their own life with wife and kid and my family ha been out of my life for year and for good reason.. I know nobody ha answer a to what I should do but I just needed to rant

My First Real Episode Hey guys.. I just really need to word soup to get thing out that have been on my mind that I have not shared with anyone close to me, I feel a if this is the only way to fight this feeling of sadness. So to start everything off, I never thought that I would be typing these word a I am now. Not to say that I am ashamed of it, but just because I never felt I had anyone to share with. I never have felt like I wa able to confide in my close friend or family because I do not want them to carry the burden of my troubles, and I used to feel like it would just be a form of attention seeking to try and explain to others how I feel sometimes. With that being said, I feel a if I truly hit my lowest of low about an hour ago and the sad thing is that I cannot really describe the feeling.. because all it felt like wa just a severe sense of nothingness. I felt a if I wa experiencing an out of body sensation, and my mind could not calculate any sense of emotion besides this feeling of dread that wa accompanied by a warmth-like feeling starting from the back of my brain and slowly taking over my head. It is been happening a lot lately during the night.. especially since I have been moderately sick lately and it feel like my body is giving up on me no matter what I try.. eating healthy and exercising only take away the feeling of loneliness and sickness a little bit. What really help is interaction with others, whether it be watching live program or being on xbox talking to people or being in chat room because it give me a small sense of community and belonging that I lose when my mind is left alone to itself. I know it sound stupid, but lately I have just been envisioning my feeling a the mind flayer monster from Stranger Things because it help me make a little more sense of everything to a degree when I envision the feeling a something physical.. I just wish it wa a bit easier to find the focal point issue that make me this way to improve not only my life but also the life of others around me.

Depression and grief I am a yr old M, who ha been diagnosed with treatment resistant MDD from the age of . Recently, I wa attempting to get into a ketamine study in a NYC hospital and wa asked a number of question about my background. One item which came up that I have not thought about in a while wa the specific of my uncle suicide when I wa around . My uncle wa a yr old gay M, developed HIV and killed himself. Though this is not what I wa initially told. It took around year with every year or so getting a new piece of information. Initially I wa told he had cancer and died. Then I wa told he had cancer and my grandparent pulled the plug . Then I wa told he wa gay, had cancer, and my grandparent pulled the plug . Then I wa told he wa gay, had HIV, and my grandparent pulled the plug . Then, finally, I wa told he wa gay, had HIV and killed himself. I think I secretly had an understanding of how he had killed himself even when I wa a kid and wa not told due to subtle hint that kid will typically pick up on. Even if I did not, I always had the feeling that something wa wrong and that my parent were not truthful. After discussing his death for two hour for the study, I realized that the depression I have been feeling for over year is so similar to the feeling I get when I think of my uncle. Intense grief. I delved into the feeling more and have not been able to stop cry for the past few day about my uncle. Does this make sense from a psychological stand point to be greiving for this long? I know there is no time limit on emotion but doe it make sense for my depression to be a a result of shoving down his death and holding onto it for all this time? I would love to hear some thought and opinions. I dont know exactly what I am looking for by posting this but I have really been struggling with the emotion I have been having and would appreciate some guidance and if not, some affirmation.

I made it so much worse Hey guys, have not been on reddit long, or this subreddit either. Never intended to post something, but recent event have changed that. So, I will start with some background, I am a year old high school student. My best friend is too, Who will be referred to a Golf from now on We did not even know each other before the school year started, but we had a couple mutual friend and we just.. connected. It is one of those friendship where it doe not really make sense, to anyone, let alone either of us, it is like we are family. It is the only way I can describe it. Anyway, we are dipshit high schoolers, so we joke about depression and suicide in our friend group. The group know Golf ha depression, they have no clue about mine though. Anyway, when I started hanging out with him I did what I have been doing for a year and a half. Joking about my depression and making joke about offing myself. I did not know Golf had it until a couple month ago, but soon after we started hanging out he started joking about it too. Well he got reported to the counseling center, a couple of time in fact. But they are honestly useless, so it did not help. It came to a head last night when the group basically kidnapped him and forced him to go to a hospital. They did not tell me for whatever reason. I still have not figured out why. But eventually I got there. The night is a blur from there, I did not eat anything since breakfast, and that wa noodles. As I am just now typing this I realize that I am at around hour without food now. But that is not important. I did my best to be there for Golf. He went home safe with his parent and is going to go to therapy counseling. It wa an awful day yesterday, a couple of event made Golf is depression way worse for him. I am glad we got him to the hospital before he hurt himself. But it is my fault, I know it is. I do not need you guy telling me how it is not either. You wont change my mind. It is my fault, I taught him that suicide and depression could be treated a a joke. I made it worse. I hate myself for it. I do not know what to do. Hell, I do not know why I made this post at all. I do not know if I want advice, or vent, or see if there is someone else out there who ha gone through something like this. Right now he is on a trip with his mom and dad golfing. Golf the activity is one of the few thing he enjoys. All I want to do is lay in my bed and not exist in the outside world for the rest of spring break. I do not want to take any attention away from Golf. He deserves it more than I do. I just do not know what to do anymore. I am sorry for the rambling and any punctuation grammar error .

Women ignore me, even here, they think I am unworthy or too ugly to be helped. I even have the stats to prove it. Why am I so undeserving of love? Everyone else wa a male who either tried to give some advice or made fun of me. Here is proof So if woman viewed my profile, only one person tried to say something. Let is not also forget the people that made fun of me too. I mean, what do you want me to do to get your replies, ladies? Do you want me to give you gold? Will that incentivize you to reply? I am not qualified to be a human apparently. I bet most people my age have had - SOs, and I have had a big fat . When I lie in bed, I look forward to living in the dream world inside of my head. There, I am the person I have always wanted to be. I am loved, safe, and happy. But when morning come and I wake up, reality sink in like a brick. My youth is gone and I am still a failure, and I wish I never woke up. I have tried so hard through most of my life to feel accomplished, to live a life I can be proud of. To love and be loved. But every day is another act of failure and rejection. The day get heavier and heavier. I have run out of strength. I want to stay in my bed. I want to stay in my dream world. I really, really do not want to wake up.

Reddit Secret Santa Saved My Life.. I want to begin this by saying that I have been in a really dark place recently. Combination of family issues, breakup, and final put me in a really depressive state. As a result, I would been having strong suicidal thought for weeks. I had been seriously thinking about ending my own life. So that is the context in which this occurs. About a month ago I signed up for secret santa on a whim. I had never done it before and honestly did not expect anything. But yesterday, my gift arrived. I do not know who this person is, but they spent at least dollar on about separate gifts. They also included a really thoughtful and touching letter that talked about how they thought I wa such a great person and how much they enjoyed learning about me. I immediately broke down cry upon reading it. It might seem small or sorta stupid, but it made me feel like someone cared about me. That I wa not the idiotic nobody my depression tell me I am all of the time. I felt motivated and happy for the first time in weeks. I cleaned my room and did work that I would been ignoring for months. I finally felt like maybe, just maybe, I meant something. It changed my life, and probably saved it. So whoever you are, thank you so much, and I cannot express how much this meant to me or thank you enough. And let this be a lesson to everyone else. The smallest act can and doe make a difference. Let is all try and use the Christmas season to ensure everyone feel a little more loved.

Desperately want to WANT TO get better Attempted suicide May st, wasted a week of my life in voluntary inpatient, wa put on the one drug that ha ever helped me olanzapine, an antipsychotic which I then promptly had an allergic reaction to, got off of, and crashed again. Was able to drag myself through some intensive outpatient group therapy for a while and then quit that too. The only good thing I have left in my life is my fianc . I know it is not healthy to live for another person but I am not exactly in a position to nitpick. At this point all I can do for them is try to be a reliable a possible while also isolating myself more often than not so that they do not have to deal with a constantly suicidal person more frequently than they can handle. But I want more? I want to be able to grow with them and be an active part of a life they enjoy? I want to repay them for all the thing they do in vain to try to make me happy? But all of my option in recovery range from extremely corny literally all talk therapy, individual and group, dbt to cbt to emdr to actually detrimental to my health reaction to and side effect from medication . What the fuck do I do so I do not lose the last good thing I have?

I wa one of the early pioneer and had literally a couple hundred thousand dollar worth not too long ago. I will admit this one wa getting to me quite a bit. Especially since I could have prevented it. But you know what really incited and is still by far the biggest part of my depression? A girl. A stupid, uninteresting, normal as girl. But I love her. I love being around her. And she probably doe not even give a shit about me because she ha a boyfriend. We hung out at a park and had a great time, we always do when we talk.. But she is never the one to start a conversation and never offer to hang out. Okay, boyfriend, but at least let me be your friend. Just planning a meetup is such a pain the ass. I wish you would just tell me to fuck off, but you keep saying yes. All while you straight up do not give a shit about me. Hope is the worst part. I am still clinging to my failing studies, new random as coin and this fucking girl. I cannot even concentrate on the other two because I think of her all the time. I am desperately trying to stay relevant to her in hope I can catch her when she is available again and I feel like such a fucking creepy loser. All for that small chance.

It feel like the past year and a half or so ha been nothing but pills. I have been depressed since I wa around or , and now I know I will probably be depressed for the rest of my life. I am about to start tm therapy. Has anyone here tried it? I do not want to get too optimistic after the utter failure that wa the pills, but I would really like some encouragement so that I do not feel like I am throwing my money away. It is covered by my insurance, but the co-pays do add up for the whole procedure.

I think I ruined another friendship TLR Made a wonderful friend, had a depressive episode, and ruined the friendship by trying to force my problem on her. Just like I have done a million time before. I have had depression my whole life and I have always gone through episodes. Sometimes they are mild, and I am just generally down for a few days, sometimes they debilitating and I can barely get out of bed for weeks. I have also never had a lot of friends. I do not have casual relationships. I either do not really think of you a friend, or I love you with every part of my heart. There is no middle ground. I have been building a friendship with a great girl from work call her Amy for a few months. It doe not seem like anything romantic is gonna come from it, but it wa nice to have a friend I could do stuff with. We went hiking, rock climbing, we even went on a scuba trip to the Caribbean together. I would opened up to her about my depression and she seemed really understanding. She actually seemed to appreciate how open and communicative I wa about it. The day before the Super Bowl, I felt an episode coming on. It wa not severe, but it made me fragile. I am a big Patriots fan, so when the Pats lost, it set me up for a bad episode. If I would just been sad about the Patriots Monday and let myself heal like I usually do when my team lose, everything would have been fine, but instead I started to blow my friendship. I texted Amy Tuesday that I wa feeling down and I would like to see her. I made a big deal about how I wa not cry about the Pats, but I wa having an episode. It seemed important to me to point that out for some reason. She said someone wa visiting from our India office and had a ton of work for her, but she would try to come over after. She worked until that night and never made it. Wednesday I left work at am because I wa too down to stay. I wa texting her the same stuff throughout the day, how I wa sad and I wanted to see her. She worked until again and did not come, but this time she had never promised to. I texted her this big apology about how I have been a shitty friend and I am sorry for forcing my problem on her. At work Thursday she told me to stop apologizing for everything. I told her I would try to stop. Friday just felt different. She wa le talkative with me than usual. She brought me cooky she made, and I thought that might be a sign that thing were getting better, but after work I asked her if she had plan that weekend, and her answer wa simply yes . I said have fun and left. Normally she would have at least told me she a general idea of what she wa doing. I talked to my roommate best friend Samantha about it Friday night. We agreed I needed to just leave Amy alone for the weekend, so I texted her and said if she found any free time I would love to see her and then I did not contact her again until yesterday at work. Yesterday some thing happened that really made me feel like thing were ending. First, we had talked about planning a trip President is day weekend, but she had a surgery and she did not want to plan anything until it wa done that is a whole other thing that is bothering me . When I asked her yesterday, she said she thought President is day wa in March and she promised to see her brother this weekend, so we will see . She also told me she like working late and going to the gym at like . Apparently she is been working hour day for the past week. The gym part hurt because one of my favorite thing to do with her wa work out, and now I have lost my gym buddy. I have had a lot of friendship go this way in the past. Speaking a little immodestly here, but when I am not depressed, I am funny, energetic, and interesting, and generally a fun person to be around. I have had lot of people enter my life, meet that me, like him, then after a few month meet the depressed side of me and just nope the fuck out. Amy first met the depressed me a few month ago and she did not run away. I thought she could be a big part of my support network moving forward. But I am worried that I just tried to put too much on her. Like I have done a million time before. The worst part is she sits right next to me at work. She is leaving next month to hike the Appalachian Trail, but until then, if I really did blow this, then I have to sit next to her every day for a month. I do not know if I can handle that. Anyway, thanks for listening to me whine about my problems.

Here is my story, however dull and blunt it may be .. High school wa great. Lots of fun You know- Parties, beer, dates, sport and the works. I wa never what one would call popular, however, I wa respected by nearly everyone I went to school with. This, I feel wa an asset of mine and helped me with self confidence a well a developing a a individual. I am now in June and have no job, no money, do not go to school and have LITERALLY no friends, aside from my parent whom I still live with a leach off of what a joke . I am virtually reclusive in my home with the occasional outing to buy cigarette and to visit my Grandmother who is well near her deathbed. I suppose my past bout with drug may be a co - culprit influencing me to work in close to complete isolation. Maybe there is a cure for me but, chance are it is not natural remedy. My addictive personality and past drug experience ha veered me away from trying the latest depression medication or any for that matter. This condition of mine, whatever the fuck it is, started developing slowly. I would avoid large social gathering at first, then I would pretty much steer clear of meeting with friend even the closest of friend , and finally I would not even take phone calls. At this point it is all of the above. When I do confront a person, which by all mean I try to avoid, I cannot for the life of me keep eye contact like I used to and I seem like a complete, uninterested asshole who is simply in a rush and ha no time for chat. For instance, a two old friend of mine from high school stopped by at my house today to catch up on things. When asked what I wa up to I looked at the ground and replied, Well .. I am pathetic excuse of a lie go here .. Nobody buy my shit. If I do not believe myself how can anyone else.? So, here I am today. The table ha turned. I am now the chump. The one without any respect OR self respect and the guy who respect anyone who is not a lowly a myself. And I hate myself for it. It is not a if I had a rough upbringing. My parent are and were loving, I have had so many friends, all the opportunity in the world. And I waste it all and continue to do so every stinking day of my life. I am not looking for sympathy. It actually matter little if nobody read this at all. I just needed to put my thought somewhere I could come back to re - read and contemplate them

I had to come home and look my brother in the eye, and apologize for being so fucked up I tried to not only punch my dad, but a police officer who wa forced to restrain me. By the way I do not remember any of this, all of this my parent told me. You know how much that hurts? Not remembering a night at all, and it turn out you ran at your dad screaming, fuck you I am gonna kill you I hate myself. I am so full of regret and guilt and self hatred all the time. I hurt my family so much, and I continue to. I have had multiple emotional breakdown since, when pretending to be okay just becomes too much. I have made my parent so concerned for me. I am trying to get communication back with my best friend. I have an idea, it will not be easy and it may never work, but it is worth a shot? Long story short I have been depressed and I have a friend. I could make a paragraph story about my friend and my depression. But I want to get to the point. I do not want to make this post too long otherwise no one will read it. My friend made the decision to stop communication with me until I go to a residential psychiatric program or somewhere similar. The thing is I have been in one already, it wa a pretty flexible place, cell phone were allowed, door were never locked, etc. Long story short I became too high risk and am not allowed back. And I do not want to go back. I do not believe in happiness by mental health, I believe in natural happiness. I believe that all human deserve to feel happy without being told your life suck so you need pill and mental health treatment to be happy. So anyways, I cannot fulfill his wish. But getting communication back with him is all I want. There are no exceptions. So here is my idea. Just for fun I livestream game on YouTube. I do it for fun, not for fame, I do not play those popular games, I play the one that no one plays. It is unlikely for a video to get more than views. But I have considered starting a new channel. I will livestream games, post video about my custom Guitar Hero song I do that for fun too and just pretty much show that I am having fun. But the big goal of the channel will be to get my friend back . That will be the whole idea. That will be written on every video. That is what the channel art will say. Think of it a a gofundme, only I am not asking for money, I am asking for support from the public to hear my story, hear what I am doing, and to be there with me when my friend doe deliver. Here is the catch. For obvious reasons, his name will never be revealed. No one will have any idea who my friend is. But little by little, I will try to reveal the channel to him. It will start with the channel being named Ian , then sooner or later add my last name. As time go on I will try and find way to give him clue about the channel without actually telling him anything. The big dream is that he eventually discovers the channel, and with whatever support there is, he will see how much I have mentally improved over however long it takes. This all may sound totally silly, totally bogus, yeah, maybe this will never work in a million years. Just a wild thought that I am going to attempt anyways. I might edit this post with a link to the channel depending on the response here.

A letter to a person I let down To The Person I Miss The Most, Happy birthday man, I miss you and I am sorry. It feel like so much time ha gone by that any attempt at reconciliation would do more harm than anything else at this point. We used to have so much fun, but nostalgia only make everyone feel worse, and more often than not lead to poor choices. It is a sweet substance, like sugar, just with a punch in the gut to remind you that you cannot ever go back to something you once valued so highly. It is been a year and a couple month since we have talked, and there is rarely a day where you do not cross my mind. I am not saying that is healthy, because it sure a hell is not, but who care anyways. I wa not good for you, you were too good for me, we crashed and burned and I loved every second of it. Was it worth it? Maybe. Does that matter? Not in the slightest. Now I just sit alone in the dark writing you letter that I know you will never fuckin read, pretending in my head that there is some fucking way that i can salvage the situation. It is like watching someone stand at the bottom of the pool drowning, when all they have to do is swim to the surface. I am cold, and tired, wasting time and throwing away opportunity left and right because i have no idea what I am doing, and I know that you are doing well, that make me happy. You deserve to succeed. You have been to hell and back, and I might a well have been the chauffeur for a good portion of it. I loved you, I do not think I do anymore, but I know I did. I thought about comparing how I felt about you with a bunch of shitty metaphor but let is be honest, that is not our style. We would probably laugh at how cheesy it wa and how stupid this whole situation is and then we would pull out our guitar and write a beautiful sad duet and I would be out of tune while you hit every note perfectly. But you would not critique me, that is just the way you are. Too kind, and sweet, too good to everyone you came across even though you knew there wa a pretty good chance that they would never return the favor. And man I really tried to, all those time we walked around talking about how much we wanted to die and how sad we were, but the whole thing wa build on the back of our own loneliness and sadness. But that is the past. Nostalgia is bullshit, but I have to indulge once in awhile just to feel something, I am sure you remember that. Here is to better time ahead, and a letter left unread. Sincerely, Your Old Best Friend

I did not expect there are people here so quick to judge and assume I made a post about how hard it is to date and find someone if you have depression. I mentioned how people with depression who have a significant other most likely have an easier time that those who do not. What I did not imply wa that I wanted that just for the sake of curing my depression. And that is what another member tried to pin on me. He or she quickly went into offensive and started preaching about how selfish it is to want to be in a relationship if you are depressed, how I should go seek therapy and that I should realize that relationship are not a magic cure. I do not want to be in a relationship for it to fix my depression, I am going to therapy, taking antidepressant for year now and I am fully aware being with someone is not a cure I wa with someone while depressed for year . I wanted to reply to this person to explain they misunderstood me, but I wa too upset, so I deleted the post. Perhaps my wording wa not good enough, but still, such a judgemental approach to answering someone is post on a depression subreddit is in my opinion very saddening. Just wanted to share this now, take it a you will.

I am screaming inside. I want to cry. My eye are burning, ready to cry. At least it is something.. A feeling. It ha taken me so much time to work up the courage to call a psychiatrist. I told myself no matter how I am feeling I am going to call. I researched and found who is supposed to be the best. I called and wa referred to a local chapter not taking new patients. They referred me to a place where the psychiatrist is not taking new patient but the psychologist are. They asked me what kind of treatment I needed!! Do you need a therapist or do you need a psychiatrist All of this wa after I worked so hard explaining my life long depression with and without circumstantial reasons. I AM NOT THE DOCTOR. HOW DO I KNOW WHAT I NEED!! BOTH!! I set the appt, but I think I need access to both a therapist and a psychiatrist. I canceled, and I feel so horrible. Do not they know how hard it wa for me to call? I am upset right now. I want to give up, but I know I will have to call someone else. Why doe it have to be so hard?

Intense feeling of not wanting to exist wanting to escape and be alone somewhere forever I am a first year in university and have suffered from depression since middle school. I have been able to manage my depression by having really supportive friend and through that, felt like I had a purpose in life. However now entering university, I feel like I have no purpose, no reason to exist and it is a lot harder managing my depression. I fill up my time with work and sport and stuff a a way to distract myself, but I just feel like I am going through the motion of life and everything just feel hallow. I think dying is such a pleasant and peaceful idea and am totally okay with it. I feel like I do not have any actual friend even though I go out a lot, and I feel like I have no impact on other people is lives, like they can go on so easily without me being there. On top of that, I feel like I do not belong anywhere since leaving highschool. I feel like I do not have a place in college, even though I got into my first choice school. However, I am too afraid to drop out because that lifestyle seems even more daunting. I really want to go someplace where I can live out my life in seclusion and just get away from anything. This is mostly just a flood of thought that are always in my head, but I just wanted to give my two cent to see if anyone relates to these thought feeling

Got rejected again today. I have had this massive crush on this girl for a while now and we been getting along really well. I wa suprised to find out we had quite a bit in common and I felt so giddy every time I talked to her. I decided today I would suprise her with an early Valentine is Day gift and maybe she would like it. Nothing huge, I got her favorite snack and a brief note telling her how I felt. I do not know what I wa expecting but she read it the note and walked away with the gift. She texted me a few minute later she wa nervous to reject me because she knew I wa afraid and she would like to stay friends. I cannot blame her for how she feels, it is her choice. Although, I feel utterly defeated. I have never been on a date or been kissed, or in any relationship with someone. I thought maybe this would be it, but I wa wrong. On top of all the other shit going on in my life, I do not see a good reason to continue this fruitless struggle to survive.

I am new here today. I believe I have been suffering from depression since I wa a late teen. I am now , run my own business and just started Prozac late December seeing a psychologist in late Nov. I do not feel any better but it is a relief just knowing that you are doing something other than trying to ignore a definite but unexplainable problem. I suffer from severe anxiety, fall asleep fine but wake up at . am with my mind racing a million mile a minute, mostly about work. This anxiety and depression ha definitely affected my relationship with my wife kids. Most time when you are at work you want to be home vice versa, really do not know what you want. I do not feel like talking to anyone have cut off most of my good friends. I understand most men do not want to admit they have a problem until their wife leaf them and it is too late. I am happy that is not the case with me. I just hope the medication kick in soon so I can see what it feel like to be normal if that is possible. Thanks for letting me ramble

I have not touched another person in years. I know it sound weird and creepy but i do not mean it like that. I mean hugs. I just want a hug. That is it. I do not have anyone to really love and i just feel so tense and alone.

My weight is ballooning out of control. I take daily MG of Prozac in the morning MG Klonopin same time MG Klonopin PM MG Klonopin bedtime , prescribed by a psychiatrist. I also take MG Keppra at bedtime for migraine prevention prescribed by a neurologist . I have been on various combination of these for a couple of years. The psychiatrist is doggedly insistent that the medication I am on should not be making me gain weight - but nonetheless they are. I have had other medication that have given me side effect that I should not have had - but nonetheless I do. I have read many, many story on the internet and through direct conversation with others that say they have had exactly the same thing happen with SSRI is. When I have asked him to change the medication, he keep preaching diet and exercise . It ha not worked. I am now down to the point where I eat virtually nothing and today I exercised to the point where I nearly blacked out. This is causing problem between my wife and I she also see the same psychiatrist and take Klonopin and Effexor , not least because I have no sexual desire. None. She see him the psychiatrist tomorrow but I do not see him until April . Yesterday in my therapy session I had an angry outburst that maybe I should just quit taking all the medication because maybe I am over medicated and she did not like that too much. Am I going to have to die of obesity or over exercise to get his attention? What do I have to do to convince them? This is not helping my depression any when I cannot stand to even look at myself in the mirror.

Nightmares and dream HI, I do not know about you, but when I wa a kid I used to have this weird nightmare not the teeth fell out usual nightmare Like getting lost in a winter forest in pijamas just to be eaten up by wolves, being totally awake at my bed while insect ate me alive like sleep paralysis but dreaming? or just watching my mother being eaten by feral dog a she protected me. Anyway, a I grew older and my depression grew with me, I stopped having nightmares, I can barely recall when the last one was. Instead I have pretty vivid dream not lucid one and in most of them, I am at some kind of weird scenery where I feel like I have always been there, and weird shit happens that I can remember, and it is like a full story, a lot of different thing happen in the same dream. The problem is, in most of them, I meet someone, normally a girl, with which I start a mutual relationship after overcoming some hardship, like, my biggest desire. These dreams, a good a they sound, are worst than the nightmare because when I wake up, it take some time to realize that I did not live that shit, that I am still in bed, and I am still alone.

So yesterday wa my th birthday, and here my dumbass wa expecting it to be different than all my other ones, but boy wa I wrong. It is nice to know that no one give a fuck about you. You can cry, and scream all you want but at the end of the day, no one is gonna be able to understand you, and the deep well that ha been buried within your mind. So what if you grew up rejected by every girl, guy, and person? So what if you have just turned and endured wave upon wave of mental abuse? At the end of the day, when you are laying in your bed, and your demon are starting to swallow you whole and fill up the bowl, what do you do? You face it. You indulge yourself in them until the pain is numb, and you cannot feel anything anymore. It may not be healthy, but it is better than suffering. Happy fucking birthday bro, have your cake.

And I cannot change school for at least another year due to family. I cannot even get a job because my town ha almost none, and the one it doe have are given to the native I am foreign . The welfare cover my expense for now but this is not a life I want to live. I am also anti-social and seem to fit the symptom of ADHD, but my therapist claim it is just anxiety disorder and doe not wanna prescribe any med yet. I do have a serious learning struggle even when language is not an issue, I cannot seem to grasp the concept unless teacher spell it out for me. Basically I am unable to learn anything the moment it go past the basic and it is rather depressing.

I am on Efexor xl at the moment and have been for about a year. It is so nice to post this and not worry about being judged, it is lovely to know that other people understand. Well that is me

Writing out my feeling in hope of gaining some sense of catharsis I would like to start by saying I do not think I am a danger to myself. I am tethered here pretty strongly by my family and my best friend. I cannot see myself leaving them, because I have seen what it doe to people when those closest to them go. I resent the fact that I cannot go, at times, but there is nothing to be done about it really. Most of the people in my life only ever knew my outer shell. The somewhat false personality that I put on in order to function. Over the last three year my mask ha been crumbling away and the result have not been pretty. It is been a viscous feedback loop that leaf me feeling worse and worse a people fall out of my life one by one, either by their own choosing or because I distance myself to hide my pain a I become le and le able to handle it. The summer after my sophomore year I wa in the darkest place of my life. I had to pull out of university and move home to get therapy. It wa actually very effective, and my junior year wa a home run. I wa getting the highest test score in STEM class with students, I wa killing it in my philanthropic efforts, and I had more friend and social obligation than I knew what to do with. My senior year I spent the fall studying abroad in France. It wa magical. I fell in love for the first time. I wa not reciprocated, but the thing I learned about love is that it doe not have to be reciprocated to be the most beautiful thing you have ever felt. When I got back from France, the seed of my current ruin were planted. All throughout college I would been heavily involved with a camp for kid whose parent have cancer. I did it because my dad had cancer when I wa a little kid, and the people I met were all wonderful, but most of all because the only thing that give me a sense of purpose is helping other people. It drive almost everything I do. This camp gave me a rock that I could cling to through the worst of my emotional storms. The two director of the camp were both new my senior year. While I wa in France, one of them dropped out of school due to her own struggle with mental health. The director that wa left over wa completely overwhelmed, and entirely ineffectual. People left and right were telling me that I should take the open position. I did not want it I have ADHD a well a depression and I wa so anxious about my lack of organization. Camp wa in such a hole though, and for the sake of my friend and my camper and their family I did the only thing I felt like I could do, and took on the directorship. It wa rough. My co-director continued to do little of anything, and I felt like I wa juggling grenades. I could not fuck this up. Kids I would been mentoring for year needed this camp to cope in a healthy way, and for a number of parent couples, the week of camp wa the last time they got to spend alone together before one of them would pas away from cancer. My grade dropped a whole point, on average. My volunteer research suffered, and I really let down the post doc I wa assisting Sorry Bethany . My mental health took a nosedive a well. I made camp happen. It wa ugly and bumpy and unorganized, but I made it happen. I took solace in the fact that the kid did not seem to notice the flaws, but it did not do a lot good for my relationship with the other volunteers. I redoubled my effort at the beginning of my th and final year of college. I moved into a house with some of the other volunteer who I wa closest to. I had to quit my research, and I could not keep my grade where I wanted them, but camp planning wa progressing well, especially after our national organization took notice of the lack of effort on my co-director is part and added a third director, my friend and newly minted roommate A. A helped enormously, but I still had so much on my plate. To cope with the stress, my drug use started to skyrocket. I wa smoking weed and cigarette all the time, and to keep up with all my biochemistry coursework and - planning meeting a week I wa taking my prescribed adderall more often than I should have been. I became thoroughly addicted. In my final quarter of school, everything really fell apart. I wa completely overwhelmed, and became le and le effective at my job. I put A in the exact position that I had been in the previous year. I could feel him resent me more and more every day, but I wa too ashamed to talk to him about it, and he never asked me how I wa doing. I barely graduated. As soon a school wa over I quit adderall cold turkey, because it had been putting me in a very dangerous mental headspace for weeks, but until then it had remained a necessity. The withdrawal hit me like a truck. Getting out of bed felt like a truly herculean task. I wa an empty husk of a human being and from graduation to camp in August I contributed almost nothing to the camp. I had nothing left to give. A hated me by that point. He began to tell people what he thought of me, and they listened. I watched helplessly a some of my closest friend and roommate began to look down upon me, if not for what A wa saying then for my severely depressed behavior. I could not even really blame them. After camp, when we had our traditional fun award ceremony, A wa awarded Most likely to make camp happen by himself . I wa awarded Linger , a camp song I wa known for singing, but also a very pointed jab. It wa humiliating. At the afterparty that night I drunkenly told A everything. He said it wa ok, and I cried lying drunk on the porch. I lived in the house with him for a few more month while I looked for a job. A wa incredibly distant, and became more and more hostile over time. I got a job on a crab boat. I had a few reason for doing it, but the most important reason in my head wa that I might be lucky enough for it to kill me. The day I moved out A sent me a paragraph essay over text, detailing everything I would ever done that had disappointed him, and letting me know that there wa nothing I could ever do to win his respect back. I left the state to work on the crab boat. For month I lived in isolation, either working or chain smoking weed to keep myself from ruminating on all my failures. The crab boat did almost kill me. Multiple times, in fact. In the end I quit, not because I wa suddenly afraid to die, but because my captain wa the most sadistic piece of human scum I would ever met, and I could not take him any more. I have spent the month since then trying to find a job. apps out and I am no closer than when I started. I have been up to visit the city I graduated in twice, but both time I have been wracked with crippling anxiety. I can tell how A affected the opinion of some of my closest friends, and it kill me. So, that is where I am. I am going to go smoke a cigarette and pray that I get my dad is cancer even younger than he did.

A song of fire and ice Hey everyone. I am on mobile so pardon my typo which will happen. I would like to take this time to thank anyone who read this a well a giving a shout out to anyone currently struggling with depression. I have a long history with Type Bipolar Disorder. Although that is not necessarily depression in itself patient who are Bipolar are bound to eventually oscillate into that emotional polarity. To give a quick summary here is what happened to me I grew up incredibly wealthy. My Father wa an ex alcoholic. My Mother died when I wa and my Father went back to drinking to cope with the loss of his wife my Mother . My Father became suicidal and threw everything we had away. We went bankrupt and I went to live with my Brother across the country. My Brothers wife left him shortly after I moved in. He became suicidal a well, ended up hospitalized. I moved back across the country again to live with my then pseudo homeless Father. One day my Father show up to my school drunk, get arrested, I am taken in by the state and put into foster care. I end up living with an incredibly poor hispanic family and eat almost nothing everyday. I have no bed. I sleep on the floor. The state then place me in an incredibly religious home where i essentially become a slave and i cook and clean nonstop for an extremely wealthy catholic couple. They do not like me Because I liked hard rock. My third stay I end up living in a small apartment with a woman who wa good at hiding her side prostitution gig and methamphetamine addiction. After all the year my Father get his life back under control. He begin dating a wealthy woman who is not a fan of me. He take prolonged stay at her home about mile away. He would visit the house to restock it with food, pay the bills, then leave again. During this time i saw my Father maybe time a year. Each encounter wa brief and lasted le than minutes. During this I still went to school, cooked, did my laundry, and did kind of normal kid stuff. The point of this story is I am an adult now who is married. I am a software engineer. I am financially stable. Regardless of how dark it get it is possible to make it out on top. You have to focus and be strong. Do whatever you need to do to survive. If anyone ha any question or would like to chat, need advice, whatever please let me know. I currently do volunteer work to aid people who suffer from Bipolar Disorder a well a others like ADHD or OCD. I also, accidentally, mentor Fatherless child on Xbox Live strange, I know . Its not easy out there and world and parent sometimes forget how hard it is being a teen. No judgement. I hope everyone ha a good night or day, depending where you are at .

Cold turkey of Escitalopram So let me begin this by saying this is a terrible idea and I should definitely taper off with the help of my psychiatrist. So, earlier this year after some lack of focus and insistent lethargy eventually my parent decided to take me to a psychiatrist. One thing lead to another and I am diagnosed with depression and put on a dose of escitalopram generic form of Lexapro mg a day. Have a history of depression on my mother is side, and they had all the symptom pretty severely minus the suicidal ideation, which I believed supported their diagnosis. So a school wa finishing up and I had exam to study for, I spent most afternoon essentially consciously unconscious a I wa too tired and struggling to keep a focus on homework and related tasks. Long story short told my parent I had been taking Adderall once and a while and we talked to the psychiatrist and he wa very understanding and after trying to allow the SSRI to do it magic, he ultimately added an Adderall script to my regime. So for some month I took the addy a needed and the anti-depressant a described other than the day I forgot . So fast forward to summer and while I am feeling marginally better, I wa lead to believe the addy wa doing most of the work. So just last week I decided just to cold turkey the SSRI. Now, this wa a slight test of seeing how I would react to abstaining from the med which is an awful idea . Strangely, I have noticed no real change whatsoever from when I wa taking it to this past week of not taking it at all. I am somewhat familiar with the omen regarding stopping an anti-depressant cold turkey and the associated rebound depression and serotonin-related issues, however, I am unsure why I have not experienced anything. The optimistic side of me want to explain this a my body just being weird and being able to withstand this drug-related anomaly. The pessimistic side of me belief that it is related to escitalopram somewhat length half-life and that a nightmarish hell awaits me very soon. Just a a side note, at the same time a my depression diagnosis, I also got a blood test which delivered wonderful news that I had Lyme is Disease which after much reading, I found exhibit many trait of depression and ADHD like disorder and wa promptly treated. Now I do not proclaim to be healed a I still exhibit a sense of lethargy, however, that might just be something I have become accustomed to and given getting out of my house, I am usually able to go out and be alive. Obviously, not discussing this decision with my doctor is unnecessarily dangerous and naive, but I just do not enjoy taking the medication and this past week kind of support my idea that I do not really need to take the medication if I am able to function fine without it. Forgive me for this whole backstory of my last year, I just wa unsure if some of this information might be useful in determining what is happening. tlr got lethargic and lacked focus this last year, diagnosed with depression and Lyme is disease, been on escitalopram since spring and Adderall whenever I choose to take it since mid-Mayish. Have stopped taking escitalopram for about a week now and am not exhibiting any withdrawal or issue regarding the cold turkey. My question is am I an anomaly or am I due for a bitter time in the near future? QUICK EDIT just wanna say I tried looking up this lack of side effect from cold turkey, but all I can seem to find is the side-effects of not taking the medication, so if someone ha some website or anecdotal experience they can refer me to, that would be much appreciated

Hi everybody! I am new here and I want to tell my story in brief and ask you a few questions. I am now. Female. I am studying on PhD in one of the US universities. I also started to read a lot of porno stories. . I am thinking almost constantly about suicide. I mean, I do not think about committing suicide. NO. I WANT TO LIVE. It is kind of obsessive thought playing in my mind I feel bad ..suicide..many people do that..suicide . It is kind of always in my mind. Sometimes I even have a feeling of the rope on my neck I do not think about other kind of suicide which is, probably, explained by the fact that my father hung himself . . Where am I going guys? So, I am a bit afraid of trusting a psychiatrist. Maybe, I do not need to tell her everything. What would be your advice? I would greatly appreciate your help. Thanks.

I am sort of new.. Here is the short version I am year old man. Single. No kids. I live in Arizona USA . My father wa a workaholic, and an alcoholic. So usually he wa not present, and when he wa he wa abusive. In addition, mental illness run in my family. At the age of I wa sexually molested by a neighbor. I can recall my anxiety always being there. It is something I have always fought with especially in social situations. My family completely isolated me when I wa growing up, in the name of protecting me. As a result I never really learned social skill until I wa older. I grew up being abused by my peer throughout school. Found myself taken in by the only people who would accept me a I wa the misfits, outcasts, drug-users. Early into my teen year depression came a an addition to my anxiety. Around I started to get into substance abuse. The only thing I ever used wa LSD on weekend regularly. A year later this extended into ecstasy and LSD. I had a traumatic experience and stopped using anything about a year after that. My anxiety became so overwhelming I could not function. So at this time I first started seeing a counselor and a psychiatrist. They put me on Clonzepam. My last year in high school my father wa starting to lose it so my mother asked me to leave so we did not kill each other. I had an inheritance from another relative and I lived off that. I went whole year without speaking to my father. I sunk deep into depression, and returned to substance abuse. The Clonzepam wa not working anymore. After being outcast from my family, I went full on into the dark side. What wa just LSD and ecstasy usage branched into cocaine, meth, marijuana, and virtually anything my friend and I could find. This culminated in an extreme suicide attempt about a year out of high school. After getting out of the mental hospital, I went totally straight and have not touched any drug since then. The year following have been a rollercoaster. One moment being on top of the world, having everything I could ever want. Another losing everything. Several long horrible relationship occurred in this time. Over the year my doctor ha moved me around on various medicines. I have been using Effexor since . Currenlty I take Lamictal in addition to it. I suffer from chronic reoccurring depression, social phobia, and generalized anxiety disorder.

Feeling trapped in my head First off I am Autistic, I am studying at Oxford I am struggling to remember anything, like anything at all, people, faces, dates, facts, etc. I am feeling more and more alone because I do not feel like I have anything good to think about. I have talk to my parent but they just talk highly of the pro is of medication and councillors. Hate councillors. I always ended up lying to them Since everything I have had some real down point, and made two attempts, by failed due to people walking in randomly either whilst in progress or while setting up. I have already made necessary precaution by writing letters, addressing them and stamping them but non have been sent. But I still want to tell her, and I do not her to be scared of me. When I close my eye and think of a memory, I just see grey mist or static like of a television. It doe not feel nice not having anything to fall back on in your mind, thing that made you happy.

I wa just reading back over the past few entries. I have been in tough shape and I did not realize how tough until I read it over. The depression, the arthritis, and the circumstance of my life all have been conspiring to keep me down. My therapist wa right, I think, when she said on Monday that I needed sometime to just be . I have stopped answering my phone and have spend most of the past few day watching DVDs, playing computer game and resting my sore body. I feel better emotionally since I have been doing this. I wish I did not feel so horribly guilty for checking out of the world for a few days, but I am willing to cope with it if it make ma feel a little better. The other thing I am feeling guilty about is this training I am supposed to go to in Washington, DC in two weeks. I feel like if I go I will be letter all sort of people down at work. I have even contacted the people running the training and asked if I can delay it, but it is now or never and since it is all expense paid in Washington for three day if I pas it up at the last minute I am screwing someone else out of the opportunity. If I go or if I do not go I am going to feel guilty and selfish. I am not going to decide now though. I am just going to keep up with the resting for another day.

Am I the only one who belief in fantasy and lie to cope with not killing myself? I believe that one day, the girl I like will like me back. I believe that she will reconsider rejecting me, and apologize to me and we can be in a relationship a more than good friends. I believe that I will be prepared for my career when I leave college. I believe that I will find an internship this summer and every summer after that. I believe that I will impress employer with my fantastic resume. I believe that I will make lot of good everlasting friend in college and that I will make even more friend at my workplace in the next three years. The relationship with my high school friend will only strengthen and we will be a group for decade to come. I believe all of the people I know now. I believe that I will graduate in the next three years, and that I will be able to get As in my class to increase my GPA. I believe I can graduate with honors, I believe that I will have enough money saved to actually visit Japan. I believe all of these thing because I know I am a failure at life, and I know I am not built to survive and dwell in this world. One day, I will end my life just when my fantasy can no longer be maintained.

People I love keep dying. I cannot take it anymore. On New Year is Eve I got a phone call at in the morning that one of my closest friend died. I did not believe it. I thought it wa a joke. It wa not. His brother made a post on Facebook letting everyone know. It felt like a bad dream. I could not stop crying. I cried at work. I tried to get time off, but they did not offer bereavement for people who were not immediate family. I wa so distraught that I could not go to the funeral. I wa afraid to see his body. I hate myself for being so weak. He wa . It should not be. He should still be alive. Four month later, my grandfather died. We were close. The last time we talked he said that is my sweetheart, that is my pride and joy. I sat with him in the hospital and watched Aubrey Hepburn. We promised to see each other again soon. I saw him a week later in hospice. He wa catatonic. I told him it wa okay to let go, okay to move on if he wa in pain. They say hearing is the final sense to go. He died thirty minute after I left. On July st my mother told me that she is been diagnosed with cancer. They took a biopsy of her lymph node yesterday to see if it ha spread there. She is on a month of leave from work. That wa the final straw for me, I think. I feel like a shell of who I wa before December st. I am terrified of the future. I remember when my friend died, I asked myself who I would lose next. I had no idea thing would spiral down and down. Everyday is a struggle for me to stay at work. All I want to do is sleep. I have constant migraine a chronic condition , and the pain paired with the grief is absolute hell. I started seeing a counselor about a month ago, and I like her but she can only do so much. I am on medication, and I have a good support system. But the sorrow is just overwhelming. I feel like this grief is never going to end. I wa not ready to say goodbye to them. I do not want to lose my mom. I am not even thirty. I am not ready to wake up knowing that she is not with me anymore. I cannot take anymore. I have been cry all day. I do not really know what I expect to see from anyone here, but I am just so lost.

I do not think who try to kill themselves actually want to die From my experience and one of a close friend who almost died in a car accident, I think people do not really want to die. About those who survived suicide, claimed that in their final moments, when they were throwing themselves from a high place, they said they would regret everything and wanted to live. Personally, I have been close to do it, but my online friend gave me so much support and so much love that I noticed that it is not worth it. I still have thing I want to do. Sure getting out of bed is still a huge task. Today it took me hour just to do it, but I did it. I am not sure if I should have posted this in suicide or here a it ha to do with both. Depression sucks, that is a fact we all know, but suicide is not the way to go. There is always another way, at least that is what I like to think

I wish I could care about those thing again but I cannot so suggesting to do those things, a if I wanted to stop, is like a punch to the face. Oh your depressed? Just do what you like. I have tried giving so many fuck and I cannot. I cannot even fake it anymore. I wish I could. How do I care again? Do I just wait? I do not think much longer.

I feel trapped in a life I do not want to live. It took a lot of time for me to consider posting here but I am gonna be alone for the whole day and cannot deal with it. So, hi, I am just your typical British kid dealing with the stress of College but the problem is that I am not stressed because of college I do not really care much for it but it is better then work , I am stressed because of this constant cycle of wake up, spend an hour trying to get up, be minute late to everything every day, eat, browse the Internet and sleep. All around me there is people who have clear career path and know what they are passionate about, but I look at myself and realise that I do not have that. I have no interest in working in a job for the next year of my life because there is nothing that I would like doing. I am doing fine in all of my class As in History and Cs in Maths, Distinctions in BTEC Engineering, everything just feel too simple but I just still get these week where I feel worthless and pointless. I get brain fog, I end up teary eyed and cannot talk to anybody for fear of looking stupid I have speech problem . But then when I end up actually talking to others I apparently look happy. I have spoken to people at my school about it, but it is the same thing every time. Oh you are struggling? We will have a five minute conversation about your feeling and wait month to make sure you are not still sad . I wa diagnosed with depression and anxiety but I stopped taking medication in July and have not seen a doctor or therapist since. They did not help, the medication I wa on turned me into a god damn zombie and my therapist got exceptionally pissy at me for not telling the truth about my lack of improvement. I felt like I had to lie so I did not waste their time and mine, I worry that is why I end up wearing a mask of the time. Even around my family, who believe more in self-help then actually getting an actually decent therapist to try and help me. I am ashamed to talk to them about it, no matter what anyone says, trust me when I say that they will NOT understand. I have been incredibly clear about it all and got mocked for it, some people just do not want to learn. I had a pretty bad childhood that I try to justify my problem with dealt with a lot of sexual abuse and my mother died in but when I am having these wouldays I am not thinking about anything in particular that would make me flighty. I ended up admitting a lot of my past to one teacher last week who I admire greatly and whom pretty much just saved my life and I am still cringing today. I know I have no reason to cringe either, I just get so nervous of social interaction. I just do not get why the universe picked me to be it miserable little experiment. I never asked for anything bad to happen, I never asked to constantly feel tired and under the weather, I know that life is not gonna be perfect but why is it that day after dull as day I have to feel worse and worse? I try to take responsibility for my health, I feel like dirt, I have other people have some part in it and they take it for granted and hardly any of them actually make a big effort on me. Sorry if my word are jumbled and rambled, I just needed a place to vent whilst I still can.

That eternal slumber I am tired. I am not here to be saved. I am nearly have a career, a SO, friend amp family who care for me but it will never be enough to keep me around. I have been depressed since age , my first suicide attempt wa at and I am convinced my life will end by my own hand eventually. I have lurked here but never posted. I had to reach out somehow and wa not going to call or text the goddamn crisis line. The world see me a happy and outgoing even when I am honest about my depression b c I do not SHOW it to anyone. I am lonely. I am tired. I am not sure how much I have left to give. I try. I do. I wake up amp try to be positive, make the most of each day but I am just going through the motions. That siren is song ha been stronger these past few weeks. Tonite ended with me locked in the bathroom, sitting on the floor in a fat, disgusting, pathetic cry heap - razor blade in hand. One of my cat scratching at the door amp me trying to hush her so a not to wake my SO. Through the tear I pathetically sliced away at my inner leg a few times. Been a decade since I have cut. No relief. There is no point to any of this, no ultimate conclusion. I am not looking for advice or friendship, I just needed someone out there to know how desperately I long for that final sleep.

Got the news I wa cancer free again last week, but I feel more emptier and lonelier than ever before. Anyways, maybe beating cancer isnt really something to be proud of. I am no fucking warrior. I am terrified about the whole thing. The people I care about think I am brave but in all honesty I brush it off because I would rather take it again and again just so they would not. I am.just trying my best to take it day by day, but it is getting harder and harder to deal with everything.

I walked out of a job yesterday. I took my wouldream job in early January, only to discover that it is not my dream job at all. I thought I would like working in a medical office, but this particular medical office ha two doctors, one part-time staff member, and a cluster of other problems. I quit on Friday the owner asked me to come in yesterday and meet, and I did, but I did not stay long, because she did not show up and the other doctor on staff acted like my resignation never even happened. I have compiled a list of why I quit. Here is a short sample - I hate the hour A-P day a week, A-P day a week an hour lunch break wa promised in the new hire handbook but is frowned upon by staff a a lack of commitment dedication - There are religious currents, including periodic prayer meeting throughout the day. I wa treated dismissively when I objected and stated I am not religious. The owner is okay with the prayers, and say it brings staff closer together. - I wa offered a management position, but after being hired, wa told I know nothing, and might manage eventually, but right now wa incapable of doing so. - I wa trained for three or so day before being expected to run insurance billing, keep room clean and do therapies, and run the front desk. - Staff is expected to remain available on evening and weekend for PR events. I know that quitting wa the best decision - sticking it out would have been detrimental to my mental health, and I would have had no time to interview for other opportunities. Still, at the same time, I cannot help but feel like a burden to my husband. After leaving yesterday, I hiked mile to the top of an area mountain really just a big hill, it is a foothill mountain and had a conversation with myself a to whether or not I intended to jump. I intentionally did not take my gun with me because I never know. I am afraid of being a disappointment, and I am afraid of never being a conventional, functional human. I am second guessing my decision to leave. I already have other opportunity presenting themselves to me and I am lucky enough to have some money put away.. but I do not want to be a failure. I can feel depression symptom creeping up on me again, and I am trying to fend them off. I forced myself into a per-diem position today, just to keep in a routine. I am trying to re-frame this a an opportunity, but right now, it feel like a literal nightmare.

I really cannot miss any more class after today, this semester is really important for my grades. I only have one friend who know I have problem with depression but I do not want her to deal with my emotional baggage.

Does Trading Help Your Depression? Maybe I am a bit weird in this regard, but I do quiet well in this regard. I have not traded too much because of life circumstances, and thus the past few year have been depressed, a my one best friend is in jail and the other ha adopted asceticism. I also moved to a new area and broke up with my ex. I have been thinking stuff over, and even though winning at coding can make me slightly happy, I feel like whenever I am trading I am on fire and feel like my true self, whereas otherwise I feel blah. When I mean trading I mean medium term investing based on value investing. IDK if the risk and reward part overrun me, but when I think about that I do not think about my lack of dating or how this or that sucks, I focus on kicking as and taking names. Anyone else ever get a feeling like that? IDK if this is taking on risky behavior for the sake of it or merely finding my muse.

I Empathize More With the Dead Than I Feel Bad for the Living There have been a few time in the past few year where I found out someone I went to high school with died of whatever means. But within the past few months, whenever I found out someone died, I did not really feel bad for their family, I mostly wa kind of jealous that they were gone and I wa still here. For example, my mom manages a nursing floor at a hospital. She told me one of her nurse is daughter died of a deadly disease at . And all I could think about wa at all I could think wa how jealous I wa of the deceased young woman, and how lucky she was. No ill will to her, I hope she rest in peace and that her family is coping. Another example. When I wa in high school, someone I knew had an older brother than went out drinking one night and when he came home, he died, choking on his own vomit. Again, I feel like there should be a lot of cautionary tale in this, but mostly I just wish I wa the one that wa dead.

Describe your depression Here is how I would describe mine I live an exceptionally fortunate life. I am a college student interning for a commercial real estate development company. I had two internship last summer, one in venture capitalism and one teaching middle schoolers how to code. I have a potential internship lined up for a Fortune company in Miami next summer and potentially an private equity internship lined up. I have all the network and connection in the world to be successful. But I feel so unhappy and miserable with my life. My thought are so irrational and negative that I cannot see how fortunate I am to have all that I have. I make great money with my summer internship, more money then most adult make, but none of that matters, because I still have suicdial thought almost everyday. I feel hopeless all day, everyday. I feel unloved and unwanted. Even though I have more than enough to be grateful for, I still feel inferior and lower than the lowest of the low.

I have been so depressed over a lost friendship. I have known this girl for about years. We were very close or so I thought. We both had boy around the same age, went on vacation together with our families, and both went through our nd pregnancy together. I knew she wa a person that had to have thing her way but I accepted this. She ha a large circle of friend that she included me in. I felt her family wa mine, in a way. I am very shy and came out of my shell. Last year I got caught up with other friend that were having problems. They really needed me. So I wa not around much but I am always available if she needed me. Anyway, we got into a misunderstanding over something very minor. I really did not think much about it the next day. That is the way I am. I get mad then I am over it within hours. She is not like that. She hold grudges. I saw her the next day th of July at her house. I knew she did not really talk to me but she did have a lot of people there. Well,a couple of week after I call her saying Hey girl, can I pick land on up? . She said How can you call and act like nothing is wrong? Then she hang up on me. I wait until the next day and called again. First thing she say is What do you want? I say Just to be your friend. She say We are no longer friends. There will be no more double dating with our husbands, vacations, you are to not come to my house, We are not friend . I wa blown away. I asked what I did and she could not give me a direct answer. She said we had different friend and I had more drama than any of her friend of years. I asked her what drama? Last year I had some problem with my husband but I did not really talk to her about that. She said that wa a problem, I did not tell her thing and that is what friend do. WHAT? She wa contradicting herself. She hung up on me again. It is very difficult for me because when I make a friend and let them into my heart they are my friend for life. Her son is my son is best friend and her husband is my husband best friend. I had recently told my husband to not mention their name around me because I become really depressed. My poor son doe not understand why she doe not like me anymore. How can I explain when I do not know. I bought her daughter a shirt about a month ago and she did not acknowledge it until she saw me in Walmart a week later and we were face to face and she thanked me. It wa very weird. I have not seen her since July. I cannot let my son have his friend over anymore because it hurt too much to see him and know that I am not welcomed in their home and they have not asked my son over their house since all of this even though he still came over ours. I cannot figure out what I did that wa so bad. I wish I knew so that maybe I could at least defend myself and have some closure.

My purpose for posting this is that I am at a dead end and do not know where else to turn. I am and I am sure have been suffering from depression most my whole life. The man who wa injured received a cut on his face after chasing after me when I split the scene, that wa the whole extent of his injuries. After the arrest I wa feeling so bad it made no difference whether I took them or not. The charge were dropped but I had to wait day after day for a year or more just waiting for them to recharge me, which my attorney wa sure they were going to do. That wa year ago and I think the experience did some very serious and real damage to me. I just lost my job in my probationary period of months. I have worked so hard to create some kind of financial security for myself BA in Psychology, technical degree in computers, numerous computer certification but where ever I go I do not fit in to the group and find myself alienated and let go. Some many failed romantic relationships, never having friends, and what family member I have are abusive and are incapable of providing healthy support. Most night I calm myself enough to fall asleep by fantasizing about killing myself and the relief that wa provide. I feel like a freak physically. Of course what I have stated so far is not close to all that is weighing on me. Now I am just so tired and hopeless I do not know how to get the energy to try again. Any encouragement or wisdom the read you can provide is very much appreciated. If you need to something that is hurtful please do not respond to this.

Is it better to find out your love wa a lie, or never to have loved at all? Last year, after year of marriage, my wife say she never loved me, ha never found me attractive who can blame her , and doe not think we have ever been right for each other. She only married me because she felt pressured from family and church to get married, and I wa a good guy , a she put it. This crushed me. She ha been everything to me. I have always loved her so much. My whole marriage ha always been a fairy tale for me, it wa everything I wanted. This wa the girl of my dreams. I remember thinking when we were dating that it wa too good to be true that any girl, especially one a amazing a my wife, would ever like me, since I am shy, boring, and ugly. I guess I wa right, it wa too good to be true, and I should have trusted my gut and known it back then. After a year of trying to find way to connect with her, make myself more attractive to her, and hoping she would love me, I have finally accepted that she never will. We are staying together for the kid is sake, and really for mine, what else would I do, no one else could ever love me, and I doubt I could ever really love anyone else the way I loved my wife. I have accepted that I will never have love. It make me wonder, is it better to have thought I had love, and enjoyed it, only to find out it wa lie, or never to have loved at all. At this point I really do not know.
