I am sitting here at what is my th or th job I can barely keep count. I am year old by the way . I already hate it and I have been here one month today. I do not think it is normal to have this many job over a lifetime, let alone when you are just in your late is. I have applied for disability before but wa denied. I do not dispute the fact that I can get a job, I just cannot keep a job. I get bored, I get anxiety attacks, I get to the point where I do not want to go outside at all. I will never be able to work successfully with all those thing going on. When I went to see an attorney to appeal my disability decision, he said I should find a job with minimal responsibility. What kind of job is that? Do not you have to be responsible enough to at least come to work and on time ? Do not you have to be responsible to follow the rule of the job? I cannot seem to do either one. Each job I get, I think maybe this can be the job I can stay at and it never happens. The longest I have ever stayed at a job is year. I just feel like such a loser. Everyone I know always say they will do whatever kind of job for their kids, or I should be lucky to have a job. I can see their point, but when I feel so miserable I cannot see past that. I drag myself to job only to end up quitting or getting myself fired. What is wrong with me? Any advice? Anyone?

Hi, everyone - new to these forum board thingies so please forgive me if this doe not end up being posted in the right place! I have lived with depression since I wa year old I am now . For the past year I have been managing this condition without the aid of drug or stimulants. My life changed the day I stopped fighting the condition and accepted it a part of who I was. Acceptance is the greatest gift you can give yourself on the road to recovery, not only doe it take away the stigma, it also give the fear nothing to feed on. For those of you who are still in the depth of darkness, please do not give up hope, there are many of u out here who, have experienced exactly what you are going through now, we survived - so can you. Recovery is possible, it just take time and a little faith in yourself. Thank you for allowing me to join this community, I hope my experience of living with this condition can help others, the door to the email box is always open! Kindest regard to all

Lonely and stupid. I feel so stupid. I have always been academic and studious- if anything, I have dedicated my existence to the pursuit of knowledge, at the expense of forming human relationships. But I am constantly overwhelmed by how much I do not know, how slow I am to understand concepts, and how my peer are all more intelligent than me. I know it is impossible to always be the smartest person in the room, but I feel that the fruit of my study are disproportionate to my efforts. At the same time, I have conflicting feeling over my loneliness. I desire human interaction, but others find me rigid and distant. In all honesty, I am easily bored by small talk and trivial discussions. I understand that it is important in forming friendships, but my under-stimulated brain seems to automatically ishut-off after a while. I have noticed that the people I do get along with are like me. Introverted, cold, and academic. We do not see each other a people, but a enlightened book with fresh concepts. These idea are interesting to explore. If the book is lost, we are disappointed but not crushed. We were never bound by friendship we were tied by our interest and perhaps mutual isolation. I do not feel an ounce of human warmth from these acquaintances.

I think i am okay, but in reality and in hindsight I am completely not okay. I think I am literally dying day by day. Hello to anyone out there, I am just a good guy who did not come from much and I am trying my best to live a fulfilling life but I do not think I can anymore because of this illness. I use to be quite a geek a a kid and love video game and playing with others and having fun. I remember when I use to look forward to coming home from elementary school or middle school and just do my homework and then game away. It wa so much fun then and I felt like I wa genuinely pretty happy. Now a day I feel like i am just literally dead. I do not do anything, I cannot sleep, I hardly eat because I cant find the motivation to go out and get food.. and over the past year I have noticed that depression really ha taken a toll on me mentally and physically. It suck so bad that I genuinely think I will probably die prematurely and die lonely. I have no friends, no acquaintances, and just family that do not understand anything about what i am going through. To be honest I wish I wa never born. I wish i did not exist because facing the world is killing me. Just the other day I thought about all the opportunity i have missed out on because of my depression. Like internships, jobs, career fairs, fun event and even a potential awesome friend but all of that is not going to happen because i am a dead a a rock. I turned a couple day ago and no one even said happy birthday..Not even family. At this point i am looking at my future and it looking dim. I have simply lost the meaning of living. I have no self esteem, no confidence, nothing. Maybe people like me do not deserve to live a good life, perhaps we ought to die and just get over it. If there wa someone who can tell me my fate i will want to listen to it now. I just cannot anymore. I fucking just want to run the bridge and jump off but sadly i recognize that I only have one life. I am hoping and hoping maybe everything can turn around for me but what are the odds to be honest. I might a well have a heart attack and just die. I hate this. I am lonely, i am always sad and i am just a piece of shit that is worthless. Good Bye everyone. I hope you have all had an awesome day. As for me everyday is the same and if thing do not change soon I think i will rather end it. Not even graduating college meant anything for me. I fucking hate myself!

I feel doubt about my relationship when I am depressed? I am M. I am gay and I have been with my boyfriend J for five months. I used to be severely depressed. But lately my life ha been pretty good. But sometimes I get into a depressed mood and I start having doubt about my relationship. Honestly nothing is really wrong between us. But sometimes I feel like I do not really love him, and that we do not actually have any chemistry. And I do not know why I feel that way. I start nitpicking our relationship and try to find flaw in it to justify how I feel. But other time we will both be in a good mood, and the spark is totally there, and I feel great about everything. I am starting to think that this is just what my brain default to when I am sad, and that there is nothing actually wrong with us. For example this weekend I wa feeling great, then on Sunday my parent had a conversation with me that really triggered me, and now I am feeling depressed and doubting my relationship. The conversation with my parent had nothing to do with my boyfriend. Basically it seems like whenever I feel down, my brain immediately jump to maybe I should break up with my boyfriend. I do not know if this is a sign that something is actually wrong, or if this is just what a depressed brain does. Does anyone else experience this? Is this common?

Advice for getting back in touch with everyday life? I think the hardest thing for me, and the largest factor I need to address to try and feel healthy again, is simply trying to feel engaged in and enjoying the present. Right now, day have little to no meaning at all, and I am only really able to think of my life in term of weeks, months, and years. As a result of that, I feel nothing from the hobby or moment that would before provide me feeling of joy, satisfaction or just generally fulfilling myself. The only activity I really enjoy anymore is anything that provides me with a complete escape from reality, however these activity are not exactly one belonging to a healthy lifestyle. I just want to enjoy the thing that I used to enjoy, but whenever I try I feel like I am wasting my time, are not doing them well enough. Has anybody gone through something similar, and ha advice for how they managed to get through it? Thanks for reading.

Thank You ArtChick and Tempesta , all of you who have been here for me. I am so glad that you all understand. I really want to get out from behind this trapped door. My life is so controlled and he doe not even see it. He denies it when i bring it up. I cry because i cannot buy thing for my child or grandchildren. This is not the way it is suppose to be. One of the reason I do not make it to church on some Sundays is because I do not have clothes to wear. I have a pair of black jean i keep switching jacket and shirt so i do not look the same every Sunday. My daughter bought me a nice dress and it wa warm enough last Sunday to wear it. I guess i should not care about what people think and all the people at my church are wonderful, not judgmental. I do go to the Lord in Prayer every morning and study my Bible. I feel content because we are supposed to give all our worry to him and not get in his way of taking care of them. I know God is working in my life, my daughter finding this site is just one of the way i know. my husband just got a job after being out of work for a year. I prayed for that too. He did not just get a job but he got a good job. I told him he did not get it on his own. I know I am going to get better eventually. Thank all of you for being here for me. I will keep all of you in my prayer too.

I suffer from major depression too and I have taken almost all of the SSRI is but the only one that really helped me wa Lexapro. I took it for around month is, then decided that I did not want to become addicted to another medication so I just stopped taking it and it did not bother me at all. I have been taking mil of Elavil at bedtime which is also an antidepressant but I take it to help me sleep. It used to help control my depression but it doe not anymore and really doe not help me sleep either. Have you ever tried Lexapro? I think it is the best SSRI one can be on and I had no side effect while taking it so you might want to ask your doctor about it. If there is an alternative treatment for major depression I would like to know what it is. I really have no reason to be depressed a I have a very loving, supportive husband wonderful children, grandchild and great-grand children. Both my husband and I are retired and this is a time when I should really be enjoying my life but there is a void which I cannot explain. I do not want for anything. I have a beautiful home, a new Durango but the material thing are not what make one happy. I have been told that one chooses to be happy or unhappy but I certainly do not choose to be unhappy and I do not know anyone who would. I am a devout Christian and I know that my depression is not coming from God but I am letting the Devil tell me that I am depressed. Maybe God is just trying to bring me closer to Him and I need to lay my burden of depression at His foot and tell him that I cannot get through this alone, then just forget about it but for me it is not that easy. Three of my child are taking antidepressant so I guess depression might be hereditary spelling? . I will pray for you to feel better and will you please pray for me too? Thank you.

I am new to this board. I have been on State Disability for severe depression since March. Sometime during the summer - cannot remember exactly when - I wa sent for a psychiatric evaluation. I should have it ready this week. Does anyone have any experience with appeal at the state California level? Hello. I am just getting over a suicide attempt, my nd. It wa extremely serious. I wa planning it for week, and when I wa fired form my job I did it the next day. I have a BS in chemistry and worked testing pharmacological products, so i knew what to take. I do not know what made me call my ex-BF. I did not speak to him for months, but I wanted him to be the one to find me. Needless to say I lived. The doctor where surprised that I did. I took things, not going to give people idea that i knew they could not do anything for because of them being together. They could not pump my stomach cause of the one thing. They could not give any antidote cause of interactions. I took well over the lethal limit. My life wa spiraling out of control since Jan of . Since then, I have had heart and cancer operations. I wa discharged from the Navy, wa an officer, because of the medical stuff. My st suicide attempt wa in the navy, they chalked it up to being stupid and not dealing with the st heart and cancer surgeries. My parent had a bitter divorce and I wa caught in the middle when I got home. My mother assumed my ID and ran up a bunch of bills. I came out of the closet. I slept around to feel wanted. Which wa not a wise choice, I gained my rd major medical situation. Not going to say what, but I am sure you can figure it out. I have a soul mate that I hurt, my ex-BF, and who know if we will ever be friend or more. wa a blur. I do not remember things, or saw thing that where not there. Like documentation, which led to me being fired. I wa afraid to leave the house, and wa even afraid of year old selling candy for the school. The good thing about the suicide attempt is there wa a proper diagnosis. I compartmentalized, and pushed emotion away. Every situation or moment had it own little box, and I put it away. I wanted to be like Spok or Data. I would put on different mask for different situations. There wa shopping me, gas pumping me, heck, i had a separate mask for every action I performed. I have abandonment issues, from how i wa treated growing up. Medicines did nothing and gave bad side effects. My depression is not chemical, but mental. I need to re-learn how to think and handle emotion and issue properly. Unemployment is running out, people are looking for money for bills. But it is better to be alive. WOW, this wa longer than I intended. Just saying who I am, and I am a mess..but slowly putting my life together.

My best friend is husband shot himself friday night. I am angry. He wa a manly man. All of us. All of his friend encouraged him to get help but he grew up in a world, in a house, that thought mental health professional were quacks. He thought that taking medicine for something going on in your head wa weak. This wa an entirely medical problem that could have been prevented. So I am mad. At him for leaving my best friend a year old widow, at the people who raised him, at society, for telling him it is weak to take medicine, at whatever the fuck higher power may be responsible for this stupid, senseless waste. I am guilty for not trying to do more. I am heartbroken that I will never talk to him again or hear him play his guitar or see him turn a piece of wood into something beautiful. I am confused by the event leading up to it. I just need help. I do not know what to do. I am spending most of my time with my best friend and trying to be strong and give comfort where I can. I do not know what the point of this post is. Any word of wisdom, advice, thoughts, story would be very welcome. Thanks for reading.

I had therapy today. I do not even know where to start. First off, I lost a day last week time loss dissociation ..it wa last Tuesday that I lost. My mom called me Friday and I said why are you calling me and she said I always call you on Friday . I told her that it wa Thursday and she told me I wa wrong. So, I back tracked the best I could and I cannot remember anything that I did on Tuesday. The interesting thing is that I mailed my therapist the research info I found on dissociation so when I saw her today I asked her what wa the date that I put on the letter I sent and guess what..IT WAS TUESDAY. Then she asked me if I brought it in and I told her no that I mailed it. And she said that I could not have because it wa not scanned by the post office. She showed me the envelope and it wa not scanned at all. She also said that the mail had already come in the office and the envelope wa in her mailbox way after she had already checked her mail. So, we have no idea how that got to her office. But I do not drive and Carol did not take me anywhere last week. So, if anyone remembers being with me or talking to me Tuesday..COULD YOU HELP ME OUT PLEASE. My therapist looked over the information that I sent her and she said that everything basically fit with what I am going through and DID. The problem is, she doe not treat dissociative disorder and ha no idea how to even help me. I appreciated her honesty though. But she said she know a therapist in Jeffersonville, IN..oh God..that treat dissociative patient but I do not drive and Carol is not going to take me over to Jville on a weekly basis for therapy. Also, we have never even been over there before so we would get lost. So, she then called her bos and another lady to see if they knew who else in Louisville could help me and to see if she can get some help on treating me. I also gave her more info on some of the thing I am dealing with and the voice that are going on. I even gave her the name of the two that I already know of. She said the fact that I cannot remember my childhood and that I not only lose time for minute but also for day that it is not normal and we need to figure out how to help me. I have been in the mental health system since and have had just about every diagnosis slapped on me. I hope I can finally get some help. I am honestly about to give up. She also said that she is going to see if they can take me off the Seroquel since it is making me sick and NOT WORKING. So, she asked me what else I have been on and I told her Haldol - did not work, Risperdal - did not work, Zyprexa - did not work, Paxil Paxil CR - worked for a little bit then wore off, Wellbutrin - did not work . She said that she want to try Depakote, Abilify, or another mood stabilizer. I also took those two journal entry in that I posted last week so she could read them. Getting motivated to get help I wa diagnosed with a mood disorder and PTSD . year ago. Now all I do is this stupid part-time job. I should probably quit because it make me incredibly suicidal. It is all so superficial. It doe not feel beneath me but I really just do not mesh with it. Anyway. Health insurance. I cannot figure out how to fill out the income stuff. A hospital near me ha people that can help but I just cannot find the motivation to even call them. It is like I am trying to prevent myself from getting help. It is not even just psychiatric reason that I want health insurance. I have a referral for a neurologist. I have been having memory issues, twitches, etc. I know I will not go without insurance. I probably could stand to get on birth control and check out some other persistent problem too but a I know I will not be taken seriously and b the only thing I genuinely like about myself is my mind so that is the priority. I am not completely not trying. I will take St. John is Wort if I am persistently suicidal but it doe not help with motivation. I have been going to support groups. I will decide to be motivated but end up collapsed and sobbing before I get out of the door. Play music, leave my phone behind so I do not get sidetracked. Tell people what I am doing so I feel pressured to keep my word. Incentivize with promise of fast food, caffeine, or chocolate. I dunno what else to do. I cannot even tell if it is laziness or depression or something else. The only thing that motivates me to go to work is fear which is also the main thing that prevents me from quitting.

A Letter to My Future Self Self Love Dear future B, This letter may be fragmented. This letter may be short, or it may be long. This letter may be emotional. Most importantly, this letter is to show you that you can stay grounded despite the rush of emotion you experience when you feel vulnerable and falsely unloved. Everything you thought you knew since that day October st ha become unraveled within the last fourteen hours. It is hard to find the word that can sum it all up in order to save some time and space within this letter. This letter is also not about those specific event but about you and only you, and how far you have come it all play into being able to deal with whatever the future may bring. As you admitted this morning, to yourself and G, your sense of clarity evaporates when you begin to feel vulnerable. It lead you to a self-fulfilling prophecy - the exact neediness you exhibit will do the exact opposite of what you would like it to do and will therefore lead you to feeling ever more needy. Listen to me You are not validated by someone is ability or lack thereof to love you. And again Sometimes, it is not simply not about you. So far in your healing process you have managed to understand the importance of detachment. You are making wonderful progress and I hope that at some point you are still progressing. Your existence is for you and for you only. It is not okay or healthy to live solely for another human being. Remember that you are not incomplete without someone however that someone can enhance the you that you already are. A relationship consists of two people working together a a whole yet existing a their own sense of wholeness outside of the relationship. That is so very important for you to remember for the rest of your life. Remember when you felt vulnerable just a few week ago sometime in November and wanted to dive into texting that boy in order to make you feel better about yourself? And then remember that you did not because you kept your clarity and understood that it wa a coping mechanism. Do not forget that you have done that not only once but a few time now and that is exceptional. I understand future Bri may encounter some setback and that her well-being might a well be a roulette wheel, but that is exactly what this letter is for. As you have been told, you are luminous. You shine bright. Your heart is almost too huge. You have the potential to do great things. You are not your illness and you are not your insecurities. The grave you will lay in one day will only consist of you and nobody else. If the world end and you survive, you have yourself. You have to keep this mind every single day. Work on self love and understand your worth. Yes, G make you feel like the most important girl in the world. But before you can let him do that, you need to understand that you are the most important girl in the world to yourself, for yourself. You are done putting your interest aside just to receive love for the night day. You are done with getting angry at the phone for not getting response quickly. You are done feeling unimportant or unloved because you are not someone is first priority. In the month and a half since the breakup, you have transformed. It is only the beginning but you have taken step in the right direction. Future B need to look back on this whether she is in a good spot at the time or not. She need to know that even though she may not be at a point in life she envisioned, she did something for herself. When you feel like he is pulling away, do not push harder. When you feel like you want to run to him in order to silence your overwhelmingly surfacing insecurities, understand that will not make thing better. Understand that they are amplified and you are only expressing coping mechanism in order to deal with the underlying issue. The issue is not that he doe not love you but that you make yourself unloveable. Understand that when you get into that mindset and lose grasp of the clarity, someone moving mountain for you will not fill that hole of pain. The only person on the face of this Earth that can fill that hole is you. You have the capability of moving mountain on your own when you remember these things. Continue doing your research. Continue taking time for yourself. Continue setting your phone down for hour at a time. Continue living your life out and letting others play a part and not the center role. You are the star of your life, you lead the show. Your family, friends, boyfriend, colleague - they play their role in your story. Most importantly, they play their lead role in their own story and similarly you are character. Learn to appreciate silence. Learn to appreciate a bit of loneliness and solitude. Self-love includes coming home from work to take a hot bath and drink a glass of red wine, not rushing over to whoevers house in order to feel loved by someone else. You cannot be loved appropriately if you cannot love yourself first. Is not it just like me to start taking the advice I have been given by so many people my entire life. Love yourself. Respect yourself. Appreciate your own time. Respect others. Respect other is need for space. Live for you. Again, love yourself. With love, B, .

I kinda like being depressed after dealing with anxiety As a lot of people, I have both depression and anxiety disorders. Basically a thing happened in July, which caused me to have constant panic attack and overall brutal anxiety until around October, when I just transitioned into deep depression. It wa however a big relief. I wa completely empty, I did not care about anything. It wa x better to me than fucking anxiety. When I am depressed, I do not feel bad . I do not feel good either, but I am fine with that. I do not feel anything, it is kinda relaxing. The downside - when I wa in the deepest state of depression I wa really close to killing myself and I also threatened to shoot up the school, after which police took me to a mental hospital. I have been here for over month now. I did some really bad things, I acted really bad, but on the inside I felt better. When I am anxious I do not do mean thing to people, but on the inside I am dying, I feel vulnerable and just want help. I understand that depression is awful and people suffer from it, I see what it doe to people on this sub. I just wanted to add my experience, since it is different to everyone else is. Anxiety make me feel like I am having a heart attack, like I am going crazy, I sweat, I shake, it feel literally like torture. Depression is the exact opposite. It is calmness, not giving a shit about anything, basically relaxing. I feel kinda comfortable being depressed. I lie on the bed and look at the ceiling, at the wall, whatever. Like I am on autopilot. Right now I have both, which just feel fucking weird, I cannot even describe that. Sorry if I offended anyone. I know some people prefer to feel something, but I am fine with being an empty shell. tlr - depression gt anxiety for me.

Hello, I am Yevgenny, year old, and have suffered from depression for..well..I guess a long a I can remember. I started having suicidal thought when I wa , but strangely enough, I cannot remember having at that age any concept of suicide. I have been placed on practically all of the antidepressant over the year with the exception of MAOIs , and am currently taking Cymbalta--no real side effects, seems effective enough. My father died when I wa , but that in itself wa not so sad. Last September, I had a sudden thought regarding my feeling about his death, and I found the most heartbreaking aspect was, like I said, not the fact that he died, but that the process of dying wa for him degrading and humiliating. Like me, he wa very independent--if he needed help with something, he considered himself defeated he wa content in his own world, like I am, but the magnitude of something like death forced people into his world..those intangible connection between ourselves and others, between him and others, seemed to chain him down. When I had my last breakdown in September, I could not stop myself from imagining it to find yourself suddenly and wholly dependent on others, and for them to force themselves into your mind, your world, and find for themselves some memory or happy relic to take with them such that even your most private, perhaps sacred thought and memory are wrenched from you. I thought about what it must have been like to know with certainty that death wa all that wa left, the helplessness of not being able to face your own future without someone either doing it for you or having earlier robbed you of the existential will power to do it. I attempted to hang myself after my morning classes. I am not sure how, but before kicking the chair away, I forced myself to call someone because the world is so huge, and I have only had the chance to see such a small part of it, to die then, would have been so meaningless and empty--the very thing I wa attempting to escape, meaninglessness and emptiness. The friend I called left work immediately and came to me. She cried in one afternoon more than I ever have, and she wa not even the depressed one. So, fast forward to today. Did some inpatient care. I am seeing a therapist whom I trust, respect, and have thus far been unable to outwit it is a good thing. On a physiological basis, the medication is helping. Psychologically however, I have got some work to do. Ignoring biological chemical factors, in order for me to be happy, I need to find build understand the meaning of my life. I do not believe that man is born with an inherent raison d etre, or that one is given to him by some divine entity rather, I believe that the meaning of one is life is self-constructed and in continual flux, it is something you work on, something you subsist upon, and yet is something that is always just out of reach, or one brush stroke undone. Not an easy job. But last week I wa on my front porch at around pm having a cigarette I am keeping this habit for now. Everything wa still, the air still cold with winter but with trace of spring on every tree, the cloud were lit from below and the west, it wa like a painting but it wa this oddly static scene that gave me the most lucid understanding of myself, that unstoppable, dynamic thing we call self. And so, more than ever before, I am going to take treatment seriously and honestly even if there is sadness, those chance moment of serenity that make up for in intensity what they lack in length, in those instance I think I will find meaning, no, I already have, I suppose. I apologize for how lengthy this became, but I am guessing it wa somehow necessary for me to say. I am looking forward to talking with the other member of the forum, a I do not think I have ever talked to others who were depressed. Even if I do not find much help here, there might be someone who find such help in me. Thanks! And, again, I will try to keep future post shorter, but in my defense, sometimes when I write I do not feel in control..oh, starting to go off again. Ok, I am going to stop now.

Nothing really interest me enough to do it for like year of my life, and the thing I would be interested in have literally no way of making a living off of or is something totally unachievable. I feel like I cannot make any difference to anyone in the world, and I will die not making an impression on anyone or having anyone really care about me in the end. It is extremely satisfying and I feel like it is a good thing to punish myself for being such a waste. So that is pretty much the gist of it, I guess? Mostly just problem with self worth and having others view me a certain way. There is some other stuff, but nothing that I can really think of at the top of my head. These past month have been excruciating, and I have not gone a day without thinking I should just end it all and give up. I want to be happy, but that just seems so far away and I do not know if me living benefit anyone. Admittedly, I do not want to die, but I do at the same time? I feel like I have no place in the world and I cannot talk to anyone about how I am feeling because none of them are actually willing to hear what I have to say, so now I am just dumping my feeling on Reddit. I am tired of living and feeling like shit. I do not remember the last time I genuinely felt happy to be alive. I want someone I am close to tell me that they love me and care about me and say I am not a useless piece of garbage and that what I say is not meaningless or invalid. I do not want to feel alone. I do not ask to feel alone. I feel alone because I am alone, and I feel like I cannot tell anyone this because I do not want them to walk out of my life. I am sorry if this seemed really petty and like I am just bitching about some shitty first world problems, because I know I am. I just feel kinda down right now and I have not been able to tell someone how I actually feel in months. So yeah. Thanks for reading, stranger. Sorry for the inconvenient text wall.

Hi! We are YourAmigo Hi! I am A.M. and I am writing to introduce a new initiative named YourAmigo. Basically we are a group of friend that have to decided to form this initiative to help anyone who need an amigo Spanish word for friend . We work by assigning anyone who want it, an amigo with whom you can talk about anything. We do not accept donations, though if anyone want to help u or ha any suggestions, feel free to contact us. Let me explain who we are We are not therapists, and we realize that we are not capable of solving your problems, or even comprehend your pain but we can listen to you. We want to hear your stories, we want you to tell u whatever you would like to say. In the end we just want you to feel heard. And of course, you will never be judged. You know guys, we have all been there, in that cold and lonely place. For some, this place will be terrifying and called depression, for others it might be something le severe. But we do not care. If it is important enough for you to feel bad about it, then it would be an honor for u to hear about it. Here is how we work below you have the email address where you can find us. Please write us. In your first email, you can tell u anything you want, though a little bit of your story is always welcomed though not required! . And that is it! Here is our email address youramigoam.com And that is it! Last but not least, I want to thank you for reading this far. I really encourage you to text us. Moreover feel free to copy and paste this message in any other forum the more people that read this, the more people we can help! See you soon! A.M.

Does anyone else miss the person they used to be? I have always struggled with depression, but sometimes it is more manageable than other times. I have noticed that with every new year and myself getting older, I begin to look back on my past and long for it, even sometimes breaking down because I miss the person I used to be. I am , so still young, but I really wish I could go back and be again because that wa when I wa truly happy. I had moved out of my hometown, had lot of friends, a good relationship, I lost ton of weight and wa confident for the first time ever, I traveled and worked for fun instead of working a a mean of survival. I loved life, I had so much energy and such a bright outlook on everything and I had a lot of fun. Now, that is all over. I really only have one good friend left from those time and he doe not even live near me anymore sometimes I get really down when I think about old friend and start thinking about thing I could have said differently that might have prevented the argument we had that would eventually lead to the end of our friendship, I really never knew how much I needed them until they no longer wanted me in their lives. My relationship fizzled out in the same way and I have yet to develop a connection like that with anyone again. I have also gained all my weight back and cannot stand to look at my own reflection. I do not know how to be happy like I wa again. I look at old picture from time past with old friends, destination I went too and I want to cry because I just wish I could go back. I am so depressed and hate myself, I am incredibly lonely and am just a shell of the person I used to be. It is like I am mourning my past life or something.

I made a word cloud of all my depressive post over the past three years. This is based on all the post on my throwaway account this is my main account and ha too many unrelated post to sort through since . I think it is noteworthy that some of the biggest word in the cloud are negative. While going back over these post from so relatively long ago, I noticed that most of the older one seemed like they were written by a total stranger. If it were somebody else saying those thing about me, it would be called harassment, but it wa me saying those thing about myself. All in all, this ha really made me realize that all the thing I have written about myself are way off-base, and are only true in my mind during a depressive episode. I know something is wrong, but I do not know what to do about it. In some way I am sure I will always think this way about myself, regardless of what I do, but I wish there were an easy way to manage it. I used this word cloud generator. Cheers.

What is the point in living? Obviously with the title you would think I am sad and hate myself or am severely suicidal. In reality, there is truth to that, but I seriously do not see a point in living. I have tried different thing to try and discover myself like spending dollar on camera equipment thinking maybe photography is my calling only to return it the next week. I have bought a jeep thinking maybe overlanding or off-roading is my thing and now I am in the process of selling it. I have friend that I hang out with once a month. I have real life friend that I text occasionally. I have not had a girlfriend in several year now. Mind you I turn year old tomorrow. I do not know what the next step in my life is? Who am I? Is there something more to me than just working then going home just to sleep all day? I have had a small problem with taking pain killer like oxy, vicodin, and codeine. I just do not find any joy in any part of my life. I do not want to die, but at the same time I would not mind not waking up tomorrow. I just want a passion. Something to live for. I do not want to be like this, but I have tried different thing all my life and I have lost all joy. Is there a way to discover myself? Is that even an actual thing? What am I missing in my life? I just want to look forward to living another day rather than dreading it. To clarify, I do not consider myself suicidal. I do not WANT to die. I WANT a reason to be alive.

I cannot seem to be happy with my current life - only the future So I wa diagnosed with mood swing mild depression quite a while ago, and have been on a small dose of Fluoxetine Prozac most of my life now. Based on looking at objective measures, I should be feeling pretty content right now, but I cannot seem to be happy about it, and only about the thing that I hope I will work towards in the future. I guess for example - I have lost a little over pound since February, the first significant time I have actually lost weight, and I am now no longer medically obese.. but I still just feel fat and have not been able to feel anything good about the weight I have actually lost. I have a great job, and am just about to finish paying off all my loans, but I do not feel any accomplishment in that either. I keep thinking maybe I will feel good when I have enough to put down a down-payment on a house, but I doubt that will be the case. I have a bunch of great friends, but I am tired of being single again. I know that I should just focus on the good thing right now, but it is not seeming to be any consolation. My faith life ha been doing pretty good recently too, especially compared to the past, but I still feel like a shitty person a lot. I dunno, I know that so many other people are having a rough time and I should be happy with how thing are going, but I am just down right now.

Coming to term with life long depression It is always going to be there in my life, like a dark cloud creeping in on a sunny day, and I am okay with that. After long year of battling depression and going through the high and low that come with it and after dedicating myself to therapy, medication and lifestyle change I have finally accepted that I am going to have to learn to live with depression for the rest of my life. It is my strength, it is my weakness and it make my life unique.

Or at least I hope I will because if not they hate me more than I can imagine. I feel awful about even saying that, I see the weakness in that statement, the defeatism, but that doe not make it any le true.

Psychiatrist of year terminated me a a patient and is refusing refill of Lamictal because I went to outpatient rehab? I have been going to the same psychiatrist for years. I have been on a high dose of Lamictal for year to treat bipolar disorder. I have gone to regular appointment and have had consistent refills. I had a period of intense depression in which I went on a one month drinking binge and went to a hospital where I wa given Ativan to deal with the withdrawal. It wa not a consistent prescription, just enough pill to ween off the withdrawal and ensure I would not relapse back to drinking. My psychiatrist just called me and told me she is terminating me a a patient and is unable to see me or refill my lamictal because I wa prescribed Ativan by another physician. I am freaking out about the effect of stopping this cold turkey. I only took the Ativan for one week, two month ago. I just want to have my lamictal refilled. I need a refill this week, I cannot find a new psychiatrist in time. How is this allowed? I sought emergency treatment for a substance abuse issue and am being unsafely yanked off a medicine I have been on my entire adult life. Help please

Hi all, I am in hell of major depression. After being for over year on Elavil and Valium small dosage , with good result for most of the time, I tapered down because of the side effect and have been drug free for year. During this year the depression slowly settled in making my life unbearable lately. I do not know what to do. I saw psychiatrist within last month. One of them wanted me on Paxil and the second one on Effexor. Problem is I am so afraid of side effect that I cannot begin taking any of them, meantime my life is falling to pieces. My nervous system wa completely messed up by these medicines. I had severe fasciculation of muscle for over month after being medicine free sign of tardive dyskinesia, untreatable neurological condition and get them back whenever I try any supplement that would increase serotonin level SAMe, St. John is Wort, Rhodiola . My memory got better after I stopped the medication but now it is falling apart because of the depression I get de-realized I mean if depression will not kill me these medicine will. What are my alternative if any ? Shall I take these medicines, for the time being, endure side effect and expose myself to degenerative damage? Shall I stay away from medicine and get incapacitated by depression? Is there any alternative treatment for major depression? I would appreciate any advice. Dania

I do not wanna die, but I ai not keen on livin either. Sorry for the Robbie lyric. I just want to vocalize a bit before the rare fancy pass and I go back to soldiering on alone. I am sorry if this ramble or doe not quite make sense, but if I leave the stream of consciousness or reread I will probably delete because I loathe the idea of complaining to others or whinging knowing full well I have probably got it better than most people here. But a part of me want to know that someone else experience depression the same way, a some small solace. I am never particularly sad, nor do I hate or wish harm upon myself or my life or the people in it. However, in every waking moment I have a weight emanating from my core, like a gravitational pull sucking in my ability to want anything meaningful. The best way I can put it is in the title - I simply do not want to be . And that is not because I am overwhelmed by hardship or struggle, I have got it pretty good and there is nowhere I would rather be. If, hypothetically, you took me back to before my birth and laid out an incredible life for me and said alright, you are about to be born, ready to go? I would say no thanks, I am good . With a core belief like that there is no life to live. Career advancement serf no purpose but to consume more time, and I would be taking a good job from someone who actually get some personal value out of it. Romance is off the card because someone who want to date someone who doe not want anything from life, probably also is not worth being with. And heaven forbid someone should want kids! Hey Junior, daddy doe not like his existence but he had you anyway, what an asshole. I should stop before I become some combination of old man yell at cloud and whiny emo stereotype . This stuff sits on me every day and I wish the small part of me that want the affirmation of others wa not there. But it is, so here I am.

Hey reddit, give me one moment. Take a deep breath. Release yourself of your role and see yourself a a person dealing with other people. Take a moment right now, take a deep breath and appreciate how there is so much effort taken in making the world a it is. We harnessed the element and made the surface of the world a little more enjoyable. Sit back and enjoy all this hard work. Strip the world off from labels. People do not mean to be good or bad. Remember that after you acomplish or not all your goal we are still people living with other people. Remember today. Take another deep breath, if you are comfortable, close your eyes. Appreciate whats around you, good or bad. Maybe the day is really ugly. Remember again that it is on around it own business. Do not see it about yourself, but instead look at your role in the big picture. Have a smile. You deserve it

Im a mess and I need to rant. Every so often, I will find a glimmer of hope and try my hardest to change my life. I will start exercising and eating healthy, and pushing myself to talk to people, and I will actually feel pretty good for a few days. Then I just stop. I will wake up one day and and have absolutely no desire to be healthy anymore and slip right back into feeling like shit and hating myself because I cannot commit to the simplest of things. This is probably the fourth time it is happened in the past year. I made some really bad choice today regarding food, which made me feel so much worse because in my eyes, my worth a a human being is directly tied to the shape of my body. Nobody could ever convince me that it is not. This past bought of motivation, I tried to convince myself that I wa going to exercise and eat right for the sake of my health, but in the back of my mind, I knew the only real reason wa because I wanted to lose weight. And now here I am, completely abandoned diet and exercise and right back into the throw of depression. All I want to do anymore is lay in bed and try to fall asleep. I do not have a job or the desire to have one and I lost most of my friend because I never talked to them. I live with my mom who I thought I could talk to about anything, but I feel like I cannot tell her about how bad it is gotten. It doe not help that she tell me everyday that I need to get a job. I know she is right, but it make me feel like an even bigger piece of garbage because I have never held down a job for more than months. If I got a job right now, I would probably have a breakdown and quit the first week. I went through cosmetology school and put myself into debt just to wind up hating the field and trying to lie to myself that I did not. I thought it wa all about doing hair, but it turn out it is all about trying to get people to buy some shitty hair product. I know my outlook on the world is fucked up, but I do not know how to change myself. It is like all these negative thought are engraved in the back of my skull. I just feel like I am stuck and any move I make is the wrong one. Sorry this is all over the place, I am just really deep into it right now and needed to vent.
